. sotnas meres arap sueD ed açitsuj ad oçivres oa es-meugertne aroga sioP . seõçca sám meretemoc arap edadiuqini à e azerupmi à sovarcse omoc es-mavagertne etnemagitnA . sasioc satse redneerpmoc me mêt euq edadlucifid ad asuac rop memoh omoc olaf uE
. sueD ed açitsuj ad oçivres oa meracif arap odacep od sodatrebil maroF
. adaifnoc iof sov euq anirtuod an átse euq olpmexe o oãçaroc o odot ed aroga meuges odacep od sovarcse odis áj odnet euqrop , sueD a saçarg uod saM
. oãçacifitsuj a arap sueD a maçedebo reuq ; etrom a arap odacep oa maçedebo reuq , omsem missa É . ehl-recedebo ed mêt méugla ed oçivres oa oãtse es euq meb otium mebaS
. amuhnen arienam eD ? sueD ed açarg à sam iel à sotiejus somatse oãn áj euqrop racep somaV ? oãtne rasnep euQ
. sueD ed açarg à sam iel à sotiejus oãtse oãn siop , ranimod áredop sov oãn áj odacep O
. açitsuj ed otnemurtsni mu oproc ossov od maçaf e adiv à etrom ad marassap euq saossep omoc sueD a es-meugertne , oirártnoc oleP . açitsujni ed sotnemurtsni omoc odacep oa oproc ossov od sorbmem so meugertne oãN
. seõçanilcni sám saus sà recedebo a o-odnavel latrom oproc ossov o erbos redop ahnet siam acnun odacep o euQ
. suseJ otsirC moc oãinu me sueD arap soviv sam , odacep o arap sotrom omoc mébmat es-meredisnoc , odom omsem oD
. sueD arap adiv é uebecer euq avon adiv a e erpmes arap zev amud odacep o arap uerrom otsirC , etrom aus aleP
. ele erbos redop áret siam acnun etrom A . árerrom oãn áj , adiv à etrom ad odassap ret rop , otsirC euq somebaS
. ele moc somereviv mébmat euq somatiderca , otsirC moc somerrom són eS
. odacep od ervil átse uerrom euq eleuqA
. odacep od sovarcse siam somres oãn arap e lam ed aivah són me euq o odíurtsed res arap , zurc an otsirC moc uerrom setna somaré són euq oliuqa euq somebaS
. adiv à etrom ad megassap an ele a sodinu ratse ed somevah mébmat , aus a omoc etrom amu rop ele a sodinu somatse eS
. iaP od onivid redop olep etrom ad uoticsusser euq eled açnahlemes à adiv avon amu mébmat reviv somedop missA . etrom aus an etrap somámot e otsirC moc sodatlupes somof , omsitpab oleP
? etrom aus an ele moc sodinu somácif , otsirC suseJ a sodinu somratse arap sodazitpab somof euq so , són sodot euq mebas oãN
? odacep me adnia reviv somaíredop omoc , odacep o arap somerrom euq , sóN . muhnen odom eD
? sueD ed açarg a ratsefinam es siam arap , odacep on reviv a raunitnoc somaV ? oãtne somerid euQ
. rohneS osson , otsirC suseJ rop anrete adiv a arap açitsuj alep anier sueD ed açarg a mébmat , etrom an uonier odacep o omoc missa euq odom eD
. sueD ed açarg a avadnuba siam , avatnemua odacep o siam otnauq saM . odacep o siam ratnemua rezaf oiev iel A
. sueD ed etnaid sotsuj manrot es sodot ós mu ed aicnêidebo alep , serodacep maranrot es sodot memoh ós mu ed aicnêidebosed alep omoc sioP
. snemoh so sodot a adiv ád euq oãçacifitsuj a exuort açitsuj ed otca ós mu mébmat missa , oãçanednoc a sodot a exuort memoh ós mu ed odacep o omoc missA
. otsirC suseJ , ós mu ed oiem rop , adiv an oãranier açitsuj ad mod o e açarg ad aicnâdnuba a mebecer euq seleuqa oãzar siam otium moc , memoh essed sévarta uonier etrom a , memoh ós mu ed asnefo alep , es sioP
. oãçacifitsuj a exuort sodacep sotnat ed sioped odidecnoc mod o sam , oãçanednoc à uovel ós mu ed odacep od otnemagluj o , otiefe moC . memoh ós mu ed odacep o evet euq saleuqad setnerefid otium saicnêuqesnoc met sueD ed mod O
. roirepus otium é , otsirC suseJ , memoh ós mu ed oiem rop sueD ed mev son euq mod essE . roiam otium é sueD ed mod o euq edadrev é mébmat , ós mu ed odacep od asuac rop uerrom oãditlum ednarg amu euq otrec é eS . sueD ed mev son euq mod oa es-rarapmoc edop oãn oãdA ed odacep o saM
. riv ed aivah euq eleuqa avatneserper oãdA . sueD a uecedebosed euq oãdA ed açnahlemes à odacep oditemoc mahnit oãn euq seleuqa erbos omsem redop evet etrom a , sésioM ed opmet oa éta oãdA ed opmet o edsed , euq adivúd meS
. odacep o atnoc me ahnit oãn sueD , iel aivah oãn adnia omoc saM . odnum on odacep o aitsixe áj sésioM ed ieL ad setnA
. maracep sodot euq áj , etneg a adot uignita etrom a euq missa ioF . etrom a oiev odacep o moc e odnum on odacep o uortne memoh ós mu roP
. oãçailicnocer a somebecer aroga meuq rop , rohneS osson , otsirC suseJ ed oiem rop sueD me airgela somitnes sóN . odut é oãn adnia E
! adiv aus alep sovlas someres sodailicnocer odnatse siam otnauq , ohliF ues od etrom alep ele moc sodailicnocer somof , sueD ed sogimini somaré odnauq , es sioP
. lanif ogitsac od servil someres eled oiem rop oãzar siam otium moc , eugnas ues olep sodacifitsuj somos euq aroga E . sueD moc seõçaler saob me somatse aroga són , etrom aus aleP
. són rop uerrom otsirC , serodacep somaré adnia odnauq , siop ama son otnop euq éta son-uortsom sueD saM
. aob aossep amu rop adiv a rad ed zapac ajes méugla zevlat , otcaf eD . etneconi essof ale euq omsem , aossep amu rop rerrom méugla licífid otium aireS
. serodacep són rop uerrom , opmet odived ues on , otsirC , sazeuqarf sasson san somaíviv adnia són odnauq , edadrev aN
. sueD ed mod é euq otnaS otirípsE od oiem rop , roma ues o moc oãçaroc o son-uehcne sueD euqrop , anagne son oãn açnarepse atsE
. açnarepse a zudorp azemrif a e sedadlucifid san retcárac ed azemrif a acovorp açnarevesrep a
; açnarevesrep a zudorp otnemirfos o euqrop , sotnemirfos sosson son airgela somitnes són , adnia siaM
. sueD ed airólg an etrap ramot ed açnarepse asohlivaram a son-ád ossi E . somet aroga euq sueD moc ainomrah atse somiugesnoc són euq éf alep e otsirC ed oiem rop ioF
. otsirC suseJ rohneS osson rop sueD moc zap me somatse , éf alep sodacifitsuj somof euq zev amu , otnatroP
. oãçacifitsuj asson arap uoticsusser e sodacep sosson sod asuac rop etrom à eugertne iof elE
. sotrom so ertne ed rohneS osson suseJ uoticsusser euq eleuqan somatiderca euq són a , atnoc me adit áres éf a meuq a són arap mébmat satircse maroF
. ele arap ós satircse marof oãn ” adatiderc ehl-iof “ sarvalap sa arO
. açitsuj omoc adatiderc ehl-iof éf aus a ossi roP
. etemorp euq oliuqa rirpmuc ed redop o met sueD euq ed azetrec emrif a ahnit siop
, sueD a serovuol ued e etrof siam adnia es-uonrot éf aus a , sueD ed assemorp ad raifnocsed e éf a redrep ed zev mE
. sohlif ret aidop oãn araS euq rebas oa e adiv mes esauq áj oproc ues on rasnep oa ueceuqarfne oãn éf aus a sam , sona mec esauq ahnit oãarbA
. aicnêdnecsed aut a áres missA : otid ahnit sueD euq o emrofnoc , seõçan satium ed iap es-uonrot missa e uotiderca oãarbA , açnarepse aivah oãn áj odnauq omseM
. maitsixe oãn euq sasioc sa ritsixe zaf e sotrom soa adiv ád euq sueD o , uotiderca meuq me sueD ed oãçangised rop iap iof elE . seõçan satium ed iap o it ed zif uE : arutircsE adargaS an zid es omoc lat
, són sodot ed lautiripse iap o é oãarbA missA . sésioM ed ieL ad oãs euq so arap ós oãn e ele omoc éf mêt euq oãarbA ed setnednecsed so sodot arap rolav met assemorp a , odom etseD . açnareh asse mev euq éf alep é otnatroP
. seõssergsnart áh oãn iel áh oãn edno e ogitsac o iarta iel a sioP
. rolav airet oãn sueD ed assemorp a e litúni aires éf a , soriedreh so messof sésioM ed ieL ad oãs euq so es , otiefe moC
. éf ad sévarta odacifitsuj odis ret rop sam , iel à odicedebo ret oãarbA rop iof oãn assemorp assE . açnareh omoc odnum o rebecer ed maivah euq setnednecsed sues soa e oãarbA a uetemorp sueD
. odadicnucric res ed setna uortsom oãarbA iap osson o euq éf ed olpmexe o meuges mébmat sam , oãsicnucric a marebecer ós oãn euq seleuqad , é otsi , sodadicnucric oãs euq sod iap etnemlaugi É
. sodacifitsuj majes sele mébmat euq arap , sodadicnucric meres mes sueD me meêrc euq so sodot ed lautiripse iap o é oãarbA missa E . odadicnucric res ed setna éf alep ahnit áj ele euq açitsuj ad oles omoc oãsicnucric ad lanis o uebecer euq é sioped óS
. setna iof euq oralC ? setna iof uo oãsicnucric ad sioped ioF ? uecetnoca ossi euq é odnauq saM
. açitsuj omoc adatiderc iof ehl oãarbA ed éf a euq somamrifa sóN ? sueduj-oãn so arap mébmat uo sueduj so arap ós áres edadicilef atse arO
. sodacep sues so atnoc me amot oãn rohneS o meuq a eleuqa zilef , miS
! sodacep so uoodrep meuq a seleuqa , satlaf sa uoodrep sueD meuq a seleuqa sezileF
: sarbo saus sà rirefer es mes acifitsuj sueD meuq a seleuqad edadicilef ad alaf divaD euq missa É
. sarbo sad asuac rop oãn e éf aus ad asuac rop , odacifitsuj ajes ele euq moc zaf sueD , rodacep o atieca euq , sueD me êrc méugla es odutnoC
. adivíd omoc sam , atrefo amu omoc odíubirta é ehl oãn ossi E . oirálas mu ebecer ahlabart euq eleuqa , meb arO
. açitsuj omoc odatiderc iof ehl ossi e sueD me uerc oãarbA : otiepser esse a zid arutircsE a saM
. sueD me oãn e ossin ohlugro ritnes airedop oãtne , uocitarp euq sarbo sad asuac rop odacifitsuj iof eS
? ele moc uossap es euQ ? oãarbA odassapetna osson od són somerid euQ
. rolav oriedadrev ues o iel à somecehnocer , oirártnoc oleP . muhnen odom eD ? iel à rolav o odot somagen són , éf ad asuac rop , euq rezid otsi reuQ
. sueduj-oãn so omoc sueduj so otnat acifitsuj , éf ad oiem rop , euq sueD ós mu áh otiefe moC
! mis euq oralC ? sovop sortuo sod sueD etnemlaugi ele é oãN . sueduj sod sueD o sanepa aires sueD odom ortuoD
. iel ad sarbo sad otnemirpmuc olep oãn e éf alep odacifitsuj é memoh o euq somaredisnoc sóN
. éf met es euqrop etnemoS . oãN ? iel ad saicnêgixe sa merirpmuc roP ? ritsixe airedop oãzar euQ . muhnen ovitom áh oãN ? rahlugro es méugla arap ovitom o otnatrop átse ednO
. suseJ me meêrc euq so acifitsuj e otsuj é sueD siop , etneserp opmet on açitsuj aus a rartsnomed arap ol-êF
. soditemoc setna sodacep so odagitsac , aicnêicap aus an , odnet oãn , açitsuj aus a uortsom ele euq missa ioF . elen meêrc euq so arap oãdrep ed otnemurtsni essanrot es , etrom aus alep , otsirC euq moc zef sueD
. odacep od redop od uotrebil so euq otsirC suseJ ed oiem rop etnematiutarg acifitsuj so sueD , adiceremi edadnob aus alep saM
. sueD ed airólg ad sodavirp oãtse e maracep sodoT
. saossep ed açnerefid revah mes , otsirC suseJ me meêrc euq so sodot arap missa É . otsirC suseJ me éf ad oiem rop sadacifitsuj majes saossep sa euq moc zaf sueD
. ossi mavorp euq sateforp so e sésioM ed ieL airpórp a é E . iel ad oiem rop res mes , ele rop sadacifitsuj oãs saossep sa euq é omoc son-uortsom sueD aroga saM
. serodacep somos euq é somebas euq o , iel aleP . sueD rop odacifitsuj é méugla euq iel ad otnemirpmuc olep é oãn sioP
. sueD ed otnemagluj oa etiejus es odot odnum o euq e saplucsed mejnarra oãn e melac es sodot euQ . iel à sotiejus oãtse euq so arap é iel ad orvil o zid euq o odut euq somebas són arO
. sueD ed romet muhnen mêt oãN
zap ad ohnimac o mecehnoc oãn e
massap edno rop aníur e oãçiurtsed maxieD
. eugnas ramarred meri arap sezolev mahnimac sép sues sO
oãçidlam e rocnar ed aiehc átse acob aus A
soibál sues sod ias setnepres ed oneneV ; managne sele , augníl aus a moC . otreba orclupes mu omoc é atnagrag aus A
. ós mu meN . meb o açaf meuq áh oãN . medrep es sodot e ohnimac od arof madna sodoT
. sueD a euqsub euq méugnin áh oãn ; adneerpmoc euq méugnin áh oãN
. méugniN . otsuj ajes euq méugnin áh oãN : arutircsE adargaS a zid missA
. odacep olep sodanimod oãtse sueduj-oãn so omoc sueduj so otnat euq racilpxe a odatse ohneT ! muhnen odom eD ? sortuo so euq od serohlem someres sueduj so sóN ? oãtne rezid euQ
. sodanednoc etnematsuj oãres sessE . ossi rezid ue ed em-masuca snuglA ? » meb o ahnev euq arap lam o somaçaf « : rezid oãn euq rop oãtnE
? rodacep omoc odanednoc adnia res ed-ieh euq rop , airólg aus a e sueD ed edadrev a siam adnia rartsom arap evres aritnem ahnim a es saM
? odnum o ragluj airedop omoc , otsuj essof oãn sueD eS . oãn euq oralC
. memoh omoc olaF ? agitsac son euqrop otsujni sueD áreS ? són somerid euq , sueD ed edadiledif a rartsom arap evres edadiledifni asson a es saM
. odagluj serof odnauq recnev ed-sáh e otsuj sé euq rartsom ed-oãh , sueD ó , sarvalap saut sA : arutircsE a zid omoc , sosoritnem oãs snemoh so es omsem , oriedadrev áres sueD . oãn euq etnematreC
? leifni mébmat res a sueD áravel seled edadiledifni A ? maratiderca oãn snugla es oãtne ecetnoca euQ
. sueduj soa megasnem aus a uoifnoc sueD euqrop etnemariemirp E . sotcepsa sotium me ednarg É
? oãsicnucric ad rolav o é lauQ ? ueduj res ed megatnav a oãtne é lauQ
. sueD ed sam snemoh sod otnat oãn oãçavorpa a met essE . atircse iel ad oãn e otirípsE od mev euq oãsicnucric amu é otsi , oãçaroc on odadicnucric essof es omoc , etnemroiretni é o euq eleuqa é ueduj oriedadrev O
. oproc on ebecer es euq aleuqa oãsicnucric é men , etnemroiretxe artsom o euq eleuqa ueduj é oãN
. odadicnucric seres ed e atircse iel a serecehnoc ed rasepa , sedirgsnart a euq it a et-ragluj ed-áh , iel a erpmuc sam , oproc ues on odadicnucric iof oãn euq eleuqa E
. odadicnucric essof es omoc é esse , iel a adnam euq o erpmuc sam , oãsicnucric a uebecer oãn euq o , oirártnoc oleP
. odadicnucric sessof oãn es omoc é , savresbo oãn a es sam ; iel a seravresbo es , asotievorp edadrev an é oãsicnucric A
. sueD ed lam mezid sovop sortuo so euq asuac assov rop É : arutircsE adargaS a zid áL
. adnam iel a euq od oirártnoc o serezaf oa sueD a sazerpsed sam , iel a riussop ed osohlugro et-setneS
? odicerefo é sehl euq oliuqad satievorpa et euq é euq roP . sesued soslaf so satseted uT ? sacitarp o euq é euq roP . oirétluda racitarp eved es oãn euq sezid uT
? sabuor euq é euq roP . rabuor eved es oãn euq sagerp uT ? omsem it a sanisne et oãn euq rop , sortuo so sanisne euq ut arO
. iel ad edadrev ad e otnemicehnoc od essop an seratse otsiv , saçnairc ed rodacude mu e setnarongi ed ertsem mu et-sagluJ
. savert san madna euq so arap zul amu , sogec ed aiug mu omoc et-saredisnoC
. rohlem é euq o rehlocse a et-anisne iel a e sueD ed edatnov a secehnoC
. sueD a serecehnoc rop osohlugro et-setnes e sésioM ed ieL an et-saiopa , ueduj et-saralced uT
. mu adac ed soderges so éta , otsirC suseJ ed oiem rop , áragluj sueD euq me aid on , oicnuna ue euq ohlegnave o moc odroca ed , rev ed-áh es euq otsi É
. sosac so emrofnoc , so-ednefed uo so-asuca e rezaf meved euq o sehl-anisne aicnêicsnoc aus ad zov A . anedro iel a euq oliuqa oãçaroc on otircse mezart euq redecorp ues olep martsoM
. somsem is arap iel a oãs sele , iel a adnam euq oliuqa etnemlarutan merpmuc , sésioM ed ieL a meret mes , sueduj oãs oãn euq so odnauq arO
. adnam iel a euq o merezaf rop sadacifitsuj oãs sam , sueD ed etnaid satsuj manrot es saossep sa euq iel a merecehnoc rop é oãn sioP
. iel a odnuges sodagluj oãres , merecehnoc a ed rasepa , macep euq so sodot saM . iel asse rop sodagluj meres mes es-medrep , sésioM ed ieL a merecehnoc mes macep euq so sodoT
. saossep ed oãçnitsid zaf oãn sueD sioP
. sueduj-oãn so arap mébmat e sueduj so arap oriemirp , meb o mezaf euq so sodot arap zap e arnoh , airólg árevah saM
. sueduj-oãn so arap mébmat e sueduj so arap oriemirp , lam o mezaf euq so sodot arap aitsúgna e otnemirfos árevaH
. açitsujni a meuges sam , edadrev a matieca oãn e ele artnoc matlover es euq soa levírret ogitsac mu árad saM
. latromi adiv e arnoh , airólg macsub e sarbo saob sa açnarevesrep moc macitarp euq soa anrete adiv a áraD
. sarbo saus sa emrofnoc mu adac a árad elE
. açnetnes atsuj aus a recehnoc a árad sueD euq me , ozíuj od aid o arap ogitsac o ratnemua a sátse ossi roP . es-redneperra reuq oãn euq odicerudne oãçaroc mu snet ut saM
? otnemidneperra oa avel et euq sueD ed edadnob a é euq sebas oãN ? aicnârelot e aicnêicap aus a , sueD ed edadnob ednarg a sazerpsed euq é omoC
? sele euq omsem o sezaf , seõçca sasse metemoc euq seleuqa seracitirc ed rasepa , es sueD ed oãçanednoc à rapacse sasnep ut euq é omoC
. sasioc siat mezaf euq seleuqa ranednoc oa oriedadrev é sueD ed otnemagluj o euq somebas sóN
. sele euq omsem o sezaf euqrop , omsem it a et-sanednoc , sol-ágluj oA . sortuo so seragluj oa aplucsed snet oãn , sajes euq reuq meuq , ossi roP
. omsem o mezaf euq sortuo so mavorpa éta sam sasioc siat mezaf ós oãn E . etrom a mecerem missa meviv euq so sodot euq sueD ed iel é euq meb otium mebas selE
. sortuo so moc arap snu sonamused e roma mes , siaelsed , aicnêicsnoc mes
, siap so moc arap sedleber , satsiugirtni , setnagorra , sosohlugro , setnelosni , sueD ed sogimini , setnezidlam es-maranroT
. sainúlac e sedadislaf , saritnem , snedrosed , semirc , sajevni , sedadlam , seõçibma , sedadisrevrep , saçitsujni ed eicépse a adot ed es-marehcnE
. maived oãn euq o merezaf arap odipmorroc otnemidnetne ues oa uonodnaba so sueD oirpórp o , sueD ed otnemicehnoc o oãçaredisnoc me marevit oãn euq zev amU
. sorre sues sod ogitsac o marebecer somsem sele e sortuo so moc snu sasohnogrev seõçca me maríaC . sortuo solep snu oãxiap ed meredra arap rehlum a moc siamron seõçaler sa maraxied snemoh so , arienam amsem aD
. azerutan a artnoc seõçaler rop siarutan seõçaler sa maradum serehlum sa étA . sasohnogrev seõxiap sà uonodnaba so sueD ossi roP
. nemÁ ! etnemanrete odaroda res eved euq ele , rodairC oirpórp o merivres e meraroda ed zev me sadairc sasioc marivres e mararodA . aritnem alep sueD ed otnemicehnoc oriedadrev o maracorT
. soproc soirpórp sues so odnarnosed sasohnogrev seõçca me maríac e seõçaroc sues sod seõxiap sà so-uonodnaba sueD ossi roP
. siamina sortuo e setnepres , seva ed snegami mararoda éta e latrom memoh od snegami mararoda , latromi sueD oa airólg merad ed zev mE
. ozíuj mêt oãn sam soibás es-meziD
. oãdirucse an es-maredrep sotasnesni seõçaroc sues so e soizav es-maranrot soinícoicar sues so , oirártnoc oleP . odived é omoc saçarg mared ehl men mararoda o oãn sam etsixe sueD euq maibas selE
. aplucsed mêt oãn ossi roP . sarbo saus san edadnivid aus a e onrete redop ues o etnemaralc uortsom levísivni é euq sueD , odnum od oãçairc a edsed , otcaf eD
. recehnoc a ued es sueD sele a mébmat sioP . sueD ed otiepser a recehnoc edop es euq oliuqa meb mecehnoc sele euqrop so-agitsac sueD
. edadrev a açehnoc es euq maxied oãn , açitsujni aus alep , euq seleuqa rop aditemoc açitsujni e edadeipmi a adot artnoc anivid ari aus a atsefinam sueD , otiefe moC
. áreviv éf alep otsuj é euq eleuqA : otircse átse omoC . éf ad oiem rop sueD ed açitsuj a alever es eleN
. sueduj-oãn so mébmat e sueduj so oriemirp , meêrc euq so sodot ravlas arap sueD ed redop o é elE . ohlegnave od ohnogrevne em oãN
. amoR me sóv a mébmat ohlegnave o raicnuna ed ojesed ednarg uem o , íaD
. setnarongi uo soibás , sodazilivic-oãn uo sodazilivic , sodot ed otnuj éta ri reved uem É
. sovop sortuo moc odicetnoca met omoc lat , otievorp mugla essavel sov mébmat ossi euq avajeseD . levíssop iof em oãn aroga éta sam , ratisiv ri sov arap sonalp suem so zif sezev satium euq rebas a meuqif euq oreuq , soãmri sueM
. ahnim alep sóv e éf assov alep ue : sortuo soa snu somemina son euq ojeseD
. éf an semrif siam menrot es euq odom ed , lautiripse mod mugla ritimsnart sov arap ratisiv ri sov ed ojesed osnemi ohnet otcaf eD
. sóv ed otnuj éta ri ed edadinutropo a aid mu êd em , edatnov aus alep , euq sueD a oçeP
. seõçaro sahnim san odrocer sov erpmes omoc ed ahnumetset é elE . ohliF ues ed otiepser a avon aob a raicnuna oa oãçaroc o odot ed ovris meuq a sueD eleuqa — ogid euq o edadrev é omoc ebas sueD
. éf assov ad alaf es etrap a adot me euqrop , sóv sodot rop saçarg uoD . otsirC suseJ ed oiem rop sueD uem oa saçarg uod , siam ed setnA
. zap e açarg meêd sov rohneS osson otsirC suseJ e iaP osson sueD euq , sotnas res a sodamahc e sueD ed sodama oãs amoR me euq so , siop , sodot A
. martnocne es mébmat soãmri so euq otsirC a recnetrep a sodamahc marof euq sod oremún on É
. emon ues od roma rop , éf ad aicnêidebo à seõçan sa sadot ed saossep sa ravel arap , olotsópa res ed oigélivirp o ibecer euq eled oiem rop ioF
. sotrom sod oãçierrusser alep , redop moc sueD ed ohliF omoc odatsefinam iof acifitnas euq otirípsE olep sam
, divaD ed etnednecsed are ele , otnemicsan oleP . otsirC suseJ rohneS osson , ohliF ues oa otiepser zid alE
. sateforp sues sod oiem rop arutircsE adargaS an oditemorp ahnit a sueD áj avon aob atsE
. sueD ed ohlegnave o raicnuna arap odihlocse , olotsópa res arap odamahc iuf e suseJ otsirC ed ovres uos , oluaP , uE

. essidepmi o méugnin euq mes , otsirC suseJ rohneS od otiepser a avanisne e sueD ed onier o etnematreba avaicnunA
. rev mai o euq so sodot aibecer ál e , odagula ahnit euq asac aleuqan rarom a sotelpmoc sona siod etnarud uocif oluaP
] . sortuo so moc snu ritucsid a arobme es-marof sueduj so , otsi essid oluaP odnauQ [
» . al-átucse ed-oãh sele e sueduj oãs oãn euq soa mébmat adaivne iof ecerefo sueD euq oãçavlas ed megasnem atse euq odnebas meuqif sioP « : adnia sehl-essid oluaP
» . raruc so ue arap , mim a meretrevnoc es men , oãçaroc o moc merednetne men , sodivuo so moc merivuo men , sohlo so moc merev oãn arap sohlo so marahcef e sodivuo so marapaT . orud es-uonrot ovop etsed oãçaroc o euqroP
. riugnitsid oãv oãn , majev euq siam rop , redneerpmoc oãv oãn , maçio euq siam roP : ovop esse a otsi rezid iaV : essid odnauq
, saíasI ateforp od oiem rop , sodassapetna sossov soa otnaS otirípsE o uolaf meB « : sehl-essid oluaP , merías ed setna saM . arobme es-mai , maidnetne es oãn omoC
. soludércni maraunitnoc sortuo sam , sarvalap saus salep sodidausrep marof snU
. sateforp son e sésioM ed ieL an es-odnaesab , suseJ ed otiepser a sol-êcnevnoc avarucorp elE . sueD ed onier od ohnumetset rad sehl ed uossec oãn , etion à éta ãhnam edseD . odajola avatse oluaP edno ragul oa éta sotium marof , odacram aid oN . atad amu oãtne maranibmoC
» . secnetrep euq a aties asse artnoc alaf es etrap a adot me euq somebas euqrop , saiedi saut sa oãs siauq acob aut ad rivuo ed somavátsog saM
. it ed lam essessid euq uo , osac o erbos saicíton essexuort euq soãmri sosson sod muhnen uogehc iuqa men , otiepser uet a aieduJ ad atrac amuhnen somebecer oãn sóN « : marednopser oãtne selE
» . setnerroc satse moc oserp uotse iuqa ue euq learsI ed ovop od açnarepse ad asuac rop etnemasicerp é siop , ralaf sov arap e rev sov arap idep euq ossi rop ioF
. ovop oirpórp uem o rasuca euq ed adan ahnet oãn arobme , rodarepmi olep odagluj res arap ridep euq evit , maresupo es sueduj so omoc saM
. etrom à ranednoc em arap ovitom muhnen marartnocne oãn euqrop em-ratlos maresiuq , meragorretni em ed sioped , setsE
. sonamor soa em-maragertne e mélasureJ me em-marednerp sueduj so , otnatne oN . sodassapetna sosson sod somebecer euq semutsoc so artnoc uo ovop osson o artnoc adan zif oãn ue , soãmri sueM « : sehl-essid e ele moc merinuer es arap amoR ed setnatropmi siam sueduj so uodivnoc oluaP , sioped said sêrT
. ol-ádraug a odadlos mu moc , oirpórp otnemajola me reviv a racif arap oãçazirotua evet oluaP , amoR a somágehc odnauQ
. odamina siam es-uitnes e sueD a uecedarga oluaP , sol-êv oA . sanrebaT sêrT e oipÁ ed açarP à éta ortnocne osson oa marof , ál arap somaí euq marebuos euq ogol , amoR me maiviv euq soãmri sO
. amoR a somágehc mif rop e , anames amu sele moc racif a maradivnoc son euq soãmri snugla somártnocne íA
. ilouzoP ed otrop oa somágehc said siod me e lus od otnev mu es-uotnavel , etniuges aid oN . oigéR ed otrop oa somragehc éta atsoc ad ognol oa somiuges ilaD
. said sêrt ál somácif e asucariS ed edadic an somácrabmeseD
. xulóP e rotsaC soemég sesued sod sarugif sa aorp à ahnit e airdnaxelA ed arE . onrevnI o ila arassap euq oivan mun somácrabme , ahli an sesem sêrt odassap odneT
. megaiv a arap somavátissecen otnauq ed odut son-mared , ovon ed somácrabme odnauq , sioped e sarnoh sa sadot moc son-maratart , zev aus rop , saossep sA
. sodaruc maracif e ele moc ret marof ahli aleuqad setneod so sodot , etnemroiretsoP
. o-uoruc e etneod od açebac a erbos soãm sa sôp , raro ed sioped , e ol-átisiv iof oluaP . airetnesid e erbef moc amac ed avatse oilbúP ed iap o , arO
. sedepsóh sues somof said sêrt etnarud e meb otium son-uebecer elE . oilbúP odamahc , ahli ad rodanrevog oa maicnetrep euq sarret samu aivah , ragul eleuqad sedadimixorp saN
. sued mu are oluaP euq rezid a maraçemoc e oãinipo ed maradum , adan aicetnoca ehl oãn euq merev ed e , opmet etnatsab merarepse ed sioped saM . etneper ed otrom essíac euq uo , essahcni ele euq mavarepse selE
. adan uerfos oãn e arieugof ad amic arap arobív a uiducas oluaP saM
» . reviv raxied iav o oãn onitsed o sam , ram od es-ravlas uiugesnoc siop , onissassa mu azetrec moc res eved memoh etsE « : sortuo soa snu maressid e oluaP ed oãm an adarudnep arobív a mariv ahli ad setnatibah sO
. oãm à ehl-es-uorraga rolac od riguf a arobív amu , otsiN . ogof on uotied euq aces ahnel ed odaçarb mu uohnapa oluaP
. aled otnuj arap son-maradivnoc e arieugof ednarg amu maredneca , oirf aizaf e revohc a avatse omoC . mumoc od arof edadilibama amu moc son-maratart setnatibah sO
. atlaM avamahc es ahli a euq somebuos , açnaruges me sodot somavátse áj odnauQ
. sovlas e soãs arret a maragehc sodot euq missa ioF . oivan od sodacob a uo saubát a sodarraga es-ravlas merarucorp arap medro ued sortuo so sodot A
. aiarp à odnagehc es-ravlas meratnet e oriemirp augá a arap meratlas arap radan maibas euq soa snedro ued , oirártnoc oleP . otcejorp esse etnaid rop ravel uoxied so oãn e oluaP ravlas aireuq laicifo o saM
. odan a essapacse es seled muhnen euq arap , sorienoisirp so ratam ed aiedi a oãtne marevit sodadlos sO
. sadno salep aditab are sárt ed etrap a otnauqne , aserp avatse etnerf A . odahlacne ila uocif e aiera ed ocnab mun uetab oivan o saM
. aiarp à oãçcerid me meriuges arap etnerf ad alev a mavatnavel e emel o mavarramased otnauqne , ram on racif san-maraxied e sarocnâ sad sobac so maratroC
. oivan o ál rahlacne ratnet marevloser e aiarp amu ahnit euq aíab amu mariv sam , arret a marecehnocer oãn soriehniram so , uecehnama odnauQ
. oivan o raivila arap ram oa ogirt o es-uotied , oãçiefer ad siopeD
. saossep sies e atnetes e satnezud , oivan on , odot oa somarÉ
. remoc a mébmat es-maresup e megaroc siam moc maracif sodoT
. remoc a uoçemoc e o-uitrap , sodot ed etnaid sueD a uecedarga , oãp on uogep oluaP , otsi odneziD
» . olebac mu reuqes men redrep iav iuqa méugniN . reviv a meraunitnoc arap ratnemila es ed masicerp siop , asioc reuqlauq mamoc euq sov-oçeP
. adan maremoc oãn opmet esse etnarud e arepse à oãtse euq sanames saud ejoh zaf áJ « : asioc amugla messemoc euq sodot a uidep oluaP , adagurdam eD
. ram oa riac an-maraxied e arieelab a maidnerp euq sobac so maratroc sodadlos so oãtnE
» . es-ravlas oãredop oãn sêcov , ocrab on merecenamrep oãn snemoh setse eS « : sodadlos soa e onamor laicifo oa oãtne essid oluaP
. oivan od etnerf ad odal od sarocnâ ratied mai euq odnignif , ram oa éta arieelab a maraxiab ossi arap e oivan od es-rapacse mavarucorp soriehniram so , otnatertnE
. aid o essepmor euq sosoisna maracif e oivan od sárt ed odal od sarocnâ ortauq maratied , sahcor san rahlacne essof oivan o euq odem moc , selE
. sortem etes e etniv ued e ridem a maranrot , etnaida siaM . sortem sies e atnirt ed are euq mariv e augá ad arudnuf a adnos amu moc marideM
. arret ed es-ramixorpa a avatse oivan o euq , etion-aiem ad atlov rop , marebecrep soriehniram so , ocitáirdA ram on avired à radna a somraçemoc ed sioped sanames sauD
» . ahli amuglan ragarfuan somav saM
. essid em euq oliuqa rezaf iav ele ; sueD me açnaifnoc ohnet uE ! megaroc , sogima suem , otnatroP
” . odrob a ogitnoc oãtse euq so sodot etrom ad rarvil iav sueD , asuac aut roP . onamor rodarepmi od etnaid ratneserpa et ed snet euqrop , odem sahnet oãn , oluaP “ : essid em euq
, oroda meuq a e oçnetrep meuq a sueD olep odaivne , ojna mu em-uecerapa adassap etion an euqrop , otsi ogiD
. oivan o edrep es sanepA . rerrom iav iuqa méugnin euqrop , megaroc mahnet aroga saM
. sozíujerp setse e otnemirfos etse missa odative somaíreT . aterC me odacif somret e sodivuo em-merad rohlem odis ahnit , sogima sueM « : essid e seled oiem on ép ed es-sôp oluaP oãtnE . adan somaímoc oãn euq opmet otium aivaH
. somravlas son ed açnarepse reuqlauq somahnít oãn áj euq arienam ed , arodaçaema avaunitnoc edatsepmet A . salertse sa men loS o men rev somiugesnoc oãn said sotium etnaruD
. soãm sairpórp sasson sa moc , oivan od sohcertepa so augá à somátied , aid oriecret oN
. ram oa agrac a ratied a maraçemoc , etrof otium avaunitnoc edatsepmet a omoc , aid ortuo oN
. avired à marof e salev sa maraxiab , aibíL ad satsoc sad aiera ed socnab son rahlacne essof oivan o euq odem mahnit omoc , siopeD . açnaruges ed sobac moc oivan o maraçrofer e odrob arap an-maraçi soriehniram sO
. oivan od arieelab a ravlas edadlucifid atium moc somiugesnoc ila e , etrof sonem are otnev o edno , aduaC adamahc atohli amu ed lus a asserped somássaP
. avired à ri oivan o somáxied , otnev o artnoc ragevan levíssopmi uonrot es omoC . oivan o uotsarra euq
etsedron ed ocinólcic otnev mu es-uoedacnesed sioped ocuop saM
. aterC ed atsoc ad ognol oa mariuges e orref maratnaveL . odaenalp mahnit euq o acitárp me rôp maidop euq marasnep ossi roP . ocarf otnev mu lus od rarpos a uoçemoC
. onrevnI o somrassap ila arap , etseoron a artuo e etseodus a adariv etrap amu moc aterC ed otrop mu é euq , ecineF ed edadic à ragehc ratnet e ilad rias somaíved euq avahca airoiam a ossi rop , onrevnI o rassap es ál arap seõçidnoc ahnit oãn otrop O
. oluaP me euq od oãtipac on e otolip on açnaifnoc siam ahnit onamor laicifo o saM
» . adiv a redrep somedop són éta E . oivan o arap e agrac a arap sozíujerp sotium odnatneserper , asogirep res iav etnaid arap iuqad megaiv asson a euq ojev , sogima sueM «
: ohlesnoc etse sehl-ued oluaP , avamixorpa es onrevnI o euqrop , ram rop rajaiv osogirep avanrot es e opmet otium odassap ahnit áj omoC
. aiesaL ed edadic ad otrep , sotroP snoB odamahc ragul mu a somágehc euq éta , edadlucifid ednarg moc , atsoc ad otnuj odnagevan somof missA
. anomlaS obaC od etnerf me odnassap , aterC ed ahli ad lus o arap omur somezif , oãçcerid aleuqa riuges avaxied son oãn otnev o omoc saM . odinC ed otrep somágehc euq oçrofse ednarg moc iof e said soiráv etnarud ragaved otium somágevaN
. elen racrabme son-zef e , ailátI a arap ai euq , airdnaxelA ed edadic ad oivan mu uortnocne onamor laicifo o , otrop esseN
. aicíL ad edadic , ariM a somágehc e ailífnaP ad e aicíliC ad atsoc ad etnerf me somássaP
. soirártnoc mare sotnev so euqrop , erpihC ed ahli ad etron oa somágevan , nodíS ed somrias ed siopeD
. essasicerp euq ed oliuqa seled rebecer e sogima sues so rev ri arap oãçazirotua ehl-ued e edadnob atium moc oluaP avatart oilúJ . nodíS ed otrop oa somágehc , aid ortuo oN
. ainódecaM ad edadic , acinólasseT ed are euq ocratsirA ocsonnoc mébmat avatsE . aisÁ ad aicnívorp ad sotrop so arap ai euq oitímardA ed otrop od oivan mun somácrabmE
. ” rodarepmI od oãhlataB “ oa aicnetrep euq , oilúJ odamahc onamor laicifo mu a soserp sortuo e oluaP maragertne , ailátI arap racrabme somaíved euq odivloser uocif odnauQ

» . rodarepmi olep odagluj res arap odidep essevit oãn es , edadrebil me otsop res aidop memoh etsE « : otseF a essid apirgA oãtnE
» . oserp ratse aived reuqes meN . etrom a açerem euq adan zef oãn memoh etsE « : sortuo soa snu maizid , merías oA
. sele moc mavatse euq so sodot e ecinereB e rodanrevog o missa meb e , es-uotnavel apirgA ier o , adiuges mE
» . setnerroc satse mes sam , uos ue euq oliuqan menrot es , iuqa rivuo a oãtse em ejoh euq so sodot sam , ut ós oãn , otium rop uo ocuop rop , euq sueD a oçep ue sioP « : uednopser oluaP
» ! oãtsirc em-rezaf a sedausrep em ocuop roP « : oluaP a essid apirgA oãtnE
» ! satiderca euq ies uE ? sateforp son satiderca , apirgA ieR
. sadidnocse sà otief iof otsid adaN . açneserp aus an açnaifnoc atnat moc olaf ossi rop e , sasioc satse sadot meb ecehnoc euq , apirgA ier o iuqa átsE
. satasnes oãs sarvalap sahnim sa e edadrev a é rezid a uotse euq O . aicnêlecxE , odiod uotse oãN « : uednopser oluaP saM
» ! ozíuj o redrep et-marezif sodutse sotium suet sO ! oluaP , odiod sátsE « : atla zov me essid otseF , asefed aus ad otnop etse a ragehc oA
» . sueduj-oãn soa omoc sueduj soa otnat zul asse ravel arap , raticsusser a oriemirp o res ed e rerrom ed ahnit saisseM o euq
: recetnoca ai euq maressid sésioM e sateforp so euq oliuqa euq od siam é oãn ogid sov euq O . sednarg e soneuqep sodot a sueD ed sov-ralaf a uotse iuqa ossi rop e , aroga éta ohnumetset uem o rad a ieunitnoc , sueD ed aduja a moc saM
. ratam maresiuq em e , olpmet on avatse ue odnauq , mararraga em sueduj so euq ossi rop ioF
. sodidneperra mavatse euq otnematropmoc ues olep odnartsom , sueD arap ratlov es ed e redneperra es ed mahnit euq essid sele sodot A . sueduj-oãn soa mébmat e sueduj sod arret a adot me sioped , mélasureJ me sioped , ocsamaD me megasnem a ieugerp , oriemirP
. uéc od oiev em euq oãsiv à icedebosed oãn , apirgA ier ó , oãtne edseD
” . mim me éf alep sodacifitnas oãs euq so ertne açnareh an etrap ret a oãrassap e sodacep sod oãdrep o missa oãraçnaclA . sueD a seraifnoc so arap obaiD od redop od sol-árvil siaV . zul a arap savert sad rassap serezaf so arap , sohlo so sehl-rirba sárI
. aroga radnam uov et siauq so arap , sueduj-oãn sod e sueduj sod et-rarvil ed-ieH
. sioped rartsom ed-ieh et ue euq o e ejoh etsiv euq o sortuo soa seratnoc arap e oçivres uem oa seracif arap et-icerapa uE . ép ed et-eõp e et-atnaveL
! seugesrep ut meuq a , suseJ uos uE “ : em-uednopser zov A ” ? rohneS , ut sé meuQ “ : ietnugrep oãtne uE
” . odaçacipse lamina mu omoc et-seratlover evres et adan eD ? seugesrep em euq roP ! oluaS , oluaS “ : suerbeh sod augníl an zov amu oãtne ivuo ue e oãhc on sodot somíaC
. megaiv an mavahnapmoca em euq soa e mim a , em-uevlovne zul A . loS o euq od etnahlirb siam , uéc od adniv zul amu iv aid-oiem od atlov rop e , ier ó , adartse an aI
. setodrecas sod sefehc sod snedro moc e odazirotua , ocsamaD ed edadic à iuf ue euq oãçnetni asse moc ioF
. aiugesrep so sariegnartse sedadic san éta euq aviar atnat sehl-ahniT . éf aus a ragen a sol-ável avarucorp , sarutrot ed açrof à , e sagoganis salep ai sezev satiuM
. sele artnoc otov uem o avad ue , etrom à mavanednoc so odnauq E . aiedac an sotnas sod sotium item , setodrecas sod sefehc sod ibecer euq oãçazirotua a moC . mélasureJ me zif euq o iof E
. érazaN ed suseJ ed emon o artnoc essedup euq o odut rezaf aived euq avasnep mébmat ue arO
? sotrom so eticsusser sueD euq sóv ertne levírcni agluj es euq é euq roP
. masuca em aroga sueduj so euq , apirgA ier , açnarepse assed asuac rop É . raminased mes , etion ed e aid ed sueD a maroda ossi rop e , assemorp assed otnemirpmuc o rev mébmat marepse learsI ed ovop osson od sobirt ezod sA
. sodassapetna sosson soa sueD rop atief assemorp an ohnet euq açnarepse ad asuac rop odagluj res arap iuqa em-marexuort aroga E
. oãigiler asson ad sosorogir siam so , suesiraf sod semutsoc so ieuqitarp edadicom ahnim a edsed euq , meresiuq es , ossi ramrifnoc medop e , marebuos erpmes selE
. mélasureJ me e , etneg ahnim a ertne adiv a iessap ue edutnevuj ahnim a edsed omoc etnematiefrep mebas sueduj sO
. aicnêicap moc saçuo em euq oçep et ossi roP . sueduj sod seõtseuq e semutsoc so sodot meb otium secehnoc euqrop , etnemlapicnirP
. masuca em sueduj so euq ed oliuqa odut ed em-rednefed it ed etnaid ejoh redop me zilef em-otniS ! apirgA ieR «
: essid e oãm a uednetse oluaP » . asefed aut me ralaf sedoP « : oluaP a essid apirgA oãtnE
» . ele artnoc áh euq seõçasuca sa racidni mes orienoisirp mu radnam odrusba em-ecerap sioP
. revercse arap asioc amugla rarit agisnoc ue oirótagorretni od euq arap , apirgA ier , it ed etnemlaicepse , sodot ed etnaid iuqa o-ogart , rodarepmi oa eled otiepser a revercse euq o meb ies oãn aroga éta omoC
. raséC a ol-áivne ivloser , rodarepmi olep odagluj res arap uidep omoc , odutnoC . etrom a açerem euq adan zef oãn ele euq ohca ue saM
. oviv raunitnoc eved oãn memoh etse euq me metsisni selE . açneserp ahnim an seõçasuca mezaf , mélasureJ ed omoc iuqad otnat , sueduj so sodot euq ele artnoc É ! memoh etse majeV ! setneserp iuqa serohnes so sodot e apirgA ieR « : essid e
oluaP rezart uodnam otseF . edadic ad setnatropmi siam snemoh so e seratilim sefehc so moc seõçpecer ed alas an marartnE . apmop e ainómirec ednarg moc maragehc ecinereB e apirgA , etniuges aid oN
» . ol-ivuo siav omsem ãhnama sioP « : uednopser otseF » . memoh esse rivuo ed avatsog ue mébmaT « : otseF a essid apirgA oãtnE
» . rodarepmi oa ol-ádnam redop éta oserp raunitnoc ele arap medro ied ue e rodarepmi olep odagluj res arap uidep oluaP saM
. mavasuca o euq ed sasioc sasse erbos odagluj ál res arap mélasureJ a ri aireuq es oluaP a ietnugrep , satsed oãtseuq amu moc rezaf ed aivah euq o aibas oãn ue omoC
. oviv ratse amrifa oluaP euq sam , uerrom euq suseJ otrec mu ed e oãigiler airpórp aus ad otiepser a are oãçasuca acinú A
. avasnep ue omoc , evarg emirc muhnen ele artnoc mahnit oãn sam , rasuca o arap es-maratneserpa sogimini sues sO
. memoh o rezart iednam e lanubirt on ragul iemot , etniuges aid on ogol , e opmet idrep oãn mareiv ác sele odnauq , ossi roP
. rednefed es ed edadinutropo ahnet ele euq arap , odasuca od etnaid serodasuca so ramahc oriemirp mes méugnin ranednoc mamutsoc oãn sanamor sedadirotua sa euq sehl-essid uE
. oãçanednoc aus a mavamalcer e ele artnoc axieuq amu em-maresup saciaduj sedadirotua sa e setodrecas sod sefehc so , mélasureJ a iuf odnauQ
. oãsirp an uoxied xiléF euq memoh mu ác ohneT « : oluaP ed osac o ier oa uotnoc otseF , said snugla maracif ila omoC
. otseF ratnemirpmuc arap aieraseC a marof ecinereB e apirgA ier o , sioped opmet muglA
» ! rodarepmi oa sári , rodarepmi o arap etsalepA « : essid , soriehlesnoc sues so moc rasrevnoc ed sioped , otseF oãtnE
» . rodarepmi o arap olepa , otnatroP . sueduj soa ragertne edop em méugnin , edadrev é oãn mim artnoc mezid euq o es saM . rerrom a otnorp uotse , etrom ed anep a açerem euq asioc amugla zif es uo , odapluc uos otcaf ed eS
. meb otium sebas ut omoc , sueduj soa muhnen lam zif oãN . odagluj res oved edno , onamor rodarepmi od lanubirt od etnaid uotsE « : uednopser oluaP
» ? sasioc satsed otiepser a mim rop odagluj ál seres arap mélasureJ a ri sereuQ « : oluaP a uotnugrep , sueduj soa radarga arap , otseF oãtnE
» . rodarepmi o artnoc men , olpmet o artnoc men , aciaduj iel a artnoc men , atlaf reuqlauq itemoc oãn uE « : asefed aus me essid oluaP oãtnE
. amuhnen ravorp mariugesnoc oãn sam , sevarg seõçasuca satium rezaf a maraçemoc e eled atlov me maracif mélasureJ ed odniv mahnit euq sueduj so , uortne oluaP odnauQ
. oluaP racsub uodnam e lanubirt on ragul ues o uomot , etniuges aid oN . aieraseC arap uotlov sioped e said zed uo otio snu mélasureJ me uocif ós otseF
» . lam mugla zef ele euq é es , merasuca o ál arap ogimoc riv oãredop sóv ertne ed sodacifilauq siam sO
. opmet ocuop ed ortned ál arap ratlov uov ue e aieraseC me oserp átse oluaP « : uednopser otseF saM
. ohnimac on ol-átam are seled onalp O . mélasureJ a oluaP riv radnam ed rovaf o otseF a marideP
. oluaP artnoc seõçasuca saus sa moc eled etnaid es-maratneserpa saciaduj sedadirotua sa e setodrecas sod sefehc sO
. mélasureJ a iof e aieraseC ed uias otseF , oãiger aleuqad onrevog od atnoc odamot ret ed sioped said sêrT

. oãsirp an oluaP uoxied , sueduj soa radarga aireuq xiléF omoC . rodanrevog omoc xiléF uiutitsbus otseF oicróP , sioped sona sioD
. ele moc ralaf arap sezev satium avamahc o ossi rop e oriehnid mugla essed ehl oluaP euq mébmat avarepse xiléF
» . zev artuo et-omahc , redup ue odnauQ . ri sedop , aroga roP « : oluaP a essid e otium es-uotsussa xiléF , lanif ozíuj od aid od e oinímod-otua od , açitsuj ad ralaf a uoçemoc oluaP odnauq saM
. suseJ otsirC me éf ad otiepser a o-uivuo e oluaP ramahc uodnaM . aiduj are euq , rehlum aus , alisurD ed odahnapmoca ai xiléF , edrat siam said snuglA
. sogima sod aduja rebecer arap açnecil e edadrebil atrec moc sam , oãsirp an oluaP retnam arap oçivres ed laicifo oa snedro ued E
» . osac o revloser uov , ragehc saisíL etnadnamoc o odnauQ « : essid e otnemagluj o uoida , rohneS od ohnimaC o erbos odamrofni meb avatse euq , xiléF oãtnE
» ” . maticsusser sotrom so euq otiderca euqrop , sóv rop odagluj res a ejoh iuqa uotsE “ : seled oiem on avatse odnauq , atla zov me essid ue euq esarf atsed etart es euq res oãn A
. sueduj sod lanubirt omerpus od etnaid avatse ue odnauq emirc mugla ed odapluc marahca em es magid iuqa snemoh setse euq , oãtne uO
. mim artnoc asioc amugla mêt euq é es , seõçasuca rezaf it ed etnaid iuqa riv meved euq sele oãS . aisÁ ad aicnívorp ad sueduj snugla ál mavatsE
. amuhnen medrosed aivah oãN . olpmet on em-mariv , oãçacifirup ad ainómirec a odabaca ret ed sioped , ossi rezaf a avatse odnauQ
. sueD a soicífircas recerefo arap e ovop oirpórp uem oa oriehnid mugla ravel arap ál ietlov , sona soiráv mélasureJ ed arof odatse ret ed siopeD
. snemoh sod e sueD ed etnaid apmil aicnêicsnoc ahnim a erpmes ret orucorp ossi roP
. suam so omoc snob so otnat , raticsusser ed-oãh sodot euq ed , sueD me mêt sele euq açnarepse amsem a ohnet e
sateforp son e sésioM ed ieL an otircse átse euq o odut me oierC . aties amu é euq mezid sele euq , ohnimaC ovon o moc odroca ed sodassapetna suem sod sueD o ovris euq é : oçehnocer ue euq asioc amu áH
. mim artnoc mezart aroga euq seõçasuca sad amuhnen arap savorp mêt oãn selE
. edadic ad etrap reuqlauq me men , sagoganis san men , olpmet on men , ovop o ratiga a uo méugnin moc ritucsid a marartnocne em oãn sueduj sO
. said ezod sanepa áh sueD a raroda arap mélasureJ a ieugehc , raugireva sedop omoC
. açnaifnoc a adot moc it ed etnaid asefed ahnim a oçaf ossi roP . ueduj ovop od ziuj sé sona sotium áh euq ies uE « : essid oãtne ele e ralaf arap oluaP a lanis zef rodanrevog O
. edadrev odut are euq maramrifa e odagovda od oãçasuca a maraiopa sueduj sortuo sO
» . somasuca o euq ed oliuqa odut acob aus ad rivuo siav , seragorretni o eS
] . ogitnoc ret riv maived mavasuca o euq so euq son-odnezid , açrof à soãm sasson sad o-uorit e saisíL etnadnamoc o uecerapa saM [
. somednerp o euq oãtne ioF . olpmet o ranaforp uotnet étA
. sonerazaN sod aties ad ahlicebac é e odnum o odot ed sueduj so ertne snedrosed acovorP . etsep amu é memoh etse euq somebas sóN
. sotnemom snu rop ratucse son ed edadnob a sahnet euq et-oçep , opmet otium rabuor et oãn araP
. seragul so sodot me e seõisaco sa sadot me , odibecer somet euq oliuqa odut rop sodicedarga otium et-somatsE
. atelpmoc zap amu ed somazog , ovop etsed rovaf a airodebas atnat moc etsezif euq samrofer sà e it a saçarG ! xiléF rodanrevoG omissítnelecxE « : xiléF a odnezid , ol-ásuca a uoçemoc olutreT , oluaP marexuort odnauQ
. oluaP artnoc , rodanrevog oa axieuq maratneserpA . olutreT odamahc odagovda mu moc e soãicna snugla moc aieraseC a iof , setodrecas sod efehc o , sainanA , sioped said ocniC

. sedoreH ed oicálap on oserp racif arap snedro ued E » . serodasuca suet so meragehc odnauq et-rivuo oreuQ « : ehl-essid
, aicíliC ad are euq rebas oA . are oãiger euq ed oluaP a uotnugrep e atrac a uel rodanrevog O
. oluaP ehl-maragertne e rodanrevog oa atrac a mared , maragehc ál odnauQ
. aieraseC arap oluaP moc mariuges sorielavac so e azelatrof à maratlov , aid ortuo oN
. edirtápitnA ed edadic à éta etion ed oluaP maravel , etnadnamoc od odibecer mahnit euq snedro sa emrofnoc , sodadlos so oãtnE
» . ele artnoc merevit euq od ogitnoc metart euq idep masuca o euq soA . ot-radnam ivloser , ratam o arap sonalp otief mahnit sueduj so euq ed odamrofni iuf odnauQ
. seled iel ad otiepser a are maizaf ehl euq oãçasuca A . etrom a uo oãsirp a essecerem euq arezif adan ele euq oãtne ibecreP
. sueduj sod lanubirt oa o-ievel , mavasuca o euq ed rebas aireuq ue omoC
. o-ietrebil e sodadlos suem so moc ál iuf , onamor oãdadic are euq ebuos ue odnauq sam , ol-átam mai e memoh etse marednerp sueduj sO
. sotnemirpmuc suem so , xiléF rodanrevoG omissítnelecxE oa saisíL oiduálC ed etrap aD «
: atrac atse sele rop mébmat uodnaM
» . xiléF rodanrevog oa açnaruges a adot moc on-mevel e ratnom oluaP arap solavac mébmat meraperP
. etion ad saroh evon sà rias arap sotnorp majetsE . aieraseC a meri arap soriecnal sotnezud e sorielavac atnetes , sodadlos sotnezud mejnarrA « : uonedro e siaicifo siod uomahc etnadnamoc O
. oliuqa odatnoc ahnit ehl euq méugnin a essessid oãn euq ehl-uidep sam , arobme zapar o uodnam etnadnamoc o oãtnE
» . ri ál sexied o euq marepse óS . ossi rezaf arap sotnorp oãtsE . meratam o oãn otnauqne adan merebeb men meremoc oãn ed enelos otnemaruj mu sodot mareziF . ratam o arap oluaP ed arepse à sodidnocse racif oãv euq so atnerauq ed siam oãs euqrop , setiderca oãN
. eled otiepser a satelpmoc siam seõçamrofni ret mereuq euq odnignif , lanubirt oa ãhnama oluaP sevel euq et-ridep maranibmoc sueduj snuglA « : uednopser elE
» ? ratnoc em arap snet euq é euQ « : ehl-uotnugrep e otnac mu arap o-uovel , oãm alep zapar on uogep etnadnamoc O
» . rezid et arap asioc reuqlauq met ele euq em-essiD . zapar etse essexuort et euq em-uidep e em-uomahc oluaP orienoisirp O « : essid e etnadnamoc oa zapar o uovel laicifo O
» . ratnoc ehl arap asioc amu met ele euqrop , etnadnamoc oa zapar etse aveL « : essid e siaicifo sod mu uomahc oluaP
. oit o rasiva azelatrof à iof e onalp od ebuos oluaP ed ãmri ad ohlif o saM
» . eugehc ác ele euq setna ratam o arap sodaraperp somatse , són a otnauQ . eled otiepser a satelpmoc siam seõçamrofni ret mereuq euq magiD . ãhnama iuqa rezart o arap etnadnamoc oa odacer , lanubirt od sorbmem sortuo so moc , aroga siop mednaM
. oluaP somratam oãn otnauqne , adan remoc ed somevah oãn euq ed sueD ed etnaid otnemaruj mu someziF « : son-maramrofni e soãicna so moc e setodrecas sod sefehc so moc ret maroF
. ossimorpmoc esse maramot euq so atnerauq ed siam marE
. oluaP messatam oãn otnauqne , rebeb men remoc ed maivah oãn euq mararuJ . otnemaruj mu merezaf arap marinuer es sueduj snugla odnauq ãhnam are áJ
» . amoR me ol-êzaf euq sáret mébmat , mélasureJ me iuqa mim ed ohnumetset etsed omoc missa euqroP ! megaroC « : ehl-essid e oluaP a rohneS o uecerapa , etion asseN
. azelatrof a arap zev artuo messavel o e ilad messarit o euq sadraug soa uodnam , ossi roP . oluaP messaçadepsed sele euq raecer a uogehc etnadnamoc o euq atneloiv oãt es-uonrot oãssucsid A
» ? ojna mugla éta uo , uolaf ehl otirípse mugla es E . memoh etsen ravorper euq adan somet oãN « : açrof a adot moc maratsetorp e es-maratnavel , suesiraf sod oditrap oa maicnetrep euq , iel ad serotuod snuglA . mavatirg sodot áj , satnat sÀ
. matiderca suesiraf so otnauqne , sotirípse ed uo sojna ed aicnêtsixe an men , sotrom sod oãçierrusser an matiderca oãn suecudas so euqroP
. odidivid uocif lanubirt o e ritucsid a maraçemoc suecudas so e suesiraf so , otsi essid ele odnauQ
» ! maticsusser sotrom so euq otiderca euqrop , odagluj res a iuqa uotsE . suesiraf ed etnednecsed e uesiraf uos ue , soãmri sueM « : otla meb essid , suesiraf sod oditrap od sortuo e suecudas sod oditrap od mare lanubirt od sorbmem snugla euq aibas oluaP omoC
» . ovop uet od efehc o sáratlusni oãN : zid arutircsE adargaS a , edadrev aN . etodrecas omus o are euq , soãmri suem , aibas oãN « : uednopser oluaP
» ? sueD ed etodrecas omus o ratlusni a et-severtA « : oluaP a maressid mavatse ila euq sO
» ? iel a artnoc ossi odnes retab em-sadnam e iel a odnuges seragluj em arap odatnes ía sátsE ! odignif ues , ossi rop et-ragitsac ed-áh sueD « : sainanA a essid oluaP
. acob an messetab ehl euq oluaP ed otrep mavatse euq soa uodnam , etodrecas omus o , sainanA saM
» . sueD ed etnaid aliuqnart aicnêicsnoc a moc ejoh ed aid oa éta iviV ! soãmri sueM « : essid e ociaduj lanubirt od sorbmem so arap etnerf ed uohlo oluaP oãtnE



. lanubirt oa o-uotneserpa e oluaP racsub meri arap medro ued siopeD . ociaduj lanubirt o odot e setodrecas sod sefehc so rinuer uodnam e oserp avatse euq moc setnerroc sa rarit ehl-uodnam , aid ortuo on , ossi roP . oluaP mavasuca sueduj so euq are euq ed otrec oa rebas aireuq ós etnadnamoc O
. rednerp odadnam ret o rop odem ed oiehc uocif , onamor oãdadic are oluaP euq rebas oa , etnadnamoc O . etnemataidemi es-marariter satnugrep rezaf ehl arap mavatse ila euq sO
» . otnemicsan ed onamor oãdadic uos ue sioP « : uednopser oluaP » . oriehnid otium em-uotsuc ossi sam , uos mébmat uE « : essid etnadnamoc o E
» . mis uoS « : uednopser oluaP » ? onamor oãdadic omsem sé uT . ál em-ziD « : ehl-uotnugrep e oluaP moc ret iof etnadnamoc O
» . onamor oãdadic é memoh etse euqrop , rezaf siav euq o moc odadiuC « : etnadnamoc oa rezid iof , otsi uivuo laicifo o odnauQ
» ? meragluj o oriemirp mes onamor oãdadic mun retab medop euq áreS « : eled otrep avatse euq onamor laicifo oa essid ele , meretab ehl arap oluaP rarrama a mavatse odnauq saM
. ele artnoc missa avatirg oãditlum a euq é euq rop rebas arap , ralaf éta meretab ehl arap medro ueD . azelatrof an oluaP retem snemoh sues so uodnam etnadnamoc o oãtnE
. ra o arap arret mavarita e apuor a mavagsar , mavatirG
» ! reviv a raunitnoc edop oãn elE ! memoh etse a etroM « : ratirg a maraçemoc íad ritrap A . otnop etse éta oluaP uivuo oãditlum A
» ” . sueduj oãs oãn euq sovop ed oiem o arap , egnol otium arap et-raivne uov ue euq , iaV “ : em-essid rohneS o saM
” . sonissassa sod apuor ad atnoc iemot étA . emirc eleuqa ievorpa e avartnocne em ál mébmat ue , ahnumetset aut , oãvêtsE ratam a mavatse odnauQ
. it me mavatiderca euq so avacnapse e aidnerp e sagoganis salep ai ue euq meb otium mebas sele , rohneS “ : idnopser oãtnE
” . otiepser uem a sezid ut euq o ratieca iav oãn etneg atse euqrop , mélasureJ ed asserped iaS “ : em-essid ele e , rohneS o iV
. oãsiv amu evit e olpmet on raro a ue avatse , odasserger odneT «
» ” . sodaodrep oãres sodacep suet so e rohneS on éf aut a assefnoc , omsitpab o ebecer , et-atnaveL ? arepse à sátse euq é euq ed , aroga E
. etsivuo e etsiv euq oliuqa sodot a serezid arap , eled ahnumetset sáres euqroP
. acob aus ad sarvalap sa serivuo arap e otsuJ o serev arap , edatnov aus a serecehnoc arap et-uehlocse sodassapetna sosson sod sueD O “ : uotnecserca sainanA
. ele arap iehlo e atsiv a ierepucer , etnatsni omsem essen , E ” . atsiv a arepucer , oluaS oãmrI “ : essid e mim ed ép oa es-uogehc , em-rev iof elE
. eled meb maizid ocsamaD me mavarom euq sueduj so sodot e , iel à etneidebo , osodeip otium are euq , sainanA odamahc memoh mu ál aivaH
. ocsamaD éta oãm alep em-ravel ed marevit soriehnapmoc suem so , atsiv a uorit em zul aleuqad ohlirb o , mérop , omoC
. ” saçaf euq reuq sueD euq o oãrid et ál e ocsamaD ed edadic an artne “ , rohneS o uednopser , ” et-atnaveL “ ” ? rezaf oved euq , rohneS “ : ietnugrep E
. avalaf em euq eleuqad zov a marivuo oãn sam , zul asse meb mariv ogimoc mavajaiv euq snemoh sO
” . seugesrep ut meuq a , érazaN ed suseJ uos uE “ : em-uednopser zov a E ” ? rohneS , ut sé meuQ “ : ietnugrep uE
” ? seugesrep em euq roP ! oluaS , oluaS “ : zov amu oãtne ivuo e oãhc on íaC
. uevlovne em e uéc od ahniv euq amissítrof zul amu etneper ed iv , aid-oiem oa esauq , ocsamaD ed otrep áj , megaiv ed ai odnauq , euq uecetnocA «
» . sodagitsac meres ed mif a , mélasureJ arap sodatnerroca sol-êzart e aivah ía euq soãtsirc so rednerp arap ál iuF . ocsamaD ed sueduj soãmri soa sadigirid satrac seled ibecer euq ed sahnumetset oãs soãicna so sodot e setodrecas sod efehc O
. oãsirp an so-iecnal e serehlum e snemoh idnerp , ohnimaC etse maiuges euq so etrom à éta iugesreP
. zaf ejoh setneserp sod mu adac omoc , rovref ednarg moc sueD a rivres ierucorp erpmeS . sodassapetna sosson sod iel a emrofnoc , etnemasorogir odacude iuF . leilamaG ed onula iuF . mélasureJ me iuqa odairc iuf sam , aicíliC ad osraT me icsaN . ueduj uos uE «
: uounitnoc oluaP . oicnêlis roiam adnia es-zef , suerbeh sod augníl an ralaf on-merivuo oA
» . asefed ahnim me sov-rezid a ohnet euq o aroga metucsE ! learsI ed siap e soãmrI «
: suerbeh sod augníl an essid , maralac es sodot odnauQ . oicnêlis ridep a , oãm a moc lanis zef e sadacse san ép ed es-sôp oluaP . o-uozirotua etnadnamoc O
» . ovop oa ralaf em-axied , rovaf roP . etnatropmi edadic amud oãdadic uoS . aicíliC an , osraT ed larutan , ueduj uos uE « : uednopser oluaP
» ? soriehlirreug lim ortauq otresed o arap uovel euq e atlover amu uoçemoc sopmet áh euq oicpíge eleuqa sé oãn oãtnE
? ogerg salaf ut saM « : ehl-uotnugrep etnadnamoc O » ? arvalap amu et-rezid ossoP « : etnadnamoc oa uotnugrep oluaP , azelatrof an ol-êtem a mai odnauQ
» ! ele moc mebacA « : odnatirg , sárta ahniv euq
oãditlum ad aicnêloiv ad asuac rop , sorbmo soa elen ragep ed marevit sodadlos so , sadacse sà maragehc odnauQ
. azelatrof a arap oluaP ravel sodadlos so oãtne uodnaM . odicetnoca ahnit euq o otrec oa rebas a uogehc oãn etnadnamoc o euq atnat are oãsufnoc A . artuo mavatirg sortuo , asioc amu mavatirg snu , oãditlum aD
. otief ahnit euq o e are meuq uotnugrep siopeD . setnerroc saud moc rarrama o-uodnam e oluaP uednerp , es-uomixorpa etnadnamoc O
. oluaP me retab ed ogol uorap , sodadlos so e etnadnamoc o uiv oãditlum a laM . ovop o arap uerroc e sodadlos e siaicifo snugla uinueR
. oçorovla me avatse edadic a euq ed aicíton a uebecer mélasureJ me sanamor saport sad etnadnamoc o odnauq , oluaP ratam arap raraperp a avatse es áj oãditlum A
. satrop sa ogol marahcef e olpmet od arof arap on-maratsarra , oluaP oãtne mararragA . assam me airroc ovop o e oçorovla ednarg me uocif edadic a adoT
. olpmet oa odavel ahnit o oluaP euq mavasnep e , osefÉ ed ueduj-oãn mu , omifórT ed odahnapmoca , edadic an , setna otsiv mahnit o euqrop otsi maressid selE
» ! ragul otnas etse missa odnahcnam , sueduj oãs oãn euq snemoh olpmet o arap aroga exuort , ossid mélA . olpmet etse artnoc e sésioM ed ieL a artnoc , learsI ed ovop o artnoc ragerp a etrap a adot rop adna euq o é etsE ! maduca , satilearsI « : mavatirg e
on-mararraga sioped e oçorovla me etneg a adot maresuP . olpmet on oluaP mariv aisÁ ad oãiger ad sueduj snugla , rabaca a mavatse oãçacifirup ad said etes so odnauq saM
. oicífircas mu ed atrefo aus a rezaf ed airet seled mu adac odnauq , é otsi , oãçacifirup ad said so mavabaca odnauq rasiva iof olpmet on , siopeD . oãçacifirup ad ainómirec an sele moc etrap uomot aid ortuo on e snemoh ortauq so uovel oluaP oãtnE
» . edadilaromi a meuqitarp men , sodalugnartse siamina ed enrac men , eugnas men , solodí soa sodicerefo siamina ed enrac mamoc oãn euq odnezid , seõsiced sasson sa moc atrac amu somevercse sehl áj són , éf a maraçarba euq e , sueduj-oãn soa otnauq saM
. sésioM ed ieL ad otnemirpmuc on leif saunitnoc , oirártnoc olep , euq e , it ed mezid euq o edadrev é oãn euq rebas a oãracif sodot , missA . açebac a rapar meredop arap seled sasepsed sa agap e oãçacifirup ad ainómirec an sele moc etrap amot , ogitnoc so-aveL
. sueD a marezif euq assemorp amu rirpmuc ed mêt euq snemoh ortauq són ertne iuqa áH : rezid somav et euq otsi serezaf áres rohlem O
. ác sátse euq rezid rivuo oãv sele euq azetrec moC ? rezaf ed somevah euQ
. sueduj sod semutsoc so ratiepser men sohlif so radicnucric meved oãn euq mébmat sanisne euq e , iel ad osac merezaf oãn a oriegnartse on meviv euq sueduj so sanisne ut euq sehl-maressiD
. sésioM ed ieL à siéif maunitnoc sam , éf a maraçarba euq sueduj ed serahlim áh iuqa euq rev siav , oãmri , meB « : oluaP a maressid e sueD a airólg mared sodot , marivuo o odnauQ
. sueduj-oãn so ertne oirétsinim ues od sévarta otief ahnit sueD euq o odut ronemrop me sehl-uotnoc e so-uotnemirpmuc oluaP oãtnE
. sodinuer ál mavatse ajergi ad soretíbserp so sodot e ogaiT ratisiv ocsonnoc iof oluaP , aid ortuo oN
. airgela atium moc son-marebecer soãmri so mélasureJ a somágehc odnauQ
. somácif euq eled asac me ioF . oipícnirp o edsed etnerc are áj euq , oãsaneM odamahc erpihC ed memoh mud asac a maravel son euq , aieraseC ed solupícsid snugla ál éta son-marahnapmocA
. mélasureJ arap somof e son-omáraperp , otsid siopeD
» ! resiuq sueD euq o ajeS « : somessid e somitsised , ol-êcnevnoc somiugesnoc oãn omoC
» . suseJ rohneS od asuac rop mélasureJ me rerrom a éta sam , oserp res a ós oãn otnorp uotsE ? ossi moc rerfos em-rezaf a e rarohc a oãtse euq é euq roP « : son-uednopser ele saM
. mélasureJ a essof oãn euq oluaP a otium somidep ilad soãmri sortuo so e són , otsi somivuo odnauQ
» . soãgap sod soãm san sioped o-odnagertne , ecnetrep otnic etse meuq a memoh o mélasureJ me missa rednerp oãv sueduj so euq amrifa otnaS otirípsE O « : essid e , oluaP ed otnic o moc soãm saus sa e sép sues so uednerp , uomixorpa es euq
, obagÁ odamahc ateforp mu aieduJ ad oãtne oieV . said soiráv ía son-omáromeD
. sueD ed arvalap a mébmat mavaralced euq sarietlos sahlif ortauq ahniT
. mélasureJ me sodihlocse odis mahnit euq etes sod mu are epiliF . ele moc somácif e epiliF atsilegnave od asac à oãtne somoF . aieraseC ed edadic à somágehc e aid ortuo on somitraP
. sele moc aid mu somássap e ilad soãmri so somátnemirpmuC . adiamelotP a oriT ed odnagevan , ram rop megaiv a sománimreT
. sasac saus arap maratlov sele e oivan o arap somof , somridepsed son ed siopeD
. sueD a somáro e aiarp an ila sohleoj ed oãtne son-omesuP . edadic ad arof éta marahnapmoca son , sohlif so e serehlum sa moc , setnerc so sodoT . megaiv somáunitnoc sioped saM
. mélasureJ a essof oãn euq oluaP a maressid , otnaS otirípsE olep sodasiva , sele oãtnE . anames amu sele moc somácif e edadic assen solupícsid snugla somártnocnE
. ila somácrabmesed , oriT ed otrop on agrac raxied ed ahnit oivan o omoC . airíS à oãçcerid me somágevan e , adreuqse à avacif son euq , erpihC ed ahli ad etnerf me somássaP
. megaiv somiuges e somácrabmE . aicíneF a arap ai euq oivan mu somártnocne edno
, aratáP ed edadic à éta somiuges ilad e sedoR ed otrop oa somágehc , aid ortuo oN . sóC ed ahli à éta etnematcerid somágevan e setnerc seleuqad son-omidepsed , euqrabme od otnemom o odagehC
. oivan oa éta on-marahnapmoca E . mairev o siam acnun euq otid ret sehl rop setsirt otium mavatse selE
. oluaP odnajieb e odnaçarba , rarohc a maresup es sodoT
. uoro e soãmri so sodot moc es-uohleoja , otsi rezid ed uobaca oluaP odnauQ
» ” . ebecer meuq euq od ád meuq zilef siam É “ : suseJ rohneS od sarvalap satse radrocer e sodatissecen so raduja somedop euq missa odnahlabart é euq odut me sov-iertsoM
. somavásicerp soriehnapmoc suem so e ue euq ed oliuqa odut riugesnoc arap soãm sairpórp sahnim sa moc iehlabart euq meb otium mebas , oirártnoc oleP
. oiráutsev o men oruo o men atarp a men méugnin ed ieciboc acnuN
. sodacifitnas so sodot ertne açnareh a rad sov arap e racifide sov arap redop met euq arvalap , açarg aus ad arvalap à e sueD ed oãçcetorp à sov-ogertne aroga E
. samirgál satium moc , mu rop mu , rahlesnoca sov ed iexied acnun , etion ed e aid ed , sona sêrt etnarud euq ed es-merbmeL . setnaligiv majetse , etniugesnoc roP
. solupícsid so ogisnoc odnatsarra , saslaf sanirtuod ranisne a snugla recerapa ed-oãh sóv ertne omseM
. sahlevo sa meortsed sezoref sobol so omoc , ajergi a riurtsed mereuq euq so oiem ossov on es-rizudortni oãv , ritrap ue ed sioped , euq meb otium ies sioP
. ohliF oirpórp ues od eugnas o moc a-uiriuqda ele siop , sueD ed ajergi ad serotsap majeS . serosivrepus omoc sôp sov otnaS otirípsE o lauq o erbos ohnaber o odot ed e sóv ed meb mediuc , otnatroP
. adan rednocse sov mes sueD ed onalp o odot ieicnuna sov euqrop
, odapluc o ue uos oãn , redrep es mugla es euq ed sahnumetset rop ejoh sov-omot , ossi roP
. rev a áratlov em , sueD ed onier o ragerp a iedna siauq so ertne , sóv ed muhnen euq ies aroga E
. sueD ed açarg ad ohlegnave od ohnumetset rad ed , ued em suseJ rohneS o euq oirétsinim o arpmuc e arierrac ad mif oa eugehc ue euq é asseretni euq O . rolav met oãn adiv ahnim a mim arap saM
. sedadlucifid e seõsirp marepse em euq , uov ednoa sedadic sa sadot me , odasiva met em otnaS otirípsE o euq sanepa ieS
. recetnoca iav em ál euq o rebas mes , otnaS otirípsE oa odnecedebo , mélasureJ arap uov arogA
. rohneS osson , suseJ me rerc e sueD arap es-ratlov maived euq azemrif moc iertsom sueduj-oãn soa omoc sueduj soa otnaT
. asac me asac ed e , etnemacilbup odnanisne e ohlegnave o sov-odnagerp , raduja sov arap odut zif euq mebas mébmaT
. mim artnoc maratnavel es euq sueduj sod asuac rop iessap euq siecífid sopmet sessen , samirgál satium moc e edadlimuh a adot moc , rohneS od ovres omoc ohlabart uem o ziF
. aisÁ ad oãiger à ieugehc euq me aid oriemirp o edsed , sotnuj somevitse euq opmet o odot iessap omoc mebas meB « : sehl-essid , maragehc ál odnauQ
. ele moc rartnocne meri es arap osefÉ ed ajergi ad soretíbserp soa odacer mu uodnam oluaP , oteliM me avatse otnauqnE
. setsocetneP ed aid od setna , levíssop es , mélasureJ a ragehc ed asserp ahnit siop , oãiger aleuqan opmet redrep oãn arap osefÉ me rarap oãn odivloser ahnit oluaP
. oteliM ed otrop oa éta ortuo e somaS ed ahli à éta aid mu siam somáveL . soiuQ ed ahli ad otrep somássap aid ortuo on e otrop essed somíaS
. enelitiM ed edadic à éta megaiv a somáunitnoc e oivan od odrob a ol-omebecer , ossA me ocsonnoc uotnuj es odnauQ
. arret rop ai euqrop , snedro sasse son-ared elE . oluaP rop ila rarepse ed somahnít siop , ossA ed otrop oa éta ocrab ed odnajaiv etnerf à somof , són a otnauQ
. sodajarocne otium sodot maracif e oviv ele moc marías , zapar oa otnauQ
. megaiv uiuges siopeD . ahnizãhnam ed éta sehl-ralaf a adnia uocif e uemoc , oãp o uitrap , aielbmessa a arap uotlov oluaP
» ! oviv átse ele euq metsussa es oãN « : essid e zapar o uoçarba , es-uonilcni , mébmat uecsed oluaP oãtnE
. otrom ol-ártnocne maroF . riac es-uoxied e oluaP ed oãmres ognol o etnarud uecemroda , alenaj amun odatnes avatse euq , ocituÊ odamahc zapar mU
. saseca sadapmâl satium ál aivah e radna odnuges on sodinuer somavátsE
. etion-aiem à éta oãçagerp a uognolorp e setnerc soa uolaf , etniuges aid on ritrap aived euq , oluaP . mumoc me oãçiefer a arap son-omátnuj , ognimod oN
. anames amu ía somáciF . edaórT me sele moc somavátse áj edrat siam said ocnic e sopiliF ed otrop on somácrabme , aocsáP ad satsef sad siopeD
. edaórT ed edadic an són rop mararepse e etnaida marof soãtsirc setse , sáilA
. aisÁ ad oãiger ad mare euq , omifórT e ociuqíT adnia e oetómiT , ebreD ed , oiaG , acinólasseT ed siod so , odnugeS e ocratsirA , aiereB ed edadic ad , orriP ed ohlif , ortapóS ele moc maroF
. ainódecaM ad ohnimac olep ratlov oãtne uevloseR . ele artnoc sonalp maizaf sueduj so euq ebuos odnauq airíS a arap racrabme arap es-raraperp a avatsE . sesem sêrt uocif edno
, aiacA à uogehc mif roP . sarvalap saus sa moc setnerc so odnajarocne , oãiger aleuqa uotisiV
. ainódecaM a arap uiuges e seled es-uidepsed siopeD . sohlesnoc snugla rad sehl arap solupícsid so ramahc uodnam oluaP , oçorovla o uobaca odnauQ
. oãinuer a adanimret rop ued , otsi rezid ed siopeD
» . oçorovla etse odot somracifitsuj arap rad assop es euq amuhnen oãzar áh oãn euq otsiv , ejoh uecetnoca euq od asuac rop , sosotlover ed sodasuca res ed ocsir o somerroc éta sóN
. lagel aielbmessa amun adivloser res ed áret ale , retabed a oãtseuq artuo reuqlauq revuoh es saM
. seõçasuca saus sa ál metneserpa euq selE . sezíuj áh e sianubirt áh ossi arap , méugla artnoc asioc amugla mêt ele moc mahlabart euq so e oirtémeD eS
. asued asson a artnoc lam ed adan maressid men olpmet o maranaforp oãn sele sam , snemoh setse iuqa marexuorT
. etnemadatipicerp adan maçaf oãn e es-memlaca , ragen edop méugnin euq asioc amu é otsi omoC
. uéc od uiac euq megami aus ad e simetrÁ asued ednarg ad olpmet od arotcetorp a é edadic asson a euq ebas etneg a adot , osefÉ ed snemoH « : essid e ovop o ramlaca uiugesnoc oipícinum od oiráterces o oãtnE
» ! soiséfE sod simetrÁ a aviV « : saroh saud esauq etnarud sarvalap samsem sa ratirg a sodot es-maresup , ueduj are ele euq marebuos odnauq saM
. ralaf arap oicnêlis ridep a oãm a moc lanis zef erdnaxelA . rezid ed aivah ele euq o ehl-mavacilpxe oãditlum ad snugla e aielbmessa ad etnerf a arap erdnaxelA mararrupme sueduj sO
. odinuer mahnit es euq rop aibas men etrap roiam A . artuo mavatirg sortuo , asioc amu mavatirg snu euqrop , aielbmessa an oãsufnoc a avanier , otnatertnE
. ortaet on essartne oãn euq odnidep , odacer maradnam ehl mébmat , oluaP ed sogima , aisÁ ad sefehc sod snuglA
. maraxied o oãn setnerc so sam , ovop od aielbmessa ad etnaid es-ratneserpa aireuq oluaP
. megaiv an oluaP ed soriehnapmoc , ocratsirA e oiaG soinódecam so sele moc odnatsarra , ortaet o arap assam me es-uigirid oãditlum a e edadic a adot rop es-uohlapse oãsufnoc A
» ! soiséfE sod simetrÁ a aviV « : ratirg a es-maresup e sosoiruf maracif , sarvalap satse merivuo oA
» . odnum o odot me e aisÁ ad oãiger a adot me adicehnocer é euq , asued atsed azednarg a adazerpsed res a riv e , met euq amaf a adot redrep edop simetrÁ asued ednarg ad olpmet o éta sam , otidércsed me riac ed ocsir o erroc oicógen osson o ós oãn euqrop , osogirep otium é recetnoca a átse euq o arO
. aisÁ a adot esauq me omoc osefÉ me iuqa ós oãn , etneg atium uoivsed e uecnevnoc áj ele , ossi moc E . soriedadrev sesued oãs oãn macirbaf snemoh so euq sesued so euq amrifa oluaP esse , rezid mevuo e meêv omoc saM . soriedadrev sesued oãs oãn macirbaf snemoh so euq sesued so euq ele ziD . rezaf a adna oluaP esse euq o odivuo e otsiv mêt sêcov saM
. oicífo etsed mev ratse-meb osson o euq mebas , sogimA « : sehl-essid e , setnahlemes soicífo me mavahlabart euq sortuo moc etnematnuj , sodot so-uinuer ele oãtnE
. ele moc mavahlabart euq soa orcul otium avad oicógen ues o e simetrÁ asued ad olpmet od atarp ed soledom soneuqep aizaf , oirtémeD odamahc , seviruo mU
. rohneS od ohnimaC od asuac rop , osefÉ ed edadic an oçorovla ednarg evuoh euq oãisaco assen ioF
. aisÁ an opmet mugla adnia uocif ele otnauqne , otsarE e oetómiT , serodarobaloc sues sod siod ainódecaM à oãtne uodnaM
» . amoR a mébmat ri ed ohnet , mélasureJ a ri ed siopeD « : aizid e , aiacA alep e ainódecaM alep odnassap , mélasureJ a ri uevloser oluaP , sotnemicetnoca setsed siopeD
. siam zev adac aicelatrof e avahlapse es arvalap aus a rohneS od redop o moc euq missa arE
. atarp ed sadeom lim atneuqnic me sodamieuq sorvil sod rolav o es-uoluclaC . sodot ed atsiv à meramieuq so arap sorvil sues so maravel e es-maratnuj sairaxurb mavacitarp euq seleuqad sotiuM
. otief mahnit euq lam o mavassefnoc e éf aus a mavamalcorp rohneS on rerc a marassap euq sod sotium oãtnE
. adnia odatiepser siam es-uonrot suseJ rohneS od emon O . odem ed soiehc maracif e otsid marebuos , sueduj-oãn e sueduj , osefÉ me mavarom euq so sodoT
. sun esauq e sodiref otium asac aleuqad riguf ed marevit sele euq otnat sehl-uetab , sele a es-uorita uam otirípse od odíussop memoh o oãtnE
» ? oãs meuq , sêcov saM . oluaP é meuq ies e suseJ oçehnoC « : sehl-uednopser uam otirípse mu saM
. setodrecas sod efehc are euq , savecsE odamahc ueduj mu ed sohlif etes aivah otsi rezaf a mavadna euq so ertnE
» ! maias euq sov-onedro , aicnuna oluaP euq eleuqa , suseJ ed emon mE « : sotirípse soa maizid e setneod sod suam sotirípse so raslupxe arap suseJ rohneS od emon o rasu maresiuq suam sotirípse raslupxe a arret me arret ed mavadna euq sueduj snuglA
. seled maías suam sotirípse so e mahnit euq saçneod sad sodaruc mavacif sele e , setneod son meracot sele moc arap , odasu ahnit oluaP euq sapuor sa e soçnel so mavavel étA
. oluaP ed oiem rop soiránidroartxe sergalim aizaf sueD
. rohneS od arvalap a marivuo , sueduj-oãn omoc sueduj otnat , aisÁ ad oãiger an avarom euq ovop o odot euq odom ed , sona siod etnarud otsi zeF
. said so sodot avanisne e avagerp edno , onariT odamahc memoh mu ed alocse an solupícsid so moc es-rinuer a uossap e seled es-uorapes oluaP oãtnE . oãditlum ad etnaid rohneS od ohnimaC od lam maizid e mavatiderca oãn , setnetiner es-mavartsom snugla saM
. sueD ed onier od acreca sol-êcnevnoc odnarucorp , oãçcivnoc a adot moc avalaf ál e agoganis à ai oluaP , sesem sêrt etnaruD
. snemoh ezod snu odot oa marE
. raziteforp a e sadicehnocsed saugníl ralaf a maraçemoc e sele erbos uecsed otnaS otirípsE o , soãm sa sôpmi sehl oluaP odnauq E
. suseJ rohneS od emon me sodazitpab marof , otsi merivuo ed siopeD
» . suseJ me , rezid reuq , eled sioped riv ed aivah euq eleuqan rerc aived euq ovop oa aizid mébmat ele sam , lam od meredneperra es saossep sa arap are oãoJ ed omsitpab O « : uocilpxe oluaP
» . atsitpaB oãoJ ed omsitpab O « : marednopser sele E » ? marebecer omsitpab euq oãtnE « : adnia uotnugrep oluaP
» ! otnaS otirípsE o etsixe euq rezid somivuo reuqes men sóN « : marednopser selE » ? éf a maratieca odnauq , otnaS otirípsE o marebeceR « : sehl-uotnugrep e
solupícsid snu ál uortnocnE . osefÉ a uogehc e roiretni olep uojaiv oluaP , otniroC me avatse olopA otnauqnE
. saisseM o are suseJ euq arutircsE adargaS an esab moc avavorp e ragen maidop oãn sele euq seõzar avatneserpA . sueduj sod orre o sodot ed etnaid avartsnomed siop
, setnerc odanrot ahnit açarg aus an sueD euq seleuqa arap aduja ednarg ed iof , aiacA à uogehc odnauQ . meb messebecer o euq meridep a ál ed solupícsid soa odnevercse , on-marajarocne soãmri so e aiacA a arap ri uidiced olopA oãtnE
. sueD ed ohnimaC o rohlem ehl-maracilpxe e asac arap ol-ável marevloser , marivuo o aliuqÁ e alicsirP odnauq saM . megaroc a adot moc agoganis an ralaf a es-sôp olopA
. oãoJ ed omsitpab o essecehnoc ós euq adnia , suseJ ed acreca atcaxe otium amrof amu ed avanisne e omsaisutne moc avalaf , rohneS od ohnimaC on odíurtsni avatsE
. arutircsE adargaS a meb otium aicehnoc e rodagerp mob mu arE . airdnaxelA ed larutan , olopA odamahc ueduj mu osefÉ a uogehc , otnatertnE
. solupícsid so sodot odnamina , aigírF ad e aicálaG ad seõiger sa uerrocrep e zev artuo arobme es-iof , opmet mugla ila rassap ed siopeD
. airíS ad aiuqoitnA arap uiuges e ajergi aleuqad soãmri so uotnemirpmuc , mélasureJ arap ogol es-uigiriD . aieraseC me uocrabmesed e
osefÉ ed uitraP » . resiuq sueD es , ác ieratlov uE « : sehl-essid , arobme iof es odnauq , otnatne oN
. uodrocnoc oãn ele sam , opmet siam essacif euq oluaP a maridep setsE
. mainuer es ál euq sueduj so moc uolaf e agoganis à ioF . aliuqÁ e alicsirP ila uoxied oluaP , osefÉ ed edadic à maragehc odnauQ
. otief ahnit euq assemorp amu rirpmuc arap , açebac a uopar , racrabme ed setna , saercnêC mE . aliuqÁ e alicsirP ele moc odnavel , airíS a arap uocrabme e soãmri sod es-uidepsed , siopeD . otniroC me opmet etnatsab uocif adnia oluaP
. ossi moc adan uotropmi es oãn oãilaG méroP . lanubirt od etnaid ila omsem , ehl-retab a sodot maraçemoc e , agoganis ad etnegirid , senetsóS mararraga oãtne selE
. lanubirt od arof rôp so-uodnam E
» ! sassed seõtseuq me ziuj res oreuq oãn euq é uE . sortuo so moc snu otnussa o ál mavloser , iel airpórp assov ad e semon ed , sarvalap ed oãtseuq amu ed atart es omoc saM
. sueduj ó , saxieuq sassov sa ratucse reved uem aires , evarg emirc mugla ed uo , açitsujni amugla ed essatart es eS « : sueduj soa essid oãilaG odnauq , ralaf a raçemoc a ai oluaP
» ! iel a artnoc é euq arienam amud sueD a raroda meved euq ed saossep sa recnevnoc a adna memoh etsE « : rodanrevog oa maressid e
lanubirt oa on-maravel , oluaP artnoc es-maratnuj sueduj so , aiacA ad onamor rodanrevog uonrot es oãilaG odnauq saM
. sueD ed arvalap a ila ranisne a oiem e ona etnarud otniroC me uocif oluaP oãtnE
» . edadic atsen ogimoc etneg atium ohnet euqrop , lam rezaf áredop et méugniN . ogitnoc uotse ue euqrop
, selac et oãn e ragerp a aunitnoC ! odem sahnet oãN « : oãsiv amun oluaP a essid rohneS o , etion amU
. sadazitpab marof e rohneS on marerc , oluaP ed megasnem a marivuo otniroC ed edadic ad saossep sartuo satiuM . ailímaf aus a adot omoc meb , rohneS on uotiderca , agoganis ad etnegirid o , opsirC E
. agoganis ad odal oa omsem avarom euq e omsíaduJ od etnazitapmis are euq , otsuJ oicíT odamahc , memoh otrec mu ed asac arap iof e ilad uias , otsi otiD
» . sueduj-oãn so rarucorp uov etnaid me aroga eD . adirpmuc átse ocsovnoc arap edadilibasnopser ahnim A . saçebac sassov sa erbos aiacer eugnas ossov o euQ « : essid e , otsetorp ed lanis me , apuor a uiducas oãtne oluaP . on-mavatlusni e oluaP artnoc es-maratlov sele saM
. saisseM o are suseJ euq ed sueduj sod etnaid ohnumetset avad e arvalap ad oãçagerp à otelpmoc rop es-uocided oluaP , ainódecaM ad maragehc oetómiT e saliS odnauQ
. sogerg omoc sueduj otnat recnevnoc odnarucorp , agoganis an avalaf ele sodabás so sodoT
. sotnuj merahlabart arap sele moc uocif , sadnet rezaf ed oãssiforp amsem ad are omoc , e
sol-átisiv iof oluaP . sueduj so sodot ál ed arobme odadnam ahnit oiduálC rodarepmi o euqrop amoR ed rias euq mareviT . rehlum aus alicsirP moc , ailátI ed ragehc ed odabaca ahnit e otnoP od larutan are euq , aliuqÁ odamahc ueduj mu ál uortnocnE
. otniroC ed edadic a arap iof e sanetA ed uias oluaP , otsid siopeD
. siam snugla e siramâD adamahc rehlum amu , ogapóerA od sorbmem sod mu are euq , oisínoiD mavatse setse ertnE . setnerc es-maranrot e oluaP a es-maratnuj snuglA
. arobme es-iof oluaP oãtnE
» . arutla artuon , ossid ralaf et-rivuo ed somevaH « : maressid sortuo e maraçort euq snu evuoh , oãçierrusser an ralaf marivuo o odnauQ
» . sotrom so ertne ed o-odnaticsusser , sodot ed etnaid edadirotua ued e uongised meuq a memoh mud oiem rop , açitsuj moc odnum o ragluj arap aid mu uocraM
. sodacep sues sod adneperra es , etrap a adot me , etneg a adot euq anedro ele , aroga saM . ejoh ed said soa éta , saossep sad aicnârongi ad amic rop uossap sueD
. snemoh sod oãçanigami alep e etra alep atief , ardep ed uo atarp ed , oruo ed megami amu moc odicerap ajes sueD euq rasnep someved oãn , sueD ed ailímaf ad oãtne són odneS
” . sueD ed ailímaf ad somos éta sóN “ : maressid mébmat sateop sossov sod snugla omoC . somitsixe e somevom son elen , adiv a somet euq elen É
. són ed mu adac ed egnol átse oãn ele , otcaf eD . ol-ártnocne rop messaçrofse es e rarucorp messedup o euq arap ossi zeF
. rarom maived sovop so edno seragul so e sopmet so uocram meuq omsem ele ioF . orietni odnum on meviv euq sanamuh saçar sa sadot mareiv essed e memoh mu oriemirp uoirc sueD
. siam o odut e oãçaripser a , adiv a sodot a ád meuq é omsem ele siop , amuhnen asioc maçaf ehl snemoh so euq asicerp men
, snemoh solep sotief solpmet me atibah oãN . arreT ad e uéC od rohneS o é e , artnocne es elen euq o odut e odnum o zef euq sueD o É
. olaf sov ue euq ed sueD o é , recehnoc o mes maroda euq sueD esse , meb sioP ” . odicehnocsed sueD oA “ : satircse sarvalap satse ahnit euq ratla mun ieraper , sosoigiler sotnemunom sossov so iv e edadic alep atlov amu ied odnauq , otiefe moC
. sosoigiler otium odut me oãs euq ojev , sesneinetA « : essid e ogapóerA od aielbmessA ad etnaid ép ed es-sôp oluaP oãtnE
. sedadivon samitlú sa ratnoc a e rivuo a opmet o mavassap sanetA me maiviv euq soriegnartse so omoc sesneineta so otnat , otcaf eD
» ! rezid reuq ossi euq o rebas ed somaíratsog e ohnartse otium é sezid son euq O
? sanisne euq asse é anirtuod avon euq rebas someredoP « : ehl-maratnugrep e ogapóerA odamahc ragul mun oãinuer amu a on-maravel oãtnE
. oãçierrusser ad e suseJ ed acreca avon aob a avaicnuna sehl oluaP euqrop otsi maiziD » . sesued sortuo ed atsidnagaporp é euq eceraP « : mavamrifa sortuO » ? rezid árereuq otarab-alaf etse euq é euQ « : maizid snU . ele moc seõsserpmi mavacort sociótse e satsirucipe sofosólif snuglA
. maicerapa ál euq so moc said so sodot avalaf , acilbúp açarp an , E . omsíaduJ od setnazitapmis so moc e sueduj so moc agoganis an aitucsid ossi roP
. solodí ed aiehc oãt edadic a rev oa odatlover es-aitnes oluaP , oetómiT e saliS rop sanetA me avarepse otnauqnE
. levíssop asserped siam o , sanetA a ele moc ret messof oetómiT e saliS euq arap oluaP ed odacer mu moc , aiereB arap maratlov siopeD . sanetA ed edadic à éta on-maravel , oluaP mavahnapmoca euq sO
. aiereB me mavacif oetómiT e saliS otnauqne , ram oa oãçcerid me oluaP etnemataidemi maradnam soãmri sO
. ele artnoc ovop o ranitoma e ratiga ál marof , aiereB me sueD ed arvalap a ragerp a avatse oluaP euq marebuos acinólasseT ed sueduj so odnauq saM
. edadeicos atla ad sagerg e sogerg ed oremún ednarg mu sesse ertne e , setnerc es-maranrot seled sotium , odom etseD
. missa omsem are aizid oluaP euq o es merev arap arutircsE adargaS a mavadutse said so sodot e , edatnov aob otium moc megasnem a marebecer siop , acinólasseT ed so euq od sodamrof meb siam mare ilad sueduj sO
. sueduj sod agoganis à marof , maragehc ál odnauQ . aiereB ed edadic a arap saliS e oluaP riuges marezif soãmri so , uecetiona euq ogoL
. meratlos so ed setna adalupitse atlum amu ragap a sortuo so e oãsaJ maragirbo euq
sadanoisserpmi oãt maracif , otsi marivuo sedadirotua sa e oãditlum a odnauQ
» . suseJ odamahc , ier ortuo áh euq mezid siop , rodarepmi od siel sa mazerpsed soudívidni sesse sodoT . asac aus me so-uebecer oãsaJ e
edadic asson an aroga oãtse etrap a adot rop snedrosed odacovorp mêt euq snemoh sessE « : mavatirg otnauqne , edadic ad sedadirotua sad açneserp à soãtsirc sortuo snugla e oãsaJ maravel , ál marartnocne so oãn omoC
. ovop od lanubirt oa meragertne so arap , saliS e oluaP ed arucorp à oãsaJ ed asac a maratlassa serodatiga sO . edadic an medrosed amu maracovorp etneg atium odnatnuj e sianigram so ertne suam snemoh snugla marinueR . ajevni ed soiehc maracif sueduj sortuo so saM
. setnatropmi serehlum satium e aciaduj oãigiler ad sotpeda sogerg ed oremún ednarg mu omoc meb , saliS e oluaP a maratnuj es ogol e sodicnevnoc maracif sueduj snuglA
» . saisseM o é raicnuna a uotse sov ue euq suseJ etsE « : sehl-aizid E . raticsusser ed ahnit , rerrom ed sioped , euq e rerfos ed ahnit saisseM o euq odnacilpxe sehl-aI
. arutircsE adargaS a erbos sele moc uolaf sodabás sêrt etnarud e ál iof oluaP , emutsoc ues are omoC
. sueduj sod agoganis amu aivah edno , acinólasseT a maragehc e ainólopA e elopífnA ed sedadic salep marassap saliS e oluaP
. arobme es-marof , merajarocne so ed e soãmri so merev ed siopeD . aidíL ed asac a marof e oãsirp ad marías saliS e oluaP
. edadic ad messías euq sehl-maragor e edadrebil me son-maresup , aplucsed sehl-ridep etnemlaossep maroF
. sodatsussa maracif , sonamor soãdadic mare saliS e oluaP euq marebuos setse odnauq E . siaicifo soa ossi rezid marof sadraug sO
» iuqad son-rarit sonamor siaicifo soirpórp so mahnev euQ ! oãn ossI ? sadidnocse sà son-ratlos mereuq aroga e aiedac an son-maretem siopeD ! sonamor soãdadic somos euq són — sodagluj somres mes , ocilbúp me son-ragitsac maradnaM « : sadraug soa uednopser oluaP saM
» . zap me rias medop , ossi roP . sov-ratlos em-maradnam siaicifo sO « : oluaP a essid orierecrac O
. ratlos so arap orierecrac oa rezid sadraug sues so maradnam sonamor siaicifo so , uecehnama odnauQ
. sueD me odirc meret rop setnetnoc otium maracif ailímaf aus a omoc orierecrac o otnaT . remoc ed sehl-ued e asac aus arap saliS e oluaP mif rop uoveL
. sodazitpab marof ailímaf aus a adot e ele , riuges a ogoL . sadiref sad ratart sehl arap aiedac ad so-uovel orierecrac o , etion ad aroh aleuqà omseM
. asac aus me mavatse euq so sodot a e orierecrac oa rohneS od arvalap a oãtne maraicnuna E
. sele marednopser , » ailímaf aut a e ut , ovlas sáres e suseJ rohneS on êrC «
» ? ovlas res arap rezaf oved ue euq é euq o , serohneS « : uotnugrep e arof arap so-uovel siopeD
. saliS ed e oluaP ed sép soa es-uovruc , remert a odot , e rerroc a uortne , zul amu uidep orierecrac o oãtnE
» ! iuqa sodot somatsE ! ossi saçaf oãN « : otla meb ehl-uotirg oluaP saM
. odiguf mahnit soserp so euq uosnep euqrop , ratam es arap adapse ad uoxup , satreba mavatse oãsirp ad satrop sa euq uiv odnauq , e uodroca orierecrac O
. es-maratlos soserp so maidnerp euq setnerroc sa e marirba es satrop sa sadot , otsiN . oãsirp ad secrecila so uolaba euq otnat uemert oãhc o , etneper eD
. mavatucse so soserp sortuo so otnauqne , sueD a sonih mavatnac e mavaro saliS e oluaP , etion-aiem ad atlov roP
. ariedam ed opec mu a sép so sehl-uednerp e aiedac ad odnuf o arap so-uovel , medro atse uebecer odnauq , orierecrac O
. açnaruges a adot moc meradraug so arap orierecrac oa snedro odnad , aiedac an son-maretem sioped e otium sehl-maretaB
. meragitsac so e sapuor sa merarit sehl arap snedro mared siaicifo so e sele artnoc es-uotnavel oãditlum a oãtnE
» . racitarp men ratieca somedop oãn , sonamor , són euq semutsoc manisne , sueduj oãs omoC
. edadic asson a rabrutrep a madna snemoh setsE « : maressid , sonamor siaicifo soa maratneserpa so odnauQ
. sedadirotua sad açneserp à , acilbúp açarp à son-maravel e saliS e oluaP mararraga , seõçahnivida sa moc oicógen siam rezaf maidop oãn áj euq mariv avarcse ad sonod so odnauQ
