. fassA ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . taG ed aril a moC . oroc od rotcerid oA
! sovlas someres e aidróciresim aut a son-artsom , són arap et-atlov , osoredop-odot sueD , ROHNES Ó
! emon uet o someracovni e adiv a son-avresnoC . it ed someratsafa son siam acnuN
. it arap recserc etsezif ut euq eleuqa , odihlocse uet o aduja saM
. ari aut a moc so-iórtsed , maratroc a e maramieuq a euq seleuqA
. recserc etsezif ut euq sotneber sod , etsatnalp omsem ut euq ahniv ad adiuC
. ahniv atsed adiuc e uéc od ál etnematneta ahlo , són arap et-atlov , osoredop-odot sueD
. an-maroved snegavles siamina so e a-atsaved atserolf ad ilavaj O
? savu saus sa racnarra massap ál euq soa odnaxied , acrec aus a etsaburred euq roP
. oir ednarg oa éta sotneber sues so e ram oa éta es-marednetse snegamar saus sA
. sordec sotla so marassapartlu somar sues so e arbmos aus a moc es-marirboc setnom sO
. orietni síap o uehcne e , sezíar uohnag ale , onerret o ehl-etsaraperP
. a-etsatnalp e soãgap sovop so etsaslupxe , ariediv amu otpigE od etsexuorT
! sovlas someres e aidróciresim aut a son-artsom , són arap et-atlov , osoredop-odot sueD
. són ed maçenracse sogimini sosson so euq setimrep e , sahniziv seõçan salep adatupsid aserp són ed etseziF
. somebeb euq me opoc o , samirgál ed etsehcne , samirgál sad oãp o moc son-etsatnemilA
? ovop uet od sacilpús sad rasepa odangidni sárartsom et odnauq éta , osoredop-odot sueD , ROHNES
! sovlas someres e aidróciresim aut a son-artsom , són arap et-atlov , sueD Ó
! redop uet o moc son-ravlas mev e atrepseD ! séssanaM e mimajneB , miarfE ed sobirt sà azednarg aut a artsoM
! et-atsefinam , snibureuq so erbos onort o snet euq ut ; ohnaber mu omoc ésoJ ed setnednecsed so saiug euq ut , atucse learsI ed rotsap Ó
. fassA ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . » ohnumetset od soiríl sO « odnugeS . oroc od rotcerid oA







! solucés so sodot rop serovuol suet so someratnac , erpmes arap some-et-racifirolg , ohnaber uet od sahlevo e ovop uet somos euq , sóN
. rohneS , marezif et euq sasnefo sa siam sezev etes sahniziv seõçan sà iubirteR
. etrom à sodanednoc oãtse euq sod adiv a avlas , redop ednarg uet o moc , e soserp sod sodimeg so sodivuo suet soa meugehC
! açnagniv mes acif oãn sovres suet sod etrom a euq , sohlo sosson sod etnaid , etneg asse a artsoM » ? sueD uet o átse ednO « : soãgap so ratnugrep ed-oãh euq roP
! emon mob uet o e airólg aut alep , sodacep sosson so aodrep e son-arvil ; rodavlas osson , sueD ó , son-errocoS
! saçrof sasson sad mif oa somágehc euqrop , ortnocne osson oa asserped ahnev aidróciresim aut a euq ; sodassapetna sosson sod satlaf salep ragap saçaf son oãN
. saníur me síap o maramrofsnart e ovop uet o maratam sele euqroP
! macovni et men mecehnoc et oãn euq , soãgap sonier e sovop so erbos ari aut a agerracseD
? rodasarba ogof mu omoc emúic uet o áreS ? odangidni sáratse , ROHNES , odnauq étA
. són ed mabmoz e es-meir maiedor son euq so ; sahniziv seõçan sa arap oinrácse ed ovitom son-ománroT
. arutlupes rad edôp sehl méugnin e mélasureJ a adot rop augá omoc eugnas ues o maramarreD
. snegavles siamina soa siéif suet sod soproc so e sertuba sod otnemila arap sovres suet sod serevádac so maraçnaL
. saníur ed oãtnom mu a mélasureJ marizuder , olpmet otnas uet o maranaforp , arret aut a maridavni soãgap so , sueD Ó . fassA ed oãçceloc ad omlaS
. airodebas atium moc o-uizudnoc e oãditcer a adot moc ovop ues od uodiuc etsE
. açnareh aus a e ovop ues o oãs euq , bocaJ ed setnednecsed sod rotsap res arap , sohnaber sod sárt ed o-uoriter
; sahlevo ed rotsap are etse odnauq , divaD ovres ues o mébmat uehlocsE
. arret a omoc , erpmes arap emrif e uéc o omoc otla , oiráutnas ues o uiurtsnoC
. odireferp ues , oãiS ed etnom o e áduJ ed obirt a setna uehlocsE
. miarfE ed obirt a uotiejer e ésoJ ed asac a uonodnaba missA
. erpmes arap ahnogrev ed so-uirboc ; riguf sol-êf e sogimini sues so uotorreD
. ohniv od otiefe o assap meuq a orierreug mu omoc lat , onos mu ed omoc , uotrepsed rohneS o saM
. ratlupes maredup so oãn savúiv saus sa e adapse à marerrom setodrecas sO
. rasac rop maracif saleznod sa e snevoj sues so uoroved ogof O
. ogimini od adapse a bos rerrom uoxied o euq , ovop ues o moc odari oãt avatsE
. airólg aus ad olobmís o , azelatrof aus ad messaredopa es sogimini so euq uitimreP
. snemoh so ertne adarom aus a are euq , oliS ed oiráutnas o uonodnabA
. aicnêmeev moc learsI odnaiduper , es-uongidni e otsi uivuo sueD
. solodí odnaroda , emúic ues o maratrepsed ; soãgap seratla moc ari aus a maracovorP
! oslaf ocra mu omoc es-marecrot ; siap sues so omoc siéifni marof , es-maraivsnarT
. sotiecerp sues so odnavresbo oãn e ele artnoc es-odnatlover , omissítla sueD o avorp à maresup sele saM
. sadnet saus san essatibah ovop ues o euq moc zef e sobirt sa ertne seled sarret sa uitraper , learsI ed etnerf ad soãgap so uoriteR
! uotsiuqnoc omsem ele euq atnas ahnatnom a , arret aus a arap ovop ues o uovel sueD
. sogimini sues so ram on avatlupes otnauqne , odem marevit oãn e açnaruges moc so-uizudnoC
. ohnaber ues oa rotsap mu omoc otresed olep so-uoiug e ovop ues o rias zeF
. maC ed sadnet san ailímaf ad saicímirp sa , soicpíge sod sotinégomirp so rerrom zeF
! etsep à sadiv saus sa uogertnE ! etrom ad uorvil so oãn ; ari aus à osruc ervil ueD
. edadimalac ed soriegasnem omoc , oãçilfa a e roruf o , oãçangidni a , ari aus a sele artnoc uogerracseD
. soiar so moc sohnaber sues so uignita e ozinarg moc sodag sues so uireF
. adaeg a moc soromócis sues so e aviaras a moc sahniv saus sa uiurtseD
. sotohnafag soa oçrofse ues od oturf o e sotcesni soa satiehloc saus sa uogertnE
. maríurtsed so euq , sãr e , mararoved so euq , sasonenev sacsom sehl-uodnaM
. seled rebeb messedup oãn soicpíge so euq arap , sianac e soir sues so eugnas me uetrevnoc odnauq
; sasorbmossa e sednarg sasioc zef , otpigE on , naoS ed sopmac son odnauq
; sogimini sod uorvil so euq me aid od , redop ues od mavarbmel es oãN
! learsI ed sueD o maicetsirtne ; avorp à sueD rôp a etnemetnatsnoc mavatloV
! otresed on sotsogsed marasuac ehl e sueD a maracovorp sezev satnauQ
! atlov oãn e assap euq orpos mu omoc , siatrom seres mare sele euq es-uorbmel sueD
. roruf moc uotart so oãn e , ari aus a seled uoivsed sezev satium ; aíurtsed so oãn e sodacep so sehl-avaodrep , osoidrociresim é euq , sueD saM
. açnaila aus à siéif men e sueD moc arap siael mare oãn seõçaroc sues sO
. orecnis are maizid euq od adan ; sosoritnem mare sotisóporp sues so saM
. rotneder ues o are omissítla sueD o euq , rotcetorp ues o are sueD euq oãtne es-mavarbmeL
. osnacsed mes on-mavacsub e ele arap es-mavatlov ; on-mavarucorp sortuo so , etrom a moc snugla sueD odnagitsaC
. oãsuli amu omoc sadiv saus sa e orpos mu omoc said sues so uiugnitxe sueD , ossi roP
. sueD ed sahlivaram san maratiderca oãn e odacep on maritsisrep , otsi odut ed rasepA
! learsI ed snemoh serohlem so uetaba ; sele ertned setrof siam so uotam e sele erbos uiac sueD ed ari a odnauq
, acob an adimoc a mahnit adnia ; etitepa ues o raerfer marebuos oãn sele saM
. sojesed sues so zefsitas sueD missa e sodaicas meb meracif éta oãtne maremoC
. sadnet saus sad atlov me e otnemapmaca od oiem on riac sal-êf sueD
! ram od aiera omoc sasoremun uéc od maíac seva sa e ; ovop ues o arap enrac uéc od riac zeF
! lus otnev o riv zef redop ues o moc e etsel otnev o suéc sod rarpos zeF
! aicnâdnuba moc adimoc sehl-uoivnE ! setrof sod oãp o sodot maremoC
! meremoc sele arap uéc od oãp o sehl-ued ; ánam o ovop o erbos revohc zef
; uéc od satrop sa uirba e snevun sà snedro ued sueD
. oilíxua ues on açnaifnoc men sueD me éf marevit oãn euqrop
; learsI artnoc uotnemua ari aus a e ogof o moc bocaJ ed ovop o uocata , es-uongidni , otsi uivuo ROHNES o odnauQ
» ? ovop ues o arap enrac raraperp e oãp mébmat son-rad ele áredop sam , aicnâdnuba moc augá uerroc aled euq e ahcor a uiref ele euq edadrev É
? otresed on asem amu raraperp son ed zapac sueD áreS « : odnezid , ele artnoc mararumruM
. setitepa sues so odnuges , serajnam ehl-odnidep , avorp à sueD rôp maresiuQ
. otresed on , omissítlA o artnoc sedleber es-odnartsom , sueD artnoc racep a maraunitnoc sele saM
. osoladuac oir mu omoc avatorb euq etnerroc augá ahcor ad rias zef sueD
. levátogseni etnof amu ed rebeb a sehl-ued e sodehcor so uednef otresed oN
. ogof ed zul amu moc etion a adot e mevun amu moc , aid ed , so-uizudnoC
. euqid mu essof es omoc , saugá sa evetnoc , messassap sele euq arap , ram o uirbA
. naoS ed eicínalp an , otpigE od arret an , sahlivaram zef sueD , sodassapetna sues sod etnaiD
. uortsom sehl euq sahlivaram sad , otief ahnit sehl ele euq od es-mareceuqse
; iel aus à recedebo maresiuq men sueD moc açnaila a maratiepser oãn
; ahlatab ad aid on aguf me es-maresup , sahcelf e socra moc sodamra , miarfE ed obirt ad sO
. sueD ues oa leifni otirípse ed e etnatsnocni oãçaroc ed , sotasnesni , sedleber , sodassapetna sues so omoc messof oãn e
sotnemadnam sues soa messecedebo euq arap ; zef ele euq od messeceuqse es oãn e sueD me açnaifnoc messevit euq arap
; sohlif soirpórp sues soa messatnoc so recsan ed adnia maivah euq sohlif so e messecehnoc so sarutuf seõçareg sa euq arap
, setnednecsed sues soa messanisne so euq sodassapetna sosson soa uonedrO . bocaJ ed setnednecsed soa iel amu ued , learsI ed ovop oa sotiecerp ued elE
. zef ele euq sahlivaram sa erbos e redop ues o e ROHNES od sairólg sa erbos sarutuf seõçareg sà someratnoc odut ; setnednecsed sosson soa somerednocse sa oãN
. maritimsnart son sodassapetna sosson so euq e somednerpa e somivuo euq sasioc
, sopmet sortuo ed samgine ratneserpa e seõçarapmoc ed oiem rop ralaf uoV
! ogid et euq oliuqà oãçneta atserp ; sotnemanisne suem so , ovop uem , atucsE . fassA ed oãçceloc ad ameoP



















































. oãraA ed e sésioM ed oiem rop , rotsap mu omoc , ovop uet o etsaiuG
. sadagep saut sa uortnocne méugnin sam , sasoladuac saugá sa ertne rop etsahnimac ; ram od sévarta ohnimac uet o etsirbA
. uemert e uecemertse arret a ; odnum o maranimuli sogapmâler so e sera son uooce seõvort suet sod zov A
. sodal so sodot ed marigrus soiar suet so e uéc on uobmuter seõvort sod zov a ; avuhc aus a riac maraxied snevun sA
. maremert ram od sazednuforp sa e ; osoecer uocif , sueD ó , uiv et ram o odnauQ
. ésoJ ed e bocaJ ed setnednecsed so , ovop uet o etsatagser redop uet o moC
. redop uet o sovop so sodot a sartsom ; sahlivaram azilaer euq sueD o sé uT
? ut omoc ednarg oãt árevah sueD euq ; seõçca saut san otnas sé ut , sueD Ó
. soigídorp suet sod olaf e otief snet ut euq o odut erbos otideM
. arortuo ed sahlivaram saut sad em-orbmel ; ROHNES od sotief so airómem an ohneT
» . etnerefid odom ed etart son omissítlA od oãm a euq é aogam em siam euq O « : odnopser ue siopeD
» ? edadnob aus a uotogse es euq odari oãt áratsE ? oãxiapmoc aus ad odiceuqse sueD ai-es-reT
? erpmes arap assemorp aus a odaluna aireT ? rama son ed odaxied ele aireT
? levárovaf son-res a siam áratlov oãN ? erpmes arap son-ratiejer rohneS o árI «
: omsem mim a otnugrep e , otidem omitní uem on ; sotnemasnep sodnuforp me etion a ossaP
. sogitna sopmet sod em-orbmel , sodassap said sod em-odroceR
! rezid adan mes ortuo o arap odal mu ed odna , sailígiv sà sodautibah oãtse sohlo suem sO
. raminased em-otnis , otidem odnauq ; oripsus , sueD me osnep odnauQ
. otrofnoc artnocne oãn amla ahnim a ; oãçaro me soãm sahnim sa ovele , osnacsed mes , etion à ; rohneS o orucorp , odaitsugna uotse odnauQ
. açio em ele euq arap omalc sueD a , etrof zov moc omalc sueD A
. fassA ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . nutudeJ araP . oroc od rotcerid oA








. arret ad sier soa romet asuac e setnanrevog soa açrof a arit elE
! levímet é euq eleuqà setneserp maçerefo maiedor o euq sO . san-marpmuc e , sueD ossov , ROHNES oa sassemorp maçaF
! emon uet me atsef mezaf setneviverbos so ; rovuol uet me adnuder suam so artnoc ari aut A
! odnum etsed sodimirpo so sodot ratrebil e açitsuj rezaf arap seugre et odnauq
, oicnêlis me acif e emert arret a e açnetnes aut a samalcorp uéc od otla oD
. roruf uet oa ritsiser men , it ed etnaid ép ed retnam áriugesnoc es méugnin ; sodot rop odimet sé , ROHNES , uT
. solavac so e sorrac so sievómi macif , saçaema so , bocaJ ed sueD ó , ut odnauQ
! onos omitlú ues o marimrod e rezaf maredup adan , setrof siam odnes sodajopsed marof setnelav siam sO
. sojopsed ed sahnatnom euq od osoidnarg siam sÉ ! sueD ó , ut sé , osoirolg euQ
. sahcelf e socra , sadapse , soducse : arreug ed samra sa uorbeuq ilA
. oãiS ed etnom on é adarom aus a ; mélasureJ me átse oiráutnas ues O
. learsI me osomaf é emon ues o ; áduJ me odicehnoc é sueD
. fassA ed oãçceloc ad ocitnâc e omlaS . sadroc ed sotnemurtsni moC . oroc od rotcerid oA


. sotsuj sod redop o áratnemua sam , suam sod redop o iórtsed elE
. bocaJ ed sueD oa serovuol ieratnac ; onrete sueD o ieravuol , mérop , uE
. atog amitlú à éta mebeb sele e ; arret ad sodavlam soa rebeb a ád ele euq , ari aus ad etrof ohniv ed oiehc ecilác mu áh ROHNES od oãm aN
. evlosba sortuo a , anednoc snu a : ziuj o é euq é sueD siop
; sahnatnom sad men otresed od men , etnedico od uo etneiro od mev oãn otnemagluj O
» . ralaf a setnelosni majes men , sueD artnoc metlover es oãN
” ! sedleber majes oãN “ : lam mezaf euq soa E ” ! sotasnesni majes oãN “ : setnagorra soa ogiD
. sesab saus sa semrif métnam meuq ue uos , setnatibah sues so sodot moc , emert arret a odnauQ
. oãditcer moc ieragluj , ragluj odidiced revit ue odnauQ « : zid ROHNES O
. sahlivaram saut sa somatnac ; emon uet o somacovnI ! rovuol somad it a ; somavuol , sueD ó , it A
. fassA ed oãçceloc ad ocitnâc e omlaS . oroc od rotcerid oA
. siam zev adac ebos it artnoc sedleber sod airaezov a : sogimini suet sod sotirg sod saçeuqse et oãN
! rassec mes mednefo et sotasnesni so euq et-arbmeL ! asuac aut a ednefed , sueD ó , et-eugrE
. odatissecen o e erbop o mevuol et euq moc zaf , sodimirpo so mehlimuh euq satnisnoc oãN
. aicnêloiv ed oiehc átse sél a sél ed síap o euqrop , ocsonnoc etsezif euq açnaila ad et-arbmeL
. osefedni ovop uet od erpmes arap saçeuqse et oãn ; siéif suet sod adiv a saref sà seugertne oãN
. emon uet o azerpsed otasnesni ovop mu euq e it ed ecenracse ogimini o euq , ROHNES , et-arbmeL
. onrevnI o e oãreV o etsanimreted ; arietni arret ad setimil so etsaxiF
. loS o e auL a etsecelebatse ; et-mecnetrep etion a e aid O
. sosoladuac soir etsaces e setnecsan e setnof ratorb etseziF
. otresed od saref sà remoc a o-etsed e ãtaiveL od saçebac sa etsaçadepseD
. sohniram sortsnom sod açebac a etsagamse ; redop uet o moc ram o etsirba , sueD ó , uT
. arret atsen sairótiv satium etsiugesnoc ; ier uem o etsof ut erpmes edsed , sueD Ó
? sodazurc soçarb ed sacif euq roP ? asoredop oãm aut a sariter euq roP
? emon uet od ozerpsed moc áralaf odnauq étA ? ogimini o son-rajartlu ári , sueD ó , odnauq étA
! árarud otsi odnauq éta ebas méugnin e , sateforp metsixe oãn áj , són arap sianis áh oãn áJ
. síap on sueD ed soiráutnas so sodot maramieuq e etnematelpmoc son-riurtsed maridiceD
. oãçatibah aut a arret rop odnatied , on-maranaforp e oiráutnas uet oa ogof maratieD
. sohlam e soletram moc odnetab , satrop saus sa maraçortseD
. odahcam ed eplog a sotnemariedam so maríurtsed e roirepus adartne a maracatA
. suéfort omoc sariednab saus sa elen mareugre ; oiráutnas uet on airótiv maratnac sogimini suet sO
! oiráutnas on uiurtsed odut ogimini o ; mif mes saníur satse rev meV
. adarom aut a snet edno , oãiS ed etnom od , merecnetrep et arap etsatagser euq sobirt sad , opmet otnat áh etsehlocse euq , ovop uet od et-arbmeL
? rotsap o sé meuq ed sahlevo sa artnoc ari aut a uotlov es euq roP ? erpmes arap etsanodnaba son euq rop , sueD Ó . fassA ed oãçceloc ad ameoP
. otief snet euq o odut ramalcorp ed-ieh ; oigúfer uem o sé , sueD uem , ROHNES , uT . sueD ed otrep ratse é edadicilef a , mim araP
. magener et euq seleuqa siórtsed ut ; es-redrep oãv it ed matsafa es euq sO
. erpmes arap açnareh ahnim a é ele ; oãçaroc uem oa açrof ád meuq é sueD , rimusnoc a ajetse es res uem o euq adniA
. ogitnoc ratse ojesed ós arret aN ? it ed méla , uéc on ue ohnet meuQ
. sarnoh moc em-rebecer ed-sáh e oivívnoc uet oa em-saiug
, oãm alep em-sezudnoc ut ; ogitnoc erpmes odatse ohnet , otnatne oN
! it ed etnaid lamina mu omoc are uE . aidneerpmoc adan e otasnesni are
; adanrotsnart , etnem ahnim a e arugrama ed oiehc avatse oãçaroc uem o , arortuO
. seled megami a sárazerpsed , rohneS , seratnavel et odnauq , ohnos mu ed atrepsed méugla odnauq omoC
! sele moc árabaca odem O ! sodíurtsed oãracif otnemom muN
. aníur an riac sol-êzaf e , oãçidrep à sol-izudnoc ed-sáh uT
. seled mif o res airi lauq idneerpmoc , sueD ed oiráutnas on iertne odnauq óS
. mim arap osonep otium iof sam , ossi redneerpmoc ietneT
. siéif oãs et euq seleuqa airaoçiarta ue , sele omoc odasnep essevit ue eS
. odagitsac uos sãhnam sa sadot ; aroh a adot a seõçavorp orfoS
! edadlam a adot ed sapmil soãm sa ret e orup oãçaroc mu ret evres em adan eD
. sueD moc meratropmi es mes , socir siam zev adac meviv : suam so missa oãS
» ? rirbocsed iav omissítlA o euq é omoc ; otsid rebas a mev sueD euq é omoC « : mezid selE
. sarvalap saus sa zediva moc mebeb e sele arap matlov es serodiuges sues so , ossi roP
. arret a errocrep augníl aus a e suéc son átse euq , sueD artnoc matsetorP
. açitsujni a mev euq sueD ed é euq odnezid , edadlam moc malaf e mabmoZ
. seõçnetni sám ed saiehc oãtse setnem saus sa e edadlam ed madrobsnart seõçaroc sues sO
. aicnêloiv ad otnam o moc es-merboc e ohlugro ed es-mehcne , ossi roP
. sortuo so omoc sodatnemrota oãs men , adiv ad sedadeirartnoc sa merfos oãN
. edúas ed soiehc oãtse siop , seõçilfa áh oãn sele araP
. mavarepsorp suam so omoc rev oa , sobrebos sod ajevni aitnes sioP
. ragerrocse arap avatlaf em ocuop , ralavser a esauq mavatse sép suem sO
! orup oãçaroc mêt euq so arap , learsI arap mob é sueD omoC . fassA ed oãçceloc ad omlaS








. ésseJ ed ohlif , divaD ed oãçceloc ad seõçaro sa manimret iuqA
! nemÁ ! nemÁ ! airólg aus ad ahcne es arret a adot euq e osoirolg emon ues o erpmes arap ajes otidneB
. sahlivaram azilaer euq ocinú o , learsI ed sueD e ROHNES o , sueD ajes otidneB
! seõçan sa sadot meticilef o e sadaoçneba matnis es eled oiem rop euQ ! rahlirb loS o otnauqne erud amaf aus a euq ; erpmes arap açenamrep ier od emon o euQ
! opmac on avre a omoc sagipse sa metorb e onabíL o omoc açserolf e azudorp ele euq , saniloc sa erbos odnaludno , ogirt ed aicnâdnuba moc arbuc es síap o euQ
. eoçneba o euq sueD a áridep es said so sodot , ele rop áridep es etnemaunitnoC ! ábaS ed oruo meêd ehl euQ ! ier o aviV
. ele arap sasoicerp oãs sadiv saus sa siop , aicnêloiv ad e oãsserpo ad sol-árvil ed-áH
. sodatissecen soa adiv a áravlas e sedlimuh sod oãxiapmoc áreT
. eduja o meuq met oãn euq , odatissecen o e acovni o euq erbop o árarvil elE
! oãrivres o seõçan sa sadot ; eled etnaid oãravruc es sier so sodoT
! setneserp oãradnam abeS ed e ábaS ed sier so ; sotubirt oãrecerefo sahli sad e sisráT ed sier sO
! arret rop oã-es-rarita sogimini sues so ; eled etnaid oã-es-ravruc otresed od sovop sO
. arret ad omertxe oa oir ednarg od , ortuo oa ram mu ed enimod ele euQ
! uéc on rahlirb auL a otnauqne merud euq e , said sues son maçserolf açitsuj a e zap a euQ
! arret a mager euq soriecauga so omoc , sopmac so erbos avuhc a omoc ajes ier o euQ
! erpmes o odot rop , raul revuoh otnauqne ; rahlirb loS o otnauqne , meroda et sodot euQ
! serosserpo so eugamse e sodatissecen so eduja ele euq ; ovop od sedlimuh so ajetorp ier o euQ
. zap e açitsuj ovop oa magart saniloc sa e sahnatnom sa euQ
. oãditcer moc sedlimuh so etart e açitsuj moc ovop uet o eugluj euq arap
, açitsuj aut a epicnírp oa e oãditcer aut a ier oa edecnoc , sueD Ó . oãmolaS ed oãçceloc ad omlaS
. lam em-rezaf mavarucorp euq so ahnogrev ed soiehc e sodidnufnoc maracif siop , aid o odot edadisoreneg aut ad ieralaF
. etsavlas ut euq , res uem o odot árarbiv somlas et-ratnac oa , airgela ed ierarbiV
. learsI ed otnas sueD ó , aratíc ad mos oa et-ratnac oreuq ; sueD uem , edadiledif aut a ravuol , aprah ad mos oa et-ravuol oreuq , ossi roP
. seratrofnocer em arap et-odnamixorpa arnoh ahnim a sáratnemuA
. arret ad sazednuforp sad aias ue euq moc sáraf e adiv avon em-rad ed-sáh , seõçilfa e selam sotium rop rassap otief sahnet em euq adniA
! ut omoc é méugnin , sasioc sednarg etsezif ; uéc o omoc ednarg oãt é , sueD ó , edadisoreneg aut A
. açrof aut a e redop uet o , riv ed-oãh euq sà e oãçareg atse a , ratnoc euq ohnet siop , senodnaba em oãn , sueD ó , socnarb solebac ed e ohlev uotse euq , arogA
. soigídorp suet so raicnuna a ounitnoc e edutnevuj ahnim a edsed , sueD ó , em-etsíurtsnI
! otsuj sé ut ós euq ieramalcorp e , ROHNES ó , oiráutnas uet od azelatrof an ierartne uE
. sievátnocni meres sele ed rasepa , açitsuj ed sotca suet so ieratnoc e etsavlas son euq ieraicnuna aid o odoT
. siam zev adac et-ravuol ed-ieh e etnemaunitnoc ierarepse , mérop , uE
! açargsed ahnim a mereuq euq so olucídir a sotsop majeS ! adiv ahnim a artnoc matneta euq so sodíurtsed e sodidnufnoc majeS
! orrocos uem me asserped mev , sueD uem ; mim ed setsafa et oãn , sueD Ó
» ! ravlas edop o méugnin euq , on-merraga , on-magisrep ; o-uonodnaba sueD « : mezid e
, maripsnoc em-ratam mereuq euq so ; mim artnoc malaf sogimini suem sO
. saçrof revit oãn áj odnauq , serapmased em oãn ; ecihlev an sezerpsed em oãN
. airólg aut a omalcorp aid o odot ; ravuol et ed aráp oãn acob ahnim A
. oigúfer uem o sé ut euqrop , sotium arap orbmossa ed ovitom uoS
! erpmes arap ie-et-ravuoL ! satnetsus em ut otnemicsan o edsed ; eãm ahnim ed ertnev o edsed , orapma ortnocne it mE
. açnaifnoc e açnarepse ahnim sé ut edutnevuj a edsed , ROHNES , ut siop
, otneloiv od e rosserpo od soãm sad , uam memoh od soãm sad , sueD uem , em-arviL
! azelatrof ahnim a e odehcor uem o sé uT . oilíxua uem me erpmes riv etsetemorp euq ut , oigúfer uem o e oãçcetorp ahnim a ut êS
! em-avlas e em-ratucse et-angiD ! otsuj sé euq ut , em-egetorp e em-arviL
. odidnufnoc euqif ue euq sexied oãn ; oigúfer orucorp , ROHNES , it mE


















! ROHNES , sedrat oãn ; rodatrebil uem o , oilíxua uem o sé uT . em-raduja asserped mev , sueD ó ; odatissecen e erbop uos uE
» ! ednarg é sueD « : etnemetnatsnoc magid oãçavlas aut a majesed euq so e ; marucorp et euq so sodot airgela ed es-mahcne saM
! mim ed maçort euq so sodahnogrevne madecorteR
! lam mereuq em euq so ahnogrev ed meroc e es-meriter ; adiv a em-rarit marucorp euq so ahnogrev ed sotreboc e sodidnufnoc majeS
! orrocos uem me , ROHNES , asserped meV ! serarvil em arap , sueD ó , asserped meV
. divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . lairomeM mE . oroc od rotcerid oA
. mama o euq seleuqa ratibah ed-oãh ál e oãiS ed soriedreh oãs sovres sues sod setnednecsed sO
. soslupxe odis mahnit euq so rasserger ed-oãh e , áduJ ed sedadic sa riurtsnocer e , oãiS raruatser ed-áh sueD , edadrev aN
! matibah o euq seres so sodot e ram o , arret a e suéc so ROHNES o mevuoL
. oãçilfa an ovop ues o azerpsed oãn e sodatissecen so atucse ROHNES o euqrop
, megaroc ed mahcne es sueD a marucorp euq so e mergela es e otsi majev sedlimuh so euQ
. sohlivon e soruot ed soicífircas euq od ROHNES o arap levádarga siam áres otsI
. saçarg ed seõçca moc , ie-ol-ácifirolg ; sueD osson o socitnâc moc ieravuoL
. em-avlas e , sueD ó , em-atnavel , etsirt e otilfa uotse euq , mim a saM
! sotsuj sod atsil an sahnop so oãN ! adiv ad orvil od so-acsiR
. oãdrep uet o mecnacla euq satimrep oãn e sodacep sues sod lor o metnemua euq axieD
. etsiref ut euq sod serod sad maçort e etsagitsac ut euq seleuqa meugesrep siop
, sadnet saus san etibah meuq ajah oãn euq e otresed euqif otnemapmaca ues o euQ
! ari aut ad roruf olep sodignita majes ; oãçangidni aut a sele erbos agerracseD
. mamert euq arap , solucsúm so sehl-eceuqarfne ; majev oãn euq arap , atsiv a sehl-ecerucsE
. sodadivnoc sues so arap e ele arap , ahlidamra me memrofsnart es seteuqnab sues so euQ
. erganiv em-mared , edes evit odnauq , e adimoc ed zev me , lef em-mareD
. essatrofnoc em euq méugnin iertnocne oãn ; oãv me iof sam , méugla ed oãxiapmoc ierepsE . oãçaroc o em-maçadepsed açneod a e sasnefo sA
! sogimini suem so secehnoc ut ; irfos euq , arnosed a e ahnogrev a , sasnefo sa sebas uT
! sogimini suem sod em-arvil ; em-avlas e mim ed et-amixorpA
! ogirep me uotse euqrop , asserped em-ednopser ; ovres uet etsed rahlo o seivsed oãN
. oãxiapmoc ednarg aut alep , mim arap ahlo ; edadnob é roma uet o euqrop , ROHNES , em-ednopseR
! mim erbos ehcef es oçop od acob a euq men , alugne em omsiba o euq sexied oãn ; etsarra em etnerroc a euq sexied oãN
! sadnuforp saugá sad e maiedo em euq sod em-avlaS ! ednufa em oãn euq arap odol od em-arit
, leif aduja sé euq uT ! roma ednarg uet olep , em-ednopser , onutropo serahca odnauq , sueD ó , em-ednopser ; oãçaro me it a em-ojirid , ROHNES , mérop , uE
. mim erbos sagitnac matnac sodebêb so e edadic ad saur salep mim ed malaF
. mim ed mecenracse sele otul ed otsiv em odnauq omsem
; mim ed açort mezaf sele oujej e orohc ue odnauq omseM
. mim erbos maríac matlusni et euq sod sasnefo sa ; emosnoc em asac aut ad olez O
. eãm ahnim ad sohlif so arap odicehnocsed mu uos ; soãmri suem so arap ohnartse mu omoc uoS
. ahnogrev ed es-uirboc arac ahnim a ; sotlusni odirfos ohnet it ed roma roP
. learsI ed sueD ó , ogimoc sodidulised meuqif oãn marucorp et euq seleuqa euQ . osoredop-odot sueD , ROHNES ó , it me maifnoc euq so asuac ahnim rop ahnogrev messap oãn euQ
. sapluc sahnim sa it ed rednocse ossop oãn ; zetasnesni ahnim a meb secehnoc , sueD ó , uT
? iebuor oãn euq oliuqa riutitser ed oãtne iereT . mim artnoc metnem euq sogimini so adnia oãs sosoremun siam ; açebac ahnim ad solebac so euq od oãzar mes maiedo em euq so siam oãS

; em-ragofa a esauq uotse euqrop , sueD ó , em-avlaS
. divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . » soiríl sO « aidolem a odnugeS . oroc od rotcerid oA

! sueD ajes otidneB ! ovop ues oa açrof e redop ád euq learsI ed sueD o , oiráutnas ues on sueD levírret é omoC
. suéc sod oãditsav a açnacla redop ues o ; learsI erbos es-ednetse edatsejam aus A . sueD ed redop o maçehnocer e
asoredop zov aus a aosser omoc metucsE ! sonrete suéc so erbos ahnimac elE
. rohneS oa sonih metnac , arret ad sovop , sueD a metnaC
. sueD arap soãm saus sa árednetse aipóitE a ; serodaxiabme oãriv otpigE oD
! asrepsid so arreug ed aisnâ an e sovop so ahlimuh , sazeuqir ed aisnâ an , euq , sorrezeb ed e sovarb soruot ed adanam asse , siaivanac sod aref asse edneerpeR
. setneserp et-recerefo ál oãv sier so ; mélasureJ me átse olpmet uet O
. rovaf osson me etsasu euq redop o , redop uet o artsom , sueD Ó
. ilatfeN e oãlubaZ ed sefehc solep sodiuges , sopurg sues so moc áduJ ed sefehc so , sioped ; aneuqep siam obirt a , mimajneB iav etnerf À ! majeV
! ROHNES o agidneb learsI ed ovop o odot euQ ! saielbmessa san sueD a magidneB
. sateriednap odnacot , saleznod sa oãv sele ertne ; sárta socisúm so e etnerf à mahnimac serotnac sO
. oiráutnas on , sueD ó , ahcram aut a , ier uem e sueD uem ó , lafnuirt ahcram aut a aleb É
» . seãc suet so arap otnemila oãres sele e eugnas ues on sép so sárahlom missA
. ram od odnuf od sol-êzart ed-ieh , sogimini suet so ãsaB ed rezart ed-ieH « : essid rohneS O
. ohnimac uam on metsisrep euq seleuqad oinârc o iórtsed e sogimini sues sod açebac a açadepsed elE
. etrom ad rarvil son arap redop met sueD osson ROHNES o , edadrev aN . avlas euq sueD mu é ele , sueD mu somet sóN
! oãçavlas asson a é sueD ; son-uotrebil ele ; aid sópa aid , rohneS o ajes otidneB
! ROHNES , it a maredner es sedleber so éta ; snemoh sod otubirt etsebecer , sorienoisirp ogitnoc etsavel e otla oa etsibus uT
. oiráutnas o arap ianiS od selen iav rohneS o ; serahlim ed serahlim oãs sueD ed sorrac sO
! etnemanrete ila áratibah ROHNES O ? rarom elen arap uehlocse sueD euq etnom o arap ajevni moc mahlo euq rop , sotla setnom Ó
! semuc sues so oãs sodavele euQ ! ãsaB ed setnom so oãs sotla euQ
. nomlaS etnom o erbos iac even a oãtne , sortsa sednarg so erbocne sueD odnauQ
. onif oruo ed , sanep saus sa e atarp ed satreboc macif sabmop sad sasa sa étA . sohnaber so ertne meizavse es sele euQ
. sojopsed so etraper asac ed anod a E ! megof , megof soticréxe so e sier sO
. sortsa sod oticréxe oa aicíton a odnavel , zov aus a raoce açaf rohneS o euQ
. edadnob aut a moc erbop o etsatrofnocer , sueD ó , ut e ; alen es-uolatsni ovop uet O
. aut é euq , arret atse etsaruatser ; aicnâdnuba moc avuhc a riac etsezif ut , sueD Ó
. learsI ed sueD , ROHNES od açneserp ad , ianiS od sueD od açneserp ad asuac rop , uéc od uiac avuhc a e uemert arret a
, otresed od sévarta odnaçnava , ovop uet od etnerf à etsías ut odnauq , sueD Ó
. lirétse arret me oãreviv sedleber so sam ; sorienoisirp oãtse euq seleuqa atrebil e reviv arap ragul mu odarapmased oa acidni sueD
. savúiv sad rosnefed e soãfró sod iap é , olpmet otnas ues on atibah euq , sueD
! açneserp aus an es-mergelA ! ROHNES on es-mergelA . snevun sa erbos aglavac euq eleuqa mevuol ; emon ues oa sonih metnac , sueD a metnaC

. divaD ed oãçceloc ad ocitnâc e omlaS . oroc od rotcerid oA




























! otiepser moc ratart ed-oãh o arret ad snifnoc so sodot E ! eoçneba son sueD euQ

! mevuol et sovop so sodot euQ ! sueD ó , sovop so , et-mevuoL

! mevuol et sovop so sodot euQ ! sueD ó , sovop so , et-mevuoL
. oãçavlas aut a seõçan sa sadot me e sohnimac suet so arret an maçehnoc es euq arap

. ocitnâc e omlaS . sadroc ed sotnemurtsni moC . oroc od rotcerid oA
. edadnob aus a moc uotlaf em men oãçaro ahnim a uotiejer oãn euq , sueD ajes otidneB
. oãçaro ahnim a uedneta e em-uivuo sueD saM
. zov ahnim a airivuo oãn rohneS o , lam mugla otief essevit ue eS
. socitnâc moc o-ievuol ; oilíxua ehl-odnidep o-iemahC

. sotirbac e sohlivon , sorienrac et-recerefo ed-ieh ; sodrog siamina ratla uet on ieramieuQ

, sassemorp sahnim sa ieragap e , olpmet uet on soicífircas recerefo ed-ieH

. melavser sép sosson so euq etimrep oãn e sadiv sasson sa avlas meuq ele É

. ele artnoc metnavel es oãn sedleber so euq arap , seõçan sa aigiv , sohlo sues so moc ; erpmes arap anrevog redop ues o moC

: snemoh sod etnaid zef ele euq sahlivaram sa , sueD ed sarbo sa rev mahneV

! airgela ed matnac e mamalca sodot ; siagirt ed es-mehcne selav so e ; sohnaber ed es-merboc sopmac sO
. azeuqir ed es-metsever saniloc sa e setnajedrev es-manrot otresed od snegatsap sA
. aicnâdnuba áh sáv euq reuq edno roP ! satiehloc sa ecerovaf edadnob aut A
. sarietnemes saus sa saoçneba e setnadnuba savuhc moc arret a seceloma ; arutla aus a odnaluger , soclus so sagirrI

. arret ad ortuo oa omertxe mu ed airgela ed sotirg mezart sotief suet so ; sahlivaram saut sa etnarep memert setnatsid sarret me matibah euq so étA

. açrof aut a e redop uet o moc sahnatnom sa semrif snétnam uT

. ocitnâC . divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . oroc od rotcerid oA



. rairolg ed-oãh es oãçaroc ed sotcer so sodot e airgela aus a ROHNES on artnocne otsuj memoh O

. açnaifnoc assov a salen mahnop oãn , sazeuqir sassov sa ratnemua meriv eS . odabuor é euq oliuqa moc maduli es men , oãsserpo an raifnoc marieuq oãN
. otnev o euq sonem masep e , ribus ed marap oãn açnalab amun sotnuj , aritnem ed massap oãn , soneuqep uo sednarg ; oãsuli amu oãs snemoh so , edadrev aN

. oigúfer uem o e oãçcetorp ahnim a é ele ; arnoh e oãçavlas ahnim a medneped sueD eD

. açnarepse ahnim a mev eled ; zap ortnocne sueD me óS

. oigúfer uem o é ele euqrop , odalaba ieres oãN . avlas e egetorp em ele óS
. oãçavlas ahnim a mev eled ; zap ortnocne sueD me óS

. aid sópa aid sotov suem so ierirpmuc e erpmes arap ie-et-ravuol missA

. sahcelf sà riguf massop euq arap , siéif suet soa lanis mu aroga áD

. son-ecelebatser , ari aut ad rasepa ; són me sahcerb rirba etsaxied e son-etsatiejer , sueD Ó

. riurtsni araP . divaD ed oãçceloc ad ameoP . » ohnumetset mu é oiríl mU « aidolem a odnugeS . oroc od rotcerid oA
! ama em euq sueD o sé ut ; oãçcetorp e azelatrof ahnim a sé ut euqrop , sonih ieratnac , sueD uem , it A

. etion a etnarud madnor , matraf es oãn es , e adimoc ed arucorp à maieugaV
. seãc omoc odnardal , edadic a merrocrep e edrat alep massergeR

. sogimini suem sod atorred a rev áraf em e ortnocne uem oa áriv , ama em euq , sueD

» ? evuo son euq é meuQ « : zoref mot me , ratirg a , mezid e sadapse omoc meref sarvalap saus sA
. seãc omoc odnardal , edadic a merrocrep e edrat alep massergeR
. serodiart sessed oãxiapmoc sahnet oãn ; etneg atse adot agitsac e atrepsed , learsI ed sueD , osoredop-odot sueD , ROHNES , uT

. soirániugnas snemoh sod em-avlas e serotieflam sod em-arviL

» ! arret a erbos açitsuj zaf euq sueD mu áh otcaf eD ! asnepmocer met otsuj é euq eleuqa , miS « : á-es-rid E
! sodavlam sod oãçiurtsed atelpmoc an rapicitrap oa e odagniv es-rev oa es-argela otsuj é euq eleuqA
. egnol arap ecnal a oãcaruf mu euq , aces uo edrev ahnel ad rolac o matnis salenap saus sa euq setnA
. zul a êv oãn euq otroba mu omoc e abab me es-rezafsed a locarac o omoc messap sele euQ
. sadarbeuq mertnocne sa euq sahcelf merarita odnauq ; aocse es euq augá a omoc es-mamuS
. seõel sesse a siaxieuq so , ROHNES , acnarra setned so sehl-arbeuq , sueD Ó
. soigélitros me sotirep sogam sod , serodatnacne sod acisúm a mevuo oãn euq
, setnepres sa omoc sodrus es-mezaf ; sarobív sad o omoc é onenev ues O
. oipícnirp o edsed mararre saritnem malaf euq so ; marecsan euq edsed es-maraivartxe siéifni sO
. aicnêloiv a arap ohnimac síap on merba e sedadislaf majrof ós , ossid zev me saM
! oãditcer moc snemoh so messagluj e satsuj seõsiced erpmes messamot euq ared meuq , setnanrevog Ó
. divaD ed oãçceloc ad ameoP . oroc od rotcerid oA
! redop uet o arret an e azednarg aut a suéc son artsom , sueD Ó
. otinifni o açnacla edadlael aut a e suéc soa éta agehc euq ednarg oãt é roma uet O
. seõçan sa ertne somlas ie-et-ratnac , rohneS ó , sovop so ertne , saçarg ie-et-raD
! arorua a ratrepsed ejoh oreuQ ! aril e aprah metrepseD ! atrepsed , amla ahnim Ó
. sonih et-ratnac a odidiced , sueD ó , odidiced átse oãçaroc uem O
. maríac elen euq sele marof sam , mim ed etnaid ossof mu maravac ; riac merezaf em arap ohnimac uem on ahlidamra amu maresuP
! redop uet o arret an e azednarg aut a suéc son artsom , sueD Ó
. adaifa adapse amu omoc , augníl aus a e sahcelf e saçnal omoc oãs setned sues so ; sonamuh seres raroved a sotsopsid seõel omoc oãs euq , sogimini rop odaedor uotsE
. edadrev aus a e roma ues o eivne sueD euq ; em-riurtsed marucorp euq sod evlas em e oilíxua ues o uéc od eivne em ele euQ
. osicerp ue euq ed oliuqa odut ád em euq sueD , omissítlA o , sueD ieracovnI
. odassap ahnet ogirep o euq éta , sasa saut sad oxiabed em-ragirba oreuQ . oãçcetorp ocsub it me euqrop , oãxiapmoc met , sueD ó , mim ed oãxiapmoc meT
. anrevac amun luaS ed uednocse es ele euq me oãisaco a odnadrocer , divaD ed oãçceloc ad ameoP . oroc od rotcerid oA
. adiv ad zul a moc , sueD ed açneserp an reviv arap , omsiba on riac ed etsarvil em e etrom ad etsavlas em euqrop
saçarg ed seõçca moc sal-irpmuc oreuq , sueD ó , zif et euq sassemorp sA
? snemoh so rezaf medop em lam euQ . odem ieret oãn e sueD me oifnoc
; sarvalap saus sa orbelec e ROHNES on oifnoc , mis ; sarvalap saus sa orbelec e sueD me oifnoC

. meratam em ed otnemom o odnarepse , sossap suem so odnaipse , es-mednocse e es-manitomA

» . erpmes arap abmucus otsuj o euq áraxied oãn siop , árecelatrof et ele e ROHNES oa sodadiuc suet so axieD «

. edazima ed sodroca so merpmuc oãn ; sogima soirpórp so artnoc oãm a matnaveL
. sueD a memet sele missa men saM . árahlimuh so e á-em-rivuo , adum acnun e , etnemanrete anier euq , sueD

. áravlas em ROHNES o ; sueD a ocovni , mim a otnauQ
. seõçaroc sues sod omitní on atibah zedavlam a euqrop , sotrom sod odnum oa soviv maçsed euQ ! sogimini suem so adneerprus etrom a euQ

. sogimini suem sod atorred a iv ue e seõçilfa sahnim sad em-etsarvil

. zilef áracif learsI ed ovop o , oãrargela es bocaJ ed setnednecsed so , ovop ues o oilíxe od rexuort sueD odnauQ ! learsI ed oãçavlas a oãiS ed ahnev euQ

. ratla uet on sohlivon sodicerefo oãres oãtnE . ogof olep sadimusnoc etnemarietni satrefo sa e sotsuacoloh so , sodairporpa soicífircas so rezarp moc sáratieca oãtnE
. mélasureJ ed sorum so acifideer ; a-aduja e edadnob moc oãiS atarT

. siamina ed satrefo saicerpa oãn e ; sot-aicerefo ue oãn es ; soicífircas sereuq oãn uT
. sazednarg saut sa raicnuna assop ue euq arap , ralaf a em-aduja , rohneS

. it arap metlov es serodacep so e sohnimac suet so serossergsnart soa enisne ue euq arap

. otirípse uem oa azemrif ád e avoner ; orup oãçaroc mu em-ád , sueD Ó
. sapluc sahnim sa sadot agapa e sodacep suem so arap sehlo oãN
. odagamse sahnet em arobme , ovon ed ie-em-rargela ; otnematnetnoc e airgela ed snos so rivuo em-zaF
. even a euq od ocnarb siam ieracif e em-aval ; orup ieracif e odacep uem od em-apmiL
. airodebas a sanisne em omitní on e oãçaroc od odnuf on edadrev a saicerpa uT

» . oãçavlas a ratnemirepxe ol-êzaf ed-ieh ohnimac uem on radna euq eleuqà e ol-áeganemoh ed-ieh saçarg ed seõçca ecerefo em euq eleuqA

. ritnem me satiseh oãn e lam rezid a otnorp erpmes sátsE

? sotirbac ed eugnas obeb uo soruot ed enrac ue omoc arutnevroP
. em-mecnetrep métnoc ele euq o odut e odnum o siop , rezid o et ed avasicerp oãn emof essevit ue eS
. oãçisopsid ahnim à oãtse opmac od sietpér so e sahnatnom sad seva sa meb oçehnoc siop

. otief snet em erpmes euq siamina ed satrefo sad , soicífircas sod asuac rop odneerper et oãN

. agluj meuq é sueD euqrop , otsuj é ROHNES o euq oãraicnuna suéc so étA
» . soicífircas marecerefo em e açnaila amu ogimoc marezif euq so , siéif oãs em euq so sodot manúeR «

. rerrom euq met ele mébmat siamina so sodot omoc ; etrom ad avlas o oãn memoh mu ed azednarg A

. asac aus ad oxul o atnemua es , eceuqirne méugla es sepucoerp et oãN
. etrom ad redop oa em-racnarra e , adiv ahnim a ratagser ed-áh sueD saM
. orclupes olep adaroved e adimusnoc áres açrof aus a ; siamina omoc saleog saus san oãriac ; rotsap ues o áres etrom a e sahlevo omoc rerrom a sodanednoc oãtsE
. sarvalap saus san matieled es euq sod onitsed o ; maifnoc is me ós euq seleuqad ohnimac o é etsE

. ároC ed setnednecsed sod oãçceloc ad omlaS . ocitnâC

. ecemertse arret a e zov aus a rivuo zaf elE . es-matiga sonier so , marumrum seõçan sA
. aid od repmor oa oilíxua ues me ári sueD ; ralicav edop oãn , aled oiem on átse sueD

. ároC ed setnednecsed sod oãçceloc ad ocitnâC . oroc od rotcerid oA
. etnemanrete oãravuol et sovop so ; erpmes arap emon uet o radrocer ieraF
. arret a adot ed setnanrevog seled sáraf ; sodassapetna suet sod áj are euq onort o oãrapuco , ier ó , sohlif suet sO
. laer oicálap on sezilef martne e airgela ednarg moc maçnavA
. ojetroc me sagima saus sa an-meuges ; ier oa mavel a aditsev etnemadidnelpsE
! oruo ed odacorb ed é oditsev ues O ! arusomrof adot é oicálap on asecnirp A
. serovaf suet so rahnag setneserp moc marucorp ovop od socir siam so , oriT ed setnatibah sO
! meganemoh ehl-atserp : rohnes uet o é ele ; azeleb aut alep rednerp es-uoxied ier o euqrop
, iap uet od asac ad e ovop uet od et-eceuqse ; ogid et euq oa oãçneta atserp , ahlif ahnim , evuO
. rifO ed oruo omissínif moc adanroda , ahniar a átse onort uet od atierid à e siaer sasecnirp áh etroc aut ad samad sa ertnE
! rargela et arap etneg atnauQ ! mifram ed soicálap sotnauQ . aissác e séola , arrim a ariehc apuor aut A
. airgela ed oeló moc soriehnapmoc suet so ertne ed uignu et , sueD uet o , sueD ossi arap ; açitsujni a raido e açitsuj a rama seved uT
. oãditcer ed ortpec moc sáranier ut , onrete sueD od onort o é onort uet O
. sogimini suet so megaroc mes macif ; sép suet a sodidner macif soticréxe so ; saduga oãs sahcelf saut sA
. razilaer a soigídorp so áracidni et açrof airpórp aut a e erbop oa açitsuj zaf , edadrev ad asuac alep etnafnuirt aglavaC
! airólg aut a e onroda uet o é ale ; ióreh ó , adapse aut a atnic à ednepsuS
. erpmes arap aoçneba et sueD , ossi roP ! otnacne atorb soibál suet soD ! snemoh sod osomrof siam o sé uT
. rotircse libáh ed anep ajes augníl ahnim a euQ ! ameop uem o ier oa raticer uov ; sarvalap saleb em-aripsni oãçaroc uem O
. roma ed ocitnâC . ároC ed setnednecsed sod oãçceloc ad ameoP . » soiríl so « aidolem a odnugeS . oroc od rotcerid oA
! roma uet olep son-avlas ; son-raduja mev e et-atnaveL
. arret à odaloc oproc osson o e óp on adíac átse amla asson A
? seõçilfa e sotnemirfos sosson sod seceuqse et e rahlo uet o són ed saivsed euq roP
! erpmes arap setiejer son oãn e atrepseD ? semrod euq rop , rohneS , adrocA
. oruodatam o arap sahlevo omoc son-matart ; said so sodot etrom à sotsopxe somatse , it ed asuac roP
. oãçaroc osson od soderges so ecehnoc ele euqroP ? ossi rop odad sueD airet oãn
, ohnartse sued mu a seõçaro otief somessévit es ; sueD osson o are meuq odiceuqse somessévit eS
! oãdirucse adnuforp siam an son-etsanodnaba ; saref ertne omoc sodíurtsed somáciF
. sohnimac suet sod odatsafa somret son mes ; et-ranodnaba odasnep somahnet euq mes
; açnaila aut a odíart somret mes , odiceuqse somret et mes , uecetnoca son otsi oduT
. mim ed es-ragniv mereuq euq , sogimini sod satnorfa sa e sotlusni so rivuo oa
, ahnogrev ed otreboc otsor o e odahlimuh etnemetnatsnoc em-otniS
. són ed odnaçort , açebac a manaba sele ; sovop sortuo sod etnaid olucídir a son-etsesuP
. són ed es-meir e son-mednefo sohniziv sosson so ; sotlusni ed otcejbo mun son-etsamrofsnarT
. oçerp o seritucsid reuqes mes , ocuop otium rop ovop uet o etsedneV
. sovop sortuo so ertne son-etsasrepsid ; oruodatam o arap sahlevo omoc son-etsagertnE
. maresiuq omoc son-maraeuqas maiedo son euq so ; sogimini sosson sod riguf son-etseziF
. soticréxe sosson so sahnapmoca oãn áj ; ahnogrev ed son-etsirboc e son-etsatiejer , odutnoC
. erpmes arap saçarg somerad et e , aroh a adot a , sueD ó , some-et-ravuoL
. maiedo son euq seleuqa etsatorred e sogimini sosson sod etsarvil son euq ut etsof
; ravlas em arap adapse ahnim an e ocra uem on oifnoc oãN
. serosserpo sosson so somágamse emon uet me , sogimini sosson so somecnev redop uet oleP
! bocaJ ed ovop oa airótiv a áD ! ier uem o sé ut , sueD Ó
. roma sahnit sehl ut euqrop , açneserp aut alep e redop ednarg uet olep iof ; maririuqda a sele euq açrof alep iof oãn , arret a maratsiuqnoc sele euq adapse aus a moc iof oãn , edadrev aN
. ovop uet o recserc etsezif e seõçan sartuo sa etsagitsac ; seled arret an ovop uet o etsecelebatse e sovop sortuo etsaslupxe uT
. adiv aus a etnarud etsezif ut euq soigídorp so maritimsnart son sodassapetna sosson so euq o ratnoc somivuo soirpórp són , sueD Ó
. ároC ed setnednecsed sod oãçceloc ad ameoP . oroc od rotcerid oA






















! rodavlas uem o e sueD uem o é elE . ravuol ed-ieh o adnia e ROHNES on raifnoc oreuQ ? odapucoerp e odaminased ratse ed-ieh euq roP
. sueD uem o sé ut ós siop , aprah ad mos oa ieravuol et ál e ; airgela ahnim a sé euq ut , sueD ó , ratla uet oa éta oãtne ierI
. satibah edno oiráutnas oa otnas etnom uet oa avel euq ohnimac o menisne em euq arap , edadrev aut a e zul aut a em-artsoM

. osrevrep od e osoritnem od em-arviL ! edadeip mes etneg atse artnoc em-ednefed ; açitsuj em-zaf , sueD Ó
! rodavlas uem o e sueD uem o é elE . ravuol ed-ieh o adnia e rohneS on raifnoc oreuQ ? odapucoerp e odaminased ratse ed-ieh euq roP
» ? sueD uet o átse ednO « : matnugrep em aroh a adot a em-matlusni sogimini suem so e sosso so em-es-marbeuQ
» ? ogimini olep odimirpo e etsirt radna ed-ieh euq roP ? mim ed etseceuqse et euq rop , odehcor uem , sueD Ó « : ehl-rezid oreuQ
. adiv ád em euq sueD oa oãçaro amu , ocitnâc mu moc evuol o etion à ue euq arap roma ues o , aid o etnarud , á-em-raivne ROHNES o saM
. mim erbos marassap sasoretla sagav saut sa sadot ; seõvort suet sod odíur o aoce omsiba me omsiba eD
. rassiM e nomreH setnom sod e oãdroJ od sarret sa edsed , it me otium osnep , ossi roP ! sueD uem , odaminased oãt em-otniS

» ? sueD uet o átse ednO « : matnugrep em aroh a adot a euqrop , etion ed e aid ed otnemila uem o oãs samirgál sahnim sA

. ároC ed setnednecsed sod oãçceloc ad ameoP . oroc od rotcerid oA
! nemÁ ! ajes missA ! erpmes arap e aroga , learsI ed sueD , ROHNES o ajes otidneB

: mezid e mim ed roip o masnep ; mim artnoc marumrum maiedo em euq so sodoT
. recehnoc a ogol an-oãd aur à meas laM . aicílam ed oiehc átse oãçaroc ues o , esseretni mes sasioc mezid , matisiv em eS

» . it artnoc odacep ahnet arobme , em-aruc ; mim ed oãxiapmoc met , ROHNES « : essid uE

. divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . oroc od rotcerid oA




. ritsixe ed exied e ritrap ed ahnet ue euq setna , otnela ramot em-axieD

. seref em odnauq oçelafsed ; ogitsac uet o mim ed ariteR

! rodavlas uem , rohneS , oilíxua uem me asserped meV
! mim ed setsafa et oãn , sueD ueM ! serapmased em oãn , ROHNES

. oãzar mes maiedo em euq so sotium oãs ; sosoredop oãs siatrom sogimini suem sO

. adeuq ahnim ad sosoirotiv mebmoz euq sexied oãn ; açargsed ahnim ad mair es euq satimrep oãn : oçep et asioc amU

. asefed aus me ralaf edop oãn e , evuo oãn euq eleuqa omoc uoS
. acob a orba oãn e odum em-oçaf ; sodivuo uod oãn e odrus em-oçaf , mérop , uE
. seõçiart maniuqam aroh a adot a ; lam uem o mereuq euq so sotlusni maicnunorp ; sahlidamra em-maraperp ratam mereuq em euq sO

! it arap oderges oãs oãn soripsus suem so ; sojesed suem so sodot secehnoc ut , rohneS
! oãçaroc uem od saxieuq sa otla otirg ; odarbeuq otium e ocarf uotsE
! etneod oproc o odot ohnet ; erbef ed redra a uotsE
. azetsirt an aid o odot ohnimac , odimirped e oxiabsibac odnA
. arucuol ahnim ad asuac rop , satnelurup e saditéf oãs sagahc sahnim sA
. mim arap siamed adasep agrac oãs sele ; sodacep suem sod ram on odagofa uotsE
. sapluc sahnim sad asuac rop , ari aut ad asuac rop , orietni muhnen uocif oãn sosso suem sod ; oãs adan uocif oãn , oproc uem oN
. arret rop em-etsarita e sates saut sa moc em-etsireF
. roruf uet o moc seugitsac em men , ari aut a moc sadneerper em oãn , ROHNES
. erbmel es sueD euq araP . divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS
. elen maifnoc euqrop , so-avlas e suam sod so-ednefed ele ; arvil so e aduja so ROHNES O
. siecífid sopmet son oigúfer ues o é euq , ROHNES od mev setneidebo snemoh sod oilíxua O
. adanimretxe áres suam sod aicnêdnecsed a ; sodíurtsed sodot oãres serossergsnart so saM
. zap ed é memoh essed orutuf o ; otcer memoh o avresbo , odarnoh memoh on arapeR

. erpmes arap alen oãreviv sele e , arret a oãriussop sotsuj sO

, açnaruges me erpmes sáreviv e meb o acitarp e lam od et-atsafA
. adaoçneba áres aicnêdnecsed aus a e ; rad ed ogima e osoreneg iv o erpmeS

. oãm a árednetse sehl ROHNES o euqrop , arret rop oãracif oãn , maiac euq omseM
. madarga ehl euq seleuqa egetorp e ohnimac ues o snemoh soa artsom ROHNES O
. sodíurtsed oãres aoçidlama ele euq so sam ; arret a oãriussop aoçneba sueD euq sO
. atserpme e ovissapmoc é otsuj o sam , magap oãn e odatserpme medep suam sO
. omuf omoc oãrapissid es e aces avre omoc oãredra ROHNES od sogimini so ; oãrecerapased suam sO

. suam sod aicnâdnuba a adot euq od otsuj memoh o met euq ocuop o siam elaV
. soçadep me otief áracif ocra ues o e oãçaroc ues on áratepse es adapse aus a saM
. ohnimac mob o meuges euq so meratam arap , odilavsed o e erbop o meretaba arap , ocra o maseter e adapse a mahníabmesed suam sO
. sodatnoc oãtse said sues so euq ebas siop , eled es-ir rohneS o sam

. edadiliuqnart ednarg ed oãraturfsed e arret a oãriussop serbop so méroP

. aid-oiem oa ahlirb loS o omoc açitsuj aut a e oãditcer aut a rahlirb áraf elE

. oãçaroc uet od sojesed so áredecnoc et ele e ROHNES on edadicilef aut a acsuB
. aicnâdnuba aus a moc et-atnemila e arret a atibah ; meb o zaf e ROHNES on aifnoC
. oãrahcrum edrev avre a omoc e onef o omoc sodafiec oãres odec euqrop
, lam medecorp euq sod ajevni sahnet men , serotieflam sod asuac rop setirri et oãN . divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS



























. meratnavel es siam oãn arap sodaburred , serotieflam so meac omoc arapeR
. arret rop metied em sodavlam so euq uo mesip em sobrebos so euq satimrep oãN
. oãçaroc ed sotcer so erbos açitsuj aut a e mecehnoc et euq so erbos roma uet o ednetsE
. zul a somev euq zul aut an é e adiv ad etnof a átse it me sioP
. edes a atam sehl saicíled saut sad oir o e asac aut ad aicnâdnuba a moc sotiefsitas maciF
. sodigetorp es-metnes sonamuh so , sasa saut sad oxiabeD ! roma uet o é , sueD ó , osohlivaram euQ
. siamina sod omoc snemoh sod otnat sadiuc , ROHNES , uT . ram o omoc sodnuforp oãs soterced suet so ; sahnatnom sa omoc ednarg é açitsuj aut A

. edadlam à raicnuner reuq oãn ; mob é oãn euges euq ohnimac o ; lam rezaf atcejorp , odatied átse odnauQ
. meb o rezaf ed e rednetne ed uoxied ; saritnem moc e aicílam moc alaF
. odacep ues o osoido rahca arap , oirpórp is a odaisamed es-aiejnosil elE
. sueD ed romet áh oãn , ele arap ; uam memoh od oãçaroc on odacep ed oicnúnorp mu áH
. ROHNES od ovres , divaD ed oãçceloc ad omlaS . oroc od rotcerid oA
! serovuol suet so aid o odot ieratnac ; edadiledif aut alep ieravuol et oãtnE
» ! ovres ues od ratse-meb o reuq ROHNES O ! ednarg é ROHNES O « : rassec mes magid ; etneconi maredisnoc em euq so metluxe e mergela es euq saM
. mim artnoc setnagorra oãs euq so sodot ahnogrev ed e oãsufnoc ed es-marbuc ; lam uem o moc margela es euq so sodot sodahnogrevne e sodidnufnoc majeS
» ! ol-omániurrA ! sotiefsitas somatsE « : somsem is arap magid oãn euQ
! mim ed mair es euq sexied oãN . açitsuj em-zaF . sueD uem , ROHNES , otsuj sé uT
. asuac ahnim a ednefeD ! rohneS uem e sueD uem , serednefed em arap et-atnavel e atrepseD

» ! etsezif ut euq o somiv meb sóN « : mim artnoc aiehc acob à mezid e
sorieoçiart sonalp maniuqam ; síap od etneg erbop a macata ; zap ed seõçnetni mêt oãn selE
. ovitom mes maiedo em euq so sohlo so melagerra oãn ; sogimini suem oãs , oãzar mes , euq so açargsed ahnim ad mair es oãN
. oãditlum ad oiem on ie-et-ravuol ; aielbmessa ednarg an ie-et-ravuoL
. seõel setsed sarrag sad em-arvil ; seuqata sues sod adiv ahnim a atagseR ? otsi odut sáralpmetnoc , ROHNES , opmet otnauq roP
. mim artnoc setned so maignar ; mim ed mavabmoz e em-mavaedoR
. meraçadepsed em éta , rarap mes em-maratartlam sodicehnocsed , serosserga so mim artnoc es-maratnuj ; mim ed merir es arap es-maratnuj , ieceport ue odnauq saM
. oãmri mu rop , ogima mu rop , eãm ahnim rop otul ed essevitse es omoc , odíac e etsirt avadnA
. oãçaro me em-aihlocer e snujej moc em-avahlimuh etnetinep mu omoc em-aitsev ue mavajetsef sele otnauqne méroP
. odalosed ieuqif ue e lam o moc meb o em-maragaP
. avarongi ue euq sasioc erbos em-maragorretni e , sahnumetset saslaf mim artnoc es-maratnaveL
» ! marolpxe so e sele euq od setrof siam oãs euq sod sodilavsed so e serbop so sarvil uT ! ROHNES , ut omoc sued ortuo áh oãN « : ierid ehl ue oãçaroc o odot moC
. airótiv a ued em ROHNES o euqrop , airgela ed oiehc ieracif uE

. sodagitsac oãres oãn maifnoc elen euq so ; mevres o euq sod adiv a atagser ROHNES O

. osoirolg ier o ele É ! osrevinU od ROHNES o É ? osoirolg ier etse é meuQ

. said suem sod ognol oa , ROHNES od asac an ieratibah E . adiv ahnim ad said so sodot em-mahnapmoca roma uet o e edadnob aut A

. ovop ues olep zef ROHNES o euq o soruodniv soa ratnoc oãri

. sairótiv saut sa socitnâc moc somerarbelec són e redop uet od azednarg a , ROHNES , artsoM

. açneserp aus à soditimda oãres sotsuj merof euq so E . açitsuj a reuq e otsuj é ROHNES o euqrop

. rorret o rahlapse a etlov , arret atsen méugnin euq e , sodimirpo so e soãfró so ednefeD
. so-edneta e so-atrofnoc ; sedlimuh sod oãçaro a atucse , rohneS
. arret aus ad maçerapased soãgap so euq ; erpmes o odot arap ier é rohneS O

» . snegavles siamina so sodot ed ier o é ; sosohlugro siam so aifased rahlo ues O

. arret rop meac sodot , ecerapa ele lam ; onagne mu é ol-êcnev rarepsE «


» . riteper o ed edatnov mes , etabmoc essed et-rarbmel ed-sáh ; eled amic me oãm a eõP
? rodacsep ed sodrad moc açebac aus a uo seõprah moc elep a ehl-raruf seugesnoC
? setnaicogen soiráv ertne ol-idivid e ele moc raicogen oãv serodacsep so euq áreS
? sahlif saut sa riartsid arap oif mu moc ol-áta uo ohnirassap mu essof es omoc ele moc racnirb siaV
? etrom à éta ovarcse uet res ratieca arap , ogitnoc otcap mugla rezaf iav euq sasneP
? sazedaciled sa sadot moc ralaf uo rovaf rop ridep iav et ele euq sahcA
? ohcnag mu moc alubídnam a ehl-rassevarta uo ziran olep ocnuj mu rassap ehl ed zapac sÉ
? adroc amu moc acob a ehl-rata uo lozna mu moc olidocorc o racsep ed zapac sÉ
? ohcnag mu moc ohnicof o ehl-rassevarta e etnerf ed ol-áhnapa áredop meuQ
. adomocni es oãn , acob alep augá a moc omsem , ahlaparta es oãn , etrof rof etnerroc a eS
. on-merbocne oir od sorieuglas so e arbmos aus a ehl-mecerefo sutól sO

. adapse a eled ramixorpa edop rodairc o ós e redop ues o moc uoirc sueD euq seres sod roiam o É
. orref ed sarrab omoc oãs saletsoc saus sa e eznorb ed sobut oãs sosso sues sO
. seõdnet setrof rop sadagil oãs saxoc saus sa e ordec ed ocnort mu omoc etrof é aduac aus A
! asolucsum agirrab aus ad rogiv on , sanrep saus sad açrof an araper saM
. iob o omoc , avre etnemselpmis emoc ele e it a omoc lat , ieirc o euq ue iuF ! tomeeB ortsnom on arapeR
. oãm aut alep ofnuirt o odaçnacla seret rop , meganemoh airatserp et oirpórp uE
. orclupes on soserp e saxiaf moc sodagil , zev amu ed sodot so-arretne
; sosonimirc so etnemataidemi agamse ; setnagorra so rahlo mu moc ahlimuh
; rahlo ós mu moc sosohlugro so arret rop atied , roruf uet oa sagral ád
, edatsejam e rodnelpse ed et-evlovne ; azednarg e airólg ed oãtne et-erboC
? zaf ele omoc oãvort o raoce rezaf e sueD omoc redop otnat ret sedneterp arutnevroP
? etneconi seraralced et arap , em-seranednoc a , oãzar em-ragen a et-severtA
. et-ratnugrep a ohnet euq oa rednopser arap et-araperp , memoh sé eS «
: odnezid , boJ ralepretni a uotlov ROHNES o , edatsepmet ad oiem oD
» . essid áj euq oa amugla asioc ratnecserca men , adan siam rezid oreuq oãn , ielaf setna áJ
! acob a rirba mes , odalac ociF ? et-rednopser ed-ieh euQ ! oneuqep odaisamed em-otniS «
: ROHNES oa uednopser boJ oãtnE
» ? racilper euq ogla met osoredoP-odoT o acitirc euq eleuqA ? rednopser aroga iav sueD a avatsetnoc euq eleuqa euq áreS «
: odnezid , boJ uolepretni ROHNES O








» . saiugá sa oãtse ál serevádac mertnocne es euq reuq edno ; rargnas a saserp sad matsog setohlif sues sO
. egnol edsed an-merbocsed sohlo sues so , aserp aus a atierpse ale , ál eD
. azelatrof aus a , socsahnep so erbos , sodehcor so erbos é oigúfer e tatibah ues O
? ohnin ues o rezaf ál arap , sarutla sa ehlocse aiugá a euq aut medro rop É
? luS oa omur sasa sa ednetse e , aov oãclaf o euq aicnêgiletni aut alep É
. airatirg a e odnamoc ed sezov sa , etabmoc od oriehc o egnol ed etnes euqrop , ahcniler ele miralc od euqot oA
. miralc od euqot od osac rezaf mes , opmac o assevarta ele , odnortse e otepmí moC
. sodrad so e saçnal sa mahlirb e avajla an sates sa marbiv , atlov aus À
. raucer zaf o adapse a men , emet adan e odem o azerpseD
. ogimini oa oãçcerid me es-arita e , açrof aus ad otiefsitas , aicnêloiv moc oãhc on atavaragsE
? odem etem euq etrof oãt rahcniler e otohnafag mu omoc ratlas sezaf o euq ut sÉ
? sanirc ed oçocsep ues o serboc e olavac oa açrof a sád euq ut sÉ
. orielavac od e olavac od edadicolev ad es-ir , rerroc a eõp es e atnavel es ale odnauq saM
. aicnêgiletni moc adatod iof oãn , airodebas sueD ed uebecer oãn alE
. sohlabart sues sod odatluser o redrep ed odem mes , sues messof oãn es omoc setohlif sues so atarT
. rasip edop so aref reuqlauq euq , ragamse medop so euq ed es-odneceuqse
, aiera a erbos racohc a so-axied e oãhc on sovo so eõP
. ahnogec ed megamulp e sasa essevit es omoc , ohlugro moc sasa sa etab zurtseva A
? ogirt ed sarie saut sa ranezamra e satiehloc saut sa rehlocer arap elen et-saiF
? rezaf arap sohlabart suet so ehl-ragertne e elen raifnoc siav , açrof atium ret ele rop , euq áreS
? ovitluc ed sarret saut sa radarg arap rasu o ed uo rarval arap odara oa ralerta o ed zapac sÉ
? larruc uet on reviv ri uo oçivres uet oa ratse áratieca olafúb o euq sahcA
. etrap reuqlauq me avre odnarucorp , otsap ed acsub me setnom so errocreP
. onod mu ed sorreb so rivuo ed met oãn e sedadic sad ohlurab od es-ir elE
. adaglas arret a tatibah rop e otresed o adarom rop ehl-ieD
? sarierrab mes reviv ed edadilibissop a ued ehl e edadrebil me megavles orrub o sôp meuQ
. siam matlov oãn e arobme es-oãv ; setrof es-manrot e mecserc sohlif sO
. sairc saus sa oãhc on macoloc , setohlif sues so rias rezaf arap es-mahcagA
? zul à rad oãv arutla euq me serebas arap , zedivarg ed mêt sale euq sesem so etsatnoC
? zul à merad salezag sa etsiv áj , saçroc sad sairc sa mecsan acopé euq me sebaS «
» ? orrocos rop sueD a matirg , emof ed sotrom , setohlif sues so odnauq , ovroc o arap adimoc a ajnarra meuQ
? sojirednocse sues son odnatierpse , sacot saus sad odnuf on sodarococa
, sohnizeõel soa emof a satam e aoel a arap aserp a saçac euq ut sÉ
? maotnoma es seõrrot so e orref omoc arud anrot es arret a odnauq
, uéc od soratnâc so ranrotne ed zapac é e snevun sa ratnoc arap edadicapac met meuQ
? otnemidnetne , olag oa e airodebas sibí oa ued meuQ
? ” ! snedro saut sÀ “ : mednopser sele euq it a É ? sogapmâler so arobme sadnam euq ut sÉ
? aicnâdnuba me it erbos aiac avuhc a euq arap , snevun sà medro amu serad áratsaB
? arret a erbos ecrexe ele euq aicnêulfni a e uéc o manrevog euq siel sa secehnoC
? sohlif sues so moc roiaM asrU a raiug e , airpórp arutla aus an amu adac , seõçaletsnoc sa recerapa rezaf seugesnoC
? noirO ed sa ratased ed uo sedaiêlP sad oãçaletsnoc a maruges euq sadroc sa rata ed zapac sÉ
. sadnuforp saugá sad eicífrepus a es-ahcef e ardep omoc arud es-anrot augá a , sele moC
? uéc od iac euq adaeg a e oleg o zul à ued euq eãm a é lauQ
? ohlavro ed satog sa recsan zef e avuhc a uoirc euq iap o é lauQ
. aces arret an avre ratorb rezaf e odirá otresed o arutraf ed rirboc arap
, eviv méugnin edno sepetse san , sadatibased saerá san revohc rezaf araP
? majevort euq snevun sa arap ohnimac mu , avuhc a arap megassap uirba meuQ
? etsel otnev o arret a erbos arpos e ogapmâler o edivid es arienam euq eD
? arreug ed e etabmoc ed aid o arap , ogirep ed aroh amu arap sodadraug ohnet ue euq
, ozinarg od soirótavreser so etsiV ? even ad soirótavreser soa etsof áJ
! adiv ed sona sotium snet , sotsiv solep , e odicsan sahnit áj otreced siop , ol-êbas seveD
? asac aus arap ohnimac o sebas euq ut , arret aus à al-ácsub ri ed zapac saireS
? oãdirucse ad adarom a é ednO ? zul a atibah edno ragul o arap ohnimac o lauQ
! odut sebas euq zev amu , ál acilpxE ? arret an áh euq o odut rebecrep seugesnoC
? sarbmos ed onier eleuqa arap adartne a ut etsiV ? etrom ad satrop sa sadalever et-maroF
? onaeco od odnuf olep etsaessap uo ram od setnecsan sà etsof áJ
. eplog o rad arap açrof mes macif oçarb o mavatnavel euq so e sosonimirc so atnegufa zul A
. roc artuod adignit apuor omoc adum , oles o moc aligra a omoc amrof ed adum arret A
? sosonimirc so sodot ratsafa e arret a adot sasa saus sa moc racraba arap
, odived ragul o arorua à etsacidni uo aid oa snedro etsed zev amuglA
” . setrof siam sadno saut sa éta rarap ed mêt iuqa ; sassap oãn etnaid arap iuqaD “ : ehl-essid e
sohlorref e satropmoc moc o-iehcef , etimil mu ehl-supmi uE
? rirboc es arap anilben a e ritsev es arap snevun sa ied ehl odnauq
, etnof aus ad osoutepmi aías odnauq , satropmoc saud sad ram o rarroj zef meuQ
? setselec seres so sodot airgela ed mavatirg e mavatnac ãhnam ad salertse sa otnauqne
, ardep ariemirp aus a uotnessa meuQ ? seralip sues so setnessa oãtse ednO
? acirtém atif amu moc uidem a meuq , seõsnemid saus sa uoxif meuq sebaS
? arret a avazinagro ue odnauq , savatse ednO : em-zid , edadrev a rebas sedneterp euq áJ
. rezaf uov et euq satnugrep sà serednopser arap , et-araperp , megaroc snet eS
? zid euq o rebas mes odnalaf , sonalp suem so rirgened mev euq é meuQ «
: somret setsen boJ a es-uigirid ROHNES o , edatsepmet ad oiem oD

















» . soibás mezid es euq so arap ahlo oãn ele siop , ratiepser meved o snemoh so , ossi roP
. rev eugesnoc o méugnin ; oãditcer e açitsuj aus a atinifni , osnemi é redop ues o ; osoredoP-odoT o rignita somiugesnoc oãN
. rodnelpse levírret ed odaedor sueD é ; adaruod zul ed serodnelpser mêv etron oD
? errav sa e arpos otnev o odnauq , snevun sad sévarta ahlirb omoc odnahlirb , zul a rev meugesnoc oãn euq áreS
? odaçortsed res arap atneserpa es méuglA ? ralaf uov ue euq sueD a rezid oãv euq áreS
. sarucse sà eled etnaid arap somri oãn arap , ralaf ed somevah ehl omoc son-ziD
? latsirc ed ohlepse mu omoc osil e emrif , otnemamrif o rednetse ed , ele omoc , zapac sáreS
? oãus otnev o arpos odnauq , rolac o moc odadomocni setnes et euq ut
, airodebas ed adamusnoc ahlivaram , snevun sad oirbíliuqe o erbos asioc amugla sebaS
? snevun san ogapmâler o recerapa zaf e otsi odut adnamoc sueD euq é omoc sebaS
! zef sueD euq sahlivaram sa redneerpmoc atnet e , boJ , otsi meb evuO
. ovitcejbo o majnita euq moc zaf , raodrep e recerovaf arap uo ragitsac arap ajeS
. osrevinU od etrap reuqlauq me anedro ele euq o odut mezaf e reuq omoc oãçcerid ed radum sol-áF
. ogapmâler ues o aidarri snevun sad , zul aus a ahlapse ele , uéc oD
. adalegnoc acif saugá sad eicífrepus a e oleg o es-amrof sueD ed orpos oA
. adaeg a mev snézamra sues sod , oãcaruf o ias oirótavreser ues oD
. sacot saus san macif e sojirednocse sues son martne siamina sO
. sueD ed sarbo sa maçehnocer snemoh so euq arap , arret a erbos ecseD
. soriecauga setrof me iac avuhc a e arret a erbos maiac euq avuhc à e even à anedrO
. sievísneerpmocni sahlivaram zaf e asoigidorp zov aus a raoce zaf sueD
. zov aus a evuo es odnauq , ép ed atneuga es méugniN . asotsejam zov aus a raoce zaf sueD , oãvort o aosser siopeD
. arret ad sedadimertxe sa erbos e suéc sod oãdisnemi alep mahlirb sogapmâler sO
. oãvort od rabmobir on alaf euq , sueD ed zov ad raosser o metucsE
. otiep uem od arof atlas e ecemertse oãçaroc uem o , otsid etnaiD «

» . edatsepmet a etnesserp ohnaber o e adagehc aus a aicnuna oãvort O
. rignita a ovla o acram sehl omsem ele e soiar so ednocse ele soãm saus saN
. aicnâdnuba me adimoc ád sehl e sovop so atnemila ele euq avuhc a moc É
. seram sod odnuf o éta otrebocsed a eõp euq , ogapmâler o rahlirb zaf sueD , snevun sa erboS
? adnet aus ad roiretni on seõvort sod raoce o , snevun sad ahcram a redneerpmoc edop meuQ
. arret a erbos sagetáb me odniac uo snevun sad etnematnel odnerrocse
, oirótavreser ues od avuhc omoc meac euq , augá ed satog sa odnatlos iav elE
. levádnosni é sona sues sod oremún o ; somredneerpmoc o arap ednarg odaisamed é sueD
. egnol edsed avahlo etneg a adot ; uiv o edadinamuH a adoT
. maratnac áj setna sortuo euq , sarbo saus sa rarbelec ed et-arbmeL
? ” lam etseziF “ : rezid iav ehl meuQ ? atudnoc ed sarger ehl-rad a everta es meuQ
? rarapmoc edop ehl es ertsem euQ ! redop ues on emilbus é sueD omoc êV «
» . oãçilfa a oieverbos et euq ossi rop iof siop , lam o arap seratlov et ed et-adrauG
. ragul ues od sovop so rarit ahnev etion a euq arap seripsus oãN
? etrof sueD o rahlaparta ed sezapac oãs soçrofse e sotsetorp suet so euq sasneP
. sueD a ranrobus ed aiedi a moc saduli et men , sossecxe a evel oãn et oãçatirri a euQ
. atsuj etnematiefrep é euq açnetnes amu moc , osonimirc omoc odanednoc res etsecerem saM
. aicnâdnuba ed radrobsnart asem aut a e osoçapse ragul me reviv et-odnezaf , oãçilfa a uotive et ele it a mébmaT
. rasiva o arap açargsed ad es-evres , oãsserpo ad odimirpo o avlas sueD saM
. oãçiutitsorp à seugertne snevoj omoc , edutnevuj anelp me merroM
. orrocos medep oãn e sodicerufne macif , arraga so sueD odnauq , sodavlam sO
. ossi rop rad reuqes mes oãrerrom e omsiba on meac , merezif oãn o eS
. ratse-meb me sona sues so e edadirepsorp me oãrerroced said sues so , meretembus es e osac merezif eS
. edadlam à meraicnuner a so-adivnoc e sosiva sues so oãçneta moc maçuo sele euq moc zaF
. atlover à uovel so euq ohlugro o , seõçca saus sa rartsom sehl arap é
, atnemrota so oãçilfa a e soserp martnocne es sele eS
. erpmes arap azednarg sehl-ád e sier omoc onort on ratnes sol-áf ; sotsuj oãs euq sod rahlo o atsafa oãN
. sodimirpo soa açitsuj zaf sam , osonimirc od adiv a apuop oãN
. açrof aus ad soruges oãtse euq so azerpsed e etrof e osoredop é sueD
. it ed etnaid átse euq otsenoh memoh mu é ; aritnem mêt oãn sarvalap sahnim sa , otcaf eD
. oãzar met euq é rodairC uem o euq odnartsom , etnatsid sueD od rovaf me zov a ieratnaveL
. sueD ed rovaf me rezid a sasioc siam ohnet , et-rezid a siam ohnet ue euq , aicnêicap meT «
: uounitnoc úilE
































» . zid euq o rebas mes sam , otium alaf ; oditnes mes sasioc zid ós boJ
? sedadlam sà oãçneta laicepse atserp men roruf moc agitsac oãn sueD euq áreS
. ele rop arepse , ossi rop , eled etnaid átse osac o ; rev seugesnoc o oãn euq sezid uT
. seled osac zaf oãn osoredoP-odoT o , ecerem oãn meuq a sodivuo ád oãn sueD sioP
. suam sod aicnêlosni ad etnaid , ednopser oãn ele e matirg snuglA
” ? uéc od seva salep airodebas ád son e opmac od siamina sod oiem rop anisne son euq
, saçrof sa aruatser son , etion a etnarud , euq , uoirc em euq , sueD átse ednO “ : atnugrep méugnin saM
. sosoredop so artnoc orrocos rop matirg e es-matnemal saossep sa , oãsserpo ad osep o boS
. açitsuj aut a atcefa , latrom , it a ós ; edadlam aut a atcefa ut omoc memoh mu a óS
? oãm aut ad retbo ele edop euq o uO ? rad sedop ehl euq é euq o , otsenoh etsof eS
. sasuac ehl ozíujerp muhnen , semirc suet so sacilpitlum es ; sueD a sezaf lam muhnen , sodacep etsetemoc eS
. it ed egnol oãtse snevun sa omoc êv ; suéc so arap oãçneta moc ahlO
. soriehnapmoc suet soa e it a , atsopser a et-rad oreuq ue sioP
” ? odacep uem od mim a mev em lam euq e it arap met esseretni euQ “ : adnia seratnecserca e
” sueD artnoc oãzar ohnet uE “ : serezid leváozar sahcA «
: uounitnoc úilE
» ” . sueD artnoc seuqata odnacilpitlum , sotirípse sosson son adivúd a raçnal edneterp e ; atlover a uotnecserca sodacep sues soA
. éf mes memoh mu ed oãs satsopser saus sa euqrop , mif oa éta avorp à otsop res aived boJ
. oditnes mêt oãn sarvalap saus sa , rezid a átse euq o ebas oãn boJ “
: em-rezid azetrec moc oãv , matucse em euq , soibás so e sotasnes snemoh sO
! sasnep euq o oãtne ál ziD . ue oãn e rednopser ed snet euq é uT ? oãinipo aut a odnuges ogitsac o ád ele , sadrocsid odnauq euq áreS
” . ol-êzaf a otlov oãn , orre mugla itemoc es e ; oralc ajev ue euq arap , ut em-anisnE
. lam o racitarp a otlov oãn ; odidneperra uotsE “ : sueD a otid ahnit ele euq somahnopuS
? otievorp ues arap rimirpo o ed e ovop o ranimod ed exied oipmí o euq moc rezaf arap
, edadinamuH a e sovop so ravresbo e sasioc satse raigiv ai meuq , rahlo o essaivsed ele eS ? ragluj airi meuq , odarap essacif sueD es méroP
. sodimirpo sod otirg o uehloca ele e sueD ed aduja a ridep a erbop o maragirbo
; sohnimac sues so riuges mararucorp oãn e satsoc sa ehl-marariv sele sioP
. sodot ed atsiv à , ocilbúp me , sosonimirc messof es omoc so-atioçA
. iórtsed e aburred so ele etion amun ; mezaf sele euq o ecehnoc sueD euqroP
. ragul ues on sortuo acoloc e otium rarucorp mes setrof so zafseD
. otnemagluj a eled etnaid açerapmoc memoh o euq arap , atad amu acram oãn sueD
. rednocse meredop es salen arap , oãdirucse men arbmos martnocne oãn suam sO
. sossap sues sod mu adac êv e snemoh sod otnematropmoc o avresbo sueD sioP
. oçrofse mes sodatsafa oãs sosoredop so , mecerapased e sodaburred oãs sednarg so ; so-ahnapa etrom a , etion ad oiem a , etneper eD
. ele rop sodairc marof sobma siop , erbop o euq od ocir o siam ecerovaf men , sosoredop soa aicnêreferp ád oãn sueD saM
” ? sednarg soa sosonimirc e ier oa ahlanac ramahc ed zapac é meuQ
? otsuj etnematinifni é euq eleuqa ranednoc siaV ? ridiced iav euq é açitsuj a aiedo euq eleuqA “
: ogid et euq oa oãçneta atserp , otsi evuo , aicnêgiletni snet eS
. óp res a mairatlov siatrom so e , etnemataidemi airerrom edadinamuH a adot
, adiv ed orpos ues o sortuo a rad ed raxied essidiced ele aid mugla eS
? odadiuc ues oa orietni odnum o sôp meuQ ? arret a uogertne ehl euq é meuQ
. açitsuj a ecrotsid acnun e lam o acitarp oãn sueD euq é edadrev A
. otnematropmoc ues o emrofnoc ehl-iubirter e zaf ele euq o emrofnoc memoh oa agap sueD
! açitsujni reuqlauq atemoc uo lam o euqitarp sueD euq aiedi alep essap sov men ; atasnesni etneg , oãtne em-metucsE
” . sueD moc meb ed ratse me adan ahnag oãn memoh O “ : rezid oa
, sosonimirc soa aihnapmoc zaf , serotieflam soa es-atnuj
; saicnêlosni ed aiehc acob a meT ? boJ a etnahlemes méugla árevaH
” . amuhnen apluc ret mes , sahcelf saus salep odignita uos ; oãzar odnet omsem , osoritnem rop ossaP
. açitsuj em-rezaf a es-asucer sueD sam ; etneconi uotsE “ : aralced boJ
. mob é euq o rebas a somracif arap , otsuj é euq o rev rarucorp oãtne somaV
. sadimoc sad robas o aicerpa radalap o omoc , sarvalap sa eugnitsid odivuo o sioP
. aicnêirepxe ed etneg ó , em-maçuo ; soibás ó , sarvalap sahnim sa metucsE «
: ralaf a uounitnoc úilE
» . airodebas a et-onisne ue euq oicnêlis me em-evuo , adan serevit oãn eS
. oãzar ierad et otsog o odot moc ; alaf , rednopser a ogla serevit eS
. et-rezid a ohnet euq o oicnêlis me evuo ; oãçneta moc em-atucse , boJ Ó
. zul a rev a meunitnoc euq moc rezaf e omsiba od racnarra so arap
, osicerp rof euq sezev sa sadot , snemoh solep zaf sueD otsi oduT
” . zul a rev a raunitnoc ossop e omsiba on riac ed em-uorviL
. odicerem ogitsac o ued em oãn ele sam , otierid o idergsnart e ieuqep uE “ : sodot ed etnaid amalcorp , odnatnaC
. açitsuj aus a snemoh soa aicnuna e airgela ed sotirg moc sueD ed etnaid es-atneserpa ; odidep ues o ehloca ele e sueD a es-egiriD
. ecininem aus ad said soa atlov e edutnevuj a arepucer oproc ues O
” . ele arap etagser iugesnoc áj ; orclupes oa recsed ed o-arviL “ : odnezid ele rop adecretni e
, memoh eleuqad rovaf a ohnumetset êd euq , serossecretni lim sod mu , rovaf ues a ojna mu revit es saM
. sotrom sod odnum od etrap zaf áj adiv aus a ; avoc a arap ép mu moc omsem átsE
. sodidnocse siam sosso so éta atsiv à odnaxied , êv es lam euq orgam oãt aciF
. sosoiciled siam serajnam sod omsem , adimoc ad ojon etnes etneod O
. rarap mes memosnoc so euq serod moc , setneod riac so-odnezaf , snemoh so egirroc mébmaT
. odnuf mes omsiba on meredrep es ed , etrom ad arvil so missa E
. ohlugro ed mahcne es sele euq rative e edadlam ad snemoh so ratsafa arap
, sosiva sues so moc odem sehl-etem e snemoh soa sodivuo so erba oãtnE
. otiel ues on etnemadnuforp memrod sale e saossep sa animod onos o otnauqne , seõsiv e sohnos ed oiem rop etion a etnarud alaf sezev sÀ
. ossid somebecrepa son erpmes men e ralaf ed sarienam sairáv met sueD
? satnugrep ehl ut euq oa rednopser acnun ed sasuca o euq é euq roP
. memoh mu arap ednarg odaisamed é sueD siop , oãzar snet oãn ossin euq rednopser et euq ohnet méroP
” . sossap suem so sodot avresbo e saiedac moc sép so em-ednerp
; ogimini ues essof es omoc em-atart e mim artnoc sotxeterp acsub ele saM
. emirc muhnen itemoc oãn , apluc mes uotse ; odacep mes e etneconi uotse uE “
: odivuo on ovresnoc ue euq seõçaralced samugla , açneserp ahnim an , iuqa etsezif uT
. ogitnoc orud odaisamed res uov men ratsussa uov et oãn , ossi roP
. orrab od odamrof iuf ue mébmat : sueD ed etnaid siaugi somos ue e uT
! etnerf serezaf em arap et-araperp , em-ednopser , seriugesnoc eS
. adiv ad orpos o ued em e uoirc em euq osoredop-odot sueD o ioF
. osnep euq o azeuqnarf roiam a moc rezid uov , edadirecnis a adot moc ralaf uoV
. acob ad em-rias a sarvalap sa ohnet e , ralaf ue uov aroga euq arapeR
. sarvalap sahnim sà oãçneta atserp , et-rezid a ohnet euq o atucse , boJ , ut E «
» . ogitsac mes airaxied em sueD men raejnosil ies ue men sioP
. méugnin a radarga rarucorp uov men sêcov ed muhnen rop oditrap ieramot oãN
. rednopser e arvalap a ramot uov , rafabased redop arap ralaf euq ohneT
. ratneber a esauq uotse ue mébmat , sovon serdo me odacoloc oãçatnemref me ovon ohniv omoC
. sal-êtnoc ogisnoc oãn áj e mim ed ortned revref a sarvalap sa ohneT
. oãinipo ahnim a mébmat rad oreuq ; ralaf ed zev ahnim a é , arogA
? rednopser mes sodarap macif e malaf oãn sele odnauq , rarepse ed adnia iereT
. etnematelpmoc marecedume , rednopser arap adan mes , sodatrecnocsed maraciF
. marezif sêcov omoc ehl-rednopser uov oãn , ele artnoc sotnemugra rigirid uov oãn , ossi roP
. rednopser edop ehl memoh mu oãn e sueD ós sioP ” ! airodebas a somirbocseD “ : rezid mahnev em oãn E
. seõçamrifa saus sà atsopser ued men atcaxe acitírc amu boJ a zef muhnen e oãçneta atium moc sov-ietucsE
. adnuforp oãçacilpxe amugla avartnocne sadacsuber sarvalap sassov san es rev arap , mavalaf sêcov otnauqne , arepse à evitsE
. oãinipo ahnim a mébmat rad oreuq ue euq setucse em euq oçep et , ossi roP
. otsuj é euq o erpmes mebas oãn sohlev so ; soibás oãs sosodi so erpmes meN
. osoredop-odot sueD ed oãçaripsni amu , mod mu é met memoh o euq aicnêgiletni e airodebas a saM
” . airodebas a ranisne edop sona sotium ueviv meuq , ralaf eved euq é edadi met meuQ “ : ogimoc avasneP
. açneserp assov an oãinipo ahnim a rad me ietiseh e odem evit , ossi rop ; sievátiepser sohlev oãs sêcov e mevoj adnia uos uE « : atsopser a rad omsem ele uidiced e
odatirri uocif úilE , adiláv atsopser amu mavajnarra oãn snemoh sêrt so euq rev oa saM
. ele euq od sohlev siam etnatsab mare sele euqrop , avitatcepxe an uocif úilE , odnalaf marof sortuo so e boJ otnauqnE
. oãzar ahnit oãn euq ed boJ recnevnoc arap sotnemugra odartnocne meret oãn rop , soriehnapmoc sêrt sues so moc etnemlaugi odatirri uociF
. sueD artnoc oãzar ret redneterp rop , boJ moc oduterbos e otsi odut moc odatirri uocif , emaR ed ãlc od , zuB ed obirt ad , leuqaraB ed ohlif , úilE
. oãzar ahnit euq ed odicnevnoc oãt avatse ele euq odnev , boJ moc ritucsid ed mararap rafoS e dadliB , zafilE , snemoh sêrt seleuqA

. boJ ed sarvalap sa manimret iuqA » . sniur savre azudorp , adavec ed zev me , e ogirt oãn e sohnipse êd arret ahnim a euq
, emof ed rerrom a sonod sues so odnaxied , rarpmoc o mes otudorp ues o imoc es
; rarohc ed messevit soclus sues so euq e essaxieuq es arret ahnim a euq moc zif eS
. epicnírp mu omoc eled em-ramixorpa e sossap suem so sodot ratnoc ehl ed aivaH
. mim arap aoroc amu eled rezaf ed e sorbmo soa ratropsnart o ed zapac uoS
! oãçasuca aus a avercse rotisopo uem o euQ ! adnopser em sueD euq ; arutanissa ahnim a é atsE ! essivuo em méugla euq ared meuQ
. lanubirt oa essof oãn e essalac em euq moc odnezaf , uotnordema em setnerap sod ozerpsed o men , oãditlum ad airatirg ad odem evit oãN
. otiep od ortned semirc suem so ielac men , sodacep suem so it ed idnocse oãn , sortuo so omoC
. sonirgerep so arap atreba avatse atrop ahnim a siop , aur an rimrod euq evet orietsarof muhneN
” ! eled atsuc à atsef somaçaF “ : messessid asac ahnim ed snemoh so euq iexied oãN
. adiv a essarit ehl euq sueD a odnidep , raoçidlama o ed otnop oa ieugehc reuqes men
, uignita o lam mugla odnauq otiefsitas ieuqif oãn , ogimini uem od açargsed a moc iergela em oãN
. uéc on átse euq sueD o ragener a airatse siop , emirc oriedadrev mu aires ossi mébmaT
. oãm a moc ojieb mu sehl-odnadnam e oãçaroc od omitní on rizudes em-odnaxied
, osotsejam radna ues o moc auL a arap men , rodnelpse ues on , loS o arap ietlov em oãN
. azeuqir ednarg amu odiugesnoc ret ed , anutrof ahnim ad icediavne em oãN
. onif siam oruo o omsem , açnaruges ahnim a essof ele euq ieredisnoc men oruo on açnaifnoc ahnim a sup oãN
. ritsiser ogisnoc oãn , oãm a atnavel ele odnauq ; sueD ed ogitsac od odem otium ohneT
. oçarb uem od osso o erbeuq es e oãhc oa aiac em atalpomo ahnim a euq
, rovaf uem a açnetnes amu lanubirt od retbo arap , oãfró mu artnoc oãm a ietnavel eS
? sahlevo sahnim sad ãl ed atief etneuq apuor a essecedarga em oproc ues o euq mes
, ritsev arap adan mes erbop mu uo , apuor mes odnubagav mugla odartnocne ue iereT
. aiug so meuq ue uos otnemicsan ues o edsed , iap omoc soãfró so ieirc aicnâfni a edseD
? soãfró soa eled mébmat rad mes , oãp ed odacob mu ohnizos imoc uo
, avúiv a etnemlituni rarohc iexied uo serbop soa odidep mugla osaca rop iesuceR
. seãm sasson sad ertnev on , sobma a son-uomrof ocinú sueD o : ele a o-uoirc mim a uoirc em meuQ
? ossid satnoc ridep em odnauq , ierednopser ehl euQ ? rasuca em sueD odnauq , rezaf ieredop euq
, ogimoc seõtseuq marevit odnauq , avres ahnim ad uo ovres uem od sotierid so icehnocer oãn eS
. sneb suem so sodot airimusnoc e oãçiurtsed à airavel em euq , ogof mu omoc maires semirc sessE
. ogitsac ed songid semirc e saicnêcedni oditemoc airet ue , osac essen , sioP
. edatnov aus à aled mahnopsid sortuo euq e memoh ortuo avris rehlum ahnim a euq
, sohniziv sod atrop à ratierpse a sup em e rehlum amu rop rizudes iexied em eS
. sotneber suem so maurtsed e ieemes ue euq oliuqa mamoc sortuo euq
, emirc reuqlauq rop sajus soãm sa ohnet es e ojev euq o odut ed sárta marof sojesed suem so es , ohnimac od maraivsed es sép suem so eS
! etneconi uotse euq áracifirev e asorogir açnalab amun em-rasep edop sueD
. saslaf sasioc ed sárta irroc men , olodí muhnen ed sárta iuf oãn uE
? sossap suem so sodot avresbo oãn , otnematropmoc uem o êv oãn sueD euq áreS
? rotieflam mu rop odicerem ertsased o , osonimirc mu a adived açargsed a aires oãN
? suéc son atibah euq osoredop-odot sueD od rarepse ue airedop asnepmocer euq , oirártnoc osaC
. mevoj amun rahlo o raxif acnun ed sohlo suem so moc otcap mu ziF «
» . arohc meuq ahnapmoca ós atualf ahnim a e otul ed átse aril ahnim A
. erbef me medra sosso suem so , oãriedlac mu euq argen siam átse elep ahnim A
. otresed on sezurtseva sa moc reviv iuf , siacahc sod oriehnapmoc em-ienroT
. oilíxua ridep ovop od aielbmessa à uov e ; loS mes e oirbmos ohnimaC
. mim ed es-mamixorpa oãçilfa ed said , axiab oãn euq erbef me odrA
. oãdirucse a oiev e zul alep ierepse , lam o em-oiev e meb olep ieisnA
? serbop sod asuac rop icetsirtne em oãN ? odimirpo o moc ierohc euq edadrev áres oãN
. orrocos rop atirg es euq ertsased od sioped men , méugla a oãm a rednetse iav es euq odidrep átse odut odnauq é oãN
. rartnocne oãv es seres so sodot edno adarom , etrom à rasserger sáraf em euq ies meB
. mim ed egnol arap ossecus o etsatsafa e otnev olep odavel essof ue euq moc etseziF
. adasep oãm aut a moc em-etsacata e ocsarrac uem o et-etsanroT
. mim ed osac etsezif oãn e em-ietneserpa , etsednopser em oãn e it rop ietirG
. óp o e orrab o moc odarutsim ocif e amal a arap ogimoc aritA
. asimac ad ohniraloc olep em-aruges e apuor alep aicnêloiv moc em-arraga elE
. osnacsed mecehnoc oãn meor em euq so , sosso so em-assapsert rod a , etion eD
. oãçilfa ed said reviv a uotsE : semuxieuq suem soa sagral rad atser em ós arogA
. mevun amu omoc uecerapased ratse-meb uem o ; edadirepsorp ahnim a açaema , lavadnev mu omoc , e mim erbos iac rorret O
. sorbmocse so ertne ogimoc ret mêv e ahcerb emrone amu ed sévarta massaP
. seled em-rapacse ogisnoc oãn ; riac em-mezaf e ohnimac o em-marraB
. açargsed a ogisnoc odnezart , mim arap merroc sodaerfnesed e sodal so sodot ed mim artnoc es-matnaveL
. otiepser oa em-matlaf açneserp ahnim an , em-mahlimuh e atrop ahnim à maipse selE
. arac an ripsuc em ed marap oãn e mim ed es-matsafa e rorroh em-mêT
. atodena amu euq siam uos oãn sele arap , seõçnac saus san mim ed mabmoZ
. adaodrob à síap od soslupxe , emon mes etneg , sotasnesni ed oãditlum amu oãS
. sotsubra sod oxiabed sodahnina , siagatam so ertne rigur es-mevuO
. sodehcor son e arret an socarub me , sasogirep satsocne san reviv ri ed mêT
. seõrdal messof es omoc sele artnoc odnatirg , son-maslupxe seõçaovop sad setnatibah sO
. meremoc arap saces sezíar e siagatam son savlam odnahnapa
, sepetse salep aivah euq o reor a sodagirbo , seõçavirp e semof rop sodatogse mavatsE
. rogiv o odot maredrep áJ ? mêt sele euq açrof a asseretni em euQ
! ohnaber uem od seãc so moc racif ed songidni maires setnad siap sues sO . ue euq od sovon siam snugla éta , mim ed es-meir aroga saM «
» . etsirt oãtse odnauq atrofnocer so e sodadlos sues so moc arom euq ier mu omoc seled etnerf an em-ahnup e ohnimac o aihlocse uE
. ergela otsor uem od rahlo o mavaivsed oãn e mavatiderca men , sele arap airros ue odnauQ
. savuhc sariemirp sa evrosba arret a omoc lat , zediva moc sa-odnebeb , sarvalap sahnim sa mavarepsE
