. otnemidnetne ues on mavartenep sarvalap sahnim sa ; mavatnecserca adan , ralaf ue ed siopeD
. sohlesnoc avad ue otnauqne , oicnêlis mavadraug e mif oa éta em-maivuo selE
” . oãm ahnim an açrof ahnag ocra uem o e mim ed ortned es-avoner adiv ahnim A
. somar suem son asiop ohlavro o e saugá sà éta magehc sezíar sahnim sA
. siam sona sotium reviv arap , ohnin uem on arrom ue , xinéf a omoc , zevlaT “ : iesnep E
. setned sues sod essapacse aserp a euq arap , sodavlam soa soxieuq so ierbeuQ
. sodicehnocsed ed seõtseuq sa éta etnemlevarovaf aivloser e soãfró so arap iap mu omoc arE
. oxoc o arap sanrep ed e ogec o arap sohlo ed aivres ue sioP
. açebac a e oproc o em-avanroda açitsuj a e aitsev em euq moc apuor a are oãditcer A
. airgela ed es-aihcne avúiv ad oãçaroc o e em-mavaticilef etrom à mavatse setna euq sO
. sodatissecen so sodot e oãfró o omoc meb , orrocos aidep ele odnauq , erbop o avarvil ue sioP
. rovaf uem a mare mavaicneserp euq so , em-avaticilef otsi aivuo meuq E
. acob ad uéc oa sehl-es-avaloc augníl a e aicedume sieváton sod zov A
. acob a rapat a oãm a odnop , oicnêlis mavadraug sednarg so
; ép ed es-mahnup sohlev so e es-mavariter , em-merev oa , sovon so
, ohlesnoc on ragul uem o rapuco arap , edadic ad acilbúp açarp à aías odnauQ
. sanrep sahnim sa erbos mairroc etieza ed soir , omasláb e emerc me sép suem so avavaL
. sohlif suem sod odaedor avatse ue e ogimoc adnia avatse osoredop-odot sueD O
. asac ahnim a saçnairc ed uehcne sueD odnauq , edutnevuj ahnim an oãtne avatsE
. oãdirucse an éta rahnimac aidop ue e mim erbos avahlirb zul aus a odnauq
; aigetorp em sueD euq me sopmet son , setnad are ue omoc res ared em meuQ «
: odnezid , osrucsid ues o uomoter boJ
» ” . lam o rative me etsisnoc aicnêgiletni a , sueD a ratiepser é airodebas A “ : snemoh soa essid siopeD
. a-uovorpa e a-uonimaxe , a-uoicerpa e airodebas a uiv ele , arutla assen
, sadaovort sà ohnimac o uocram e riuges aived avuhc a euq siel sa uoxif odnauq
, saugá sad adidem a uonimreted e oirpórp osep ues o otnev oa uiubirta odnauQ
. odnum on áh euq oliuqa odut avresbo e arret ad omertxe oa éta egnita rahlo ues o sioP
. megiro aus a ecehnoc euq ele É ; airodebas ad sohnimac so edneerpmoc sueD
” . odivuo ed somecehnoc a óS “ : maralced sotrom sod odnum o e etrom A
. rirbocsed medop a uéc od seva sa men edno , soviv seres sod rahlo od egnol , adidnocse átsE
? aicnêgiletni ad etnof a acif ednO ? airodebas a riv edop euq é ednod , sioP
. orup siam oruo olep eriuqda es men , aipóitE ad oizápot o ale moc arapmoc es oãN
. salorép sa euq siam elav airodebas a ; elaf es men siaroc e latsirc eD
. onif oruo ed sosav ale rop oãd es men ordiv o men oruo o men ale moc marapmoc es oãN
. arifas e anilanroc ed sasoicerp sardep moc men rifO ed orup oruo moc eriuqda es oãN
. atarp ed osep a agap es men , oruo ed ocort a ednev es oãN
” ! átse oãn mébmat iuqA “ : eteper odnuforp ram o e ” ! iuqa átse oãN “ : zid omsiba O
. oçerp ues o ecehnoc onamuh res muhnen e , odnum etsen artnocne es oãN
? aicnêgiletni ad etnof a acif ednO ? mev ale euq é ednod , airodebas a saM
. sadidnocse ál sazeuqir sa aid od zul à zart e soir sod setnecsan sa arolpxE
. edadisoicerp reuqlauq arap otneta rahlo ed , sahcor san sairelag erbA
. sahnatnom sad ziar a uexemer e oãm a uetem ele otinarg on étA
. sép so sôp ál men siamina sod ier o , uossap ál rop acnun oãel O
. marirbocsed áj oãclaf od sohlo so men , ecehnoc ertuba o men euq sohnimac rop
, oruo es-artnocne arret an e sarifas áh sodehcor sues soN
. ogof olep odamieuq odut iof euq ecerap oxiab rop e oãp o zudorp euq arret é amic roP
. adroc amu ed osnepsus es-odnaecnalab , uossap méugnin adnia edno rop , sodot ed egnol , sodatibah soitís sod egnol sairelag erbA
. sarucse e sairbmos siam saturg sa , sodidnocse siam seragul so racsuber iav e savert sa moc abaca memoh O
. eznorb o ednuf es ardep ad e arret ad odariter é orref O
. oruo o iartxe es edno ed seragul e atarp a arit es edno ed sanim áh euq somebaS «
» . ragul ues o ranodnaba a o-agirbo , sadatefob e soibossa moC
. es-rapacse etnemadarepsesed atnet ele e edadeip mes o-arrupme sueD
; ragul ues od o-acnarra lavadnev o , ogisnoc o-avel etsel otnev O
. edatsepmet a o-ataberra , etion amun ; etnehcne a omoc oã-ol-ágofa serorret sO
. adan met oãn áj , sohlo so rirba oa : res o ed áraxied sam , ocir es-uotieD
. opmac mu radraug arap atief anabac amu omoc , ahnara ed aiet omoc áres riurtsnoc ele euq asac A
. sapluc merevit oãn euq soa adanitsed áres atarp a e sotsenoh e snob solep sadasu oãres sapuor sasse
, óp omoc sapuor odatnuj e arret omoc atarp odaotnoma revit eS
. sele rop oãrarohc reuqes men savúiv saus sa e setneviverbos sues so áratlupes etrom A
. emof a ratam euq moc oãret oãn setnednecsed sues so e arreug an oãrerrom , merecserc sohlif sues so eS
. avreser ehl osoredoP-odoT o euq etros a é , sueD ed ebecer osonimirc o euq agap a é atsE
? sedadislaf riteper a maunitnoc euq rop , ossid sahnumetset oãs sêcov sodot es E
. ele erbos ies euq od adan ierednocse sov oãn , sueD ed redop o sov-rartsom uoV
. otnemom o odot a sueD a racovni me , osoredoP-odoT o arap ratlov es me otsog etnes oãn ele , sáilA
? oãçilfa a riacer ele erbos odnauq , sacilpús saus sa rivuo iav sueD euq áreS
? adiv ad oif o atroc ehl sueD es , rerrom oa , oipmí o ret edop açnarepse euQ «
» ! sodavlam e sosonimirc sod etros a mahnet sogimini e soirásrevda suem so euQ
. mim me ravorper a adan áh oãn ; oãzar ohnet euq azemrif moc erpmes ieretnaM
. etneconi uos euq etrom à éta ierednefeD ! oãzar sov-rad mim ed egnoL
. saritnem ieraicnunorp men , sedadislaf oãrias oãn acob ahnim ad
, adiv a ravresnoc em sueD e raripser ue otnauqne , euq oruJ
! arugrama ed ehcne em e açitsuj em-rezaf a agen es euq , osoredoP-odoT o , sueD rop oruJ «
: arienam atsed , osrucsid ues o uounitnoc boJ E
» ? sotief sues sod emrone azednarg a redneerpmoc ed zapac áres meuQ . eled ratnoc edop es euq o odut ed oce mu , sarbo saus sad etrap amu ós é otsi saM
. zolev etnepres a uotam oãm aus a moc , uéc o uerrav orpos ues o moC
. soac o zefsed aicnêgiletni aus a moc , ram o uomlaca redop ues o moC
. odimarb ues o moc sadatsussa , uéc o matnetsus euq sanuloc sa memerT
. savert sa e zul a ertne etimil on , ram od atlov à olucríc mu uoçarT
. méugnin rop otsiv res oãn arap , onort ues o mevun amu moc uirbocnE
. osep o moc metneber satse euq mes , snevun sad ortned saugá sa uorrecnE
. adan o erbos arret a uednepsus e oizav o erbos etselec adabóba a uednetse sueD
. otrebocsed a ecerapa oãçiurtsed ad arret a , sueD ed etnaid es-erba omsiba O
. etsixe elen euq o odut e onaeco o emert , mecrotnoc es sodot , oãdirucse ad arret aN
? ralaf a etsevitse meuq ed emon mE ? sarvalap sasse uoripsni et euq é meuQ
! edadilibah atnat moc o-odniurtsni , etnarongi mu rahlesnoca ed arienam euQ
! soçarb so reugre eugesnoc oãn meuq rerrocos ed , saçrof mes átse meuq a raduja ed arienam aob euQ «
: odnezid , uednopser boJ








» ! emrev selpmis mu ed assap oãn euq , etnacifingisni arutairc , memoh o siam otnauq
, eled etnaid ohlirb medrep salertse sa e zul mes atneserpa es auL a étA
. etneconi ias acnun latrom selpmis mu , sueD artnoc oãzar ret eugesnoc oãn memoh mU
? zul aus a ahlirb oãn euq é meuq erbos E ? serodivres sues so ratnoc ed arienam árevaH
. zap a ranier zaf , uéc od ál , levímet e onarebos é sueD «
: odnezid , uednopser auhC ed dadliB
» . oditnes mêt oãn sarvalap sahnim sa euq agid e atnimsed em méugla euq , missa é oãn eS
. sagipse omoc sodatroc marof ; sodahnapa e sodaburred marof , sodot omoc ; marecerapased áj e sednarg mare , ocuop áh adniA
. etrap a adot rop so-avresbo sam , edatnov à reviv so-axied sueD
. soruges ratse ed maxied , ecerapa ele odnauq ; so-abirred , açrof aus a moc , sueD saM
. avúiv avatse euq a uerrocos oãn e sohlif mes uocif euq rehlum a lam uotart elE
. adarbeuq áres atnalp amu omoc edadlam a e ; odarbmel áres siam acnun ; o-aroved emrev o , o-eceuqse eãm A
. suam so elogne orclupes o missA . augá a elogne aces arret a e even a eterred loS O
. sahniv saus sà ri a áratlov oãn e sadaoçidlama macif sarret saus sa ; saugá salep odatsarra é odavlam O «
» . etion ad serorroh soa oãtse euq sodaoçiefa oãt ed , sarucse sà metnes es sele euq é ãhnam a moC
. zul a moc adan mereuq oãn , asac me es-mahcef aid ed ; orucse olep on-mezaf sasac matlassa euq sO
. sodidnocse seragul arap iav e ” ! êv em méugniN “ : odnezid , olucsúperc oa atierpse oretlúda O
. oãrdal o acata , etion ed ; edlimuh e erbop o ratam arap adagurdam ed es-atnavel onissassa O
. opmet otium selen mêtnam es oãn , soralc sohnimac rop madna oãn ; aid od zul à megof serotieflam setsE
. odrusba etse a oãçneta atserp oãn sueD e orrocos medep sodiref so e memeg sodnubirom so , edadic aN
. edes ed merrom sam , ragal on savu sa masip e sóm sa moc etieza o memerpsE
. sagipse ed sexief odnagerrac , emof massap e ritsev euq meret oãn rop sun madnA
. erbop od soãm sad saçnairc sa ebuor e eãm ad soçarb sod oãfró o euqnarra meuq áh sioP
. oigúfer omoc , sodehcor soa es-marraga sele e son-macrahcne sahnatnom sad soriecauga sO
. oirf o rative meredop arap adan , rirboc es euq moc adan mêt oãn , etion eD
. suam sod sahniv sa ramidniv oãv , soiehla sopmac son sagipse rahnapa oãV
. sohlif sues so arap adimoc merajnarra arap , somre seragul arap odec ãhnam ed meas , otresed o arap rahlabart oãv , snegavles sonsa omoC
. rednocse es ed mêt síap od sedlimuh siam so , ohnimac od arof arap serbop so marrupmE
. avúiv ad iob od es-mairporpa e oãfró oa ecnetrep euq orrub o ogisnoc maveL
. marabuor euq sohnaber so sues omoc etnecsapa e sedadeirporp sad socram so euqolsed meuq áH
? oãçnevretni aus a meraicneserp sogima sues so arap , satad acram oãn sueD euq é euq roP «
» ! açneserp aus ad essirbocne em etion a e essednocse em oãdirucse a euq airajesed , ossi roP
. remert em-zaf osoredoP-odoT o , megaroc a em-arit sueD , otcaf eD
. odem ed oiehc ocif , ossin otidem odnauq ; eled etnaid omert , ossi roP
. onalp ues on met euq sasioc sartuo satium e mim arap uidiced euq o razilaer ed-áH
. zaf ele euq o é ajesed ele euq oliuqa : evomed o méugnin , asioc amu ediced ele odnauq saM
. sarvalap saus sa oãçaroc uem on iedraug , snedro saus sad ietsafa em acnuN
. raivsed em mes , ohnimac ues olep erpmes iuf , sossap sues sod otsar o erpmes iugeS
. orup oruo omoc uos euq árev e avorp à ahnop em euq ; sossap suem sod mu adac ecehnoc ele saM
. rev a ogehc o oãn e lus arap uov ; ortnocne o oãn e etron arap o-orucorP
. orbucsed o oãn , etnedico arap otlov es ; átse ele edno ies oãn , etneiro arap uov es saM
. asuac ahnim a recnev rezaf airiugesnoc , ele moc etnemlael ritucsid essedup ue eS
. mim artnoc es-recerufne airiv omsem elE ! oãN ? ogimoc ritucsid arap , otutitsbus mu radnam airi ele euq áreS
. essed em euq satsopser sa airebecrep e sotnemugra so redneerpmoc ed zapac aireS
. seõtseuq sa airitucsid omsem ue ; asuac ahnim a eled etnaid airatneserpA
! lanubirt ues oa éta ragehc redop e ol-ártnocne edno rebas ared em meuQ
. odimeg uem o etnemarud uogitsac oãm aus a siop , arugrama moc otnemal em zev amu siaM «
: uocilper boJ
» . sapmil soãm sa otcaf ed serevit es ; etneconi serevitse es , árarvil et elE
. sodahlimuh oãs euq so errocos sueD siop , serovuol ranedro sedop , seõçahlimuh raterced méugla eS
. ohnimac uet on erpmes árahlirb zul a e árecetnoca seridiced euq o oduT
. etsezif euq sassemorp sa sárirpmuc ut e et-atucse ele , asioc amugla seridep ehl odnauQ
. açneserp aus an zilef et-ritnes e ele arap sohlo so ratnavel sáredop missA
. atarp ed edaditnauq emrone amu omoc , oruo omoc it arap áres osoredoP-odoT O
. oriebir od sardep sa arap rifO ed oruo uet o , oxil o arap oruo uet o aritA
. açitsujni a asac aut ad ratsafa seved sam , odicelebatser sáracif , osoredoP-odoT o arap seratlov et eS
. oãçaroc uet on sarvalap saus sa acoloc e ád et ele euq otnemanisne o atiecA
. it arap áratlov edadirepsorp a e ele moc zap me ovon ed et-eõP
” . ogof olep adaroved iof azeuqir aus a , soruoset sues so es-marabacA “
: seled es-meir sapluc mêt oãn euq so , setnetnoc macif e ossi meêv snob sO
. sosodlam sonalp sues sod on-maratsafa sele sam , sneb ed asac a odihcne sehl-ahnit sueD
” ? osoredoP-odoT o son-rezaf edop euQ ! zap me son-axieD “ : sueD a mezid selE
? seõçadnuf sa uosarra sehl aiehc a odnauq , etnemarutamerp sodatsarra marof euq
, suam snemoh so maradna edno rop , orucse ohnimac o riuges sereuQ
” . etselec adabóba alep aiessap ele odnauq , rev metimrep ehl oãn e olucátsbo mezaf snevun sA
? snevun sad ác arap açitsuj rezaf ed zapac áreS ? otsid ebas sueD euq é euQ “ : sárid ut saM
! salertse sa satla macif omoc araper E . uéc on átse sueD euq somebas sóN
. agofa et euq oãçadnuni amu omoc é ; adan rev axied et oãn oãdirucse A
. it erbos etnemanitneper uiac rorret o e sogirep ed odaedor sátse , ossi roP
. saizav soãm ed maracif soãfró so e adan mes savúiv sa arobme etsadnaM
! ele erbos animod euq etnatropmi aossep amu , síap od onod é euq méugla omoc et-saitneS
. emof ahnit meuq a oãp savagen e edes ahnit meuq a rebeb ed savad oãN
. sun so-odnaxied , apuor a sehl-savarit , sortuo sod are euq o etnematsujni saigixE
? mif mêt oãn semirc suet so e atium é edadlam aut a euq setna áres oãN
? otnemagluj a amahc et e edneerper et ele euq edadeip aut alep áreS
? otnematropmoc mob uet o zaf ehl otievorp euQ ? otsuj seres ut ed otcaf o moc osoredoP-odoT o ahnag euQ
? sueD arap edadilitu amugla ed res edop , oibás uo etrof otium omsem , memoh mu euq áreS «
: uocilper nameT ed zafilE
» ! onagne orup oãs satsopser sassov sA ! seõsuli moc em-ratrofnoc medneterp adnia E
. evel anrot sehl es arret a éta missA . seled sárta euges laugi artuo e etnerf aus à ojetroc zaf oãditlum amU
. sol-êgetorp a amic rop alupúc amu moc suélosuam socir me sodatlupes oãs siopeD
? mecerem euq ogitsac o ád sehl men , mezaf euq lam o arac à arita sehl méugnin euq
; setnesua martnocne es sele , atrop à etab sehl ertsased o odnauq , euq e açargsed à rapacse meugesnoc suam so euQ
? matnoc sale euq oliuqan matiderca oãN ? majaiv euq saossep sà maratnugrep áJ
” ? sosonimirc so mavarom edno ragul o , sonarit sod asac a átse ednO “ : ratnugrep oãv euq ieS
! satsujni oãs mim erbos saiedi sassov sa : sotnemasnep sossov so meb oçehnoC
. semrev ed sotreboc , arret an mezaj sortuo e snU
. sezilef oditnes meret es acnun mes , arugrama ed soiehc merrom sortuo otnatertnE
. sosso ed setrof e sanrep ed sodrog meb
, aliuqnart e amlac adiv amu mazog e etrom à éta meb erroc odut , snugla araP
? sodacoloc etnematla siam so agluj euq , sueD a seõçil rad edneterp ele euq áreS
. sohlif sod etros a moc atropmi es oãn uam o , adiv aus a adanimret zev amu , sioP
. osoredoP-odoT od ari a ratnemirepxe e aníur aus a rev aived mu adaC
. rednerpa arap , ragap aireved euq é mu adaC ? sohlif sues so arap ogitsac o raxied iav sueD euq áreS
? oãcaruf olep adatsarra ahlap omoc , otnev olep adavel ahlap omoc res oãv euq áreS
? azerud moc uogitsac so sueD sezev satnauQ ? açargsed a sele erbos uiac e suam sod adapmâl a uogapa es sezev satnauq
, sueD ed egnol oãtse sotnemasnep sues so es e soãm saus san átse oãn edadicilef a eS
” ? atrop aus à retab me somahnag euQ ? sovarcse sues somres arap , osoredoP-odoT o é meuQ
! snedro saut sad rebas somereuq oãN ! zap me son-axieD “ : sueD a mezid selE
. orclupes oa zap me mecsed e sotiefsitas adiv a massaP
. atualf ad euqot oa es-metrevid , saril e serobmat macoT
. edadrebil me matlas sohlif sues so , sotirbac omoc saçnairc saus sa rerroc maxieD
. sairc saus sa redrep mes zul à oãd satse e sacav sa odnadnucef iav oruot ues O
. sele erbos asep oãn sueD ed ogitsac o ; odem mes e zap me oãtse sasac aus sA
. sele moc meviv sohlif so e soviv oãtse adnia siap so : emrif átse ailímaf aus A
? odnecehlevne oãv emrofnoc socir siam macif e reviv a raunitnoc medop suam so euq é euq roP
. oãçaroc o em-atrepa rovap o e odazirorroh ocif rarbmel em ed óS
. otnapse ed sodum oãracif e osac uem oa oãçneta metserP
? odaitsugna ratse arap oãzar , otnatrop , ohnet oãN . memoh selpmis mu moc é oãn oãssucsid ahnim A
. meresiuq es , em-raziralucidir medop , sioped ; olaf ue otnauqne , aicnêicap mahneT
. oãd em sêcov euq oãçalosnoc a asse ajeS . sarvalap sahnim sa etnematneta maçuO «
: uednopser boJ
» . sele arap uonimreted sueD euq ogitsac o , suam soa anitsed sueD euq etros a é atsE
. ogitsac ues od roruf o setnerrot me rerroc raxied sueD euq me aid on , asac aus a etsarra oãçadnuni a euQ
. rasuca o arap es-atnavel arret a e semirc sues so oãralever suéc sO
. adarom aus ad sotser so iórtsed euq , osoiretsim ogof mu o-aroved , latot oãdirucse a o-arepsE
. ele erbos riac a etrom ad serorret so oãs : odagíf od ehl-rias a ahlirb artuo e satsoc salep ehl-ias ahcelf amU
. eznorb ed ocra mu rop odassevarta é , orref ed samra sad riguf oA
! rodasarba ogof ues od avuhc a moc o-ager e ari aus ad etnedra amahc a ele erbos adnam : agirrab a ahcne ele euq moc zaf sueD
. oãçilfa a ele erbos iac odaitsugna es-etnes , sazeuqir ed rehcne es ed siopeD
. otium rarud edop oãn ratse-meb ues o , ossi rop ; aicnânag aus à uopacse méugniN
. oãçibma aus à uopacse adan , ogessos ed otnemom mu evet oãN
. odíurtsnoc ahnit oãn euq sasac ed es-uoredopa , onodnaba oa so-uoxied e serbop so uorolpxE
. ol-áerobas a ragehc mes ohlabart ues od oturf o e rimusnoc so mes sorcul sues so revloved euq meT
. agietnam ed e lem ed soir men , etieza ed setnehcne árartnocne oãN
. etrom a á-ehl-rad etnepres ad aledidrom a , arobív ed onenev avapuhC
. arof sal-átied a o-agirbo sueD , ratimov sa ed met uilogne euq sazeuqir sA
. arobív ed onenev me es-amrofsnart otnemila esse , ogamôtse ues on saM
. acob ad uéc oa adaloc a-odnavresnoc , riac raxied a mes , meb a-avadraug
; augníl ad oxiabed a-aidnocse , radalap oa ehl-avadarga edadlam A
. arret ad óp on ele moc zaj ossi odut sam , edutnevuj ed e açrof ed oiehc avatsE
. serbop so raslobmeer ed mêt sohlif sues so , azeuqir aus a riutitser a odagirbo é elE
. avatse ele edno ragul o meêv reuqes men , siam meêv o oãn áj maiv o euq sohlo sO
. anrutcon oãsiv amu omoc egof e artnocne méugnin euq ohnos mu omoc ecerapaseD
. átse ele edno árebas oãn rarucorp o meuq ; ocretse omoc recerapased ed-áh
, snevun san açebac a moc racot éta , uéc oa éta osohlugro etnavel es euq adniA
? ariegassap é soipmí sod edadicilef a e egnol iav oãn suam sod oãçafsitas a euQ
? odnum etsen etsixe edadinamuH a euq edsed , oipícnirp o edsed missa é euq sebas oãN
. oãsneerpmoc ed otirípse moc rednopser rarucorp uov e etnahlirb oãçisopxe aut a rivuo a evitsE
. odanoisserpmi etnemlaer uotse euqrop , rednopser a em-mavel seõxelfer sahnim sA «
: odnezid oãtne oievretni ámaaN ed rafoS
» . açitsuj zaf sueD euq rebas a oãracif E . semirc sossov solep ragitsac edop sov , roruf ues od adapse a moc , euq sueD a mamet saM
” mim me átse oãtseuq ad ziar a saM ? riugesrep somav o euq é omoC “ : rezid sieredoP
. açetnoca ossi euq rop aiesna oãçaroc uem O . rahnartse mes , sohlo suem so moc ol-êv ed-ieh , rovaf uem a ol-êv ed-ieH
. sueD a rev ieredop , oviv ovon ed , elep ahnim a otiefsed ret es missa ed sioped , E
. etrom a artnoc arvalap amitlú a met ele e rodatrebil uem o é adiv ad sueD o euq ies uE
! ardep an sadacram etnemanrete meracif arap , obmuhc e orref a sadavarg messof euq ared em meuQ
! orvil mun uo oãçircsni amun sadavarg e satircse res messedup sarvalap sahnim sa álaxO
? raroved em mes sotiefsitas macif oãN ? sueD omoc , meugesrep em euq é euq roP
. ogimoc arap arud otium iof sueD ed oãm a euqrop , mim rop madecretni , sogima suem , mim rop madecretnI
. savigneg sad sodanracsed meas setned so e elep à sodaloc oãtse sosso suem sO
. mim artnoc es-maratlov avatsog ue meuq ed seleuqa , mim ed rorroh mêt opurg uem od mare euq sO
. mim ed lam mezid e em-otnavel ; mazerpsed em saçnairc sa étA
. mim ed matsog oãn sohlif soirpórp suem so e etnanguper em-ahca rehlum ahnim A
. rovaf rop ridep ehl euq evit , uednopser oãn ele e odagerpme uem o iemahC
. odicehnocsed mu sele arap em-ienrot , ohnartse mu omoc em-maredisnoc asac ahnim me maivres e mavarom euq sO
. mim ed es-mareceuqse sodicehnoc suem so e em-maranodnaba setnerap suem sO
. ohnartse mu omoc em-matart sogima suem so e mim ed egnol arap serailimaf suem so uovel sueD
. asac ahnim ad atlov à ocrec mezaf e mim artnoc ohnimac merba , açrof me mêv saport saus sA
. ues ogimini mu omoc em-uotart e odicerufne mim artnoc es-uotloV
. atnalp amu acnarra meuq omoc , açnarepse a em-uorit , otiefsed e odaniurra etnematelpmoc em-uoxieD
. açebac an aizart ue euq aoroc a em-uovel , arnoh ed aoroc ahnim a em-uoriT
. ohnimac uem o oãdirucse ed erboc e ; rassap ogisnoc oãn , ohnimac o em-uopat elE
. rednefed mev em méugnin , orrocos oçep es ; atsopser ohnetbo oãn , açitsujni ratirg ue eS
. eder aus a mim erbos odnarita , uotneirosed em euq sueD iof euq odnebas meuqif
, rahnogrevne em arap ogimoc ritucsid e rasuca mêv em euq áj saM
. mim a etnemos otiepser airid ossi , orre mugla oditemoc essevit ue eS
? missa rajartlu em ed ahnogrev mêt oãN . maratlusni em sezev zed rop áJ
? sarvalap sassov sa moc riref e ratnemrota oãv em odnauq étA «
: oãtne uocilper boJ
» ” ! sueD ecehnocer oãn euq eleuqad oãçatibah a , odavlam od asac a abaca omoc majeV “
: rorret ed soiehc oãrid e sodarimda oãracif sodot , etnedico a e etneiro a , etros aus ad merebas oA
. ueviverbos méugnin asac aus ad , setnednecsed men sohlif mes áracif ailímaf aus A
. odnum etsed arof arap odarretsed e oãdirucse a arap zul ad odarita áreS
. sazednoder san odadrocer res ed áraxied , eled oã-es-receuqse , arret aus aN
. oãrahcrum arizudorp euq somar so e races ed-oãh ahnit euq sezíar sA
. sneb sues so erbos erfoxne árahlapse e aus iof euq asac an áratibah ortuO
. etrom ad serorret sod ier oa odizudnoc e asac aus ad ogessos oa odacnarra áreS
. sorbmem so e elep a ocuop a ocuop odnaroved ehl-iav , etrom ad atinégomirp ahlif , açneod A
. aihnapmoc aus a aroga é açargsed a e emof me es-amrofsnart azeuqir aus A
. radna o mavart ehl e matnordema o serorret so , odal o odot roP
. rahnapa o arap , ohnimac on ahlidamra amu , ele arap oçal mu áh , arret an odidnocsE
. açrof moc on-mednerp soçal so , ohletra olep o-arraga ón O
. ogirep o arap ahnimac omsem ele , ép oirpórp ues rop ahlidamra an iac
; sonalp soirpórp sues solep odaburred é e odnatrucne es-oãv sosorogiv sossap sues so
; es-eugnitxe adiv aus ad adapmâl a e odnecerucse iav zul a , asac aus mE
. rahlirb ed áraxied ogof ues od amahc a , es-ragapa ed-áh uam memoh od zul a euq ahlO
? omsem it a saçadepsed et , odatlaxe , euq ut , ragul ues od rias oãv sodehcor so e raovopsed iav es arret a it rop euq áreS
? it arap sievízerpsed siamina omoc , siamina omoc saredisnoc son euq é euq roP
! somalaf sioped e sasioc sa edneerpmoC ? ahlidamra ed sarvalap rarita siav son odnauq étA «
: odnezid , uocilper , auhC ed larutan , dadliB
» . orclupes oa somrecsed sobma odnauq , etrom ad sarrag san áriac ale mébmaT
? uiv a euq é meuq , mim arap açnarepsE ? mim arap açnarepse rartnocne oãtne ossop ednO
. soãmri suem e iap uem , semrev soa e oãdirdop à eãm ramahc ieredoP
. ratied em arap amac amu oãdirucse an rajnarra e sotrom so ertne adarom amu é orepse euq o oduT
. oãdirucse ad oiem on , amixórp átse zul a euq agid e etion à aid emahc meuq áH
. sotiefsed maracif sodnuforp siam sojesed suem so e marassap áj iehnos ue euq said sO
. oibás muhnen sóv ertne rartnocne uov oãn euq rev ed-oãh ; rovaf rop , sodot ác mahnev saM
. sapmil soãm sa mêt euq mahca siam adnia e sotsuj oãs euq ed sodicnevnoc siam maciF
. leifni o artnoc es-atlover etneconi o e sodarimda macif sotcer oãs euq so , ossi roP
. arbmos omoc mecerapased saçrof sahnim sa , rod ed es-mezafsed sohlo suem sO
. mazirorroh es sodot meuq ed méugla uos , ovop od sacob san aroga odnA
. emof ed rerrom a sohlif sues so axied e eteuqnab mu arap sogima so adivnoc meuq omoc oãs selE
. serodecnev maias sele euq satnisnoc oãn , otnemidnetne o seled etsatsafa euq , uT
. eiopa e oãm alep eruges em euq méugla , it ed etnaid rodaif omoc méugla , rovaf rop , em-áD
. seõçacovorp saus sa ojev etion e aid ; serodabmoz ed odaedor uotsE
. orclupes od arieb à uotse , odnagapa es-iav adiv ahnim a , otnela mes em-ortnocnE «

» . ohnimacne em onroter mes adnes a arap E , oãrassap sona sotruc so sioP
. snemoh ertne seõtseuq me ecetnoca omoc , sueD e memoh o ertne ortibrá ed avris esse euQ
. samirgál moc orolpmi meuq a , sueD ed etnaid sotnemasnep suem so eterpretni euq
, rovaf uem a eralced euq amic me ál méugla , mim rop ajes euq ahnumetset amu , uéc on , etnematrec revah eved saM
! otirg uem o arap arutlupes ajah oãn e eugnas uem o sadnocse oãn arret Ó
. arecnis é oãçaro ahnim a e açitsujni amuhnen itemoc oãn , odutnoc E
. sohlo suem so erboc oãdirucse a e rarohc otnat ed argen arac a ohneT
. arret ad óp on açebac a moc , odartsorp ieuqif e otul ed em-itsev uE
. sadiref ed oproc o em-uirboc e orierreug mu omoc mim erbos uiaC
. lef uem o oãhc olep amarred e edadeip mes sahnartne sahnim sa assevarta sale moc , sates sa megnita em sodal so sodot eD
. seuqata sues sod ovla o mim ed zef ; em-uoçadepsed e oçocsep olep em-uorraga , ogessos uem oa em-racnarra oiev sueD
. sosonimirc ed soãm sa arap em-uorita , sodavlam soa em-uogertne sueD
. merahlimuh em arap , sadatefob em-oãd e rasuca em arap acob a merba , mim artnoc matnuj es sodoT
. ogimini uem essof es omoc , mim me sohlo so avarC . mim artnoc setned so odnegnar , roruf moc em-açadepsed e em-arragA
. seõçasuca saslaf mim artnoc uoicnunorp e mim artnoc ahnumetset omoc es-uotnaveL
. em-mararrama sadraug sues so , odatogse em-uoxied ele etnemlaeR
. mim ed atsafa es oãn , ralaf ed oxied es , e rod ahnim a iunimid oãn , olaf es saM
. sosrucsid sotium rezaf ed rasicerp mes , ramina sov arap sarvalap avajnarrA
. oãxiapmoc rop açebac a avanaba e osrucsid etnahlirb mu sêcov artnoc aizaF . ragul uem on messevitse es , sêcov omoc ralaf ed zapac are mébmat uE
” ? missa racilper a agirbo et euq é euq O ? saizav sarvalap sasse mabaca odnauQ “ : em-odnezid
, siam megilfa adnia sêcov , meratrofnoc ed zev mE . sasse a siaugi sarvalap ed serahlim ivuo áJ «
: oãtne uocilper boJ
» . oãsulised a é ertnev on mezart sele euq o , açargsed a zul à oãd e oãçilfa a is ed ortned mezarT
. onrobus ed saiehc , sasac saus sa áraroved ogof o , lirétse áracif soipmí sod oiulnoc O
. rolf a riac axied euq arievilo omoc , sedrev adnia savu sa edrep euq ariediv a omoc áreS
. recedrever a siam áratlov oãn e opmet od setna rabaca iaV
. litúf áres euq é adiv aus a ; sedadilituf me es-odnaif , ranagne es oãn arap É
. sueD rop odarpos lavadnev o so-acnarra e rolac o so-aces , sotneber sues so ; oãdirucse à árapacse oãn elE
. orclupes oa éta magehc oãn sneb sues so ; áretnam es azeuqir aus a men ocir áres oãN
. saníur me riac a setserp mavatse euq , sadatibased sasac me , sadanodnaba sedadic me avatibaH
. snir so erbos sahnab uoirc e arudrog aus a moc es-uegetorp sioP
. oducse ogral e etrof ues od sárta odigetorp , sueD artnoc açebac ed es-avaritA
. osoredoP-odoT o uoifased , sueD artnoc oãm a uotnavel euqrop
, racata a otnorp oticréxe mu omoc on-matrepa , on-mazirorreta oãçilfa a e aitsúgna A
. otrep átse etrom ad oãdirucse a euq etnes ele , sertuba sod otnemila arap odanodnabA
. etrom a rad ehl arap eipse o meuq áh ; oãdirucse ad ratlov ed oruges átse oãN
. oãrdal o ele erbos iac , odagessos siam átse odnauq ; sodivuo sues son maoce rorret ed sezoV
. reviv arap sona socuop met onarit o , aitsúgna an adiv a massap suam sO
. sele moc essacif ál ohnartse muhnen euq mes , síap o sueD ed marebecer euq seleuqa
, odacinumoc mahnit sehl siap sues so áj e maritimsnart soibás so euq oliuqa
, irbocsed ue euq o et-ratnoc oreuq ; asioc amu et-rezid oreuQ ! evuO
? augá ebeb meuq omoc edadlam ebeb euq memoh o árecerap oãn ehl odipmorroc e levátseted siam otnauQ
. sorup etnematelpmoc suéc so men , siéif etnematulosba aredisnoc sueD sojna sues so meN
? oãzar met euq rasnep latrom selpmis mu edop omoC ? etneconi raredisnoc edop es memoh mu euq é omoC
? satsujni sarvalap odnaicnunorp , sueD artnoc missa etsatlov et e
sasioc sa rev ed sohlo suet so maraxied euq roP ? otnemidnetne o uorit et euq é euQ
? oiopa ed arvalap amu meêd et e sueD ed emon me metrofnoc et euq saicerpa oãN
. iap uet o euq od ohlev siam ajes e ocnarb olebac o ahnet meuq són ertne áH
? mébmat somahnet oãn són euq snet airodebas euQ ? somabias oãn són euq ut sebas euQ
? airodebas ad seraredopa et arap , ohlesnoc uinuer sueD odnauq etneserp etsevitsE
? sahnatnom sa meritsixe ed setna etsecsan euq , ritsixe a memoh oriemirp o etsof euq sasneP
. it artnoc mednopser sarvalap saut sa ; ue oãn e anednoc et euq é acob aut A
. sosoicutsa sotnemugra odnehlocse , semirc suet so sezev lim matnemua sarvalap saut sA
. oãçaro ed otirípse o sazerpsed , sosoigiler sotnemitnes so siórtsed uT
. méugnin recnevnoc medop oãn euq sarvalap moc , açrof mes sotnemugra moc etucsid oãn
; otnev o omoc saizav saiedi ed atnemila es men , saco satsopser ád oãn oibás é meuQ «
: oãtne uednopser nameT ed zafilE
» . otnemirfos oirpórp ues o ratnemal e serod sairpórp saus sa ritnes eugesnoc óS
. adan ed rebas a agehc oãn ele euq es-raniurra uo recserc medop sohlif sues sO
. arobme ol-adnam e odarugifsed ol-axied , erpmes arap ecerapased ele e ol-aburreD
. memoh od açnarepse a siórtsed ut e ; arret a matsarra setnehcne sednarg sa , sardep sa odnatsagsed iav augá a
; odacolsed res edop odehcor mu ; es-rezafsed e riac edop ahnatnom amU
. sedadlam sahnim sa sairirbocne e semirc suem so odahcef meb ocas me sairacoloc missA
; sodacep suem soa oãçneta atnat setserp oãn , aroga omoc , sossap suem so sodot seravresbo ed zev mE
. etsairc ut euq res etse , mim rop ohnirac uet o odnitnes , airednopser ue , mim rop sessamahc odnauq
; adiv ad sedadlucifid sa airatnemal oãn , essof missa eS ? reviv a ratlov áredop , errom memoh mu odnauq saM
! mim ed serarbmel et arap , ozarp mu sessacram euq ared meuQ ! mim artnoc roruf uet o rassap éta , sotrom so ertne odidnocse , radraug sessedup em ut euq ared meuQ
. onos ues od oãradroca oãn , oãratrepsed oãn sele , suéc so maçerapased euq éta ; siam áratnavel es otnufed muhnen saM
! otresed o omoc soces racif soir so e sogal son saugá sa rabaca medoP
? atser ehl siam euq , ritsixe ed axied eS . sosrucer siam met oãn , errom memoh mu es saM
. adatnalp iof odnauq omoc , somar mecsan e es-ravoner a atlov augá a etnes lam
, oãhc on euqes ocnort ues o e arret an açehlevne ziar a euq omseM
. sotneber rizudorp ed aráp oãn e ovon ed atorb , metroc a euq omsem ; açnarepse erpmes met erovrá amU
. ohlabart ed aid ues o odagessos rassap etnemaliuqnart o-axied ; missa seigiv o oãN
. rassapartlu edop oãn euq setimil etsaçart e rarud ale iav euq opmet o secehnoc ut ; odanimreted ozarp mu met memoh od adiv A
! méugnin etnematulosbA ? orupmi é euq o orup ranrot edop meuQ
! it ed etnaid otnemagluj a ravel em arap , rahlo uet o mim me raxif etsof e ; uos ue euq otsi É
. ariegassap arbmos omoc recerapased éta , ahcrum e es-evlovnesed atnalp amu omoC
. sotnemrot ed aiehc e atruc adiv a met , rehlum ad odicsan , onamuh res O «
» . odneor iav açart a euq apuor omoc , erdop ariedam omoc es-zafsed adiv ahnim a saM
. adiv ahnim a adot ronemrop me odnatona , sossap suem so sodot savresbo e saiedac moc sép suem so sednerP
. aicnâfni ad sorre rop ragap em-rezaf a saunitnoc e saidleber ed oirótaler mu mim artnoc etseziF
? aces ahlap amu ed sárta rerroc uo adíac ahlof amu a odem retem ed sasicerP
? ogimini uet omoc satart em e rahlo o mim ed saivsed euq é euq roP
! sodacep e semirc suem so em-artsoM ? ue ohnet sodacep uo sedadlam euQ
. ressid ue euq oa racilper sedop e odnopser ue euq ratnugrep sedop siopeD
. amirpo oãn em roruf uet o euq e sogitsac suet so mim ed atsafa
: it ed rednocse em euq ret oãn arap , serovaf siod oçep et ós , sueD Ó
! orrom euq ohca , olac em aroga eS ? ogimoc ritucsid riv reuq meuQ
! etneconi uotse euq ies euqrop , oãtseuq a ietneserpa oirpórp uE
. ropxe uov ue euq oa sodivuo meêd , rezid a ohnet euq o meb metucsE
. açneserp aus à ragehc eugesnoc éf-ám ed méugnin siop , airótiv ahnim a áres , riugesnoc o eS
. otnematropmoc uem o eled etnaid airednefed e açnaifnoc airet ue , etrom à essanednoc em ele eS
! adiv airpórp ahnim a ocsir me mahnop sarvalap sahnim sa euq omsem , rof euq o ajeS
! recetnoca assop em euq o atropmi em oãN . ralaf mim a em-mexied e es-melaC
. amal ed ahlarum amu é acilpér assov a e óp o omoc sevel oãs sotnemugra sossov sO
? eled etnaid odem ed soiehc metnes es oãN ? azirometa sov oãn azednarg aus A
. sadidnocse sà omsem , sotsujni merof es , azetrec a adot moc sov-redneerper ed-áh ele sioP
? memoh mu anagne es omoc , ol-ánagne mairatneT ? otnemagluj a essatiejus sov ele euq meb mavahcA
? ele moc ritucsid edneterp méugla es , odari acif sueD euq áreS
? samelborp so ropxe medop ehl es oãn e sodacep so sueD a ropxe meved es euq áreS
. ritucsid oreuq ue euq oãtseuq a maçuo , rasrevnoc arap ohnet ue euq oa oãçneta metserP
. airodebas ed edutita amu etrap assov ad aires ; sodalac meracif rohlem aireS
! seãtalrahc socidém omoc oãs e satasnesni sarvalap mêt sêcov sioP
. sueD moc ritucsid redop missa arap , osoredoP-odoT o moc ralaf redop ared em meuQ
. sêcov euq sonem uos oãn , ies ue mébmat mebas sêcov euq oliuqA
. odnedneerpmoc ocuop a ocuop iuf e odnivuo e odnev ue iuf otsi oduT «
» . sodebêb messof es omoc , oãdirucse an saledaplapa sà , zul a merartnocne mes , sodidrep radna sol-áF
. ohnimac o erpmes arap macrep euq moc zaf e ovop od sefehc soa otnemidnetne o ariT
. oilíxe o arap so-adnam e recserc sol-áf , so-iórtsed sioped e sovop so ecednargnE
. oãdirucse an avatse euq o aid od zul à zart e sazednuforp san odidnocse átse euq o atsiv à eõP
. asefed mes sosoredop so axied e sednarg so olucídir a eõp
; sohlev soa zetasnes a arit e sodimuserp soa arvalap a redrep zaf
; sodalatsni mavatse euq so aburred e arobme so-adnam e setodrecas so ajopsed
; sodot ed etnaid sun so-axied e sier soa laer oãrutnic o atrepased
; olucídir a setnanrevog so eõp e arobme so-adnam e sednarg so ajopsed elE
, amitív a e oãlrub o mecnetrep ele a ; rafnuirt arap redop met elE
. arret a matsaved saiehc sa , siamed revohc zaf es ; aces a é , avuhc a riac axied oãn ele eS
. airótapacse met oãn áj arraga ele meuq ; odíurtsnoc res a atlov oãn iórtsed ele euq O
. odut ebecrep e edneerpmoc , redop o e airodebas a met ele , ossi roP
. aicnêgiletni zudorp agnol adiv amu , airodebas ád ecihlev A
. adarga ehl euq robas o eugnitsid radalap o omoc , sarvalap sa riugnitsid ebas odivuo O
. sonamuh seres so sodot amina euq otirípse o e soviv seres so sodot ed adiv a átse oãm aus an sioP
? ROHNES od arbo é ecetnoca euq o odut euq ebas oãn euq é meuq , arienam atseD
. é omoc oã-et-ratnoc ram od sexiep so , áramrofni et ale euq arret a moc ralaf iaV
. recehnoc a oãrad ot seva sa sadot , oãramrofni et sele euq siamina soa atnugrep saM
. oãm an sueD mêt euq odnasnep , soruges meviv sueD a macovorp euq so e edadirepsorp mêt seõrdal sod sasac sA
. levízerpsed asioc amu é agerrocse euq memoh o , sotiefsitas e sosohlugro so araP
! otcer e otsuj é meuq ed mecenracse e adnopser euq arap sueD rop es-amahC ! sogima sod osir oa otiejus uotsE
? ossi odut ebas oãn euq é meuQ . sêcov euq od sonem uos oãn e aicnêgiletni ohnet mébmat ue saM
! airodebas a abaca es , mererrom odnauq , euq masnep e setnatropmi es-metnes sêcov , etnemlaeR «
: uednopser boJ
» . rerrom é açnarepse acinú aus a e , merartnocne o mes oigúfer ed arucorp à , sodatogse oãracif suam sO
. meganemoh ratserp ed-áh et etneg atium e onos uet o rabrutrep ári adaN
. odasnacsed rimrod siav , atlov me odnahlo , e açnarepse ret arap sovitom áh euq sáritnes , etnaifnoC
. asoidar ãhnam áres etion ad oãdirucse a e aid-oiem od loS o euq siam árahlirb adiv aut A
. sadassap saugá omoc eled odnarbmel et ós , lam od et-receuqse sáredoP
. odem mes e emrif sáratse , ahnogrev mes açebac a ratnavel sáredop oãtne
, asac aut me ejola es açitsujni a euq seraxied oãn e oditemoc serevit euq lam o it ed seratsafa es
, oãçaro me soãm sa ele arap serednetse e orecnis oãçaroc ed sueD arap seratlov et es saM
. odacitsemod recsan megavles orrub mu odnauq , otnemidnetne rahnag ed-oãh sotasnesni sO
. soçrofse sednarg ed rasicerp mes , lam o átse edno êv e soslaf so oãs meuq ebas elE
? ritsiser áredop ehl meuq , otnemagluj a avel o e méugla ednerp ele eS
! ram o euq od ogral siam e arret a euq od osnetxe siam É
? redneerpmoc o arap rezaf sáredop euQ . omsiba o euq odnuforp siam e uéc o euq otla siam É
? redop osnemi ues o odot e sueD ed oirétsim o redneerpmoc ed zapac sáreS
. edadiuqini aut ad satnoc edep et sueD euq rebas a acif E . adidneerpmoc res arap adnuforp odaisamed , airodebas ad soderges so airalever et elE
. it artnoc açnetnes aus a raicnunorp arap , arvalap a et-rigirid a sueD essof álaxO
” . it ed etnaid apluc mes uotse ; edadrev a é ogid ue euq O “ : rezid sedop
; ehnogrevne et méugnin euq mes , sortuo sod ocuop rezaf sedop , memoh mu ralac rezaf medop sosrucsid suet sO
? méugla a oãzar ád euq ralaf otium o áreS ? atsopser mes racif iav odaervalap otnat euq áreS «
: atsopser me , essid ámaaN ed rafoS
» . oãdirucse é zul a éta edno , oãsufnoc e savert ed , airbmos e argen arret
, savert sad e arbmos ad arret a arap , ratlov ed açnarepse mes , arobme ri em ed ret ed setna
, ocuop mu rirros redop ue arap , exied em e etsafa es sueD euQ ! severb oãs said suem sO
. orclupes oa odavel aires ertnev od ; oditsixe essevit oãn ue es omoc aireS
. rev a ragehc em méugnin mes , odirrom ret aidoP ? recsan etsezif em euq rop oãtnE
. azerud siam moc zev adac em-odnatart , ogimoc odari siam adnia savacif e mim artnoc roruf uet o savacifisnetnI
. mim artnoc soigídorp rezaf a savatlov e oãel mu omoc em-savarraga , açebac a essatnavel eS
. oãçilfa ed otreboc e odahlimuh erpmes , açebac a ratnavel airedop oãn mébmat , etneconi essof ue es saM ! mim ed ia , odapluc essof eS
. apluc ahnim a ragitsac mes savassap oãn e satnoc em-ridep ed saivah , essacep ue eS
. adidnocse aiedi amu sahnit oãçaroc uet od odnuf on euq ies aroga saM
. adiv me odavresnoc em-mêt sodadiuc suet so e roma moc em-etsatart e adiv a em-etseD
. elep ed e enrac ed em-etsirboc e solucsúm e sosso ed em-etseceT
. ojieuq rezaf arap , etiel ahlaoc meuq omoc , oproc uem o etsezif uT
? óp me ovon ed em-ramrofsnart siaV ! orrab o moc etsamrof em euq et-arbmeL
? riurtsed em arap et-satlov aroga e ; soãm saut sa moc etsaledom e etsairc em uT
. oãm aut ad arvil em méugnin , missa omsem , e odapluc uos oãn euq meb sebaS
? odacep uo apluc reuqlauq mim me rartnocne satnet euq é euq roP
? latrom reuqlauq euq od adiv ed sona siam , aicnêirepxe siam snet oãn euq áreS
? memoh reuqlauq ed à laugi é sasioc sa rev ed arienam aut a euq áreS
? sonalp sues so mezilaer suam so euq saxied otnauqne e etsairc em euq ut etsof odnauq , em-serazerpsed e em-serimirpo meb et-eceraP
! mim artnoc snet euq o em-zid ; senednoc em oãN : sueD a oçeP
. amla an iav em euq arugrama a rartsom uov , emuxieuq uem oa sagral rad uoV ! adiv ahnim atsed otraf uotsE «
» . oãzar ahnet oãn ue , ele arap , euq omsem , odem ret mes airalaf ue
, aitsugna em euq rorret o essabaca e retab em ed essaxied ele eS
. ortuo e mu ertne oãm a reugre e siod so ertne rartibra arap méugla essitsixe álaxO
. lanubirt a raifased e rednopser ehl ue arap , uos ue omoc , memoh mu é oãn elE
. sajus etnemlevirroh mairacif sapuor sahnim sa e amal an sairadnufa em ut
, assatop moc soãm sa essaval e oãbas moc essagerfse em euq adniA
? etnemlituni em-raçrofse êuq arap , odanednoc res uov eS
. etneconi uos euq secehnocer oãn euq ies siop , otnemirfos o etnarep oitsugna em ovon ed
, ” rirros a rednerpa e arac ed radum uov ; otnemirfos uem o receuqse uoV “ : omsem mim a ogid eS
. aserp a erbos odniac aiugá omoc , lepap ed socrab omoc mecerapased
; edadicilef a odatnemirepxe meret mes megof , atelta mu euq sodipár siam merroc said suem sO
? oãtne é meuq , zaf o euq ele é oãn eS . ragluj aived meuq a sohlo so ahcef ele e suam soa eugertne acif arret A
. etneconi od orepsesed od es-ir ele , etrom a aiemes anitneper açargsed amu eS
. odapluc o omoc etneconi o iórtsed sueD ” ! omsem o elav oduT “ : ogid , ossi roP
! adiv alep esseretni ohnet oãn áj , omsem ogimoc opucoerp em oãn áj e etneconi uotse ue saM
. apluc ret ue mes , em-agitsac e em-anednoc ele , etneconi eralced em ue euq omseM
? es-ratneserpa a agirbo o meuq , lanubirt a e ; etrof siam o é ele , açrof ed oãtseuq mE
! arugrama ed ahcne em e ogelôf ramot exied em oãn euq adnia
; sagahc sahnim sa ovitom mes etnemua e edatsepmet ad oiem od etierpse em euq omseM
. odatucse ahnit em ele euq ed azetrec a airet oãn , essednopser em ele e essamahc ue euq omseM
. ziuj uem oa aicnêmelc ridep ed ohnet e rednopser ogisnoc oãn , oãzar ahnet ue euq omseM
? ratneserpa ehl arap sotnemugra airajnarra omoC ? rednopser airedop ehl ue euq é omoC
. sohniram sortsnom so es-manilcni sép sues a ; sárta atlov oãn , atirri es sueD odnauQ
” ? rezaf a sátse euQ “ : ehl-rezid e ritsiser edop ehl meuq , asioc amugla arit eS
. ossid abecrepa em ue euq mes assap , ojev o oãn e mim rop assap elE
. atnoc mes soigídorp e sievádnosni sahlivaram zef
; lus otnev od sojirednocse so e sedaiêlP e noirO , asrU ad seõçaletsnoc sa uoirc
; odnuforp ram o erbos ahnimac e etselec adabóba a ohnizos uednetse elE
. oles mu moc salertse sa arrecne ; atnavel es oãn ele e loS oa medro amu áD
. sesab saus sa recemertse zaf e ragul ues od arret a acnarra
; odari átse odnauq , sa-iórtsed e , ossi rop rad méugnin mes , sahnatnom sa acolsed elE
? oseli racif e ritsiser ehl arap , osojaroc e oibás etnemetneicifus é meuQ
? lim ertne oãtseuq amu a rednopser edop ehl meuq , ele moc ritucsid arieuq es euq omseM
. sueD artnoc oãzar ret edop oãn memoh mu euq , missa é euq ies uE ! edadrev É «
: uocilper boJ
» . árecerapased sodavlam sessed adarom a e ahnogrev ed sotreboc oãracif lam mereuq et euq sO
. otnematnetnoc ed sotirg rad sassop euq moc rezaf e airgela ed et-rehcne adnia edop sueD
. lam o mezaf euq sod oãm a ednerp men otsenoh é euq eleuqa atiejer oãn sueD saM
. etnerefid erovrá artuo ecsan arret ad e adiv ergela aus a animret missA
. ” iv et acnuN “ : odnezid , al-ágener ed-áh etse , ragul ues od macnarra a es saM
. asac ad sorum soa es-marraga e sardep sa ertne rop es-mednetse sezíar saus sA
. latniuq o erbos somar sues so ahlapse e los oa etsiser euq , etnajedrev erovrá omoc oãS
. ép ed atneuga es oãn ale a arraga es es , etsiser oãn ale , asac aus à atsocne es eS
. ahnara ed aiet amun açnarepse aus a eõp oçidarbeuq oif mud assap oãn aifnoc euq me oliuqA
. leifni é meuq ed saçnarepse sa mabaca missa , sueD ed meceuqse es euq sod onitsed o é esse sioP
. odacnarra e odairc ratse ed setna omsem , satnalp sartuo euq asserped siam airaceS
? augá revuoh oãn edno ocnuj o uo onatnâp od arof recserc edop oripap o euq áreS
. aicnêirepxe aus ad sadarit sedadrev sa et-ranisne e et-riurtsni ed-oãh sele saM
. arret a erbos arbmos aneuqep amu é adiv asson a ; adnia somebas adan e metno somecsan ós sóN
. sodassapetna sues sod onisne on etcelfer e sadassap seõçareg sà ratnugrep iaV
. arepse et euq osohlivaram orutuf o moc odarapmoc , aicnâtropmi acuop áret odassap uet O
. secerem euq arienam ad árasnepmoc et e it ed áradiuc otreced ele , otsuj e otsenoh serof es
, osoredop-odot sueD oa oãdrep seridep arap , odec ãhnam ed satnavel et ut es saM
. odacep ues od saicnêuqesnoc sa ragap sol-êf ele e sueD artnoc satlaf oditemoc ret meved sohlif suet sO
? etneconi é meuq ecehnocer oãn e açitsuj a ecrotsid osoredop-odot sueD o euq áreS
! lavadnev mu omoc oãs sarvalap saut sA ? arienam assed ralaf siav odnauq étA «
: uocilper auhC ed dadliB
» . sartnocne em oãn , serarucorp em oãtne es , e orclupes on ieratse everb mE ? apluc ahnim a recerapased sezaf oãn e odacep uem o ut saodrep oãn euq roP
? omissítla sueD ó , it arap osep mu ienrot em euq áreS ? ovla uet arap etsehlocse em euq roP ? edadinamuH ad ziuj ó , it artnoc ue zif lam euQ
? avilas a rilogne saxied em reuqes men e rahlo o mim ed saivsed oãn euq é euq roP
? avorp à seõp o etnemaunitnoc e said so sodot ratsiver snev o euq roP
? oãçneta aut a elen seraxif arap , aicnâtropmi serad ehl arap memoh mu é euQ
! oãsuli amu ed massap oãn said suem so euq , em-axied ; erpmes arap reviv ossop oãN
. oteleuqse levírroh uem etse moc reviv a odalugnartse rerrom aireferp ue euq odom ed
, odem metem em euq sasioc rev em-sezaf , soledasep moc em-sazirorreta ut saM
. saxieuq sahnim sa airaivila ossi euq , odagessos airatse , essatied em es , euq iesnep adniA
? mim artnoc adraug ed serop et arap , ohniram ortsnom ortuo uo ram o ue iereS
. arugrama ahnim a recehnoc a ierad , emirpo em euq aitsúgna ad ieralaf ; ralaf ed raxied uov oãn , ossi roP
. árecehnocer o siam acnun adarom aus a e asac aus à siam asserger oãN
. ribus a atlov oãn orclupes oa ecsed euq o mébmat , ecerapased e zafsed es euq mevun omoC
. uoliuqina em e mim erbos uiac rahlo uet o euqrop , rev em ed áraxied mim arap rahlo meuQ
. edadicilef a rev a ieratlov siam acnun e otnev o omoc é adiv ahnim a euq ed et-arbmeL
. açnarepse reuqlauq mes mif oa magehc e ariedaçnal amu euq sodipár siam massap said suem sO
. satnelurup sagahc ed aiehc , elep ahnim a , óp e semrev ed otreboc átse oproc uem O
. ãhnam ed éta satlov rad ed em-otraf e agnol é etion A ” ? em-ratnavel ieriugesnoc odnauQ “ : osnep , otied em odnauQ
. otnemirfos ed setion e setion marof mared em euq o , oãv me rarepse a sesem marof ebuoc em euq etros A
. agap alep aiesna , odairalassa mu omoc , arbmos alep aripsus , ovarcse mu omoC
. odairalassa mu ed soa setnahlemes oãs said sues so , oçivres orud rirpmuc a arret an átse memoh O «
» ? edadrev a ropxe ies oãn ue euq áreS ? aritnem áh sarvalap sahnim san euq áres
: aicnêconi ahnim a asuac me átse euq , zev amu siam , otnemignif mes e , rovaf rop , zev amu siaM
. arac assov an ritnem a uotse oãn euq majeV ! rovaf rop , mim arap mehlo saM
. sogima sossov sod mu éta rednev ed e sodad soa oãfró mu ragoj ed sezapac maires sêcoV
! otnev o omoc oãs odarepsesed mu ed sarvalap sa saM ? sarvalap sahnim sa racitirc arutnevrop mereuQ
? riref aidop em ossov osiva mu euq é omoC ? arud res aidop ariedadrev arvalap amu euq é omoC
. ierre ue euq é euq me em-mertsom ; oicnêlis me rivuo oreuq ue euq em-maurtsnI
? serosserpo sod messatagser em uo ogimini od messatrebil em euq
, azeuqir assov ad etrap messed em euq sov-ideP ? asioc amugla arutnevrop sov-ideP
. odem ed soiehc maracif e selam suem so mariv ; adan ed marelav oãn em sêcov mébmaT
. sodatnopased es-metnes es-meramixorpa oa ; sadidulised macif saçnarepse saus sa sam
, arucorp aus à oãv ábaS ed setnajaiv so , ol-irbocsed marucorp ámeT ed sanavarac sA
. es-medrep e ortned otresed olep martne , ohnimac ues od es-maivsed sanavarac sa , ossi roP
. etnematelpmoc mecerapased , rolac o moc , e maxiab sele , eceuqa opmet o odnauq sam
, even ad e oleged od sotser so moc radrobsnart a soiehc merroc , oriemirP
. augá mes uocif euq oriebir mu omoc , em-maranagne sogima suem so saM
. osoredoP-odoT od romet o anodnaba , aidróciresim a ogima ues oa asucer meuQ
. ecnacla uem od arof átse ossecus o ; sosrucer siam mim me ohnet oãn áJ
? eznorb ed otief é oproc uem o euq áreS ? sardep sad aicnêtsiser a ohnet euq áreS
? aicnêicap ret arap , ue orepse orutuf euQ ? ritsiser arap matser em saçrof euQ
. otnas sueD od sarvalap sa odagener ret oãn rop , airgela ed airatlas , edadeip mes odarutrot omsem ; otrofnoc adnia airet ue , missa omseM
! essíurtsed em e oãçcetorp aus a essariter em euq , em-ragamse essangid es sueD euq
: ojesed uem etse essazilaer e odidep mu a essednopser em sueD euq aireuq óS
. adagartse adimoc essof es omoc é , mim arap ; sehl-racot a overta em euq ue uos oãN
? odipísni ogla me otsog artnocne meuq , las mes adimoc amu atropus euq é meuq saM
? adimoc aus ad etnaid egum iob o uo avre aus ad etnaid arruz megavles orrub o euq áreS
. sievírret selam mim artnoc uoedacnesed sueD ; onenev ues o ratropus ed evit e mim artnoc es-maratlov osoredoP-odoT od sahcelf sA
! malortnocsed es sarvalap sahnim sa , ossi roP . ram od aiera a euq adasep siam é euq airev
, açnalab amun açargsed ahnim a etnematnuj racoloc e ranep uem o rasep essesiuq méugla eS «
: uednopser boJ
» . atnoc me on-met e oãçneta , otnatrop , atserP . odavorp e otrec omoc somet euq otsi É
. airpórp arutla an , orudam ogirt ed exief mu omoc , saçrof sa odidrep ret mes orclupes oa sárecseD
. opmac od avre an sotneber so omoc sotnat oãres setnednecsed suet so euq ed azetrec a sáreT
. atlaf et adan snegatsap saut san euq e açnaruges me átse asac aut a euq sárev oãtnE
. zap me oã-et-raxied snegavles siamina so e opmac od sardep sa moc açnaila sáraF
. snegavles saref sa sáremet oãn e emof ad e açargsed ad et-rir sáredoP
. açargsed amuhnen ed etnaid odem sáret oãn e saugníl sám salep odatioça sajes euq ativE
. adapse ad et-arvil arreug an e etrom ad et-avlas , emof ed opmet mE
. árignita et lam muhnen e seõçilfa satium ed et-arvil sueD
. aruc a ád omsem ele , zaf euq eplog o arap e atart a omsem ele , adiref amu zaf sueD es sioP
. osoredoP-odoT od ogitsac o azerpsed oãn e ajirroc o sueD euq atieca euq memoh o zileF
. acob a ralac ed mêt sosonimirc so otnauqne , açnarepse ed sovitom áh socarf so araP
. setnetoperp sod redop od e augníl ad , adaifa adapse ad erbop o sueD avlas missA
. etion ed omoc saledaplapa sà oãradna , aid-oiem oa e , oãdirucse oãrahca ós , aid eD
. arret rop meac sosrevrep sonalp sues so e azetrepse aus an sotrepse so ahnapA
. odidneterp odatluser o meugesnoc oãn e sosoicutsa sod sonalp so zafsed
; sotilfa soa açnaruges ád e sedlimuh so ratnavel zaf
; sopmac so rager arap augá a adnam , arret à avuhc a áD
. atnoc mêt oãn euq soigídorp e sievádnosni sahlivaram zaf elE
. seõçapucoerp sahnim sa ehl-avatnoc e sueD arap em-avatlov , ue essof eS
. ra olep odnaov e ogof od ratlas a sahletnec omoc , airésim a ecsan euq memoh oirpórp od É
. oãhc od atorb airésim a men arret ad ecsan oãn açitsujni a sioP
” . azeuqir aus ad meredopa es sosoicnanag so euq ; sohnipse ed ebes ad rasepa , adabuor ajes ehl e sodaemofse solep adaroved ajes atiehloc aus a euQ
. adnefed so euq méugnin mes , edadic ad atrop à , lanubirt on sodatartlam majes e aduja mes meuqif sohlif sues so euQ “
: ailímaf aus a ogol ieoçidlama sam , rarepsorp a otasnesni mu iv áJ
. odanednoc átse ossi rop e osojevni é etnarongi o ; ossid asuac rop errom e es-atlover otasnesni O
? ratlov siav et sotnas sod lauq araP ! ednopser et méugla es rev arap , atirG «
» . airodebas a meraçnacla mes merrom sele e adnet aus ad sadroc sa marbeuq es euq siE
. erpmes arap mecerapased , ossi rop êd es euq meS ? sodaçadepsed oãs aid mu ed oçapse on e
óp on sodahlugrem meviv e arret an adarom aus a mêt euq so rodairc ues od etnaid sopmil oãratse omoc sioP
. otiefed artnocne soriegasnem sues son e açnaifnocsed ed sovitom met ele sovres sues sod étA
” ? rodairc ues , sueD ed oãinipo a artnoc orup uo etneconi raralced edop es memoh mu euq áreS “
: rezid a zov amu ivuo sioped saM . oicnêlis me , mim ed etnaid megami amu omoc are ; icehnocer o oãn sam , etnerf ahnim an avatsE
. ép me maresup es solebac suem so sodot e otsor uem on uetab otnev O
. odem ed uisnart es oproc uem o odot , rorret o mim erbos uiaC
. edadinamuH a erbos iac onos o odnauq , anrutcon oãsiv amun , ohnos mun
, odivuo uem on uortne oirúmrum evaus omoc ; megasnem amu oderges me ibeceR
. setnarre madna setohlif sues so e mahnifed seõel so , saserp saus sa meS
. sodarbeuq oãs seõel sod setned so saM . lacahc ed sotirg e odrapoel ed sodigur oãS
. ari aus ad roruf olep sodíurtsed mabaca sele , sueD ed orpos selpmis mu moC
. rehlocer iav euq o omsem ossi é oãsserpo aiemes e edadlam atnalp meuq euq iv ue sioP
? açargsed à ribmucus atsenoh aossep amugla uo etneconi mugla ed osaca rop et-sarbmeL
? açnarepse ád et otnematropmoc mob uet o men , megaroc ád oãn edadeip aut a euq áreS
. odazirorreta sacif , egnita et odnauq ; satneuga oãn , it a acot et odnauq saM
. ép ed mavatneuga oãn es euq soa açnaruges e mavaelabmac euq soa azemrif mavad sarvalap saut sA
. sadiceuqarfne soãm sà açrof etsed e sotium a etsanisne ut euq edadrev É
? sarvalap sa retnoc aroga airiugesnoc meuq E ? rivuo o ed zapac sáres , arvalap a egirid et méugla eS «
: oãtne essid nameT ed zafilE
» . sotlasserbos ertne , osnacsed mes oviv ; osuoper men ogessos ohnet oãN
. em-uecetnoca avazirorreta em euq o , mim erbos uiac aimet otnat ue euq oliuqA
. rebeb arap augá ed zev me sodimeg em-mevres ; samirgál mecerapa em ós , adimoc ed zev mE
? ohnimac ues o arap oditnes êv oãn áj euq memoh oa adías amu agen sueD euq é euq roP
! orclupes o etnemlanif meraçnacla rop sotiefsitas e setnetnoc oãt mairaciF
. odidnocse oruoset mu euq od siam an-marucorp e mev oãn euq etrom alep marepse sessE
? adarugrama amla a met meuq a adiv e , odaçargsed mu a zul ád ele euq é euq roP
. sonod sues sod ervil acif ovarcse o e oneuqep o e ednarg o oãtse ilA
. rosserpo od zov a rivuo mes , masuoper sorienoisirp so sodot ilA
. etnemlanif masnacsed sodatogse madna euq so e lam siam mezaf oãn áj suam so , orclupes oN
. aid o rev a uogehc oãn euq otef omoc , arretne es euq otroba mu omoc odis ret ared em meuQ
. soicálap sues so atarp ed marehcne euq , oruo me socir sepicnírp so moc uo
, sotnemunom semrone is arap maríurtsnoc euq , odatse ed snemoh sednarg e sier moc otnuj
, etnemaliuqnart rimrod a ejoh airatse ; rasnacsed a odatied aroga airatse uE
? ramam ue arap otiep o mared em e oçager on marehloca em euq é euq roP
? onretam ertnev od rias oa ogol odnaripxe , recsan oa irrom oãn ue euq é euq roP
. airésim atnat rev a essagehc ue euq odnative , ertnev od adías a odahcef ret em oãn rop
, arorua ad soiar so rev a meugehc oãn e aid od zul alep oãv me merepse sale euq , maçerucse ãhnam ad salertse saus sa euQ
. ohniram ortsnom o rarujnocse me siebáh oãs euq so , onaeco o maoçidlama euq so maçafsed a euQ
. airgela ed sotirg alen siam maçuo es oãn e lirétse adaralced ajes etion asse euQ
. sesem sod oremún on ertne men oirádnelac on siam açerapa oãn ale euq odom ed , etion aleuqa menimod savert sa euQ
. rorret o ahlapse euq loS od espilce mu omoc , argen mevun lauq avlovne o e eled eredopa es airbmos siam oãdirucse a euQ
! ranimuli ahnev oãn o zul a euq e eled radiuc ed exied , otla od ál , sueD euq ; oãdirucse me emrofsnart es aid esse euQ
” ! zapar mu É “ : essid es euq me etion a , icsan euq me aid o açerapaseD «
: uomalcxe , arvalap a odnamot , e
adiv aus a raoçidlama arap , ralaf uidiced boJ , said etes sod mif oA













. otnemirfos ues o emrone are euq maiv siop , setion etes e said etes , arvalap amu rigirid ehl seled muhnen mes , oãhc on sodatnes ele moc maracif missa E
. azetsirt ed lanis me , saçebac saus sad amic rop aznic mararita e apac aus a uogsar , atla zov me rarohc a , seled mu adac E . maicehnocer o men , egnol ed mariv o odnauQ
. otrofnoc ed e edazima ed ocuop mu boJ a ravel sotnuj ri maranibmoc e asac aus ed mu adac maríaS . ámaaN ed rafoS e auhC ed dadliB , nameT ed zafilE : marE . ele erbos odíac mahnit euq saçargsed sa sadot ed ralaf marivuo boJ ed sogima sêrT
. sueD artnoc avisnefo arvalap amu avaicnunorp oãn boJ , otsi odut ed rasepa E » ? lam o mébmat rebecer ed somevah oãn euq rop , sueD ed oãm ad meb o somebecer eS ! reuqlauq etnarongi amu omoc ralaf a sátsE « : ehl-aidnopser boJ saM
» ! zev amu ed errom e sueD a aoçidlamA ? oãditcer aut an emrif saunitnoc adniA « : ehl-aizid boJ ed rehlum A
. arret ad óp on odatnes , elep aus a avapsar ele moc e ocac mun uorraga boJ
. açebac à sép so edsed , sievírroh sagahc ed esserfos boJ euq moc zef e ROHNES od otnuj ed es-uoriter ãtaS
» . adiv a ehl-apuop saM . oãçisopsid aut à snet o íA « : ehl-uednopser ROHNES O
» . etnerf aut an omsem , aoçidlama et oãn ele es sárev e oproc ues on e sosso sues son açneod a arfos ele euq moc zaf ; ele artnoc oãm aut a ratnavel atnemirepxe saM
! adiv aus a ravlas redop arap , elep airpórp aus a éta e met euq o odut rad ed zapac é memoh mU « : ROHNES oa uocilper ãtaS
» ! oãditcer aus an emrif aunitnoc elE . oãv me iof sam essaniurra o ue euq moc rezaf etsedneterp uT ! lam ed adan zaf oãn e osoigiler otium , otsenoh e mob memoh mu É ! odnum on ele omoc ortuo áh oãN ? boJ ovres uem on etsaraper oãN « : ehl-uotnugrep ROHNES o oãtnE
» . arret alep satlov samu rad e raessap iuF « : ovon ed uednopser ãtaS E » ? snev ednoD « : ãtaS a ovon ed uotnugrep ROHNES O
. ROHNES od etnaid sele moc zev amu siam es-uotneserpa ãtaS , ROHNES od etnaid meratneserpa es setselec seres so ed aid o odagehC
. ele artnoc otsetorp ed arvalap amuhnen essid men sueD a uednefo oãn boJ , otsi odut ed rasepa E
» ! odavuol ajes ROHNES o euQ . uorit om sueD , ued om sueD . arret ad oies oa ratlov ed-ieh un e eãm ahnim ad ertnev od un ías uE « : odnezid
, oãçaroda me arret rop es-uonilcni e olebac o uopar , otul ed lanis me apac aus a uogsar , es-uotnavel boJ
» . aicíton a rad riv et arap , rapacse iugesnoc ue óS . sodot a so-odnatam e riac a-odnezaf , asac ad sotnac ortauq so artnoc uetab , otresed od sodal sod uorpos etrof otium otnev mu , etneper ed , e
ohlev siam oãmri od asac me atsef rezaf a mavatse sahlif saut sa e sohlif suet sO « : essid euq , ortuo odagehc ahnit áj e ralaf ed odabaca ahnit oãn eleuqa adniA
» . aicíton a rad riv et arap , rapacse iugesnoc ue óS . adapse à sovres suet so maratam e ogisnoc son-maravel , solemac so maracata suedlac sadamón ed sopurg sêrT « : essid euq ortuo odagehc ahnit áj e ralaf ed odabaca ahnit oãn etse adniA
» . aicíton a rad riv et arap , rapacse iugesnoc ue óS . odut uiurtsed e , sovres suet so erbos e ohnaber o erbos , uéc od uiac emrone acsíaf amU « : essid euq , ortuo odagehc ahnit áj e ralaf ed odabaca ahnit oãn etse adniA
» . aicíton a rad riv et arap , rapacse iugesnoc ue óS . sovres suet so adapse à maratam e siamina so ogisnoc maravel euq , suebas sadamón snu marecerapa otsin e
ilad otrep ratsap a sarrub sa e rarval a mavadna sacav sA « : boJ a rezid iof oriegasnem mu
, ohlev siam oãmri od asac me atsef rezaf a mavatse boJ ed sahlif e sohlif so odnauq , odacram aid oN
. ROHNES od otnuj ed es-uoriter ãtaS , otsid siopeD » . racot sedop oãn omsem elen sam , oãçisopsid aut à átse ecnetrep ehl euq o oduT « : ãtaS a essid ROHNES O
» . etnerf aut an omsem , aoçidlama et oãn ele es sárev e ues é euq oliuqa artnoc oãm a ratnavel atnemirepxe saM
? síap o odot rop etnememrone marecserc sohnaber sues so euq odom lat ed , sohlabart sues so sodot etsaoçneba euq edadrev é oãN ? ecnetrep ehl euq o odut a e ailímaf aus à , ele a , sodal so sodot ed segetorp o ut , acrec amu omoc lat , euq edadrev é oãN
? sodasseretnised oãs sosoigiler sotnemitnes sues so euq sahcA « : ROHNES oa uednopser ãtaS
» ! lam ed adan zaf oãn e osoigiler otium , otsenoh e mob memoh mu É ! odnum on ele omoc ortuo áh oãN ? boJ ovres uem on etsaraper oãN « : ehl-uotnugrep ROHNES o oãtnE
» . arret alep satlov samu rad e raessap iuF « : uednopser elE » ? aroga snev ednoD « : ãtaS a uotnugrep ROHNES O
. sele moc ál etnemlaugi es-avartnocne ãtaS rodasuca o , ROHNES od etnaid mavatneserpa es setselec seres so sodot euq me aid otreC
. mainuer es sele euq sezev sa sadot ed boJ aizaf missa E » . otnemasnep uam mu rop sueD a odnednefo , atlaf reuqlauq oditemoc mahnet sohlif suem so euq recetnoca edoP « : ogisnoc avasnep boJ , otcaf eD . seled mu adac ed emon me , oicífircas me siamina aicerefo e odec es-avatnavel , aid ortuo oN . etnemetneinevnoc messaraperp es euq sehl-aidep e , said seleuqa sodassap , ramahc so-avadnam boJ , atsef amu maizaf sele euq sezev sa sadot saM
. sele moc seteuqnab soa meri arap , sãmri sêrt saus sa mébmat mavadivnoc e , seteuqnab merezaf arap , soãmri sod mu adac ed asac me zev amu , es-rinuer mavamutsoc sohlif sues sO
. etneirO od so sodot ertne ocir siam memoh o , otcaf ed , are elE . siaçivres ed oremún ednarg mu adnia ahniT . sarrub satnehniuq e siob ed satnuj satnehniuq , solemac lim sêrt e sahlevo lim etes : sohnaber sotium aíussop e
sahlif sêrt e sohlif etes ahnit boJ
. lam ed adan aizaf oãn e osoigiler otium , otsenoh e mob memoh mu arE . ecU ed arret an aiviv euq , boJ odamahc memoh mu aivaH












































































































. setnednecsed sues sod ratse-meb olep uotul e ovop ues od meb o uorucorP . sueduj so sodot rop odamitse e odarnoh iof e sexreX ier od sioped oriemirp o are ueuqodraM ueduj o , etnemlaeR
. sasreP sod e sodeM sod sieR sod sacinórC sad orviL on odataler átse ossi odut , ueuqodraM uovele euq a azednarg ad seronemrop so e zef ele euq sasioc sasohlivaram e sednarg sa sadoT
. sahli sad e etnenitnoc od sotidbús so sodot a otubirt mu sôpmi sexreX ier O
. orvil mun otircse iof odut E . miruP ed atsef a rarbelec ed arienam a uomrifnoc retsE ed medro A
. seõçatnemal e snujej sod aicnâvresbo à savitaler sasioc samugla siam mavatnecserca E . odatpoda mahnit soirpórp sele omoc lat e odadnam mahnit retsE e ueuqodraM omoc lat , setnednecsed sues so e sele , sadaxif satad san miruP ed satsef sa messavresbo euq sehl-avadnemocer e
sueduj so sodot a açnaruges e zap avajeseD . asrep oirépmi od saicnívorp etes e etniv e otnec sad amu adac a , saipóc sadaivne odnes , sueduj so sodot a adigirid are atrac A
. miruP ed atsef ad acreca , ariemirp an odanedro iof euq o odnamrifnoc e odnitsisni , atrac adnuges amu marevercse ueuqodraM ueduj o e , liaibA ed ahlif , retsE ahniar A
. setnednecsed sues e sueduj solep sodiceuqse meres siam acnun arap , miruP ed said so ravresbo e raromemoc maireved es , edadic adac me e aicnívorp adac me , ailímaf adac me , sarutuf seõçareg sa sadot me , euq odivloser ioF
. seõçurtsni saus san , ueuqodraM rop odicelebatse arof emrofnoc , sadacidni satad san , said siod setse erpmes arap e ona adac rarbelec a mairassap , omsíaduj oa essetrevnoc es euq reuq meuq e setnednecsed sues so , sele euq marecelebatse sueduj so
, uecetnoca sehl euq o odut rop e ueuqodraM ed atrac ad asuac roP . ruP ed larulp o é euq , miruP amahc es said seleuqà euq ossi rop É
. sodacrofne marof sohlif sues so e ele E . sueduj so arap odaenalp ahnit euq onitsed o esserfos namaH euq otircse rop uonedro etse e ier od etnaid es-uotneserpa retsE saM
. sol-ánimretxe are onalp ues o siop , ratam so arap aid o raxif arap , miruP , é otsi , setros odatied ahnit , ueduj ovop od ogimini e gagA ed etnednecsed , atademaH ed ohlif , namaH
. etnemlauna atsef aleuqa rarbelec a odnassap , ueuqodraM ed seõçacidni sa mariuges sueduj so missA
. serbop so arap satrefo e setneserp ed acort , seteuqnab moc , atsef e airgela me maretrevnoc es otul o e azetsirt a euq me sêm o iof etsE . sogimini sues sod maratrebil es sueduj so euq said sessen ioF
. sovitsef said omoc sadavresbo messof sona so sodot ed radA ed ezniuq e ezrotac ed satad sa , etnaid me íad , euq odnaterced
, sexreX ed oirépmi o odot me , egnol ed e otrep ed sueduj so sodot a satrac uoivne e sotnemicetnoca setse uevercse ueuqodraM
. setneserp ed acort e seteuqnab , airgela moc radA ed sêm od ezrotac aid o marbelec aicnívorp an meviv euq sueduj so , ossi roP
. airgela e atsef ed aid mu atad assed marezif e ezniuq aid on marasuoper sanepa , ezrotac aid on e ezert said son maratnuj es euq , asuS ed sueduj so saM
. ojizoger e atsef ed aid mu atad assed marezif e marasuoper ezrotac aid oN . radA ed sêm od ezert aid on uossap es euq o ioF
. sneb sues sod mararedopa es oãn saM . mavaido so euq seleuqa ertned lim ocnic e atnetes odnatam , sogimini sues sod es-odnaçarabmesed , marednefed e marazinagro es mébmat saicnívorp san maiviv euq sueduj sO
. sneb sues sod mararedopa es oãn saM . edadic ad saossep satnezert ed siam odnanimretxe , radA ed sêm od ezrotac aid on ovon ed es-marinuer asuS ed sueduj sO
. acrof an sodarudnep marof namaH ed sohlif zed sod soproc so E . essezif es missa euq asuS me odacilbup oterced mu ed oiem rop uonedro ier O
» . namaH ed sohlif zed sod soproc so acrof an sodarudnep majes E . uitimrep sehl ejoh oterced o euq oliuqa ãhnama merezaf asuS ed sueduj soa es-adecnoc , edatsejaM assoV a meb recerap eS « : uednopser retsE
» . odidecnoc áres et ridep adnia seresiuq euq o oduT ? aroga sedneterp euQ ! saicnívorp san otief oãret oãn euq O . namaH ed sohlif zed so odniulcni , saossep satnehniuq maratam sueduj so asuS me óS « : retsE ahniar à oãtne essid elE
. asuS me satrom saossep sad oremún o ier oa recehnoc a mared , aid omsem eleuqaN



. sneb sues sod mararedopa es oãn saM . ataziaV e iadirA , iasirA , atsamraP , atadirA , ailadA , ataroP , atapsA , noflaD , atadnahcraP : sueduj sod ogimini o , atademaH ed ohlif , namaH ed sohlif zed so es-mavatnoc sotrom so ertnE
. saossep satnehniuq maratam , asuS , latipac an óS
. maresiuq sele euq so sodot odnaliuqina e so-odnamizid , adapse à sogimini sues so maratam sueduj sO
. aid arap aid ed avatnemua redop ues o euq e oicálap on osoredop are ueuqodraM euq oirépmi o odot me es-aibaS
. ueuqodraM ed odem moc , sueduj sod oditrap o maramot — soiránoicnuf sotla e serodanrevog , sapartás — siaicnivorp sedadirotua sa sadot , oirártnoc oleP
. sele artnoc uotlov es méugnin e odem evet oãçalupop a méroP . sol-ácata essarucorp meuq artnoc merigaer arap , sexreX ed oirépmi od saicnívorp sa sadot me , sedadic saus san es-marazinagro sueduj sO
. sogimini sues so maranimod euq sueduj so marof sam ; amic me sehl-riac mavarepse sueduj sod sogimini sO . rogiv me rartne aived oterced o euq me aid , radA ed ezert aid o uogehC
. seled odem moc , sueduj soa marinu es euq sotium evuoh seõçalupop sa ertne étA . airgela ednarg e seteuqnab moc otnemicetnoca o mavajetsef sueduj so , laer oterced o odnagehc ai ednoa , saicnívorp e sedadic sa sadot mE
. oãçafsitas e ojizoger , airgela emrone evuoh sueduj so ertnE
. airgela ed avarbiv asuS ed edadic a E . oruo ed aoroc amissíuqir amu e aruprúp e ohnil ed otnam mu moc , ocnarb e luza me siaer setsev moc oicálap od uias ueuqodraM , otsid siopeD
. asuS me odacilbup iof oterced etsE . sodihlocse siaer solavac son sodatnom , asserp a adot a maritrap soirássime so , ier od medro roP
. aid eleuqan sogimini sues sod meragniv es arap sodaraperp messevitse sueduj so euq arap , oterced o odacilbup iof saicnívorp sa sadot mE
. sêm odnuges omicéd o é euq , radA ed ezert aid omsem on , asrep oirépmi o odot me rogiv me avartne oterced O
. sneb sues sod raredopa es ed otierid o moc adnia mavaciF . saçnairc e serehlum odniulcni , essaçaema so euq síap uo ovop , açrof reuqlauq riurtsed e ratam , rileper maidoP . merednefed es ed e merinuer es ed otierid o , sedadic sa sadot ed sueduj soa mairefnoc satrac sA
. siaer solubátse son sodihlocse , sodipár solavac me sodatnom soirássime rop sadavel adiuges me odnes , laer oles o moc sadales e sexreX ier od emon me satircse marof satrac sA
. sueduj sod a odniulcni , saugníl e satircse setnerefid saus sa atnoc me odnet , aipóitE à éta aidnÍ a edsed , saicnívorp etes e etniv e otnec sad sefehc soa e serodanrevog soa , sapartás soa , sueduj soa sadanitsed satrac uotid ueuqodraM . naviS ed sêm o , sêm oriecret od sêrt e etniv aid o arE . ier od soiráterces so sodamahc oãtne maroF
» . adagover res áredop oãn , adales mim rop e emon uem me atircse rof es , siop , lena uem od oles o ehl-mahnop e , ier od emon me , rohlem recerap sov omoc , sueduj sod rovaf a oãçamalcorp amu aroga mavercsE
. sueduj so artnoc raripsnoc rop racrofne iednam meuq a , namaH ed sneb so retsE a ied , meêv omoC « : ueuqodraM ueduj oa e retsE ahniar à oãtne uednopser sexreX ier O
» ? etneg ahnim ad oinímretxe o ratropus ue airedop omoC ? ovop uem o raçaema a átse euq açargsed a ratropus ue ossop omoC
. oirépmi od saicnívorp sa sadot ed sueduj so sodanimretxe meres arap uevercse namaH euq satrac sa oterced mu rop sadaluna majes euq , amitse aus a recerem ue es e edatsejaM assoV ed odarga od rof eS «
: essid e es-uotnavel ale e oruo ed ortpec o ehl-uednetse ier O
. sueduj so artnoc odaraperp ahnit , gagA ed etnednecsed , namaH euq ongilam onalp oa omret essesup euq ehl-uocilpus , sohlo son samirgál moc sép sues a es-odnahleoja , e ier od açneserp à ovon ed uotlov retsE
. namaH ed sneb sod atnoc ramot ed ueuqodraM uogerracne retsE E . ueuqodraM a o-uogertne e , namaH a odariter ahnit áj euq , lena ues on uogep ier O
. ier od açneserp à osseca ret a uossap ele ossi rop e ueuqodraM moc ocsetnerap ues o ier oa uolever retsE . sueduj sod ogimini o , namaH ed sneb so sodot retsE ahniar à ued sexreX ier o , aid omsem eleuqaN
. uomlaca ier od ari a E . ueuqodraM arap odaraperp ahnit euq acrof an uerrom namaH missa E
» ! acrof assen namaH meuqrofnE « : uomalcxe ier o oãtnE » . edatsejaM assoV ed adiv a aicnúned aus a moc uovlas euq , ueuqodraM racrofne arap , asac aus à otnuj , arutla ed sortem etniv ed siam ed acrof amu zef éta namaH « : essid , anobraH odamahc , seled mu oãtnE
. namaH ed otsor o marirboc sadraug so , sarvalap satse rireforp ed uobaca ier o laM » ? asac airpórp ahnim an ahniar a raloiv reuq adnia , zef euq od méla , memoh etsE « : uomalcxe e retsE ahniar a avartnocne es edno áfos o erbos odanilcni namaH moc ued , eteuqnab od alas a arap uotlov ier o odnauQ
. adiv a essavlas ehl euq rarolpmi ehl arap , ahniar ad otnuj uecenamrep ossi rop e ahniar ad e ier od etnaid açargsed latot me odíac ahnit euq uedneerpmoc namaH . oicálap od snidraj so arap es-uigirid e alas a uoxied , odazirelocne es-uotnavel ier O
. ahniar ad e ier od etnaid odazirorreta uocif namaH » . namaH odavlam o é rosserpo e ogimini essE « : uednopser retsE
» ? memoh esse átse ednO ? asioc lat rezaf a everta es meuQ « : ehl-uotnugrep ier o otsi etnareP
» . ier od sesseretni so racidujerp airi oãn açargsed asse siop , adan aizid men ue sovarcse omoc merednev son arap ós essof eS . meríurtsed e meranimretxe , meratam son arap , sodidnev somof ovop uem o e ue euq É
. odidep uem o etse arE . ovop uem od a e adiv ahnim a epuop euq oçep , ojesed uem oa redeca meb rahca es e edatsejaM assoV ed amitse a oçerem eS « : uednopser retsE ahniar a oãtnE
» . oirépmi uem od edatem ajes euq adnia , ierad ot ue e sedneterp euq o ziD « : retsE ahniar à etnemavon uotnugrep ier o eteuqnab odnuges etsen E
. retsE ed eteuqnab oa , siop , marof namaH e ier O
. odaraperp ahnit retsE euq eteuqnab oa namaH rizudnoc a marasserpa es euq , oicálap od socunue so maragehc , mavalaf otnauqnE
» . eled soãm san riac siav euq azetrec eD . recnev sáriugesnoc o oãn , ueduj é ele eS . ueuqodraM a oãçaler me redrep a raçemoc a sátsE « : on-marineverp setneirepxe sogima sues so e ale oãtnE . odicetnoca ahnit ehl euq o odut sogima sues soa e , rehlum aus , sereZ a uotnoC
. ahnogrev ed otsor o odnirboc e etsirt , asac arap ratlov a es-uosserpa namaH e oicálap on otsop ues o arap uotlov ueuqodraM , otsid siopeD
» . raeganemoh ajesed meuq a eleuqa arienam atsed asnepmocer edatsejaM auS « : eled etnaid odnamalcorp , edadic ad saur salep o-uohnapmoca namaH e olavac a uotnom ueuqodraM adiuges mE . ueuqodraM uitsev e olavac o e setsev sa uomot namaH missA
» . etsessid euq od adan rezaf ed sexied oãN . oicálap od oiránoicnuf , ueuqodraM ueduj o etsessid euq odom od atart e , olavac o e setsev sa racsub asserped iaV « : namaH a oãtne essid ier O
» ” . raeganemoh ajesed meuq a eleuqa arienam atsed asnepmocer edatsejaM auS “ : atla zov me amalcorp otnauqne , edadic ad saur salep olavac a rahnapmoca o ed e memoh esse ritsev ed eugerracne es ier od sortsinim sod mu euq , adiuges mE
. açebac an adacoloc ajes ehl laer aoroc a euq e laer olavac mun metnom o , siaer setsev sa matsiv ehl euq arap medro rad eved edatsejaM assoV
, memoh esse raeganemoh araP « : uednopser , ossi roP
» ? mim a oãn es , laicepse arienam ed raeganemoh rereuq ier o áredop meuQ « : ogisnoc arap essid namaH oãtnE » ? raeganemoh ajesed ier o euq méugla a rezaf eved es euq é euQ « : ehl-uotnugrep ier o e uortne namaH
. ier o uonedrO — » . ertne euQ « » . arepse à arof ál átse namaH « : marednopser soãsetroc so , ossi roP
. odaraperp ahnit ehl euq acrof an ueuqodraM racrofne arap oãçazirotua ier oa ridep ed oãçnetni a moc odartne otnatertne ahnit namaH » ? oicálap on méugla áH « : ratnugrep a uotlov ier o oãtnE
. atsopser a ioF — » . zef es adaN « » ? oçivres esse rop ueuqodraM rasnepmocer e recedarga arap zef es euq é euQ « : uotnugrep ier o E
. sexreX ratam mavaenalp euq , siaer sotnesopa sod sadraug , ier od socunue siod so , sereT e anatgiB ed arujnoc a odaicnuned ahnit ueuqodraM omoc avatnoc euq etrap aleuqa mareL
. messel ohl e onier od sacinórC sad orvil o messexuort ehl euq uonedro , ossi roP . rimrod uiugesnoc oãn ier o , etion aleuqaN
. acrof a rezaf uodnam e aiedi etnelecxe amu are euq uohca namaH » . otiefsitas siav áj , edatsejaM auS moc eteuqnab oa serof odnauq , e racrofne ednam o euq ier oa sedep , ãhnam ed ãhnamA ? arutla ed sortem etniv ed siam ed acrof amu rezaf sadnam oãn euq roP « : mariregus sogima sues so e sereZ oãtnE
» . ier od oicálap on ueuqodraM ueduj esse riv otnauqne , zafsitas em otsid adan saM
. ier o moc eteuqnab ortuo a ãhnama ovon ed ri arap uodivnoc em áj E . uoraperp ale euq eteuqnab oa ier o moc ri arap , mim a uodivnoc em ós ahniar a , ossid mélA « : uotnecserca E
. ier od soiránoicnuf e sortsinim so sodot erbos edadirotua aus ad e odaifnoc ahnit ehl ier o euq ograc otla od , ahnit euq sohlif ed oremún od , azeuqir aus ad es-rabag a uoçemoc e
, rehlum aus , sereZ e sogima sues so uomahc adiuges mE . asac arap iof e ari a uonimod odutnoC
. osoiruf uocif , megassap aus à otiepser ed lanis mugla avartsom men avatnavel es oãn , oicálap od adartne à , ueuqodraM euq uiv odnauq saM . zilef e etnetnoc asac a uosserger aid eleuqan namaH
» . atnugrep asse a atsopser a oãtne ieraD . ãhnama arap raraperp uov euq eteuqnab ortuo arap namaH moc etnematnuj radivnoc o ed airatsog , ojesed uem o rezafsitas e odidep uem oa redeca adarga ehl e edatsejaM assoV ed amitse a oçerem eS «
: oãtne ehl-uednopser retsE
» . oirépmi uem od edatem ajes euq adnia , ierad ot ue e sajesed euq o em-ziD « : somret setsen ahniar à es-uigirid ier o , eteuqnab o etnaruD
. retsE ed eteuqnab oa marof namaH e ier o missA » . otiefsitas ajes ahniar ad ojesed o euq arap , namaH asserped maniverP « : essid oãtne ier O
» . ieraperp ue euq , eteuqnab mu a , namaH moc etnematnuj , ejoh esseiv euq airatsog , edatsejaM assoV ed odarga od é eS « : uednopser retsE
» . oirépmi uem od edatem ajes euq adnia , ierad ot ue e sedneterp euq o em-ziD ? retsE ahniar , snet euq é euQ « : ehl-uotnugrep ier O
. ortpec od atnop an uocot e es-uomixorpa alE . oãm an ahnit euq , oruo ed ortpec o ehl-uednetse e odarga moc a-uohlo , oirtá on retsE ahniar a uiv ele euq ogoL
. adartne a arap odariv , onort on odatnes avatse ier O . onort od alas ad etnaid , oicálap od roiretni oirtá on es-uotneserpa e siaer sejart sues so moc es-uitsev retsE , mujej ues od aid oriecret oN
. uidep ehl retsE euq o zef e oãtne es-uoriter ueuqodraM
» . iererrom , rerrom euq revit es , e ; iel a artnoc ajes arobme , ier o moc ret ieri siopeD . samad sahnim sa moc omsem o ieraf uE . setion sêrt e said sêrt etnarud mabeb men mamoc oãn , mim rop meujej ; asuS ed sueduj so sodot enúer e iaV «
: ueuqodraM a atsopser etniuges a uodnam retsE oãtnE
» . ahniar a etsagehc ut euq oãçautis atse revloser arap iof oãn es ebas meuq saM . ailímaf aut a e ut , sárerrom , etrap artuo ed mereiv sueduj sod oãçatrebil e orrocos o e seralac et aroga eS
. laer oicálap on seviv euqrop ós , sueduj sortuo so euq od aruges siam sátse euq sesnep oãN « : osiva etniuges o ehl-uoivne
, retsE ed megasnem a uebecer ueuqodraM odnauQ
» . ramahc adnam em oãn ele euq sêm mu ed siam áh áj saM . oruo ed ortpec ues o ehl-rednetse ier o é adiv moc rapacse ed arienam acinú A . etrom à odanednoc é rezif o es E . odamahc res mes , oicálap od roiretni on ratneserpa edop es , rehlum uo memoh , méugnin euq , oirépmi olep odahlapse ovop oa soãsetroc so edsed , ebas etneg a adoT «
: megasnem etniuges a moc cataH etnemavon uoivne ahniar A
. odidep eleuqa ehl-uitimsnart e retsE moc ret iof cataH
. ovop ues od rovaf me ier od otnuj redecretni arap ale moc essitsisni euq e , odut ed etnerroc oa a-odnop , retsE a essartsom o euq ehl-uidep ueuqodraM . sueduj sod oãçiurtsed a avanedro euq , asuS me odad oterced od aipóc amu mébmat ehl-uogertnE
. sueduj sod oinímretxe od acort me , oirépmi od serfoc son ratisoped aretemorp namaH oriehnid otnauq e odidecus o ehl-uotnoc ueuqodraM E
. oicálap od adartne à , edadic ad açarp an avatse euq , ueuqodraM ed ortnocne oa iof cataH missA
. edutita aus ad oãzar a lauq ueuqodraM a ratnugrep ehl-uodnam e , oçivres ues oa aresup ier o euq , oicálap od socunue sod mu , cataH uomahc retsE oãtnE
. uotieca oãn ele saM . aizart euq saleuqa essipsed e , essitsev es ueuqodraM euq arap sapuor uodnaM . adabrutrep otium uocif ale , avassap es euq o maratnoc ehl socunue sues so e retsE ahniar ad samad sa odnauQ
. aznic erbos es-mavatied e otul ed sapuor maitsev sotiuM . sotnemal e sotnarp , snujej moc azetsirt aus a mavatsefinam euq , sueduj so ertne oãçalosed ednarg evuoh saled amu adac me , laer oterced o e medro a uogehc euq a saicnívorp sa sadot mE
. arienam aleuqad oditsev rartne ál aidop méugnin euqrop , uortne oãn sam , oicálap od atrop à uogehc missA
. arugrama ed sotirg odnatlos edadic a uerrocrep e açebac an aznic sôp , otul ed sapuor moc es-uitsev , rod ed lanis me setsev saus sa uogsar , odassap ahnit es euq o ebuos ueuqodraM odnauQ
. adanretsnoc avatse edadic a , mavaeteuqnab es namaH e ier o otnauqne E . asuS me odacilbup iof oterced o e asserp a adot a maritrap satefatse so , laer medro roP
. aid esse arap messaraperp es euq arap , etneg a adot a recehnoc a adad res aived otnemucod eleuqad aipóc A
. sneb sues sod es-raredopa e sodot sol-íurtsed maiveD . sotrom messof , saçnairc e serehlum , sohlev e sovon , sueduj so sodot , radA ed ezert aid o are euq , aid ós mun euq arap seõçurtsni mavad es íA . saicnívorp sa sadot arap saipóc maravel satefatse oãtnE
. sexreX ier od oles o moc odales e otircse iof otnemucod o E . siacol sefehc soa e serodanrevog soa , ier od sapartás soa odaivne e oirépmi on setnetsixe saugníl sasrevid san otircse e odizudart essof euq arap oterced o sehl-uotid e , sêm oriemirp od aid oriecret omicéd on , ier od soiráterces so uocovnoc namaH oãtnE
» . seled seresiuq euq o zaf ; suet oãs oriehnid ues o e ovop O « : ehl-essid e
, gagA ed etnednecsed , atademaH ed ohlif , sueduj sod ogimini o , namaH a o-uogertne e siairepmi soterced so rales arap odasu lena o oded od uorit ier o oãtnE
» . siaer soruoset son adartne merad arap , atarp ed sadalenot satnezert ed siam adnezaf ad soiránoicnuf soa ragertne a em-otemorpmoc ue e ; oinímretxe ues o es-eterced , edatsejaM assoV a meb recerap eS
. ol-árelot me esseretni áh oãn E . onier od siel sà ecedebo oãn e sovop sortuo sod sad setnerefid siel met , siamed sod odarapes eviv euq mu áh , edatsejaM assoV ed onier od saicnívorp sa meõpmoc euq sovop so ertnE « : ier oa essid namaH oãtnE
. radA ed sêm o é euq , sêm odnuges omicéd on ahlocse a uiaC . sotnetni sues so obac a ravel aived euq me sêm o e aid o rehlocse arap , namaH ed etnaid , etros a , é otsi , rup o odaçnal iof , sexreX ed odanier od ona odnuges omicéd on , nasiN ed sêm o é euq , sêm oriemirp oN
. ueuqodraM ed ovop omsem od meres rop , sexreX ed oirépmi od sueduj so sodot riurtsed uoenalp sam , ele a etnemos ol-ágitsac ocuop aires euq uohca , ueduj are ele euq ebuos odnauq E
. megassap aus à avanilcni es men ohleoj o avarbod oãn ueuqodraM euq uiv odnauq , osoiruf uocif namaH
. otid ahnit ueuqodraM euq o oãn uo edadrev are es rev arap , namaH a oãtne on-maraicnuneD » . ueduj uos uE « : aidnopser ós e sodivuo avad sehl oãn ele sam , omsem o maizid ehl said so sodot E
» ? ier od medro à secedebosed euq roP « : ehl-maratnugrep laer oicálap od oçivres oa siaicifo sortuo so oãtnE
. avanilcni es men ohleoj o avarbod oãn ueuqodraM óS . ier o odanedro ahnit missa siop , eled etnaid es-odnanilcni e ohleoj o odnarbod , meganemoh mavatserp ehl laer oicálap on oçivres ed siaicifo so sodoT
. sortsinim sortuo sod amica o-odnacoloc , ortsinim-oriemirp ues , gagA ed etnednecsed , atademaH ed ohlif , namaH uoemon sexreX ier o , opmet mugla odassaP
. ier od açneserp an , sacinórC sad orvil on otircse iof osac o e sodacrofne marof siod sO . apluc a adamrifnoc iof e adagitsevni iof oãtseuq A
