. oit od emon me , ier oa uotnoc o zev aus rop euq , retsE ahniar à rebas ol-êf e arujnoc a uirbocsed ueuqodraM
. acranom oa adiv a rarit maratnet e es-maratlover , siaer sotnesopa soa osseca o mavadraug euq , socunue siod , ier od atrop à oçivres ed ueuqodraM odnatse , aid otreC
. odadiuc ues oa avatse otnauqne arezif erpmes omoc lat , aicedebo ale e odibiorp ohl-ahnit ueuqodraM siop , aiduj are euq recehnoc a odad ahnit oãn adnia , mérop , retsE
. ier od atrop à oçivres me avatse ueuqodraM , zev adnuges alep marinuer es snevoj sa odnauQ
. setneserp socir sodíubirtsid marof e sotsopmi ed oãçuder amu saicnívorp sà adidecnoc mébmat ioF . soãsetroc e sortsinim sues so sodot a , retsE ed arnoh me , eteuqnab ednarg mu ued ier o oãtnE
. itsaV ed ragul me ahniar ramalcorp al-êf e açebac aus a erbos laer aoroc a racoloc uodnaM . snevoj setnatser sà euq od oãçiefa siam ehl-uocided e serovaf siam ehl-uedecnoc e , serehlum sartuo sa sadot ed euq od retsE ed siam uotsog ier O
. tebeT ed sêm o é euq sêm omicéd on , odanier ues od ona omités on , sexreX ier od açneserp à , oicálap oa adizudnoc iof retsE missA
. essasu euq odadnemocer ahnit ehl iageH euq od méla , laicepse ed adan uidep oãn alE . rev maidop a euq so sodot rop adarimda are e ahlif rop aratpoda a euq , ueuqodraM ed oit , liaibA ed ahlif are retsE . ier od açneserp à adavel res retsE ed zev a uogehC
. ramahc essadnam a e essajesed a etse euq res oãn a , ier od açneserp à siam avatlov oãn E . sairádnuces sasopse salep levásnopser o are euq , laer ocunue , zagsahC ed adraug à , mérah odnuges mu a adizudnoc are etniuges ãhnam an e , etion à aditimda arE
. essajesed ale euq o odut ogisnoc ravel aidop , oicálap oa mérah od rassap oa , aid esseN
. ier od açneserp à adizudnoc are mevoj adac , zev aus a avagehc odnauq siopeD . sodairporpa sotudorp sortuo e omasláb ed oeló moc sesem sies e arrim ed oeló moc snegassam ed sesem sies odniulcni , ona mu rop es-ragnolorp aived azeleb ed otnematart O
. odnecetnoca ai ehl euq o e retsE ed saicíton rebas arap , mérah od oitáp o avadnor ueuqodraM said so sodoT
. aiduj are euq uolever oãn , ueuqodraM ed ohlesnoc rop , retsE saM
. sadagerpme saus sa arap e ale arap , mérah od sotnesopa serohlem so sodad adnia ehl-maroF . meritsissa a arap , laer asac ad sadagerpme serohlem sad etes ued ehl e laicepse oãçatnemila e azeleb ed sotudorp so etnemataidemi uonitsed ehl ossi rop e mevoj aleuqad otium uotsog iageH
. sale ertne es-avartnocne retsE . iageH ed adraug à mérah on sadinuer e asuS a sadavel marof snevoj sasoremun , acilbúp adanrot iof ier od medro a odnauQ
. seõçief ed e oproc ed , aleb otium are retsE . ãfró uocif euq edsed , ahlif omoc a-avaredisnoC . eãm men iap ahnit oãn ale euqrop , odairc ahnit ele euq , retsE ociarbeh me , assadaH adamahc ahnirbos amu ahnit ueuqodraM
. áduJ ed sainoceJ ier o oilíxe o arap uovel ainólibaB ad rosonodocubaN ier o odnauq , sorienoisirp sortuo moc etnematnuj mélasureJ ed odatroped odis ahnit ueuqodraM
. siuQ ed e iemiS ed etnednecsed e mimajneB ed obirt ad , riaJ ed ohlif , ueuqodraM odamahc ueduj mu asuS me aiviv , opmet eleuqan , arO
. acitárp me rôp o-uodnam e recerap etse uovorpa ier O . ahniar omoc itsaV airiutitsbus edatsejaM auS a siam essadarga euq a e
, azeleb ed sotnematart mairebecer snevoj sasse , áL . ier od serehlum salep levásnopser ocunue o , iageH ed edadirotua a bos átse euq , asuS ed mérah oa snevoj sadnil siam sa meravel e meranoicceles arap , oirépmi od saicnívorp sa sadot me soirássimoc messaemon es euq mébmat maressiD
. edatsejaM auS arap snegriv e sasomrof snevoj messarucorp es euq mariregus ier od soriehlesnoc so oãtnE
. ale artnoc adamot arof euq oãsiced ad e otief ahnit itsaV euq od avarbmel es adnia ele , odamlaca áj ret es sexreX ier od ari a ed e sotnemicetnoca setsed siopeD
. essecerap sehl omoc snedro rad e asac aus ad serohnes res maived sodiram so euq odnezid , ovop adac ed e aicnívorp adac ed augníl a e atircse a moc odroca ed , onier od saicnívorp sa sadot a oterced od saipóc sadaivne oãtne maroF
. zef missa ier o e , soriehlesnoc sortuo soa e ier oa uodarga nacumeM ed ohlesnoc O
» . laicos oãçidnoc aus a rof lauq ajes , sodiram sues soa otiepser oãret sasopse sa sadot , oirépmi ednarg etsed snifnoc soa éta odagluvid rof laer oterced o odnauq E
. ahniar ed ragul ues o emot ale euq od rohlem artuo euq e siaer sotnesopa son rartne ed adibiorp euqif itsaV euq enedro es eleN . ragover assop es oãn e sodem sod e sasrep sod siel san odíulcni ajes euq , laer oterced mu es-euglumorp , meb rahca edatsejaM assoV eS
. oãçangidni e otiepser ed satlaf satium áranigiro ossi e sodiram sues so moc arap arienam amsem ad redecorp oãv , zef ahniar a euq o merivuo aidéM ad e aisréP ad serbon sarohnes sa odnauQ
” . recerapmoc a es-uosucer ale sam , itsaV ahniar a açneserp aus à messexuort euq uonedro sexreX ier O “ : rezid a e sodiram sues so razerpsed a sa-odnavel , serehlum sa ertne acob me acob ed árassap zef ale euq O
. onier od sotidbús e sortsinim so sodot mébmat sam , edatsejaM assoV uednefo ós oãn itsaV ahniar ad edutita A « : essid e ohlesnoc od e ier od etnaid arvalap ad uosu nacumeM
. socunue sod oidémretni rop aritimsnart ehl ier o euq medro à odicedebo ret oãn ale rop , itsaV moc arap ramot a lagel otnemidecorp o erbos sodatlusnoc marof setsE
. ier oa otcerid osseca mahnit e etroc ad seragul soriemirp so mavapuco euq aidéM ad e aisréP ad soãsetroc etes so , nacumeM e anesraM , sereM , sisráT , atamdA , ratehC , anesraC es-maratneserpA
. açitsuj a e medro a maicehnoc euq so moc seõtseuq sa ritucsid emutsoc ues are euqrop , soriehlesnoc so oãtne ramahc uodnaM
. odatirri etnemadnuforp uocif ier o e recerapmoc a es-uosucer ahniar a , ier od medro a maritimsnart ehl socunue so odnauq saM
. asomrof otium are ale siop , azeleb aus a rarimda messedup serbon e sotidbús sues so euq arap , açebac an aoroc ed , itsaV ahniar a açneserp aus à messexuort euq arap
, sacraC e rateZ , atgabA , atgiB , anobraH , ateziB , namueM — oçivres ues oa mavatse euq socunue etes soa snedro ued , ohniv o moc ergela áj , ier o , aid omitlú o ragehc oA
. sexreX ed oicálap od roiretni on sarohnes sa arap atsef amu avad itsaV ahniar a , opmet omsem oA
. edatnov à rebeb sodadivnoc so meraxied arap sovres sues soa snedro odad ahnit ier O . seõçirtser mes rebeb maidop sodoT
. ier mu ed oirpórp are omoc aicnâdnuba me ohniv aivah e , setnerefid sale sadot , oruo ed saçat me es-aibeB
. xinó e aloréperdam ed seõçatsurcni moc ocnarb e edrev eromrám ed sotnemivap erbos atarp e oruo ed sãvid aivah ; eromrám ed sanuloc a atarp ed salogra rop sasnepsus mavatse sairaçepat sA . aruprúp e onif ohnil a sadaurbed , siuza e sacnarb , oãdogla ed sairaçepat sanif aivaH
. laer oicálap od snidraj son iof atsef A . serbop e socir , asuS ed edadic ad oãçalupop a adot arap , anames amu ed zev atsed , atsef artuo ued ier o , sesem sies so sodassaP
. rodnelpse e apmop ednarg aus a e ier od azeuqir emrone a rartsom aidneterp , sesem sies uorud euq , atsef A
. saicnívorp sad serodanrevog e serbon so e aidéM ad e aisréP ad oticréxe od siaicifo so setneserp marevitse aleN . soiránoicnuf e sortsinim sues so sodot arap atsef amu uoraperp sexreX , odanier ed ona oriecret oN
. latipac a , asuS ed azelatrof an onort ues o oãtne ahnit ier O
. aipóitE à éta aidnÍ a edsed , saicnívorp etes e etniv e otnec erbos uonier euq sexreX ed opmet on uecetnoca otsI
! meb uem arap , mim ed et-arbmel , sueD uem Ó . soturf soriemirp sod agertne à otnauq e sadanimreted sacopé san ahnel ad atrefo à otnauq seõçisopsid mébmat iemoT
. mu adac ed seõçnuf sa mainifed euq sotnemaluger so icelebatse e soriegnartse so sodot ed missa so-iepmiL
. sativel e setodrecas moc etsezif euq açnaila a e oicódrecas o maranaforp euq sessed et-arbmel , sueD uem Ó
. mim ed egnol arap o-ietsafa , oãzar lat roP . noroH-teB ed , talabenaS ed ahlif amu moc odasac ahnit , bihcailE etodrecas omus od ohlif zev aus rop , ádaioJ ed sohlif sod mU
» ? sariegnartse serehlum moc odnasac , sueD osson o rednefo a oãtse euq , odacep omsem o retemoc a oãtse euq otiepser ossov a es-rezid árI « : ossi rop sehl-essiD
. racep a on-maravel sariegnartse serehlum otnatertnE . learsI ed ier eled zef e o-uoma sueD . ele euq od etnatropmi siam ier aivah oãn , soriegnartse sovop so sodot ertnE . learsI ed ier o , oãmolaS uocep euq missa iof euq rev sehl-ziF
. sariegnartse serehlum moc sohlif sues so men soriegnartse snemoh moc messasac es sahlif saus sa euq siam mairitnesnoc oãn euq sueD ed emon me raruj a so-ieugirbo e solebac so sehl-ieuqnarra , snuglan itaB . so-ieoçidlama e ossi rop so-idneerpeR
. aciaduj augníl a mavalaf oãn áj e sovop sortuo ed e dodsA ed augníl a mavalaf sohlif sues sod edateM
. baoM ed e nomA ed , dodsA ed serehlum moc odasac mahnit es euq sueduj aivah , opmet eleuqan , euq mébmat ieuqifireV
. aidróciresim ednarg aut alep mim ed oãxiapmoc met e , ossi rop , mébmat mim ed et-arbmel , sueD uem Ó . odanaforp res a essatlov oãn odabás o euq arap satrop sa raigiv messof e messacifirup es euq arap sativel so mébmat iesivA
. odabás oa siam maratlov oãn , arutla asse edsed , E . ossi rezaf a messatlov es rednerp avadnam so euq sehl-essid e sahlarum sad arof odabás o etnarud meracif rop so-idneerper oãtne uE
. sezev saud uo amu mélasureJ ed arof maracif sairodacrem ed eicépse a adot ed serodednev e serodarpmoc sO
. odabás ed aid me agrac amuhnen rartne meraxied oãn arap satrop sà otnuj serodarobaloc suem sod snugla mébmat ieuqoloC . odabás ed sioped oãnes merirba es oãn arap e , edrat ad riac oa ogol , é otsi , odabás ed setna mélasureJ ed satrop sa merahcef arap snedro ied , seõzar satse roP
» . odabás o meranaforp rop , learsI artnoc sueD ed ari a ratnemua a oãtse sêcoV . edadic atse erbos e són erbos saçargsed satse riac zef sueD osson o , ossi rop , e sodassapetna sossov so marezif euq missa ioF
. odabás o meranaforp oa lam otium redecorp a oãtsE « : sehl-essid e áduJ ed sedadirotua sà ossi arap oãçneta a iemahC
. mélasureJ me sueduj snugla a odabás oa san-maidnev e sairodacrem ed eicépse a adot e exiep mavavel , mélasureJ me setnediser sam , oriT ed edadic ad siarutan snugla euq mébmat aicetnocA
. aid eleuqan sairodacrem saus sa merednev rop so-idneerpeR . mélasureJ arap odabás oa mavatropsnart sa e sagrac ed eicépse a adot e sogif moc , savu moc , ohniv moc sorrub so mavagerrac euq , satsoc sà sodraf mavavel euq , odabás oa savu mavasip euq snemoh aivah euq ed atnoc ied em mébmaT
. otluc ues olep e sueD uem od olpmet olep zif euq meb o odot saçeuqse oãN . sueD uem , mim ed et-arbmel , otsi odut roP
. soriehnapmoc sues solep oãçiubirtsid a rezaf ed sodagerracne maracif euq sele maroF . açnaifnoc ed sangid saossep , sainataM ed oten e rucaZ ed ohlif , nanaH otnujda omoc sup e , sativel sod mu are euq , saíadeP a e codaS oiráterces oa , saimelehC etodrecas oa olpmet od snézamra sod odadiuc o ieifnoC
. etieza od e ovon ohniv od , ogirt od samicéd sa olpmet od sasnepsed sa arap ovon ed uovel ovop o odot E
. sotsop sues soa meratlov arap serotnac so e sativel so ovon ed meramahc arap sehl-essid E . sueD ed olpmet o missa odanodnaba ahnit es euq rop sehl-ietnugrep e sedadirotua sa redneerper ed otnatrop eviT
. arret aus a arap mu adac , odariter mahnit es , otluc od sodagerracne , serotnac so e sativel so euq ed odamrofni iuf e maicnetrep sehl euq satrefo sa sativel soa rad ed odaxied mahnit euq mébmat ebuoS
. osnecni o e satrefo sa , sueD ed olpmet od sodargas sotcejbo so ál racoloc a messatlov e messapmil a euq arap snedro mébmat ied
; saiboT a aicnetrep euq o odut alas assed arof rôp iednam e etnemadnuforp em-uotsogsed ossI
. sueD ed olpmet od saicnêdneped sad alas amu saiboT ed oãçisopsid à racoloc oa , bihcailE otief ahnit euq lam od ebuos ue euq oãtne ioF . sexrexatrA ed otnemitnesnoc o moc , mélasureJ a odasserger ahnet ue opmet mugla odassap arobme
, ier od otnuj arap ietlov ue , ainólibaB ad ier , sexrexatrA ed odanier od siod e atnirt ona on , siop ; mélasureJ me avatse oãn ue , uecetnoca ossi odut odnauQ
. setodrecas soa omoc meb , sorietrop e serotnac , sativel soa sodanitsed mare euq , etieza od e ovon ohniv od , ogirt od samicéd sa e sodargas sotcejbo so , osnecni o , satrefo sa etnemroiretna mavadraug es euq ál arE . alas ednarg amu omitlú etsed oãçisopsid à otsop ahnit
, saiboT ed etnerap e sueD osson od olpmet od sasnepsed sad salas sad odagerracne , bihcailE etodrecas o , ossid setnA
. soriegnartse so sodot learsI ed maratsafa oãçanimreted atse merivuo oA
. oãçnêb me oãçidlam aleuqa uodum euq é sueD osson O . raoçidlama so arap oãalaB a maragap éta , oirártnoc oleP . sotnemila moc merebecer so arap satilearsi sod ortnocne oa odi mahnit oãn arortuo sele euq áj
, sueD ed ovop od edadinumoc ad etrap rezaf maireved acnun satibaom so e satinoma so euq otircse avatse ál euq es-uocifirev , sésioM ed orvil o etnemacilbup es-rel oa aid otreC
. aicnetrep sehl euq etrap a , oãraA ed setnednecsed , setodrecas soa mavad sativel so e , maidnopserroc sehl euq satrefo sa sativel soa odom omsem od mavagertnE . sorietrop soa e serotnac soa sadanitsed seõçrop sa etnemairaid avagertne , saimeeN ed e lebaboroZ ed opmet on , learsI ed ovop O
. sueD a saçarg ed oãçca ed e rovuol ed socitnâc so maigirid euq serotnac ed sefehc aivah fassA ed e divaD ed opmet o edsed , otiefe moC
. oãmolaS ohlif ues rop e divaD rop odicelebatse odis ahnit emrofnoc mavaicifo , odal ues rop , sorietrop so e serotnac sO . oãçacifirup ed siautir so e sueD ed otluc o mavarugessa euq
sativel e setodrecas so sotsop sues son rev rop etnetnoc avatse áduJ ed ovop o odoT . sativel e setodrecas soa avanitsed es e seõçaovop sad atlov à mavatse euq sopmac sod avagehc , iel a moc odroca ed , euq o ranezamra maiveD . samicéd sa e soturf soriemirp so , satrefo sa meradraug arap , sasnepsed sad salas sad sadagerracne saossep es-maraemon oãisaco aleuqaN
. egnol oa rivuo es-aizaf mélasureJ ed airgela A . ojizoger essed marapicitrap saçnairc sa e serehlum sa mébmaT . airgela ed uehcne so sueD euqrop , ojizoger ednarg evuoh e soicífircas sotium aid eleuqan es-marecerefO
. saíarziJ rop sodigirid serotnac so es-maivuO . rezÉ e malE , saiuqlaM , nanaoJ , izU , razailE , saíamehC , saiessaM
mébmat mai sessed méla e , satebmort saus sa mavavel euq , sainanaH , sairacaZ , ianeoilE , saieuqiM , nimainiM , saiessaM , miuqailE : setodrecas setniuges so , ogimoc maI
. mavahnapmoca em euq ovop od sefehc sod edatem a moc , mébmat ue e sueD ed olpmet oa maragehc soroc siod so siopeD
. adrauG ad atrop an odnarap , sahlevO sad atrop à éta meC sod errot ad , leinanaH ed errot ad , exieP od atrop ad , anaseJ ed atrop ad , miarfE ed atrop ad amic rop somáunitnoC
. agral ahlarum à éta sonroF sod errot a edsed , ovop od sefehc sod edatem moc sárta ai uE . adreuqse a arap aiuges oroc odnuges O
. etsel a átse euq , augÁ ad atrop à éta e divaD ed oicálap od amica , divaD ed edadic à zudnoc euq airadacse a maribus sele , etnoF ad atrop à maragehc odnauQ
. sardsE abircse o ai seled etnerf À . sueD ed memoh , divaD ed siacisum sotnemurtsni so moc sodot , inanaH e áduJ , leinataN , iaaM , ialaliuG , ialaliM , lerazA , saíamehC setnerap sues so e
fassA , rucaZ , saieuqiM , sainataM , saíamehC ed etnednecsed , satanóJ ed ohlif , sairacaZ : setodrecas setniuges so satebmort moc son-mavahnapmocA
. saimereJ e saíamehC , mimajneB , áduJ
, maluhceM , sardsE , sairazA ajes uo
, áduJ ed sefehc sod edatem moc saíasoH seled sárta aI
. ariemurtsE ad atrop à oãçcerid me , otierid odal o arap es-aivom mU . soroc sednarg siod iezinagro e áduJ ed sedadirotua sa sahlarum sa arap ribus sioped iednaM
. edadic ad sahlarum sad e satrop sad , ovop od oãçacifirup ad lainomirec o marazilaer , oãçacifirup airpórp aus ad lautir od sioped , sativel so e setodrecas sO
. tevamezA ed e abeuG ed sopmac sod , lagliuG-teB ed
, afoteN ed seõçaovop sad e mélasureJ ed seroderra sod serotnac so marerrocA
. saratíc e saprah , solabmíc ed sodahnapmoca , rovuol ed sonih moc asoigiler ainómirec a etnemergela merarbelec ed mif a , mélasureJ a meriv arap , maiviv edno sedadilacol sad sativel so es-maracovnoc , mélasureJ ed sahlarum sad oãçargasnoc ad atsef a araP
. sardsE abircse e etodrecas od e saimeeN rodanrevog od opmet on e cadaçoJ ed oten e éusoJ ed ohlif , miuqaoJ ed opmet on seõçnuf saus sa mavahnepmesed saossep satsE
. bucA e nomlaT , maluhceM , saidabO , saiuqubcaB , sainataM : mare satrop sad otnuj snézamra so mavaigiv euq sorietrop sO
. sueD ed memoh , divaD ed medro a emrofnoc , sonrut sodived sues son , serovuol so ROHNES oa ratnac ed , soriehnapmoc sues so moc etnematnuj , sodagerracne so mare , leimedaC ed ohlif , éusoJ e saiberehC , saibassaH sativel sod sefehc sO
. bihcailE ed oten , satanóJ ed acopé à éta sotsiger ed orvil on sotircsni marof ailímaf ed sefehc , sativel sod semon sO
. aisréP ad rodarepmi , oiraD ed odanier oa éta setodrecas sod e ailímaf ed sefehc , sativel sod semon sod atsil a es-zef setodrecas somus marof audaJ e nanaoJ , ádaioJ , bihcailE euq me opmet oN
; leinataN , saíadeJ arap ; saibassaH , saiuqliH arap
; rebÉ , comA arap ; ialaS , ialaC arap
; izU saíadeJ arap ; ianataM , biraioJ arap
; satanóJ , saíamehC arap ; aumahC , agliB arap
; iatliP , saidaoM arap ; … nimainiM arap
; maluhceM , noteniuG arap , sairacaZ , odI arap
; iacleH , toiareM arap ; ándA , miraH arap
; ésoJ , sainabehC arap ; satanóJ , culaM arap
; nanaoJ , sairamA arap ; maluhceM sardsE arap
; sainanA , saimereJ arap ; saíareM , saíareS ed ailímaf ad : setniuges so marof , siatodrecas sailímaf sad sefehc so , etodrecas omus iof miuqaoJ euq me opmet oN
. audaJ ed iap o , satanóJ e satanóJ ed iap o iof ádaioJ
; ádaioJ ed iap o , bihcailE ; bihcailE ed iap o , miuqaoJ ; miuqaoJ ed iap o iof éusoJ
. sele moc mavanretla inU e saiuqubcaB sativel so e
rovuol ed sonih so rigirid ed sodagerracne mavatse ailímaf aus ad so e etsE . sainataM e áduJ , saiberehC , leimedaC , iuniB , éusoJ : sativeL
. éusoJ ed opmet on , setnerap sues sod e setodrecas sod sefehc so mare setsE
. saíadeJ e saiuqliH , comA , ulaS , saíadeJ , biraioJ , saíamehC
, agliB , saidaoM , nimaiM
, saibA , ioteniuG , odI
, tomereM , mueR , sainacehC
, sutaH , culaM , sairamA
, sardsE , saimereJ , saíareS : setodrecaS : éusoJ moc e , leitalaS ed ohlif , lebaboroZ moc oilíxe od marasserger euq sativel e setodrecas sod atsil a es-eugeS
. mimajneB ed oirótirret on reviv a maracif áduJ ed obirt ad sorbmem so ertne ragul mahnit euq sativel snugla , ossid mélA
. soirárepO sod elav on onO e doL
, talabeN , miobeS , didaH
, miatiuG , ámaR , roçaH
, sainanA , boN , totanA me
, seroderra sues e leteB , iA , sámciM , abeuG me es-maraxif mimajneB ed obirt ad saossep sA
. moniH ed elav oa éta abehcreB ed iav euq oirótirret on maraxif es euq rezid reuQ . seroderra e acezA e seroderra e siuqáL , seroderra e maludA , aonaZ
, tumraJ , aroS , nomiR-nE
, seroderra e ánoceM , galciS
, seroderra e abehcreB , lauS-raçaH
, teleP-teB , adaloM , ausseJ me
, seroderra e lecebaceJ , seroderra e nobiD , seroderra e ábrA-tairiuQ me es-maralatsni áduJ ed obirt ad saossep sa , saiedla sà otnauQ
. asrep etroc a etnarep learsI ed ovop o avatneserper , áduJ ed ohlif , areZ ed ãlc od , lebazehceM ed ohlif , saíateP
. olpmet on serotnac sod oçivres o arap sonrut etnemairaid aivah , ier od medro roP
. sueD ed olpmet on , socitnâc solep levásnopser o , fassA ed ãlc oa maicnetrep euq , aciM ed , sainataM ed , saibassaH ed etnednecsed , inaB ed ohlif , izU are mélasureJ me sativel sod efehc O
. apsiuG e aiC sefehc sues odnes , lefO ed orriab on es-maraxif olpmet od serodivres sO
. edadeirporp aus an mu adac , áduJ ed sedadic sartuo san ridiser a maracif sativel e setodrecas setnatser so e satilearsi sortuo sO
. siod e atnetes e otnec odot oa , setnerap sues e nomlaT , bucA : sorietroP
. atnas edadic an sativel so ortauq e atnetio e sotnezud odot oa marE
. nutudeJ ed e lalaG ed etnednecsed , aumahC ed ohlif , adbA , ailímaf ad odnuges o are euq , saiuqubcaB ; oãçaro ad aroh an rovuol ed socitnâc sod odagerracne , fassA ed , idebaZ ed etnednecsed , aciM ed ohlif , sainataM
. olpmet od roiretxe etrap an oçivres od sodagerracne , sativel sod sefehc so mare euq , dabazoJ e iatebahC missa meb e
, inuB ed , saibassaH ed , macirezA ed etnednecsed , bussaH ed ohlif , saíamehC : sativeL
. milodeuG ed ohlif , leidebaZ are efehc ues O . arreug ed snemoh sodot , otio e etniv e otnec odot oa marE . soãmri sues e
remI ed , tomelisseM ed , iazA ed etnednecsed , lerazA ed ohlif , iassehcamA . siod e atnerauq e sotnezud odot oa marE . ailímaf ed sefehc , soãmri sues e
saiuqlaM ed , ruihcaP ed , sairacaZ ed , icemA ed , sailaleP ed etnednecsed , maoreJ ed ohlif , saíadA . olpmet od oçivres oa maracif euq so siod e etniv e sotnecotio odot oa marE . soãmri sues e
, etodrecas omus o are euq , ebutiA ed , toiareM ed , codaS ed , maluhceM ed etnednecsed , saiuqliH ed ohlif , saíareS
, niuqaJ , biraioJ ed ohlif , saíadeJ : setodrecaS
. edadic ad efehc odnuges o are , auneS ed ohlif , áduJ e opurg etsed efehc o are , irciZ ed ohlif , leoJ
. otio e etniv e sotnecevon marof odot oA . ialaS e iabaG adnia e
saíasI , leitI , saiessaM , saíaloC , saíadeP , deoJ ed etnednecsed , maluhceM ed ohlif , ulaS : mimajneB ed obirt ad sorbmeM
. setnelav snemoh sodot , otio e atnesses e sotnecortauq ed iof mélasureJ me maidiser euq sereP ed setnednecsed sod latot O
. inolihC ed e sairacaZ ed , biraioJ ed , saíadA ed , saíazaH ed , ézoH-loC ed etnednecsed e curaB ed ohlif , saiessaM
. leilalaM ed , saitafehC ed , sairamA ed , sairacaZ ed etnednecsed , saizU ed ohlif , sereP ed ãlc od , saíatA : áduJ ed ailímaf ad sorbmeM . mélasureJ me ridiser a uocif mimajneB ed e áduJ ed saossep ed opurg mu odutnoC
. sedadic saus san , sedadeirporp saus sa arap marof oãmolaS ed sovres sod setnednecsed e olpmet od serodivres , sativel , setodrecas , satilearsi sortuo so otnauqne , mélasureJ me ridiser a maracif aicnívorp ad sefehc sO
. mélasureJ me ridiser arap marecerefo es etnemairatnulov euq so sodot uovuol ovop O
. sedadilacol sartuo san evon sartuo sa odnidiser , mélasureJ ed atnas edadic an essaxif es saossep zed ertne amu euq arap setros uotied ovop od otser O . mélasureJ me ridiser a maracif sedadirotua sA
. sueD osson od olpmet o ranodnaba oãn sometemorP . serotnac so e sorietrop so , oçivres ed setodrecas so martnocne es euq ál É . oiráutnas od soilísnetu so martnocne es edno snézamra so arap etieza od e ohniv od , ogirt od satrefo sa oãravel sativel so e satilearsi sO
. sueD osson od olpmet od snézamra so arap mebecer euq o ravel meved adiuges mE . oãraA ed etnednecsed etodrecas mu ed sodahnapmoca ratse meved sativel so , etrap amicéd a merebecer oA
. somarom euq me seõçaovop san etrap amicéd asse ratnavel etnemlaossep oãri sativel sO . satiehloc sasson sad etrap amicéd a sativel soa ravel a e setodrecas so arap etieza e ohniv oriemirp osson o e serovrá sad soturf soriemirp so , ahniraf ariemirp asson a , olpmet od salas san , ragertne ed ossimorpmoc o somimussa etnemlaugI
. sahlevo e sacav sasson sad sairc sariemirp sa omoc meb , essecsan son euq ohlif oriemirp o , oçivres matserp ál euq setodrecas soa , olpmet on ratneserpa a e
serovrá sasson sad e sopmac sosson sod soturf soriemirp so , sona so sodot , ROHNES od olpmet oa ravel a son-ometemorpmoC
. iel an otircse átse omoc , sueD osson , ROHNES od ratla on ramieuq arap ahnel a , sodanimreted sopmet me e sailímaf savitcepser sa odnuges , ona adac airavel meuq rev es arap setros maratied ovop od otser o odot e sativel so , setodrecas so , ossid mélA
. sueD osson od olpmet on otluc o moc sasepsed sa arap e learsI ed odacep od oãdrep olep soicífircas so arap , sueD a sadargasnoc satrefo sartuo sa arap , sedadinelos sartuod e sêm od aid oriemirp od satsef sad e sodabás sod soicífircas so arap , soiráid sotsuacoloh so arap , siaerec ed sairáid satrefo sa arap , sodargasnoc seãp so arap
, olpmet od oçivres o arap olcis mu ed etrap açret a ona adac ragap ed oãçagirbo a somimussA
. sadivíd sa sadot raodrep a e ona omités on oisuop ed arret a raxied a adnia e , otnas aid me uo odabás oa , rednev arap sotudorp sues so messexuort odnauq , síap od siarutan soa adan rarpmoc oãn a etnemlaugi son-ometemorpmoC
. sohlif sosson so moc messasac seled sahlif sa euq ratieca oãn e síap od siarutan so moc messasac sahlif sasson sa euq ritnesnoc oãn somidiceD
. sotiecerp e sarger , sotnemadnam sues so sodot etnemleif ravresbo e , sésioM ovres ues od oiem rop odad ahnit ele euq , sueD ed iel a riuges mararuj e sieváton satoirtapmoc sues soa es-marinU
. rednetne ed sezapac áj sahlif e sohlif sues so , serehlum saus sa moc etnematnuj , sueD ed iel a merirpmuc arap , síap od ariegnartse oãçalupop ad odatsafa mahnit es euq so sodot e olpmet od serodivres , serotnac , sorietrop , sativel , setodrecas , ovop od otser o sele a es-maratnuJ
. ánaaB e miraH , culaM
, nanA , nanaH , saíA
, saiessaM , anbassaH , mueR
, cebohC , áeliP , séoL
, bussaH , sainanaH , saiesO
, saíanA , nanaH , saitaleP
, audaJ , codaS , lebazehceM
, rizeH , maluhceM , saipgaM
, iabeN , totanA , firaH
, iaçeB , muhcaH , saidoH
, ruzA , saiuqezE , retA
, nidA , iavgiB , sainodA
, iabeB , dagezA , inuB
, inaB , utaZ , malE , baoM-taaP , sóraP : ovop od sefehC
. unineB e inaB , saidoH
, sainabehC , saiberehC , rucaZ
, saibassaH , boeR , aciM
, nanaH , saíaleP , átileuQ , saidoH , sainabehC soãmri sues so e
leimedaC , dadaneH ed ãlc od , iuniB e sainazA ed ohlif , éusoJ : sativeL
. setodrecas mare setse sodoT . saíamehC e iagliB , saizaaM
, nimaiM , saibA , maluhceM
, curaB , noteniuG , leinaD
, saidabO , tomereM , miraH
, culaM , sainabehC , sutaH
, saiuqlaM , sairamA , ruihcaP
, saimereJ , sairazA , saíareS
, saicedeS , sailacaH ed ohlif , rodanrevog o , saimeeN : saossep setniuges sa manissA
. setodrecas e sativel sosson solep , sefehc sosson solep odanissa res iav euq , otircse rop emrif ossimorpmoc mu somamot són , otsi odut roP

» ! oãçalubirt ednarg amun son-omartnocnE . siamina sosson sod e saossep sasson sad edatnov à meõpsid euq , otcaf ed , sele oãS . sodacep sosson sod asuac rop etsesupmi son euq , soriegnartse sier so arap oãs sotudorp sues so sam , litréf é arret A
. sneb sues sod e soturf sues sod meratnemila es arap , sodassapetna sosson soa etsed euq síap omsem etsen , sovarcse somos ejoH
. seõçca sám saus sa maranodnaba men , otluc maratserp et oãn , etsagertne sehl euq litréf e ednarg arret ad e etsed sehl euq sneb sotium sod rasepa , onier ues oN
. etsed sehl euq saicnêtrevda e sotiecerp soa maredneta oãn ; iel aut a acitárp me maresup oãn sodassapetna sosson so e setodrecas sosson so , sefehc sosson so e sier sosson sO
. lam o somezif són euq ossap oa , edadlael moc etsiga siop , uecetnoca son euq o odut me otsuj etsof ut euq otrec É
. ejoh ed aid oa éta airíssA ad ier od sopmet so edsed , ovop uet o odot a e sodassapetna sosson soa , sateforp sosson soa e setodrecas sosson soa , sefehc sosson soa e sier sosson soa , són a , megnita son euq sotnemirfos so sodot a etnerefidni sajes oãN . edadiledif moc açnaila a snétnam e , levírret e osoredop , ednarg sé ut , sueD osson , uT
. ovissapmoc e osodnob sueD sé ut euqrop , etsanodnaba so men etsaliuqina so oãn , aidróciresim ednarg aut alep , otnatne oN
. seõçan sartuo ed redop oa so-etsagertne oãtnE . sodivuo mared et oãn sele sam , otirípse uet olep so-etsahlesnoca e sateforp suet sod oiem rop so-etsatroxe , sona sotium etnarud so-etsatropuS
. recedebo a etnemasomiet es-marasucer e aidleber moc satsoc sa maratloV . avresbo so meuq a adiv oãd euq , sotnemadnam suet so maridergsnarT . snedro saut sà marecedebo oãn , abrebos ed soiehc , sele sam , iel aut a meravresbo a so-etsatroxE
. sezev satium sol-avatrebil e uéc od ál sol-avatucse , oãxiapmoc ed oiehc , ut e aduja et-ridep a zev amu siam mavatloV . mavanimod so euq , sogimini sues sod soãm san ovon ed savanodnaba so missA . it artnoc lam o rezaf a mavatlov , zap a mahnitbo euq ogol , otnatne oN
. sogimini sues sod redop od essatrebil e essavlas so meuq sehl-savaivne , oãxiapmoc ednarg aut aN . saidneta so , uéc od ál ut e it rop mavamalc , sodimirpo mavatse odnauq saM . marimirpo so euq , sogimini sues soa etsagertne so , ossi roP
. etnemevarg et-marednefo ; meretrevnoc es sele arap maidneerper so euq , sateforp suet so maratam , iel aut a marazerpseD . it artnoc es-maratlover e sedleber marof sele , odut ed rasepA
. etsed sehl euq aob asioc atnat moc es-maratieled e meraicas es éta maremoC . aicnâdnuba me oturf ed serovrá ed e siavilo e sahniv ed , sanretsic saob mahnit euq e odut ed saiehc sasac ed , litréf síap mu ed e sadacifitrof sedadic ed es-mararedopA
. oãiger aleuqad sovop so e sier so essesiuq omoc ratart aidop etsE . ovop uet od soãm san so-etsagertne e , suenanac so , setnatibah sues so seled etnaid etsatorreD . aled essop maramot e alen marartnE
. rad sehl ed saivah euq sodassapetna sues soa odaruj sahnit euq , arret an rartne so-etsezif e uéc od salertse sa omoc sohlif sues so etsacilpitluM
. ãsaB ed gO ier od o e nobseH ed noeS ier od sesíap so maratsiuqnoC . sele ertne etsaetros sarret sajuc , sovop e sonier sehl-etsagertnE
. marahcni sép sues so men , marepmor es sapuor sa men E . ratlaf sehl adan mes , otresed on so-etsatnemila , sona atnerauq etnaruD
. edes a meratam arap augá a sehl-etsed e , meremoc arap , ánam uet o etsasucer sehl oãn ; meredneerpmoc sele arap otirípse mob uet o sehl-etseD
. etion a etnarud , ohnimac o avaimula sehl euq , ogof od anuloc a e , aid o etnarud , ohnimac o raiug sehl arap , seled uotsafa es oãn euq , omuf ed anuloc a avatse áL . otresed on etsanodnaba so oãn , edadnob ednarg aut a moc , ut sam
, sasnefo sevarg sartuo adnia maretemoC . otpigE od odarit ahnit so euq sued ues o are oliuqa euq maressid e odidnuf latem ed orrezeb mu mébmat mareziF
. etsanodnaba so oãn e oãxiapmoc ed oiehc e etneicap , aidróciresim e edadnob ed oiehc , oãdrep ed sueD mu sé ut saM . otpigE od oãdivarcse a arap ovon ed ratlov arap efehc mu marehlocse euq sedleber oãt maroF . rovaf ues me otief sahnit euq sasohlivaram sasioc sad es-odneceuqse , recedebo maresiuq oãN
. sotnemadnam suet soa marecedebo oãn e sedleber es-marartsom , ohlugro ed soiehc , sodassapetna sosson sortuo so e mérop selE
. sehl-rad odaruj sahnit euq arret ad essop meramot arap sehl-etsessiD . edes a seratam sehl arap , odehcor od augá rarroj etsezif e , emof a seratam sehl arap , uéc od oãp o sehl-etseD
. ovres uet , sésioM ed oiem rop , iel ad sotiecerp e sotnemadnam so sehl-etsed e odabás otnas uet o meravresbo a so-etsanisnE
. snob sotnemadnam e sotiecerp , sariedadrev siel , satsuj snedro sehl-etseD . uéc od ál sele moc etsalaf e ianiS etnom oa etsecseD
. riuges ed maivah euq ohnimac o seraimula arap , ogof ed anuloc amud oiem rop etion ed e omuf ed anuloc amud oiem rop aid ed so-etsaiuG
. augá à adarita ardep amu omoc , serodiugesrep so odnuf on etsatipicerp ; otuxne ép a marassap euq , satilearsi sod etnaid ram o etsidiviD
. snet aroga euq amaf a etsahnag missA . ovop uet o maimirpo sele omoc saibas siop , síap ues od ovop o odot artnoc e sortsinim sues e óaraf o artnoc soigídorp e sahlivaram etsazilaeR
. ohlemreV raM on romalc ues o etsatucse e , otpigE on , sodassapetna sosson sod oãçilfa a etsiV
. leif sé euqrop , assemorp aut a etsirpmuc E . suesagriug sod e suesubej sod , suezirep sod , suerroma sod , satitih sod , suenanac sod síap o setnednecsed sues soa rad odnetemorp , açnaila amu ele moc etsezif e leif are et ele euq etsiV
. oãarbA ed emon o ehl-etsesup e suedlac sod rU ed o-etsarit ; oãrbA etsehlocse euq ut etsoF ! sueD ROHNES o sé uT
. uéc od salertse sa et-marodA . sasioc sa sadot a adiv a sád euq ut sÉ . mêtnoc sele euq o e seram so , etsixe alen euq o odut e arret a etsezif ; salertse sa sadot moc , suéc sod otla siam o e uéc o etsezif euq ut etsoF . ortuo áh oãn e ROHNES o sé uT
! rovuol e oãçnêb a adot ed amica átse azednarg ajuc , odavuol ajes osoirolg emon uet o euq ROHNES « » ! erpmes o odot rop , sueD ossov , ROHNES oa mevuol e es-metnaveL « : maressid saíateP e sainabehC , saidoH , saiberehC , sainebassaH , inaB , leimedaC , éusoJ sativel sO
. sueD ues , ROHNES o , atla zov me , maracovni e sativel sod odartse oa maribus inanaC e inaB , saiberehC , inuB , sainabehC , leimedaC , inaB , éusoJ
. sueD ues , ROHNES o mararoda e sodacep sues so marassefnoc , sêrt sartuo etnarud e , ROHNES od iel ad orvil od arutiel a merivuo a seragul sues son ép ed marevitse saroh sêrt etnaruD
. sodassapetna sues sod sapluc sa e sodacep sues so marassefnoc , ép ed , e soriegnartse sod es-mararapeS
. otul ed lanis me , saçebac sa erbos óp maratied e sariessorg sapuor maritseV . mujej mu arap es-marinuer satilearsi so , sêm essed ortauq e etniv aid oN

. iel an odanimreted avatse omoc , aielbmessa ednarg amu evuoh , ovatio on , e said etes etnarud atsef a es-uorbeleC . atsef ad omitlú oa éta aid oriemirp o edsed otsi , sueD ed iel a etnemairaid es-aiL
. airgela ednarg amu otcaf ed evuoH . etnahlemes asioc otief mahnit acnun satilearsi so , oãtne éta , nuN ed ohlif , éusoJ ed opmet o edseD . maratibah ál e sadnet saus sa marezif orievitac od odatlov mahnit euq so sodoT
. miarfE ed atrop ad e augÁ ad atrop ad etnerf me saçarp san , sueD ed olpmet od soirtá son , soitáp son , soçarret son sadnet es-marezif e somar rezart arap ovop o oãtne uiaS
» . otircse átse emrofnoc , sadnet somrezaf arap , sasodnorf serovrá ed somar sortuo e ariemlap ed e otrim ed , oriejubmaz ed , arievilo ed somar magart e setnom soa mabuS « : osiva etniuges o sedadic sa sadot rop e mélasureJ me ramalcorp e raicnuna , ossi rop , maiveD
. sêm omités od asoigiler atsef a etnarud , sadnet me meratibah a satilearsi so agirbo euq megassap a marartnocne , sésioM ed oiem rop odad ahnit ROHNES o euq iel atseN
. iel ad sarvalap sa rohlem meredneerpmoc arap , sardsE ed açneserp an es-marinuer sativel so e setodrecas so , ailímaf ed sefehc so , etniuges aid oN
. odanisne odis ahnit sehl euq o odidneerpmoc mahnit euqrop , atsef ednarg amu mareziF . sortuo so moc snu odnitraper , rebeb e remoc arap oãtne uotsafa es ovop o odoT
» ! setsirt majetse oãN . otnas aid mu é etsE ! oicnêliS « : odnezid , ovop o maramlaca sativel so mébmaT
» ! açrof assov a átse ROHNES od airgela an euqrop , setsirt majetse oãN . otnas aid mu é etse siop , odaraperp adan mêt oãn euq so rebeb e remoc arap medivnoc e merevit euq rohlem od mabeb e mamoc , arobme es-oãV « : adnia essid sardsE
» ! merohc men maçetsirtne es oãN . sueD osson , ROHNES oa odargasnoc aid mu é etsE « : ovop oa maressid iel a racilpxe a mavatse euq sativel so omoc meb , sardsE abircse e etodrecas o e saimeeN rodanrevog o oãtnE . iel ad sarvalap sa rivuo oa avarohc etneg a adoT
. arutircsE a messedneerpmoc sodot euq arap on-mavacilpxe e on-maizudart , sueD ed iel ad orvil o atla zov me maiL
. ragul ues on aicenamrep euq , ovop oa iel a mavacilpxe saíaleP e nanaH , dabazoJ , sairazA , átileuQ , saiessaM , saidoH , iatebahC , bucA , nimaJ , saiberehC , inaB , éusoJ sativel sO
. ROHNES o mararoda , arret rop otsor o moc , es-odnanilcni E » ! nemÁ ! nemÁ « : sodatnavel soçarb so moc , uednopser ovop o odot e , sueD ednarg o , ROHNES oa serovuol ueD
. ép me maresup es sodot , ol-irba oa , e odavele siam ragul me avatse siop , ovop o odot ed atsiv à orvil o uirba sardsE
. maluhceM e sairacaZ , anadabsaH , muhcaH , saiuqlaM , leahciM , saíadeP uocif adreuqse À . saiessaM e saiuqliH , sairU , saíanA , amehC , saitataM maracif , atierid aus à , eled otnuJ . oãisaco a arap otief iof euq ariedam ed odartse mu erbos ép ed aicenamrep sardsE
. iel ad arutiel à sotneta mavatse sodot e ; otnemidnetne ed edadicapac mahnit sotnauq ed e serehlum , snemoh ed açneserp an , aid-oiem oa éta ãhnam a edsed orvil o rel a evetse sardsE , augÁ ad atrop ad etnerf me átse euq açarp an , omsem ilA
. otnemidnetne ed edadicapac e edadi mahnit áj euq so sodot e serehlum , snemoh rop atsopmoc are euq aielbmessa ad etnaid iel a uovel sardsE etodrecas o , sêm essed aid oriemirp oN
. learsI a odad ahnit ROHNES o euq , sésioM ed ieL ad orvil o rezart arap sardsE abircse oa es-uidep e , augÁ ad atrop ad etnerf me átse euq açarp an memoh ós mu omoc uinuer es ovop o odot , seõçaovop savitcepser saus san mavatse satilearsi so áj , sêm omités o uogehc odnauQ

. seõçaovop saus san es-marecelebatse learsI ed ovop o odot e olpmet od serodivres so , serotnac so , sorietrop so , sativel so , setodrecas so siopeD
. siatodrecas setsev etes e atnesses e atarp ed soliuq lim ed acrec , oruo ed saçep lim etniv mared satilearsi sortuo sO
. atarp ed soliuq mec e lim e oruo ed saçep lim etniv oruoset o arap marecerefo ailímaf ed sefehc sortuO
. siatodrecas setsev atnirt e satnehniuq e saçat atneuqnic , oruo ed saçep lim ed acrec oruoset o arap uecerefo rodanrevog o : sarbo sa arap satrefo mared ailímaf ed sefehc sod snuglA
. sotnemuj etniv e sotnecetes lim sies e solemac ocnic e atnirt e sotnecortauq , salum ocnic e atnerauq e satnezud , solavac sies e atnirt e sotnecetes maíussoP
. sarotnac e serotnac ocnic e atnerauq e sotnezud mébmat odnevah , etes e atnirt e sotnezert lim etes mare euq savarcse e sovarcse odnatnoc oãn
, saossep atnesses e satnezert lim saud e atnerauq rop adíutitsnoc are oilíxe od marasserger euq sod edadinumoc A
. sodargas sodad sod oiem rop oãtseuq a ridiced etodrecas mu riv ed setna satnas sasioc sad messemoc oãn euq , ossi rop , sehl-essid rodanrevog O
. oicódrecas od sodíulcxe marof , marartnocne so oãn euq otsiv , sam ailímaf ed sotsiger sues so mararucorp setsE
. aled emon o uomot e daeliuG ed larutan , ializraB ed ahlif amu moc uosac euq , ializraB ed e sóC ed , saíaboH ed setnednecsed so es-mavartnocne , setodrecas so ertnE
. siod e atnerauq e sotnecsies , adoceN ed e saiboT ed , saíaleD ed setnednecsed
: aicnêdnecsa e ailímaf aus alep satilearsi mare es ravorp maredup oãn e remI e nodA-bureuQ , ahcraH-leT , aleM-leT ed mareiv euq sO
. siod e atnevon e sotnezert mare oãmolaS ed sovres sod sohlif so e olpmet od serodivres so , odot oA
. nomA ed e miabeS-tereuqoP ed , litaH ed , saitafehC ed
, lediuG ed , nocraD ed , alaJ ed
, ádureP ed , terefoS ed , iatoS ed sailímaf sad : oãmolaS ed sovres sod setnednecseD
. afitaH ed , aiceN ed setnednecsed
; ámeT ed , aresíS ed , sócraB ed setnednecsed
; asraH ed , adíaM ed , tilecaB ed setnednecsed
; ruraH ed , afucaH ed , cubcaB ed setnednecsed
; missehcifeN ed e minueM ed , iaseB ed setnednecsed
; aessaP ed e ázU ed , mazaG ed setnednecsed
; adoceN ed , niceR ed , saíaeR ed setnednecsed
; raaG ed , lediuG ed , nanaH ed setnednecsed
; iamlaS ed , ábagaH ed , anabeL ed setnednecsed
; nodaP ed , aiS ed , sóreuQ ed setnednecsed
; toabaT ed , afussaH ed , aiC ed setnednecsed : olpmet od serodivreS
. otio e atnirt e otnec , iabohC ed e atitaH ed , bucA ed , nomlaT ed , retA ed , mulaS ed setnednecsed : sorietroP
. otio e atnerauq e otnec , fassA ed setnednecsed : serotnaC
. ortauq e atnetes , saidoH ed , leimedaC ed , éusoJ ed setnednecsed : sativeL
. etessazed e lim , miraH ed setnednecsed
; etes e atnerauq e sotnezud lim , ruihcaP ed setnednecsed
; siod e atneuqnic e lim , remI ed setnednecsed
; sêrt e atnetes e sotnecevon , éusoJ ed ailímaf ad , saíadeJ ed setnednecsed : setodrecaS
. atnirt e sotnecevon lim sêrt , áaneS ed setnatibah
; mu e etniv e sotnecetes , onO e didaH , doL ed setnatibah
; ocnic e atnerauq e sotnezert , ócireJ ed setnatibah
; etniv e sotnezert , miraH ed setnednecsed
; ortauq e atneuqnic e sotnezud lim , malE ortuo od setnednecsed
; siod e atneuqnic , obeN ortuo od snemoh
; sêrt e etniv e otnec , iA ed e leteB ed snemoh
; siod e etniv e otnec , sámciM ed snemoh
; mu e etniv e sotnecsies , abeuG ed e ámaR ed snemoh
; sêrt e atnerauq e sotnecetes , toreB ed e arifaC ed , miraI-tairiuQ ed snemoh
; siod e atnerauq , tevamezA-teB ed snemoh
; otio e etniv e otnec , totanA ed snemoh
; otio e atnetio e otnec , afoteN ed e méleB ed snemoh
; ocnic e atnevon , noebiuG ed setnatibah
; ezod e otnec , firaH ed setnednecsed
; ortauq e etniv e sotnezert , iaçeB ed setnednecsed
; otio e etniv e sotnezert , muhcaH ed setnednecsed
; otio e atnevon , saiuqezE ed ahnil alep , retA ed setnednecsed
; ocnic e atneuqnic e sotnecsies , nidA ed setnednecsed
; etes e atnesses e lim siod , iavgiB ed setnednecsed
; etes e atnesses e sotnecsies , macinodA ed setnednecsed
; siod e etniv e sotnezert lim siod , dagezA ed setnednecsed
; otio e etniv e sotnecsies , iabeB ed setnednecsed
; otio e atnerauq e sotnecsies , iuniB ed setnednecsed
; atnesses e sotnecetes , iacaZ ed setnednecsed
; ocnic e atnerauq e sotnecotio , utaZ ed setnednecsed
; ortauq e atneuqnic e sotnezud lim , malE ed setnednecsed
; otiozed e sotnecotio lim siod , baoJ ed e éusoJ ed etnednecsed are euq , baoM-taaP ed setnednecsed
; siod e atneuqnic e sotnecsies , arA ed setnednecsed
; siod e atnetes e sotnezert , saitafehC ed setnednecsed
; siod e atnetes e otnec lim siod , sóraP ed setnednecseD
: satilearsi sod atsil a atse É » . ánaaB e mueN , iavgiB , terepsiM , nahcliB , ueuqodraM , inamaN , saimaR , sairazA , saimeeN , éusoJ : lebaboroZ moc mareiV
. oãçaovop aus à mu adac , áduJ a e mélasureJ a marasserger , sioped sam ; orretsed o arap so-uodnam , ainólibaB ad ier , rosonodocubaN . orievitac od maratlov euq aicnívorp ad setnatibah so setse oãS «
: seõçacidni setniuges sa ál ed mêV . oilíxe od odasserger mahnit oipícnirp oa , euq seleuqad otsiger ed orvil mu oãtne es-uortnocnE . otnemaesnecer mu rezaf arap ovop o e sievásnopser e sefehc so rinuer a em-uoripsni sueD
. sadíurtsnocer mavatse oãn adnia sasac sa euqrop , asoremun ocuop are oãçalupop a sam , asoçapse e ednarg are edadic A
. asac aus ad atlov à mébmat e otsop oirpórp ues on lauq adac , zev à aicnâligiv messecrexe setnatibah soirpórp so euq arap snedro mébmat ieD . sotsop sues son messevitse oãn sadraug so otnauqne , sadahcef meretnam sa arap e otla ri loS o éta mélasureJ ed satrop sa merirba oãn arap so-iesivA
. sortuo sotium euq sueD a etnemet siam e oirés memoh mu are euq , sainanaH edadic ad ratilim etnadnamoc omoc sup e inanaH oãmri uem oa mélasureJ ed onrevog o ieifnoC
. sativel so e serotnac so , sorietrop so es-maraemon , satrop sa sadacoloc e ahlarum a adíulcnoc iof euq ogoL
. ratsussa em arap satrac saus sa avadnam , zev aus rop , saiboT . seõçcaer sahnim sa ratnoc meri ehl arap , açneserp ahnim an eled meb maizid étA
. saiuqereB ed ohlif , maluhceM ed ahlif a moc odasac avatse nanaoJ ohlif ues O . arA ed ohlif , sainacehC ed orneg res rop , otnemaruj rop saiboT a sodagil mavatse áduJ me sotium euq É
. saiboT e áduJ ed setnatropmi saossep ertne aicnêdnopserroc atium arutla aleuqan mébmat evuoH
. sueD osson od aduja a moc adazilaer odis ahnit arbo atse euq marecehnocer euqrop , sodahlimuh otium maracif e es-marazirometa , ossid marebuos sahniziv seõçan sad sogimini sosson so odnauQ
. adíulcnoc uocif ahlarum a , ohlabart ed said siod e atneuqnic sópa ajes uo , lulE ed sêm od ocnic e etniv soA
» . em-radimitni mavarucorp euq sateforp sortuo sod e saidaoN asiteforp ad mébmat et-adroceR ! talabenaS e saiboT marezif euq od et-arbmel , sueD uem Ó «
. ahnogrev ed em-mairboc e oãçatuper ahnim a maíurtsed amrof atseD . ohlesnoc ues o essiuges ue es , odacep mu rezaf a meravel e meratsussa em arap arE ? mavagap ehl euq é euq rop saM
. ossi arap ogap mahnit ehl talabenaS e saiboT euqrop , otiepser uem a oliuqa aizid sam , eled oiem rop avalaf euq sueD are oãn euq ed atnoc ied , otsin odnasneP
» . sassed asioc amu ieraf oãN . adiv moc racif e oiráutnas on rartne edop oãn ue omoc memoh mu , ossid mélA . egof oãn ue omoc memoh mU « : ehl-idnopser ue saM
» . ratam et arap oãriv etion atsen euqrop , satrop sa somehcef e , oiráutnas od ortned , sueD ed olpmet on son-omertnocnE « : oãtne ele em-essiD . asac ed rias aidop oãn ele euqrop , leibateM ed oten e saíaleD ed ohlif , saíamehC ed asac a iuf oãisaco atreC
» ! megaroc em-ád , ROHNES Ó « . ohlabart o ranodnaba a meravel son arap , son-raminased mavatnet sele sodot euq missa arE
» ! açebac aut ad ossi etsarit euq é uT ! sezid euq od adan edadrev é oãN « : rezid ehl-iednaM
» . otiepser lat a siod so somrasrevnoc arap ecerapmoc , oãzar lat roP . sexrexatrA ed otnemicehnoc oa ragehc ed-oãh sasioc satse etnemlarutaN . áduJ ed ier sé ut euq mélasureJ me meramalcorp arap , sateforp etsecelebatse áj éta e
ier res sári ut , seromur siat odnugeS . ahlarum a riurtsnocer a oãtse , ossi rop , euq e es-ratlover masnep sueduj so e ut euq , amrifnoc o mébmat mehcéuG e , sueduj-oãn so ertne , atsnoC « : ail es edno
, atreba atrac amu oãm me aizart euq , odagerpme ues olep zev atsed , odacer omsem o zev atniuq alep adnia em-uoivne talabenaS
. atsopser amsem a erpmes sehl-ied ue e asioc amsem a rezid maradnam em sezev ortauQ
» . raçnava ed axied arbo a , ocsovnoc ret rof ue eS . ocsovnoc ret ri ossop oãn , ossi rop , e etnatropmi otium arbo amun odapuco uotsE « : atsopser atse moc soriegasnem oãtne sehl-ieivnE
. lam em-rezaf are mavasnep sele euq o , edadrev aN . onO ed elav on , mirifaC me ortnocne mu somret arap em-radivnoc a soriegasnem maraivne mehcéuG e talabenaS
, satrop sa odacoloc essevit oãn adnia arutla assen arobme , sahcerb aivah oãn áj euq e ahlarum a odíurtsnocer ahnit ue euq marebuos sogimini sosson sortuo so e , ebará o , mehcéuG , saiboT , talabenaS odnauQ
» . ovop etse rop zif euq o odut , meb uem arap , atnoc me amot , sueD uem Ó «
. ovop o erbos avasep euq agrac a adasep meb are áj siop , rodanrevog omoc otierid ahnit euq a oãsnep a iemalcer acnun , ossid rasepA . aicnâdnuba me ohniv aivah said zed me zed ed e , seva e sadihlocse sahlevo sies , iob mu etnemairaid es-avaraperP
. ogimoc ret mahniv , sohniziv sovop sod , euq seleuqad méla , soiránoicnuf e ueduj ovop od etneg , saossep atneuqnic e otnec ratnetsus euq ahnit ue E
. ohlabart etsen ogimoc sodinu marevitse sele sodot , sodagerpme suem soa otnauQ . edadeirporp reuqlauq ierpmoc oãn e ahlarum ad oãçurtsnocer à em-ieugertne , oirártnoc oleP
. sueD moc arap otiepser rop , missa idecorp oãn mérop uE . ovop o maimirpo sodagerpme sues so étA . ohniv od e adimoc ad méla , atarp ed sadeom atnerauq maibecer siop , ovop o arap osep mu marof mim ed setna marevitse euq serodanrevog so , oãtne étA
. rodanrevog omoc aicnetrep em euq oãsnep ad osu somezif serodarobaloc suem so men ue men , sexrexatrA ier od siod e atnirt ona oa éta etniv ona o edsed ajes uo , áduJ ed síap od rodanrevog iuf euq me sona ezod so etnaruD
. assemorp aus a uirpmuc ovop o E . ROHNES oa serovuol ued e » ajes missa « uomalcxe oãditlum a adoT » . iussop aroga euq o odut ed odiducas ajes missa euQ . otnemaruj etse rirpmuc oãn euq eleuqa odot sedadeirporp saus sad e asac aus ad arof arap mébmat aducas sueD euQ « : essid e otnam uem o iducas , ossid mélA
. maretemorp euq o raruj sehl-zif e açneserp aus à setodrecas so oãtne ieuqovnoC » ! etsessid omoc someraF . seled adan siam somerebecer oãn e riutitser somaV « : marednopser selE
» . etieza uo ohniv me , ogirt me ajes oriehnid me ajes , maríartnoc sele euq sadivíd sa sehl-meodrep e , sasac saus sa e siavilo sues so , sahniv saus sa , sopmac sues so omsem ejoh sehl-mautitseR
. sadivíd sasse someodreP ! meb sioP . ogirt e oriehnid somátserpme sehl serodarobaloc e soriehnapmoc suem so , omsem ue mébmaT
. són ed ocuop messezif , sogimini sosson , soãgap so euq rative e sueD osson o ratiepser ed oãçagirbo mahniT ! meb átse oãn rezaf a oãtse euq O « : siam sehl-essid E
. rednopser arap sarvalap marevit oãn selE » ? zev artuo ratagser so ed somret arap , ovop osson od saossep a sol-êdnev a manrot aroga e soãgap soa sodidnev odis mahnit euq sueduj satoirtapmoc sosson so , somedup emrofnoc , somátagser sóN « : essid e
, seled asuac rop aielbmessa ednarg amu ieuqovnoC . satoirtapmoc sues soa arusu lat amu meropmi rop , sievásnopser e sefehc so idneerper e omsem ogimoc osac on iesneP
. odatirri etnemadnuforp ieuqif , sarvalap saleuqa e saxieuq saleuqa ivuo odnauQ
» . sortuo a mecnetrep áj sahniv sasson sa e sopmac sosson so siop , ossi rative arap adan rezaf somedop oãn e savarcse oãs áj sahlif sasson sad samugla , sáilA . sahlif sasson sa e sohlif sosson so oãdivarcse à ratiejus ed somet , ossid rasepA . seled sohlif so omoc oãs sohlif sosson so e satoirtapmoc sosson sod açar amsem ad somos , otnatne on , E
. sahniv e sarret sasson sa odnacetopih , ier oa sotsopmi so ragap arap odatserpme oriehnid ridep ed somet sóN « : essatnecserca meuq adnia aivaH
» . emof à somrerrom oãn e ogirt somriugesnoc arap , sasac sasson sa e sahniv sasson sa , sopmac sosson so racetopih ed someT « : maizid sortuO
» . reviv somredop e somremoc arap ogirt ed somasicerp e sahlif e sohlif sotium someT « : essessid meuq otcaf ed avatlaf oãN
. sueduj soãmri sues so artnoc , serehlum ed omoc snemoh ed otnat , ovop od saxieuq sednarg mavatnavel es euq mébmat uecetnocA






. oãm an amra a avavresnoc mu adac e somaítsev euq apuor a somavárit , maiuges em euq adraug ed snemoh so e serodarobaloc suem so , soriehnapmoc suem so men , ue meN
. aid o etnarud rahlabart meredop e , etion a etnarud edadic a meradraug missa arap , mélasureJ ed ortned etion a messassap , setnaduja so omsem , sodot euq arap snedro ied , oãisaco amsem aleuqaN
. samra avahnupme laossep od edatem otnauqne , etion ad riac oa éta ãhnam ad repmor o edsed , arbo an somaváhlabart són euq amrof atsed arE
» . odal osson olep áratul sueD osson o e mim a es-metnuj , atebmort ad mos o maçuo euq reuq edno , ossi roP
. sortuo sod snu setnatsid e ahlarum a erbos sodarapes somatse són e asnetxe e ednarg é arbo A « : setneserp so sodot a e sievásnopser soa , sefehc soa otid ahnit ue euq É
. erpmes em-avahnapmoca atebmort ed rodacot mu E . maíurtsnocer otnauqne , arutnic à adapse a mahnit sorierdep so sodoT
. amra a mavahnupme artuo a moc e mavahlabart soãm sad amu moc , siairetam so mavatropsnart euq sO . sahlarum sad oãçurtsnocer an avahlabart euq
áduJ ed ovop oa oiopa ues o mavad sefehc sosson so E . saçaruoc e socra , soducse , saçnal moc : samra moc avatse edatem artuo a e sahlarum san avahlabart snemoh suem sod edatem , oãtne ed ritrap A
. aferat aus a mu adac odnahnepmesed , ahlarum an rahlabart a oãtne somátloV . sonalp sues so odartsurf ahnit sehl sueD euq e odut ed etnerroc oa somavátse són euq rebas a mareiv sogimini sosson sO
» ! sasac sassov salep e serehlum sassov salep , sahlif e sohlif sossov solep , satoirtapmoc sossov solep metuL ! levírret e ednarg é rohneS o euq es-merbmeL ! seled odem mahnet oãN « : setneserp so sodot a e sievásnopser soa , sefehc soa rezid arap zov a ratnavel ed evit , odanoiccepsni revah odut ed siopeD
. socra e saçnal , sadapse moc , sadíulcnoc adnia mavatse oãn edno soitís son , sahlarum sad sárt rop , sãlc sues so odnuges sodíubirtsid , ovop od sodadlos so oãtne ieuqoloC
. sodal so sodot rop son-racata mairiv sogimini sosson so euq ed son-rasiva sezev sairáv mareiv seled oiem on mavatibah euq sueduj so saM
. sarbo sa rarap a meragirbo e meratam son arap , són ed oiem oa meragehc éta adan somaírev men , atnoc somaírad oãn són euq sogimini sosson so mavasneP
» . ahlarum a riurtsnocer ed sezapac somos oãn sóN . sorbmocse ed edaditnauq lat etnarep açrof mes oãtse serodagerrac sO « : aizid áduJ ed ovop o E
. seled somrednefed son arap , etion e aid , adraug ed snemoh somácoloc e sueD osson oa oãtne somárO
. lam son-rezaf e mélasureJ racata meriv arap , sodot es-marinU
. es-marecerufne , sahlarum sad sahcerb sa rapat a mavaçemoc es áj e mavaçnava oãçurtsnocer ed sohlabart so euq marebuos dodsA ed setnatibah so e satinoma so , sebará so , saiboT , talabenaS odnauQ

. ovop o odot ed omsaisutne aivah siop , arutla aiem a avatse áj , opmet essen , euq ahlarum a riurtsnocer a somáunitnoc mérop sóN
» . ahlarum a riurtsnocer a átse meuq meratlusni rop , açneserp aut ad maçerapased euq e ; sodacep sues so men , edadlam aus a seodrep sehl oãN
. síap ortuo arap sorienoisirp sodavel majes e sogimini sod redop me maiac sele euq e somsem sele erbos maiac sotlusni sues so euQ . són ed ocuop mezaf omoc , sueD osson ó , atucsE « : oãçaro atse ROHNES oa oãtne igiriD
» ! sardep sa áraburred amic rop etlas ehl euq asopar amu , ahlarum a maurtsnoc sele euq adniA « : uotnecserca , odal oa avatse euq , atinoma o , saiboT zev aus roP
» ? sadamieuq marof áj sale odnauq , savon sardep saníur ed seõtnom sod rariter marepsE ? aid mun ohlabart o riulcnoc sele masneP ? soicífircas recerefo e riurtsnocer maxied so euq masneP ? sueduj sieváresim setse rezaf a oãtse euq é euQ « : airamaS ed sodadlos sod e soriehnapmoc sues sod etnaid aiziD
. són ed ocuop rezaf a uoçemoc e etnemetrof es-uotirri , sahlarum sa riurtsnocer a somavátse , sueduj so , són euq ebuos talabenaS euq ogoL
. sahlevO sad atrop a e , aniuqse ad aigiv ed otsop od ritrap a , etniuges oçort o maríurtsnocer setnaicremoc so e seviruo sO
. ahlarum ad olugnâ on , aigiv ed otsop oa éta , adrauG ad atrop ad etnerf me , setnaicremoc sod e olpmet od setnevres sod sasac sà éta uiurtsnoceR . seviruo are euq , saiuqlaM uohlabart odal oA
. aicnêdiser aus ad etnaid uiurtsnocer saiuqereB ed ohlif , maluhceM , seled siopeD . riuges a ogol , oãçces adnuges aus a maríurtsnocer , falaS ed ohlif otxes o are euq , nunaH e saimelehC ed ohlif , sainanaH
. etneirO ed atrop ad adraug are euq , sainacehC ed ohlif , saíamehC uohlabart , odal od oãçces aN . asac aus ad etnaid , remI ed ohlif , codaS uiurtsnocer , riuges A
. asac aus ed etnerf me mu adac , setodrecas so marahlabart , solavaC sod atrop ad ritrap A
. lefO ed otnuj ahlarum à éta errot ednarg ad edadimertxe a edsed , oãçces adnuges aus a maríurtsnocer aocéT ed setnatibah so , seled siopeD
. eugre es ila euq errot ad e , etnecsan a , augÁ ad atrop ad etnerf à éta maríurtsnocer lefO ed orriab on mavatibah euq olpmet od setnevres sO
. sóraP ed ohlif , saíadeP uohlabart , riuges a ogoL . oãsirp ad oirtá od otnuj , laer oicálap od amica eugre es euq errot ad e ahlarum ad aniuqse a edsed , etniuges oãçces a uiurtsnocer , iazU ed ohlif , lalaP
. aniuqse à éta sairazA ed asac a edsed , etniuges rotces o uiurtsnocer , dadaneH ed ohlif , iuniB
. asac aus ed etnerf me acif euq etrap a mébmat uiurtsnocer , sainanA ed oten e saiessaM ed ohlif , sairazA . sasac saus sad etnerf me odniurtsnocer , bussaH e mimajneB marahlabart , sele a riuges A
. mélasureJ ed seroderra son mavatibah euq setodrecas so marahlabart , ahlarum ad etniuges oçort oN
. asac ad edadimertxe à éta bihcailE ed asac ad adartne a edsed , etniuges oãçces a uiurtsnocer , sóC ed oten e sairU ed ohlif , tomereM
. rotces odnuges ues o , iabaZ ed ohlif , curaB uiurtsnocer , bihcailE etodrecas omus od asac ad adartne à éta , aniuqse ad ritrap A
. ahlarum ad aniuqse à éta , samra sad otisóped od adibus a edsed ahlarum ad rotces odnuges ues o uorapeR . ápsiM ed rodanrevog , éusoJ ed ohlif , rezÉ uohlabart riuges a ogoL
. alieuQ ed otirtsid od edatem artuo ad rodanrevog e dadaneH ed sohlif , iuniB soãmri so marahlabart , seled siopeD
. otirtsid od emon me ohlabart esse zef lauq o , alieuQ ed otirtsid od edatem ed rodanrevog , saibassaH etnaida siam , e inaB ed ohlif , mueR uohlabart ilA . sativel solep odíurtsnocer iof etniuges oçort O
. ratilim letrauq od e augá ed otisóped od otnuj éta , divaD ed olumút oa éta uohlabarT . ruS-teB ed otirtsid od edatem ed rodanrevog are euq , cubezA ed ohlif , saimeeN uiurtsnocer etnaida siam ocuop mU
. divaD ed edadic ad ecsed euq airadacse à éta , ier od midraj od otrep , éoliS ed anicsip ad ahlarum a mébmat uiurtsnoceR . sacnart e sarudahcef sa moc setnetab so ehl-uocoloc e otcet moc a-uirboc , a-uocifideer : etnoF ad atrop a uiurtsnocer , ápsiM ed otirtsid od rodanrevog , ézoH-loC ed ohlif , mulaS
. sacnart e sarudahcef saus sa moc setnetab so ehl-uocoloc , ariemurtsE ad atrop a uiurtsnocer , meraC-teB ed otirtsid od rodanrevog , baceR ed ohlif , saiuqlaM
. ariemurtsE ad atrop à éta , ahlarum ed sortem atneuqnic e sotnecortauq ed acrec mébmat maríurtsnocer ; sacnart e sarudahcef saus sa moc setnetab ehl-maracoloc , an-maríurtsnocer : elaV od atroP a mararaper aonaZ ed setnatibah so e nunaH
. sahlif saus sad aduja a moc , etniuges oãçces a uiurtsnocer , mélasureJ ed otirtsid od edatem artuo ad efehc , séoL ed ohlif , mulaS
. sonroF sod errot a aíulcni euq rotces odnuges ues o maríurtsnocer , baoM-taaP ed ohlif , bussaH e miraH ed ohlif , saiuqlaM
. sainebassaH ed ohlif , sutaH uohlabart etnaida siaM . asac airpórp aus ad etnerf me avatse euq oãçces a , odal oa , uiurtsnocer , famuraH ed ohlif , saíadeJ
. mélasureJ ed otirtsid od edatem ed rodanrevog are euq , ruH ed ohlif , saíafeR uohlabart , etniuges rotces oN
. agral ahlarum à éta maríurtsnoceR . atsimufrep are euq sainanaH uohlabart , odal oA . seviruo are euq , saíaraH ed ohlif , leizU rop odíurtsnocer iof etniuges oçort O
. setarfuE od etseo a adautis aicnívorp ad rodanrevog od sasnepxe a , ápsiM ed e noebiuG ed snemoh so e tonoreM ed nodaJ , noebiuG ed saitaleM marahlabart , odal oa oãçces aN
. sacnart sa e sarudahcef sa maresup e setnetab so maracoloc , sarierbmo sa maratnavel : ahleV atrop a maríurtsnocer , saidoseB ed ohlif , maluhceM e aessaP ed ohlif , ádaioJ
. setnegirid soa messecedebo oãn sefehc sues so arobme , riuges a avacif euq etrap a maríurtsnocer aocéT ed snemoh sO
. etniuges oãçces an uiurtsnocer , ánaaB ed ohlif , codaS . lebazehceM ed oten e saiuqereB ed ohlif , maluhceM mébmat e , sóC ed oten , sairU ed ohlif , tomereM uohlabart , seled odal oa , rotces oN
. sacnart e sarudahcef savitcepser sa moc satrop sa ragul on maracoloc e sarierbmo sa maratnavel : sexieP sod atrop a maríurtsnocer áaneS ed setnednecsed sO
. iremI ed ohlif , rucaZ mébmat e ócireJ ed snemoh so mavahlabart seled odal oA
. leinanaH ed errot à éta oãçurtsnocer a maraunitnoc , odargasnoc meret a ed siopsed , E . meC sod errot à éta ahlarum a sioped maríurtsnoceR . setnetab so maracoloc ehl e marargasnoc a somsem selE . sahlevO sad atrop a maríurtsnocer , setodrecas so , soriehnapmoc sues so moc bihcailE etodrecas omus O
» . edadic atsen oãçadrocer ed sovitom men , edadeirporp men , otierid mêt oãn siop , otnussa etsen retem es euq adan mêt oãn serohnes so e mélasureJ ed oãçurtsnocer a raçemoc somav , sovres sues , sóN . aserpme atsed meb rias son-rezaf ed-áh suéc sod sueD O « : rednopser sehl ed evit ue E
» ? ier o artnoc es-ratlover mereuQ ? rezaf masnep euq é euQ « : zevitla moc son-maressid e són ed ocuop marezif , mehcéuG ebará o e atinoma oiránoicnuf o saiboT , noroH ed talabenaS , otsid merebas oA
. acifíngam arbo atse a soãm maresup etnemasojaroc E » ! ohlabart oa somav , miS « : marednopser sele , aressid em ier o euq o ietnoc sehl e odaduja ahnit em sueD uem o omoc ieuqilpxe sehl odnauQ
» . asohnogrev oãçautis atsen siam someunitnoc oãn e mélasureJ ed sahlarum sa riurtsnocer somsem són somaV ! sadamieuq satrop saus sa e saníur me átse mélasureJ : somartnocne son açargsed euq me majeV « : etniuges o essid sehl ue euq é sioped óS
. sohlabart son rapicitrap mairi euq saossep sartuo men , setnegirid e sefehc so , setodrecas so , é otsi , sueduj so odamrofni ahnit reuqes men adnia , arutla asseN . arezif euq o men odi ahnit ue edno arap marebuos oãn sedadirotua sA
. rartne arap elaV od atroP à ovon ed ietlov e ahlarum a ravresbo a , etion ed adnia , nordéC od elav olep iecnavA
. odatnom ai ue euq me lamina o rassap arap ragul aivah oãn e ier od anicsip à e etnoF ad atrop à éta iugeS
. ogof olep sadíurtsed satrop saus sa e saníur me mavatse euq mélasureJ ed sahlarum sa ravresbo missa eduP . ariemurtsE ad atrop à e oãgarD od etnof à oãçcerid me elaV od atroP alep ías , etion asseN
. ai ue euq me adatnom a sanepa somaváveL . snemoh snugla moc ías e em-ietnavel , etion ed siopeD
. edadic alep rezaf a odaripsni ahnit em sueD euq od méugnin a adan ratnoc mes ál evitse , said sêrt etnarud , e mélasureJ a ieugehC
. satilearsi sod ratse-meb olep avasseretni es euq méugla odniv ret rop sodatirri etnemadnuforp maracif , atinoma oiránoicnuf , saiboT e , noroH ed edadic ad , talabenaS , adagehc ahnim ad marebuos odnauq saM
. ier od satrac sad agertne sehl-zif e setarfuE od etseo a serodanrevog so moc ret ri arap ohnimac a oãtne em-suP . seratilim sefehc ed e airalavac ed atlocse amu ogimoc etnematnuj uoivne sexrexatrA
. uoduja em sueD uem o euqrop , idep ue euq o odut em-uedecnoc ier o E . ratibah airi ue edno asac a arap e edadic ad sahlarum sad satrop sa arap , olpmet od amixórp azelatrof ad satrop sa arap ariedam eled riugesnoc ed mif o moc , ier od satserolf sad adraug o are euq , fassA arap atrac amu etnemlaugi ideP
. áduJ ed arret a arap etnemervil riuges messaxied em sele euq arap , setarfuE oir od etnedico a oãtse euq serodanrevog soa sadigirid satrac seugertne messof em euq arap otnemitnesnoc mébmat ehl-ideP
. ri raxied em me uitnesnoc ele e satad ehl-ieuqidni oãtne uE » ? sáratlov euq é odnauq e megaiv aut a árarud opmet otnauQ « : em-uotnugrep , odal ues a adatnes ahniar a ahnit euq , ier O
» . aurtsnocer a ue euq arap , sodassapetna suem so sodatlupes oãtse edno edadic à , áduJ ed aicnívorp à ri assop ue euq em-atimrep , saçarg saob saus san uotse ue es e edatsejaM auS a meb recerap eS « : ehl-idnopser
, uéc oa ecerp ahnim a odnavele , ue oãtnE » ? açaf et ue euq ut sereuq euQ « : ier o em-uotnugreP
» ? ogof olep sadíurtsed sahlarum sad satrop sa e saníur me átse sodassapetna suem sod solumút so oãtse edno edadic a es , etsirt radna ue ed-ieh oãn omoC ! erpmes arap aviv edatsejaM auS euQ « : ehl-idnopser
, oiecer etnatsab moc , uE » ! oãçapucoerp ednarg amu res edop ós ossi , otnatroP . etneod sátse oãn uT ? snet ut euq é euQ « : oãtne ele em-uotnugreP
. odicetnoca ahnit acnun setna euq o , etsirt otium avatse ue euq ed atnoc es-ued ier o , ohniv o ehl-rivres ai ue odnauq , odanier ues od etniv ona od nasiN ed sêm oN
. sexrexatrA ier od oriepoc ue are , arutla aleuqa roP » . ogimoc arap mob ajes ier o euq e odidecus meb ajes ue euq moc zaF . rarnoh mereuq et euq sovres sortuo sod seõçaro sa e oãçaro ahnim a aroga atucsE
. açrof aut a e redop uet o moc etsatrebil euq ovop uet o somos ; sovres suet somos sóN
. emon otnas uet o odaroda res ál arap odihlocse ragul oa rasserger rezaf e rinuer son ed saivah , odnum od snifnoc son sodarretsed somessévitse euq adnia , sotnemadnam suet so somessírpmuc e somessêtrevnoc son es , euq etsessid mébmat saM
. sotiecerp suet so somessídergsnart són es , etrap a adot rop rasrepsid son ed saivah euq sésioM a etsessid euq et-adroceR
. sésioM ovres uet od oiem rop etsed son euq sotiecerp e siel sa , sotnemadnam so somirpmuc oãn siop , otium et-somednefO
. it artnoc odacep somet , sodassapetna suem so omoc ue otnat , euq oçehnoceR . satilearsi sovres suet solep etion e aid oçaf ue euq , oãçaro ahnim a sadneta e setucse euq , ossi rop , et-oçeP
. sotnemadnam suet so merpmuc e mama et euq seleuqa moc arap osoidrociresim sé e açnaila a moc arap leif sé ut , levírret e ednarg sueD , uéc od sueD , ROHNES Ó «
: uéc od sueD oa oãçaro ahnim a igirid e mujej zif , etsirt otium iedna , said soiráv etnarud , e rarohc a em-ietnes , otsi rivuo oA
» . ogof olep sadíurtsed adnia satrop sa e saníur me maunitnoc sahlarum sa , mélasureJ a otnauQ . airésim ednarg me e sedadlucifid sednarg me es-martnocne orievitac o arap marof oãn e airtáp an maracif euq sessE « : etniuges o em-maressid selE
. ainólibaB ad orievitac oa odapacse mahnit euq sueduj sod e mélasureJ ed saicíton sehl-ideP . snemoh snugla siam moc soãmri suem sod mu , inanaH , áduJ ed aicnívorp ad , uogehc odnauq
, asuS ed azelatrof an ue em-avartnocne , sexrexatrA ed odanier od , etniv ona od uelsiuQ ed sêm oN . sailacaH ed ohlif , saimeeN ed airótsiH








































































































































































































































































































































































































. sohlif soa e sale a san-maraslupxe e sariegnartse serehlum moc odasac mahnit setse sodoT
. saíaneB e leoJ , odiJ , anibeZ , dabaZ , saitataM , leieJ : obeN ed setnednecsed soD
. ésoJ e sairamA , mulaS
, sairamehC , saimelehC , lerazA
, iarahC , iahcahC , iabedancaM
, saíadA , nataN , saimelehC
, iemiS : iuniB ed setnednecsed soD
. iassaJ , ianetaM , sainataM
, bihcailE , tomereM , sainaV
, uleuQ , saideB , saíaneB
, leU , maremA , iadaM : inaB ed setnednecsed soD
. iemiS e séssanaM , iamereJ , telefilE , dabaZ . átateM , ianetaM : muhcaM ed setnednecsed soD
. sairamehC e culaM , mimajneB
, oãemiS , saíamehC , saiuqlaM , saissiJ , rezéilE : miraH ed setnednecsed soD
. séssanaM e iuniB , lelaçeB , sainataM , saiessaM , saíaneB , laleuQ , ándA : baoM-taaP ed setnednecsed soD
. tomireJ e laehC , bussaJ , saíadA , culaM , maluhceM : inaB ed setnednecsed soD
. ialtA e iabaZ , sainanaH , nanaoJ : iabeB ed setnednecsed soD
. azizA e dabaZ , tomireJ , sainataM , bihcailE , ianeoilE : utaZ ed setnednecsed soD
. sailE e tomireJ , idbA , leieJ , sairacaZ , sainataM : malE ed setnednecsed soD
. saíaneB e saiuqlaM , razaelE , nimaiM , saiuqlaM , saiziJ , saimaR : sóraP ed setnednecsed soD : satilearsi sortuO
. irU e meleT , mulaS : sorietroP . bihcailE : serotnaC
. rezéilE e áduJ , saíateP , atileuQ o é euq , saíaleuQ , iemiS , dabazoJ : sativeL
. ruihcaP ed setnednecsed , ássalE e dabazoJ , leinataN , leamsI , saiessaM , ianeoilE
; miraH ed setnednecsed , saizU e leieJ , saíamehC , sailE , saiessaM
; remI ed setnednecsed , saidabeZ e inanaH
. odacep ues olep oicífircas omoc orienrac mu merecerefo a e sasopse saus sa arobme radnam a sodot es-maretemorpmoC
. cadaçoJ ed sohlif , soãmri sues ed e éusoJ ed ailímaf ad setse sodot , sailodoG e biraJ , rezéilE , saiessaM : setodrecaS : sariegnartse serehlum moc odasac mahnit euq sod atsil a es-eugeS
. sariegnartse serehlum moc sotnemasac ed sosac so sodot ed otnemagluj o odíulcnoc mahnit sele , setniuges sesem sêrt sod ortned , E
. otnussa o erbos meridiced arap sêm omicéd od aid oriemirp on marinuer es siauq so , semon sues solep sodangised sele sodot , ailímaf ed sefehc , snemoh snugla oãtne uehlocse sardsE etodrecas O . maradrocnoc orievitac od sodasserger sortuo so sodoT
. iatebahC ativel olep e maluhceM rop sodaiopa , medro atse a maresupo es , ávciT ed ohlif , saizaJ e , leasA ed ohlif , sanoJ sanepA
» . odacep etse rop adasuac , sueD ed ari ednarg a són ed ratsafa es éta , sezíuj sues so e edadic ad sefehc so moc , ranimreted a sozarp me metneserpa es sariegnartse serehlum moc marasac e sedadic sasson san meviv euq so sodot euq E . sefehc sosson so otnussa od meugerracne es euQ
. otnop etsen somáhlaf euq so setnatsab somos euqrop , siod uo aid mun revloser es arap asioc é oãn otsi , siam arap , E . arof ác raunitnoc edop es oãn e savuhc sad acopé an somatse , sotium somos sóN « : etniuges o otnatertne maratnecsercA
» . sezid son omoc someraf , miS « : atla zov me uednopser ovop od aielbmessa a adot E
» . sariegnartse serehlum sassov sad es-merapes e sarret satsen meviv euq soriegnartse sod es-metsafA . edatnov aus a marpmuc e , sodassapetna sossov ed sueD , ROHNES od etnaid apluc asse maçehnocer aroga saM
. learsI ed apluc a missa maravarga e , sariegnartse serehlum moc merasac oa , maraceP « : odom etsed sehl-uolaf e es-uotnavel sardsE etodrecas O
. aíac euq avuhc ad e ratart ai es euq otnussa od asuac rop , remert a mavatse sodot e olpmet od açarp an iof oãinuer A . sêm onon od etniv aid on etnemasicerp , said sêrt sodassap , mélasureJ me marinuer es mimajneB ed e áduJ ed snemoh so sodot , etniugesnoc roP
. sodanroter sod seõinuer san etrap ramot ed otierid o airedrep e sneb sues so sodacsifnoc airev , said sêrt ed mif oa essecerapmoc oãn méugla eS . ovop od sefehc sod medro rop otsi
, orievitac od sodanroter so mélasureJ me messinuer es euq arap mélasureJ e áduJ me recehnoc a adad iof euq airótacovnoc amu oãtne es-zeF
. orievitac od odasserger mahnit euq seleuqad odacep o moc odicetsirtne avatse euqrop , rebeb e remoc uosucer ele , augá e oãp meravel ehl ed rasepa E . bihcailE ed ohlif , nanaoJ ed sotnesopa so arap iof e olpmet od etnerf me avatse edno ragul od , es-uoriter sardsE , adiuges mE
. mararuj sele E . atsoporp aleuqa mairatieca euq ovop od otser od e sativel sod , setodrecas sod sefehc so raruj zef e es-uotnavel sardsE oãtnE
» ! arbo à soãm e megaroC . oiopa osson o moc ratnoc sedoP . aut é edadilibasnopser a siop , et-atnaveL
. iel a adnam euq o rirpmuc somaV . sueD osson od sotnemadnam so matiepser euq seleuqad so e sohlesnoc suet so odniuges , sohlif sues so e serehlum sasse sadot arobme radnam a sueD osson od etnaid son-retemorpmoc somaV
. learsI arap açnarepse amu adnia atser , otnatne oN . arret atsed siarutan , sariegnartse serehlum moc somrasac oa , sueD osson o artnoc somácep sóN « : sardsE a essid , malE ed ailímaf ad , leieJ ed ohlif , sainacehC oãtnE
. etnemagrama mébmat odnarohc , ele a es-ratnuj oiev , saçnairc e serehlum , snemoh , satilearsi ed oãditlum ednarg amu , sueD ed olpmet od etnaid rarohc a e arret rop odartsorp , oãssifnoc atse aizaf e avaro sardsE otnauqnE
» . ossid asuac rop , açneserp aut an ratse somedop oãn euq odnebas , satlaf sasson sa it ed etnaid somecehnoceR . rev edop es omoc , ejoh ed aid oa éta esseviverbos són ed otser mu euq etsaxied euqrop , osodnob sé ut , learsI ed sueD , ROHNES Ó
? reviverbos siam méugnin mes , etnematelpmoc seríurtsed son ed otnop oa éta són artnoc sairatirri et oãN ? sievátseted oãt sacitárp ed etneg atse moc sotnemasac razilaer e sotiecerp suet so ridergsnart a ratlov són someredoP
. oãçatrebil atse son-etsedecnoc siop , somaícerem euq od sonem etsagitsac son , missa omsem , euq somecehnocer són , satlaf sevarg e seõçca sám sasson sad asuac rop , uecetnoca son euq o odut ed siopeD
. erpmes arap setnednecsed sosson soa açnareh omoc raxied ed somevah euq , síap etsed sneb sod somrazog e setrof res somredop ed mif a , sele moc meb ed e zap me ratse somerucorp men , sahlif saus sa moc mesac es sohlif sosson so men , seled sohlif so moc mesac es sahlif sasson sa euq ritnesnoc somereuq oãn , aroga otnatroP
. artuo à atnop amud arret asse maihcne euq e avatibah ál euq etneg ad airtalodi ed sacitárp salep adanimatnoc avatse riussop somaíri són euq arret a euq odanisne mahnit selE ? sovres suet , sateforp sod oiem rop etsed son euq
, sotnemadnam suet so somirpmuc oãn euq zev amu , otsi odut ed sioped , aroga rezid són somedop euQ
! mélasureJ e áduJ me açnaruges somrahca arap e avartnocne es euq me saníur sad olpmet osson o ovon ed somratnavel arap reviv messaxied son aisréP ad sier so euq moc etsezif , edadnob aut aleP . oãdivarcse asson an etsanodnaba son oãn ut sam , sovarcse somaré , otcaf ed , són euqroP
. oãdivarcse asson ad oiem on adiv ed ocuop mu e sohlo sosson so arap zul amu iof euq o , otnas ragul etsen oigúfer messartnocne e edadrebil a messiugesnoc són ed snugla euq moc odnezaf , ocsonnoc arap edadnob aut a rartsom ed etsabaca , sueD osson , ROHNES , opmet ocuop áh adnia , ossid rasepA
. somartnocne son adnia euq me asohnogrev oãçautis à sotiejus e sodabuor , sodiref somof e soriegnartse sier ed soãm san somíac , setodrecas sosson so e sier sosson so , són euq seõssergsnart sasson sad asuac rop ioF . otium odacep somet , ejoh éta , sodassapetna sosson sod opmet o edseD
. uéc oa éta odnatnemua es-marof satlaf sasson sa e saçebac sasson sad amica maracilpitlum es sodacep sosson so euqrop , it arap otsor uem o ratnavel arap osufnoc e odahnogrevne otium em-otnis ue , sueD uem Ó « : iemalc e
ROHNES oa raro arap soãm sa ietnavel , sohleoj ed em-sup , sadagsar sapuor sa moc adnia , e oãçartsorp ahnim ad em-ietnavel , edrat ad oicífircas od aroh a ragehc oA
. edrat ad oicífircas od aroh à éta missa evitsE . orievitac od odatlov mahnit euq seleuqad sodacep sod asuac rop , learsI ed sueD od ogitsac o maimet euq so sodot mim a es-marinu E
. odaminased etnemadnuforp oãhc on em-ietnes e abrab ahnim a e olebac uem o ieuqnarra , otul ed lanis me sapuor sahnim sa ieugsar , sasioc siat rivuo oA
» . odacep etsen riac a soriemirp so marof setnegirid e sefehc soirpórp sO . sovop setse moc odarutsim uocif sueD ed otnas ovop o missa e sãgap serehlum moc marasac sohlif sues so omoc sele otnaT
. maiviv sele euq me airtalodi ed sacitárp samsem san maríaC . suerroma e soicpíge , satibaom , satinoma , suesubej , suezirep , satitih , suenanac rezid reuq , síap etsed etneg ad maratsafa es oãn , sativel e setodrecas odniulcni , satilearsi sO « : merezid em arap sefehc sod snugla ogimoc ret mareiv , otsi odut ed sioped áJ
. sueD ed olpmet oa e ovop oa sievárovaf marof , otcaf ed , euq setarfuE oir od etseo a aicnívorp ad serodanrevog soa e sedadirotua sà ier od snedro sa maritimsnart siopeD
. ROHNES oa otsuacoloh me sodamieuq marof siamina setse sodoT . sodacep solep atrefo arap sedob ezod e soriedroc etes e atnetes , sorienrac sies e atnevon , learsI ed ovop o odot rop soletiv ezod : learsI ed sueD oa sotsuacoloh , ovop o odot ed emon me , oãtne marecerefo orievitac od odasserger mahnit euq sO
. otircse rop odatsiger iof odut , etnemlanif , e odasep e odatnoc odut ioF
. iuniB ed ohlif , saidaoN e , éusoJ ed ohlif , dabazoJ sativel so e , saieniF ed ohlif , razaelE ele moc mavatsE . sairU ed ohlif , tomereM etodrecas oa odut es-uogertne e sotcejbo sosrevid so e oruo o , atarp a sueD ed olpmet on es-uosep , aid otrauq oN
. said sêrt etnarud somásnacsed , mélasureJ a odagehc somret ed siopeD
. megaiv a etnarud ogimini od sadacsobme e seuqata sod son-uegetorp e son-uoduja sueD osson O . sêm oriemirp od ezod aid on , mélasureJ a somrigirid son arap avaA oir od somitraP
. sueD osson od olpmet on meragertne e mélasureJ arap meravel so arap sodasep odis meret ed sioped , soilísnetu so e oruo o , atarp a oãtne marebecer sativel so e setodrecas sO
» . ROHNES od olpmet od oruoset od salas san , mélasureJ me , learsI ed ailímaf ed sefehc sod etnaid e sativel sod e setodrecas sod sefehc sod etnaid merasep so éta odadiuc moc son-medrauG
. siap sossov ed sueD ROHNES oa sodicerefo marof etnemaenatnopse euq oruo e atarp ed sotcejbo setse oãtse sodargasnoc etnemlaugI . ROHNES oa sodargasnoc oãtse sêcoV « : sehl-essid siopeD
. oruo ed messof es omoc osoilav oãt etnahlirb e odilop eznorb ed sosav siod e saçep lim ed rolav on , oruo ed saçat etniv
, oruo ed sadalenot sêrt e atarp me sosoicerp sotcejbo ed sadalenot sêrt , atarp ed sadalenot etniv ed acrec sehl-ieugertnE
. setneserp mavatse euq satilearsi solep e siaicifo e soãsetroc sues solep , ier olep sueD osson od olpmet oa sodicerefo sotcejbo so e oruo o , atarp a seled etnaid iesep , adiuges mE
. sues soriehnapmoc zed e saibassaH , saiberehC moc , ezod ihlocse setodrecas sod sefehc so ertnE
. son-uivuo ele e sueD osson oa somáro e somáujej són , ossi roP
. manodnaba o euq so etnemetrof agitsac sam , mevres o euq seleuqa sodot egetorp sueD euq otid ahnit ehl ue euqrop , otsI . megaiv a etnarud , sogimini so artnoc messednefed son euq sorielavac ed atlocse amu ier oa ridep ed odahnogrevne em-ahnit ue euq É
. aicnetrep son euq o odut a e sohlif sosson soa , són a , megaiv an essegetorp son euq somridep ehl e sueD osson od etnaid somrahlimuh son arap e somraujej són sodot arap snedro ied , avaA oir od otnuj , ilA
. sele sodot ed semon so odnacidni , etniv e sotnezud maradnam , sativel sod oçivres oa odanitsed mahnit serodarobaloc sues so e divaD euq setnevres so ertned , ossid mélA
. saossep etniv ed oremún me , soãmri e sohlif sues moc , irareM ed ailímaf ad mare euq saíasI e saibassaH etnemlaugi maradnaM
. otiozed ed oremún me , soãmri e sohlif sues ele moc odniv , iveL ed obirt ad somar sod mu are euq , ilaM ed ailímaf ad etnednecsed atilearsi mu , odidnetne memoh , saiberehC son-maradnam sele , sueD osson od oãçcetorp à saçarG
. sueD ed olpmet on oçivres meratserp arap saossep messaivne son euq , olpmet od setnevres so , soriehnapmoc sues soa e ele a merezid ehl arap , aifíssaC adamahc edadilacol amud efehc , odI moc ret ri so-iednaM
. natanlE e biraJ sabircse so mébmat e setnegirid mare euq , maluhceM e sairacaZ , nataN , natanlE , biraJ , natanlE , saíamehC , leirA , rezéilE ramahc ossi rop iednaM
. ativel muhnen iertnocne oãn , setodrecas so e ovop o ertne odarucorp oãtne odneT . said sêrt ál somápmaca e avaA arap erroc euq oir od otnuj sodot a so-inueR
. snemoh atnetes ed sodahnapmoca , iavgiB ed setnednecsed sod , dubaZ e iatU
. snemoh atnesses ed sodahnapmoca , macinodA ed setnednecsed somitlú , saíamehC e leieJ , telefilE
; snemoh zed e otnec ed odahnapmoca , dagezA ed setnednecsed sod , nataC ed ohlif , nanaoJ
; snemoh otio e etniv ed odahnapmoca , iabeB ed setnednecsed sod , iabeB ed ohlif , sairacaZ
; snemoh atnesses e otnec ed odahnapmoca , inaB ed setnednecsed sod , saifesoJ ed ohlif , etimolehC
; snemoh otiozed e sotnezud ed odahnapmoca , baoJ ed setnednecsed sod , leieJ ed ohlif , saidabO
; snemoh atnetio ed odahnapmoca , saitafehC ed setnednecsed sod , leaciM ed ohlif , saidabeZ
; snemoh atnetes ed odahnapmoca , malE ed setnednecsed sod , sailatA ed ohlif , saíaseJ
; snemoh atneuqnic ed odahnapmoca , nidA ed setnednecsed sod , natanoJ ed ohlif , debÉ
; snemoh sotnezert ed odahnapmoca , utaZ ed setnednecsed sod , leizaJ ed ohlif , sainacehC
; snemoh sotnezud ed odahnapmoca , baoM-taaP ed setnednecsed sod , saíareZ ed ohlif , ianeoilE
; ailímaf ed otsiger on sotircsni snemoh atneuqnic e otnec ed odahnapmoca , sóraP ed setnednecsed sod , sairacaZ
; divaD ed setnednecsed sod , sainacehC ed ohlif , sutaH ; ramatI ed setnednecsed sod , leinaD ; saieniF ed setnednecsed sod , nosreG
. sexrexatrA ed odanier on , sardsE moc ainólibaB ad orievitac od marasserger euq ailímaf ed sefehc sod atsil a , saigolaeneg savitcepser sad oãçacidni moc , acif iuqA
» . ogimoc marasserger euq satilearsi sod sefehc so rinuer redop arap megaroc ued em e uegetorp em euq , sueD uem , ROHNES o ioF . etroc ad setnatropmi saossep e sepicnírp soa , soriehlesnoc sues soa e ier oa iedarga ue euq sueD ed aidróciresim alep ioF
. mélasureJ me ROHNES od olpmet o rarnoh a ier o uoripsni euqrop , siap sosson ed sueD , ROHNES o ajes otidneB «
» . oãsirp à uo sneb sod oãçacsifnoc à , orretsed oa uo etrom à seõçatiseh mes odanednoc ajes euq , ier od siel sa uo sueD uet od siel sa rirpmuc oãn méugla es E
. mecehnoc oãn a euq seleuqà iel asse omsem anisnE . sueD ed iel a ecehnoc , setarfuE od etseo a , euq ovop o menrevog euq sezíuj e serodartsinimda raemon sáreved , ued et sueD euq airodebas ad odnasu , sardsE ut E
. sueD ed olpmet od setnevres sod uo sorietrop , serotnac , sativel , setodrecas sod megassap ed sotierid e sotsopmi , seõçiubirtnoc rebecer odibiorp euqif euq mébmat onimreteD
. sohlif suem so erbos uo mim erbos ogitsac mugla eivne oãn euq arap , etnematnorp odad res eved olpmet ues o arap uéc od sueD o ajixe euq oliuqa oduT
. osicerp ajes euq las o odot e etieza ed sortil lim ortauq , ohniv ed sortil lim ortauq , ogirt ed soliuq lim atnirt , atarp ed soliuq lim sêrt ed aitnauq à éta
, ridep ele euq o odut , uéc od sueD od iel an odíurtsni abircse e etodrecas , sardsE a meragertne arap setarfuE oir od etseo a sorieruoset so sodot a snedro uod , sexrexatrA , oirpórp uE
. sueD uet od olpmet o arap rezaf ed sahnet euq sasepsed sartuo arap oirássecen ajes euq siam o odut laer airaruoset an retbo sáredoP
. olpmet on otluc o arap seugertne merof et euq sotcejbo so , mélasureJ me , sueD ed etnaid sáratneserpA
. sueD ed edatnov a moc odroca ed , merednetne rohlem euq o oãraf soriehnapmoc suet so e ut , oruo od e atarp ad ratser euq o moC
. mélasureJ me , sueD ossov od , olpmet od ratla o erbos serecerefo arap , ohniv e siaerec , soriedroc , sorienrac , soletiv rarpmoc ed sáratart , oriehnid esse moC
. olpmet o arap rad marieuq setodrecas e ovop od saossep sa euq sairátnulov satrefo sa omoc meb , ainólibaB ad aicnívorp an ratnuj seriugesnoc euq oruo e atarp a adot etnemlaugi sáraveL
. mélasureJ me olpmet o met euq , learsI ed sueD oa etnemairatnulov somecerefo soriehlesnoc suem so e , ier o , ue euq oruo e atarp a sáraveL
. soãm saut san ogitnoc sezart euq iel a , sueD uet od iel a mélasureJ e áduJ me adirpmuc res a átse omoc seraugireva arap et-somaivne soriehlesnoc etes suem so e , ier o , uE
