. sueD uet , ROHNES o arap levánimoba asioc oãs sacitárp siaT . oãçiutitsorp ed sotca rop odibecer oirálas moc , sueD uet , ROHNES od olpmet on sassemorp meugap es euq satimrep oãN
. oãçiutitsorp a maulcni euq sotluc euqitarp , rehlum uo memoh , atilearsi muhnen euQ «
» . serolpxe o oãn e odihlocse revit ele euq edadic an , ovop uet od oiem on odagessos reviv o-axieD
. onod od asac arap ovon ed sevel o oãn , asac aut me raigufer es e onod ues od asac ed riguf oriegnartse mud ovarcse mu eS «
» . sov-avanodnaba ele , essecetnoca ossi eS . osohnogrev ed adan elen ertnocne oãn sueD euq arap , otnas ragul mu res eved otnemapmaca ossov o , ossi roP . sogimini so soãm sassov san ragertne e raduja sov arap otnemapmaca o arap ocsovnoc iav , sueD ossov , ROHNES o , otiefe moC
. sotnemercxe so apat , sioped , e ele moc ocarub mu zaf , otnemapmaca od arof ri euq revit odnauq , e uap mu otnemapiuqe ues on áret odadlos adaC
. sedadissecen saut sa serezaf ál arap otnemapmaca od arof oitís mu ravreser seveD
. otnemapmaca on rartne edop áj los-od-rôp oa e augá moc es-racifirup eved edrat ad riac oA
. aid o odot etnarud , elen rartne a ratlov oãn e otnemapmaca od arof arap rias eved , anrutcon oãçulop amu rop orupmi revitse arreug ed snemoh suet sod reuqlauq mu eS
. ám oãçca reuqlauq metive , sogimini sossov so artnoc arreug me merevitse odnauQ «
» . oãçareg ariecret ad ritrap a , ROHNES od aielbmessa an soditimda res medop sovop sessed setnednecsed sO
. síap ues on etnargime etsof siop , soicpíge so setiejer oãn mébmaT . setnerap suet oãs euqrop modE ed setnednecsed so setiejer oãN
. ratse-meb ues o arap saubirtnoc men ogessos sêd sehl acnun erpmes arap e adiv a adot etnaruD
. sóv rop met , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq roma o é laT . oãçnêb me oãçidlam aleuqa uodum e oãalaB ed odidep o ratieca siuq oãn euq é , sueD ossov , ROHNES O
. raoçidlama sov arap on-maratartnoc e aimâtoposeM an , roteP ed , roeB ed ohlif , oãalaB ramahc maradnam , oirártnoc oleP . otpigE od odías meret ed sioped , marassap ál rop odnauq , augá e oãp recerefo a ortnocne ossov oa marías oãn euqrop
, seõçareg zed ed sioped men , ROHNES od aielbmessa an soditimda res meved acnun mébmat baoM ed e nomA ed setnednecsed sO
. seõçareg zed ed sioped ajes euq adnia , setnednecsed sues e sodratsab sohlif so ROHNES od aielbmessa an soditimda res meved oãn mébmaT
. ROHNES od aielbmessa an etrap ramot oãredop oãn etnemlauxes sodalitum uo sodartsac merof euq sO «
» . iap oirpórp ues o rarnosed a missa airatse euqrop , iap ues od asopse a moc rasac edop méugniN «

» . odatneloiv ret a ed asuac rop , adiv aus a adot etnarud , aled rarapes edop es oãn E . rehlum aus áres ale e aled iap oa atarp ed sadeom atneuqnic rad euq met memoh esse
, sotrebocsed merof e ele moc seõçaler ret a avel a e , aditemorpmoc oãn adnia , megriv agirapar amu rartnocne memoh mu eS
. riduca ehl arap méugnin aivah oãn , odatirg essevit agirapar a euq adnia e oãçaovop ad arof a-uortnocne elE
. atam o e ortuo a arita es euq memoh mu ed osac o omoc iof uecetnoca ehl euq O . etrom a açerem euq emirc muhnen uetemoc oãn euqrop , agirapar a ragitsac seved oãN
. rerrom eved euq é ele ós , ale moc seõçaler revit , a-odnatneloiv , e agirapar atid a artnocne memoh esse euq oãçaovop ad arof é es saM
. ovop uet on oladnâcse etse moc sárabaca missA . ortuo moc aditemorpmoc áj rehlum amu uotneloiv euqrop ele e , oãçaovop an odnatse , orrocos rop uotirg oãn euqrop ale , sodajerdepa rerrom a sol-ánednoc e lanubirt a sobma a sol-ável meved
, ale moc seõçaler revit e , ortuo ed avion átse euq , megriv agirapar amu oãçaovop amun rartnocne memoh mu eS
. learsI me oladnâcse etse moc sárabaca missA . ale omoc ele otnat rerrom meved adasac rehlum amu moc oirétluda me odahnapa rof memoh mu eS
. ovop uet od oiem on oladnâcse etse moc sárabaca , arienam asseD . iap ues od asac a odnarnosed , riutitsorp es ed aimâfni a learsI ed ovop od oiem on uetemoc ale euq É . edadic aus ad snemoh solep atrom e adajerdepa áres ila e iap ues od asac ad atrop à al-ável meved oãtne
, mevoj ad edadnigriv ad savorp merartnocne es oãn etnemlaer es saM
. aled rarapes áredop es siam acnun adiv aus a adot etnarud , e rehlum aus res a áraunitnoc alE . learsI ed ovop od mevoj amu uomafid euqrop , mevoj ad iap oa ragap a , atarp ed sadeom mec ed atlum amu ehl-racilpa adnia oãreveD
. ol-ágitsac e memoh eleuqa rednerp radnam meved sele e
loçnel o soãicna soa oãtne matneserpA ” . megriv are ale euq ed lanis o iuqa átse méroP . megriv are oãn áj ahlif ahnim a euq odnezid , al-áinulac a uodna E
. aled atsog oãn ele sam , memoh etse moc ahlif ahnim a iesaC “ : soãicna soa oãtne árid mevoj ad iap O
. lanubirt me sodinuer , edadic ad soãicna soa edadnigriv ed sianis so ravel meved mevoj ad siap sO
” . megriv are oãn ale euq ieuqifirev ale moc reviv ri ed sioped sam , rehlum atse moc iesaC “ : odnezid einulac a e aled lam elaf uo
, aled ratsog ed exied , ale moc odiviv ret ed sioped , e rehlum amu moc esac memoh mu euq recetnoca edoP «
» . serirboc et euq moc otnam od satnop ortauq san sajnarf rasu seveD
. etnematnuj ohnil ed e ãl ed atief apuor rasu seved oãN
. sotnuj orrub mu e iob mu moc rarval seved oãN
. ahniv ad oãçudorp a omoc etsaemes ut euq o otnat , ROHNES oa odargasnoc essacif odut euq moc sairaf missa siop , sedadilauq saud ed etnemes ahniv aut an raemes seved oãN
. oxiaba ilad riac euq , méugla ed etrom ad , ailímaf aus a men , odapluc res oãn arap , oçarret od atlov à orum mu rezaf eved avon asac amu riurtsnoc méugla eS
. adiv agnol e edadirepsorp sáret missA . eãm a riguf raxied seved sam setohlif so rahnapa sedoP
. setohlif so moc etnematnuj eãm a rahnapa seved oãn , sovo so moc uo setohlif so moc ál revitse eãm a es e , sovo moc uo sohnirassap moc , oãhc on ajes erovrá amun ajes , ohnimac uet on orassáp ed ohnin mu serartnocne osaca rop eS
. sasioc sassed zaf meuq atseted ROHNES o , edadrev aN . rehlum ed sapuor rasu eved memoh mu men , memoh ed sapuor ritsev eved oãn rehlum amU «
» . ép ed sol-ôp a ol-áduja seved saM . odal ed rassap seved oãn mébmat oãhc on odíac atoirtapmoc uet mud iob mu uo orrub mu seriv es E
. odal ed rassap seved oãn , serartnocne so eS . odidrep revit atoirtapmoc uet mu euq otcejbo reuqlauq moc uo apuor ed açep amu moc , orrub ues o moc rezaf seved omsem O
. ohl-siutitser arutla assen E . rarucorp ahnev o onod o euq éta , larruc uet o arap lamina o avel oãtne , onod o secehnoc oãn es uo aut ad egnol otium rof asac aus a es E
. onod od asac arap metlov siamina sesse euq moc rezaf é reved uet O . ratropmi et mes odal ed sessap oãn atoirtapmoc uet mu ed lamina ortuo uo iob mu odidrep serartnocne eS «
» . edadeirporp me rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret a arupmi ranrot ed ocsir o rerroc seved oãn e sueD ed oãçidlam amu é odacrofne mu euqrop , aid omsem on ol-árretne seveD . acrof an odarudnep euqif oproc ues o euq raxied seved oãn
, otnemacrofne rop adatucexe rof açnetnes a e emirc mugla rop etrom à odanednoc rof memoh mu odnauQ «
» . odem moc áracif e ossi ratnoc árivuo ovop o odoT . ovop uet od oiem od oladnâcse eleuqa moc sabaca , amrof asseD . edadic aleuqad setnatibah solep odajerdepa e etrom à odanednoc oãtne áres elE
” . rebeb e remoc reuq óS . snedro sasson sad osac zaf oãn e edleber e etneidebosed é ohlif osson etsE “ : merezid sehl arap
edadic aleuqad soãicna sod açneserp à ol-ável meved siap so
, osac rezaf oãn a aunitnoc magitsac o odnauq omsem , e mezid ehl eãm a e iap o euq oliuqad osac zaf oãn euq , edleber e etneidebosed ohlif mu revit méugla eS «
» . ohlev siam ohlif ed sotierid so met euq ele é e açrof aus ad oturf oriemirp o é ohlif eleuqa euqrop , açnareh ad soçret siod rad ehl ed meT . sonem atsog meuq ed rehlum ad ohlif res ele ed rasepa sotierid sesse ratiepser euq meT
. ohlev siam o é euq é etse euqrop , artuo ad ohlif od ozíujerp moc , adireferp rehlum ad ohlif oa ohlev siam ed sotierid so rad edop oãn , sohlif solep açnareh a ritraper euq me aid on
, sonem atsog ele meuq ed aleuqad ajes ohlev siam ohlif o euq adnia , sabma ed sohlif revit e sonem atsog meuq ed artuo e otium atsog ele meuq ed amu , serehlum saud revit memoh mu eS «
» . asac aut arap etsavel a euq açrof à iof siop , ale moc oriehnid rahnag ratnet men , al-êdnev sedop oãn sam , edadrebil me arobme al-ádnam sedop , radarga et ed raxied ale sioped eS
. rehlum aut áres ale e odiram ues o sáreS . ale moc rasac sedop , ossid siopeD . eãm aus alep e iap ues olep otul rezaf edop sêm mu etnaruD . asac aut me áracif e arienoisirp ed soditsev so áracort
, sahnu sa áratroc , açebac a árapar alE . asac aut arap al-ável sedop
, ale moc rasac seresiuq e edarga et euq , atinob rehlum amu seriv
serezif euq sorienoisirp so ertne es , oãçisopsid aut à resup so , sueD uet , ROHNES o e sogimini suet so artnoc arreug serezif odnauQ «
» . ROHNES od sohlo soa , otsuj é euq o sárirpmuc e etneconi mud etrom alep edadilibasnopser ad learsI ed ovop uet o sáratrebil missA
. etrom aleuqad satnoc áridep sov siam méugnin E ” . etneconi mud etrom alep sapluc sa saubirta son oãN . etsatrebil ut euq , learsI ed ovop uet oa aodrep , ROHNES
. eled sahnumetset somof men , emirc etse sometemoc euq són somof oãN “ : opmet omsem oa , oãrid e
, atrom arrezeb a erbos , etnerrot an soãm sa oãraval emirc od ragul od amixórp siam edadic ad soãicna sO
. emirc uo oãtseuq reuqlauq me lanif açnetnes a mêt euq é selE . serovuol sues so meratnac arap e oçivres ues oa meratse arap uehlocse ROHNES o euq , iveL ed setnednecsed , setodrecas so es-ramixorpa meved siopeD
. arrezeb à acun a oãrarbeuq , etnerrot assed otnuj , ía e odaemes men odarval iof acnun euq oitís mu arap , rerroc a augá erpmes ahnet euq etnerrot amu arap arrezeb asse ravel meveD
. oguj o uovel adnia men , uohlabart oãn adnia euq arrezeb amu oãrajnarra amixórp siam revitse euq edadic ad soãicna sO
. sazednoder sad sedadic sad amu adac a iav euq aicnâtsid a raluclac meved sezíuj e soãicna so
, uotam o meuq abias es euq mes , odanissassa iof euq méugla ed revádac o , opmac on odanodnaba , recerapa edadeirporp me rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret an eS «
» . adner es ale euq riugesnoc éta , ocsovnoc arreug me átse euq edadic a racrec sale moc arap , ratroc sedop euq é oturf oãd oãn euq sabias euq serovrá sa óS
? ocrec uet oa aicnêtsiser recerefo medop euq , saossep sa omoc oãs serovrá sa euq áreS . setroc sa oãn , remoc ed snet euq saled É . adadahcam à serovrá saus sa sadot saurtsed oãn , ratsiuqnoc a e retabmoc a arap , opmet otium etnarud edadic amu a ocrec rôp ed serevit odnauQ
. sueD ossov , ROHNES o artnoc odacep mu mairetemoc ossi moc siop , sesued sues sod arnoh me mezaf sele euq sievánimoba sasioc saleuqa racitarp a sele moc merednerpa oãn arap osiva mu é otsI
. uonedro et , sueD uet , ROHNES o omoc lat , suesubej so e sueveh so , suezirep so , suenanac so , suerroma so , satitih so : atelpmoc oãçiurtsed à sol-ánednoc seveD
. edadeirporp me rad iav et ROHNES o euq , iuqad sovop setsed sedadic san adiv moc adan raxied seved oãn saM
. atlov à iuqa sovop setse a mecnetrep oãn euq e arret aut ad egnol merevitse euq sedadic sa sadot moc rezaf seved euq missa É
. uogertne et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ogimini uet od sojopsed sod ropsid sedoP . odacif merevit alen euq sojopsed so sodot rehlocer e , siamina so e saçnairc sa , serehlum sa moc racif sedop saM
. adapse ed oif a snemoh sues so sodot rassap seved e oãçisopsid aut à a-acoloc , sueD uet , ROHNES O
. edadic à ocrec seõp oãtne , aicnêtsiser merecerefo e ogitnoc zap a meresiuq oãn es saM
. sodaçrof sohlabart arap , sovarcse suet oãres martnocne es ál euq so sodot , satrop sa merba et e zap a matieca setnatibah sues so eS
. zap ed seõçaicogen ehl-roporp oriemirp seved ahlatab serad ehl arap edadic amud seramixorpa et odnauQ
. oticréxe o radnamoc oãri euq seratilim sefehc so rehlocse meved , ovop oa meralaf missa ed sioped , E
” . sageloc soa mébmat megaroc a redrep rezaf oãn arap , asac aus arap etlov megaroc etnes oãn uo odem moc átse méugla eS “ : somret setsen ovop oa ralaf a adnia oãratlov siaicifo sO
” . ale moc airasac euq é ortuo e ahlatab an rerrom edop euq , asac aus arap etlov , ale moc uosac oãn adnia e rehlum amu ed ovion átse méugla eS
. al-ámidniv airi euq é ortuo e ahlatab an rerrom edop siop , asac aus arap etlov , uomidniv a oãn adnia e ahniv amu uotnalp méugla eS
. raruguani airi a euq é ortuo e ahlatab an rerrom edop siop , asac aus arap etlov uoruguani a oãn e avon asac amu uiurtsnoc méugla eS “ : odom etsed ovop oa mébmat oãralaf siaicifo so , zev aus roP
” . airótiv a rad sov arap , sogimini sossov so artnoc retabmoc iav e odal ossov oa iav , sueD ossov , ROHNES O
. seled etnaid mebrutrep es men , mamert oãn ; odem mahnet men , medraboca es oãN . sogimini sossov so artnoc arreug me rartne siav ejoh , learsI atucsE “ : sehl-zid oãtnE
. ovop oa ralaf arap es-ramixorpa eved etodrecas o , ahlatab a raçemoc a omsem revitse odnauQ
. otpigE od rias zef et euq é ele ; ogitnoc átse , sueD uet , ROHNES O . seled odem sahnet oãn , aut à roirepus otium solavac e sorrac ed edaditnauq amu seriv e sogimini suet so artnoc arreug me rartne euq serevit odnauQ «
» . ép rop ép , oãm rop oãm , etned rop etned , ohlo rop ohlo , adiv rop adiv rigixe es-eveD . odapluc od anep sahnet oãN
. oãçca lat oãretemoc acnun euq odem otnat oãret , uossap es euq od otnemicehnoc meret oa , saossep sartuo sA
. ovop uet od oiem od lam etse moc sabaca missa E . ortuo o arap aidneterp ele euq ogitsac o rodasuca o erbos riacer oãraf
, ohnumetset oslaf mu ed atart es euq meracifirev eS . oãtseuq a meb raugireva oãrarucorp sezíuj sO
. arutla aleuqan oãçnuf me merevitse euq sezíuj sod e setodrecas sod etnaid , ROHNES oa es-ratneserpa oãri , odasuca e rodasuca , saossep saud sa oãtne
, emirc mu ed a-odnasuca , aossep amu artnoc ohnumetset oslaf moc méugla recerapa eS
. sahnumetset sêrt uo saud rop atief rof odnauq adiláv é ós oãçasuca A . reuqlauq odacep mu uo emirc mu , edadlam amu oditemoc ret ed aossep amu rasuca arap atsab oãn ahnumetset ós amU «
» . sodassapetna suet solep sodacram marof omoc sol-áxied seveD . ohniziv uet od sedadeirporp sad setimil so raretla seved oãn , rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , arret ad essop ed serevitse odnauQ
. meb árerroc et odut e learsI me setneconi saossep ed etrom a moc sárabaca missA . eled anep sahnet oãN
. etrom à odanednoc áres e otrom o ragniv reuq euq etnerap od oãçisopsid à ol-ôp e racsub ol-ádnam meved edadic aus ad soãicna so
, oigúfer ed sedadic sassed amu arap sioped odniguf , atam a e ale erbos iac e ohnimac oa ias ehl , aossep artuo a lam reuq euq méugla es saM
. ossi rop levásnopser saires ut recetnoca a esseiv lat es ; etneconi revitse odnauq , otrom res a áriv méugnin , edadeirporp me rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , arret an , amrof atseD
. onedro et ejoh euq o serirpmuc e sotnemadnam setse sodot acitárp me seresup es , assemorp asse árirpmuc ROHNES O . setnetsixe áj sêrt sà oigúfer ed sedadic sêrt sartuo siam ratnecserca seved oãtne
, sehl-rad uetemorp euq o odut ragertne a reiv et e , sodassapetna suet soa uetemorp omoc lat , oirótirret uet o rednetse , sueD uet , ROHNES o aid mugla es , E
. oigúfer ed sedadic sêrt sessehlocse euq ienedro et , ossi roP
. uerrom euq aossep à muhnen lam aireuq reuqes men euqrop , etrom a aicerem oãn memoh eleuqa euq é edadrev a arO . o-atam e , egnol otium acif oigúfer ed edadic a euqrop , rahnapa o ed zapac é avel euq aviar a moC . uotam o euq od sárta erroc e ragniv o arap otrom od etnerap mu riv edop , raigufer es oãn eS
. adiv a avlas e oigúfer ed sedadic sad amu arap riguf edop memoh essE . otrom iac euq , oriehnapmoc o riref iav orref o e es-abacnesed odahcam o sam , serovrá sa ratroc arap odahcam on arragA . serovrá ratroc oriehnapmoc mu moc atserolf à iof memoh mu , olpmexe roP
. muhnen lam rereuq ehl setna mes sam , aossep artuo a etrom a uosuac , rereuq mes , euq méugla ed osac o É . adiv aus a missa ravlas a e salen oigúfer rarucorp a adicimoh mu a otierid ád euq oirétirc o é etsE
. ila es-raigufer assop oidícimoh retemoc meuq euq odom ed , ohnimac o sáraraperp e radreh zef et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret a setrap sêrt me sáridiviD
. açnareh rop árad et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret an sedadic sêrt sárarapeS
. sedadic e sasac saus sa sárapuco e arret assed essop ramot sárI . rad iav et euq arret an oãtse euq sovop so ranimile iav , sueD uet , ROHNES O «
» . eled odem sahnet oãn , ossi roP . ateforp essed edadilibasnopser ad sanepa é sam , ROHNES od etrap ad mev oãn euq arvalap amud etnemetnedive es-atart , rirpmuc a agehc es oãn zid ele euq oliuqa sam , ROHNES od emon me ralaf redneterp ateforp mu eS
” ? ROHNES od etrap ad mêv oãn euq sarvalap sa riugnitsid ed somevah euq é omoC “ : omsem it a ratnugrep sedoP
” . etrom à odanednoc áres , sesued sortuo ed emon me ralaf es uo , iednam oãn ue euq sasioc odnezid , emon uem me ralaf a rôp es ed aidasuo a revit ateforp mu es saM
. ossid satnoc ridep ed-ieh ehl omsem ue , emon uem me áritimsnart ateforp esse euq , sarvalap sahnim sa ratucse oãn méugla es E
. radnam ehl ue euq o odut recehnoc a sov-rad ed-áh ele e arvalap ahnim a recehnoc a ehl-rad ed-ieH . it a etnahlemes ateforp mu , satoirtapmoc sues so ertned e seled oiem on , rigrus rezaf ed-ieH
. mezid sele euq oliuqa moc odroca ed uotsE “ : uoralced , sueD uem , ROHNES o E
” ! orrom oãnes , ogof emrone etse rev a raunitnoc ossop men , sueD uem , ROHNES o ralaf rivuo a ratlov ossop oãN “ : maressid odnauq , enelos oãinuer ad aid on , beroH etnom on , sueD ossov , ROHNES oa maridep euq omsem otsi iof , edadrev aN
. ratucse meved euq ele a É . satoirtapmoc sossov so ertne odihlocse , ue omoc ateforp mu erpmes sov-rad ed-áh , sueD ossov , ROHNES O «
» . asioc etnahlemes etimrep oãn , sueD ossov , ROHNES o sêcov a sam , serodatnacne e sohnivida soa sodivuo oãd etnerf assov ad sodajolased res oãv euq sovop sessE
. sueD uet , ROHNES o moc arap otsenoh res seveD
. etnerf assov ad aslupxe so , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq seõçanimoba siat ed asuac rop é E . ROHNES o arap sievánimoba es-manrot sasioc sasse macitarp euq so sodoT
. sotrom so etlusnoc uo seõsiv erucorp uo , sotirípse so etlusnoc uo , sairaçitief euqitarp méugnin euq ; oãçitsrepus a uo aigam a uo , oãçahnivida a uo , sotnematnacne euqitarp méugnin euq
; ogof on so-odnamieuq , sesued soa oicífircas me ahlif uo ohlif ues o açerefo méugnin euQ
. mezaf sovop seleuqa euq sievánimoba sasioc sa rezaf a sahnop et oãn , rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret à seragehc odnauQ «
» ! ailímaf ed sneb sues sod adnev alep retbo riugesnoc ele euq oliuqa ratnoc mes , sortuo sod à laugi sotnemila ed oãçrop amu árebecer E
. ROHNES od etnaid mevres euq soriehnapmoc sues sativel sortuo so omoc lat , sueD ues , ROHNES o rivres ál áredop
, rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul o arap ri rajesed , learsI ed sedadic sad reuqlauq me eviv euq , ativel mu eS
. erpmes arap , ROHNES od oçivres oa racided es arap , sobirt sa sadot ertned adihlocse iof , setnednecsed sues so sodot moc , iveL ed obirt A
. sadaiuqsot merof euq sahlevo sariemirp sad ãl ad e etieza od , ohniv od , ogirt od saicímirp sad etnemlaugi sehl-rad meveD
. ogamôtse o e salubídnam sa , audápse a , lamina ortuo reuqlauq ed ajes siob ed ajes , oicífircas mu recerefo merof euq satilearsi so sodot ed rebecer a otierid mêt setodrecas sO
. uetemorp ehl omoc , açnareh aus a é ROHNES O . satoirtapmoc sues so mêt omoc açnareh mêt oãn selE
. ecnetrep ehl euq od e ROHNES oa satief satrefo sad es-ratnemila meveD . learsI ed ovop od otser o moc arret ad oãçiubirtsid an etrap oãret oãn , sativel selpmis majes reuq setodrecas majes reuq , iveL ed obirt ad sorbmem so sodoT «
» . learsI ed ovop od etnerf à , odanier ognol oãret serossecus sues so omoc ele otnat , arienam atseD . ortuo o arap uo odal mu arap sotnemadnam sessed es-raivsed men , satoirtapmoc sues so euq etnatropmi siam es-ritnes eved oãN
. sotiecerp setse sodot acitárp me rôp e iel atsen átse euq o odut rirpmuc arap , sueD ues , ROHNES o ratiepser a rednerpa arap , adiv aus a adot etnarud rel a arap , ogisnoc erpmes al-êt eveD
. sativel setodrecas sod odadiuc oa átse euq lanigiro o erbos atief , iel atsed aipóc amu rezaf radnam eved , laer onort ues on odalatsni revitse ele odnauq , E
. oruo otium e atarp atium ralumuca eved men ; rahnimacnesed es ed ocsir o rerroc oãn arap , serehlum satium ret eved oãn mébmaT
. otpigE oa oãçcerid me messahnimac siam acnun euq essid ROHNES o euqrop , solavac siam meriugesnoc arap otpigE oa etneg radnam men , solavac sotium ret me es-rapucoerp eved oãn ier o , odom reuqlauq eD
. uehlocse oãn ROHNES o euq , oriegnartse mu ier uet omoc rôp seved amuhnen arienam eD . rehlocse , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq satoirtapmoc suet sod mu ier uet omoc recelebatse seved saM
. atlov aut à merevitse euq sovop sortuo so omoc lat , ier mu ret rereuq siav seralatsni et alen e aled essop seramot odnauq , rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret à seragehc odnauQ «
» . aidleber ed sedutita áret siam méugnin e , odidecus o ratnoc rivuo oa , odem ed oiehc áracif ovop o odoT
. learsI ed ovop od oiem od oladnâcse eleuqa moc sabaca , odom esseD . etrom à odanednoc áres recedebosed missa euq esse , ziuj oa uo , sueD uet , ROHNES od oçivres oa revitse euq etodrecas oa recedebo oãn e osohlugro rof meuq E
. ortuo o arap men , odal mu arap men seivsed et oãN . meraicnunorp euq açnetnes a euges e mered et euq seõçatneiro sa eugeS
. meressid et euq o odut acitárp me eõP . uehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on oãtse siop , mered et sele euq seõçurtsni sa etnematcaxe riuges seveD
. rad a oãçulos a oãracidni et sele e otnussa o erbos so-atlusnoC . arutla assen revitse euq ziuj o e sativel setodrecas so moc ret iaV
. odihlocse revit , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ragul oa et-rigirid seved , revloser ed zapac sajes oãn euq oãtseuq artuo uo siaroproc sotart suam rop axieuq amu uo etrom ed osac mu , edadic aut an , otnemagluj arap recerapa eS «
» . ovop uet od oiem od oladnâcse eleuqa moc sabaca missa E . odot ovop o riuges a e sahnumetset sa oãres odanednoc o artnoc sardep merarita a soriemirp sO
. ós amud oãn e sahnumetset sêrt uo saud ed seõçaralced san esab moc etrom à oãçanednoc revah eved ós saM
. adajerdepa rerrom a adanednoc ajes euq e edadic aut ad lanubirt oa , rehlum uo memoh ajes , aossep asse avel
levánimoba oãt asioc amu uetemoc síap uet on méugla euq edadrev iof etnemlaer euq seracifirev eS . oãtseuq a meb ragitsevni arucorp , ossid ralaf serivuo es uo ramrofni reiv et méugla es
; ibiorp ue euq sasioc , sortsa sod reuqlauq ed uo auL ad uo loS od etnaid uo seled etnaid es-ranilcni e sesued sortuo raroda odni
, adargased ehl euq oliuqa odnezaf , ROHNES od açnaila a ridergsnart rehlum amu uo memoh mu euq recetnoca , rad iav et ROHNES o euq sedadic sad amun , eS
. sueD uet , ROHNES o arap levánimoba aires ossi euqrop , otiefed ahnet euq lamina reuqlauq uo oruot mu , sueD uet , ROHNES oa oicífircas me recerefo seved oãN «
» . sueD uet , ROHNES oa etnemadnuforp adargased ossi euqrop , ardep ed sosoigiler sotnemunom setnavel meN
. sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me riurtsnoc siav euq ratla od odal oa odargas etsop ed merivres et arap serovrá ratnalp seved oãN
. rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret ad essop ramot e adiv agnol ret sassop euq arap , açitsuj a ós e açitsuj a arucorP
. otsenoh siam ziuj od açnetnes a mepmorroc e soibás sod sohlo so sogec manrot sonrobus so sioP . setneserp moc adarpmoc ajes uo saossep sa ertne oãçnitsid açaf es euq , apmorroc es açitsuj a euq mexied oãN
. edadilaicrapmi moc ovop oa açitsuj a rartsinimda oãreved selE . sobirt saut sad amu adac a ragertne iav , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , sedadic sa sadot arap sodartsigam e sezíuj raemon seveD «
» . odidecnoc revit ehl ROHNES omsem o euq oliuqa emrofnoc , redup euq o ROHNES oa ravel eved mu adac sam
, saizav soãm ed ri meved oãN . sadneT sad atsef an e setsocetneP od atsef an , aocsáP ad atsef an : odihlocse revit ele euq ragul on , sueD uet , ROHNES od etnaid es-ratneserpa meved snemoh suet so sodot , ona rop sezev sêrT
. sohlabart suet so sodot me e satiehloc saut sa sadot me aoçneba et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euqrop , airgela a adot moc a-ajetseF . odihlocse revit ele euq ragul on , sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me atsef amu sárarbelec said etes etnaruD
. odal uet oa meviv euq savúiv sa e soãfró so , soriegnartse so , sativel so , savarcse e sovarcse suet so e sahlif e sohlif suet so moc etnematnuj satrefo saut sa airgela moc sárajetsef e
, sadneT sad atsef a sárarbelec samidniv sa e siaerec ed satiehloc sa odanimret serevit odnauQ «
» . siel satse sadot acitárp me rôp seved , ossi roP . otpigE on ovarcse etsof euq et-arbmeL
. arret aut an meviv euq savúiv sa e soãfró so , soriegnartse so , it ed otnuj mereviv euq sativel so moc e savarcse e sovarcse suet so moc , ailímaf aut a adot e sahlif e sohlif suet so moc etnematnuj , oiráutnas ues o rezaf ál arap odihlocse revit ele euq ragul on , sueD uet , ROHNES od etnaid atsef a airgela moc sárarbelec E
. odidecnoc revit et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq oãçudorp a emrofnoc , satrefo sáratneserpA . sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me setsocetneP od atsef a sárarbelec oãtne e
sanames etes atnoc , ogirt od atiehloc a rezaf a seraçemoc euq me aid od ritrap A «
» . rahlabart seved oãn , aid essen , e , sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me atsef ed oãinuer amu árevah aid omités on ; otnemref mes oãp sáremoc said sies etnaruD
. asac aut a rasserger arap ohnimac a et-rôp sedop áj , ãhnam ed etniuges aid oN . odihlocse revit , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ragul on adimoc e adizoc res eved adicerefo enrac A
. otpigE od etsías euq me aroh , los-od-rôp od otrep , edrat à , aocsáP ed oicífircas o recerefo seved euq é ilA . oiráutnas ues o rezaf ál arap rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on etnemos sam
, ragertne iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , sedadic sad reuqlauq me aocsáP ed oicífircas o rarbelec oditimrep é et oãN
. etniuges ãhnam a arap adan racif eved oãn , aid oriemirp od edrat an , oicífircas me sárecerefo euq enrac ad E . síap o odot ed recerapased eved otnemref o , said etes seleuqa etnaruD
. otpigE od etsías euq me aid o , sereviv otnauqne , sáradrocer , arienam asseD . otpigE od etsías ut euq asserp à iof siop , oãçilfa ad oãp o é euq , otnemref mes oãp remoc sedop óS . odatnemref oãp , siamina sessed enrac a moc , remoc seved oãn , said etes etnaruD
. oiráutnas ues o rezaf ál arap , rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on siob uo soriedroc , ROHNES od arnoh me , recerefo seved , aocsáP ed oicífircas omoC
. otpigE od uorit et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq sêm essed etion amun iof siop , sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me aocsáP ad atsef a rarbelec ed sexied oãn bibA ed sêm oN «
» . augá omoc arret an ol-ámarred seved ; eugnas ues o remoc seved oãn óS
. odaev mu uo alezag amu essof es omoc É . sorupmi majetse reuq sorup etnemlautir majetse reuq , eled remoc medop sodoT . sereviv edno arret an ol-êmoc seved osac esseN
. sueD uet , ROHNES oa oicífircas me recerefo sedop o oãn , ogec uo oxoc rof es , olpmexe rop , otiefed reuqlauq revit ele es saM
. rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on , ailímaf aut a e ut , sona so sodot , ROHNES od etnaid sol-êmoc seveD
. raiuqsot sedop o oãn , oriedroc rof es , e rahlabart arap eled rivres seved et oãn , orrezeb rof eS . sueD uet , ROHNES oa sadicerefo oãres sahlevo saut sad e sacav saut sad sairc sariemirp sA «
» . serezif euq o odut me raoçneba et ed-áh , sueD uet , ROHNES o , ossid méla , e odairalassa reuqlauq ed orbod o uohlabart , sona sies etnarud it arap rahlabart oa , siop edadrebil a serad ehl rop odacidujerp ritnes seved et oãN
. avarcse aut a moc sáraf asioc amsem A . erpmes arap ovarcse uet áres ele e ahlero a ehl-saruf e oãçnup o samot oãtne
, ” ailímaf aut ad e it ed otsog euqrop , asac aut ed arobme ri oreuq em oãN “ : ressid et e asac aut me meb ritnes es ele es saM
. snedro satse ejoh uod et euq é , ossi roP . uotrebil et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq e otpigE on ovarcse etsof ut mébmat euq et-arbmeL
. uedecnoc et ROHNES o euq oliuqa odut ed , ohniv uet od e laerec uet od , odag uet od aicnâdnuba moc ehl-áD
. saizav soãm ed arobme radnam seved o oãn , edadrebil me seresup o odnauq E
. edadrebil a ehl-rad seved , ona omités oN . sona sies etnarud oçivres uet oa ret sedop o ós , ovarcse uet ranrot es , rehlum uo memoh , atilearsi mugla eS «
» . arret aut an meviv euq serbop so moc arap e sodatissecen satoirtapmoc suet so moc arap osoreneg sajes euq onedro et , ossi roP . arret atsen oãratlaf acnun serboP
. sotnemidneerpme e sohlabart suet so sodot me et-raoçneba ed-áh , sueD uet , ROHNES o edadisoreneg aut alep siop , oiecer mes e azeugral moc ehl-áD
. odacep mu adaredisnoc aires edutita aut a e ROHNES oa it ed es-raxieuq airi ele sioP . adan serad ehl oãn e erbop atoirtapmoc uet o sodom suam moc seratart arap , sadivíd sad oãdrep od ona o omixórp átse áj euq etnemasodlam rasnep a sahnop et oãN
. edadissecen revit ele euq ed oliuqa odut edadisoreneg moc ehl-atserpme saM
. oãm aut a sehcef ehl men , oãçaroc uet o saçerudne oãn , rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret an , sedadic saut sad amuglan , satoirtapmoc suet so ertne erbop mugla revuoh es E
. it a áranimod et méugnin sam , sovop sotium sáranimoD . odatserpme ridep ed sárasicerp oãn e , sovop sotium a ratserpme euq otium sáreT . uetemorp et omoc , et-raoçneba ed-áh , sueD uet , ROHNES O
. uod et ejoh ue euq sotnemadnam so sodot acitárp me odnop , sueD uet , ROHNES od snedro sà serecedebo es árecetnoca ós otsi saM
. aut edadeirporp omoc aled essop seramot arap , ued et euq arret an et-uooçneba , sueD uet , ROHNES o siop , sóv ed oiem on serbop revah eved oãn , arienam atseD
. odatserpme serevit ehl euq o raodrep seved euq é atoirtapmoc uet oA . adivíd ad otnemagap o rigixe sedop soriegnartse soA
. ROHNES od arnoh me oãdrep ed ona mu É . oãçiutitser a rigixe oãn e raodrep ehl-eved méugla a asioc amugla odatserpme revit euq eleuqa odoT : arienam etniuges ad áreS
. sadivíd sa raodrep seved , sona etes adac ed mif oN «
» . serezif euq o odut me et-raoçneba ed-áh , sueD uet , ROHNES o missA . sotiefsitas meracif éta remoc massop sele euq arap , oãiger aut an meviv euq , savúiv e soãfró so , soriegnartse so arap e , sarret sad oãçiubirtsid an ogitnoc etrap marevit oãn euq , sativel so arap áres ossI
. edadic aut an odut ranezamra e ona eleuqad samicéd saut sad otudorp o ratnuj seved , sona sêrt me sêrt eD
. sarret ed oãçiubirtsid an ogitnoc etrap mêt oãn euqrop , it ed otnuj meviv euq sativel so mébmat saçeuqse oãN
. ailímaf aut a moc atrefo aut a etnemergela odnajetsef , sueD uet , ROHNES od otnuj eteuqnab mu sáraf oãtne E . recetepa et euq siam o odut e sadibeb sartuo e ohniv , sahlevo , siob : edatnov an serevit euq oliuqa odut ál sárarpmoc oriehnid esse moC
. odihlocse revit , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ragul o arap , etnednopserroc oriehnid o ogitnoc ravel e sol-êdnev seved oãtne
, sotinégomirp e amicéd aut a ogitnoc ravel seriugesnoc oãn e asac aut ed egnol otium rof , oiráutnas ues o rezaf ía arap rehlocse , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ragul o es saM
. sueD uet , ROHNES oa erpmes ratiepser a sárednerpa missA . sahlevo saut sad e sacav saut sad sairc sariemirp sa ragertne e etieza uet od e ohniv uet od , ogirt uet od amicéd a ragap seveD . oiráutnas ues o rezaf ía arap rehlocse ele euq ragul on , sueD uet , ROHNES od etnaid eteuqnab mu sáraf ale moC
. sopmac suet so mezudorp etnemlauna euq o odut ed etrap amicéd a ragap seveD «
» . eãm aus ad etiel o moc otirbac o raraperp meved oãn mébmaT . sueD ossov , ROHNES oa odargasnoc ovop mu oãs siop , megassap ed oriegnartse mugla a on-madnev uo ocsovnoc meviv euq soriegnartse soa on-meêD . otrom açerapa euq lamina muhnen remoc meved oãN
. remoc medop sarup seva sad saM
. seled remoc medop oãn ; sorupmi sodaredisnoc res meved maov euq sotcesni so sodoT
. ogecrom o e oãsiaf o , saçrag ed eicépse a adot , ahnogec a
, erfahlim o e ohniram ovroc o , onacilep o
, sibí o , ohcom o , ajuroc a
, seõivag ed seicépse sa sadot e atoviag a , ahnirodna a , zurtseva a
, sovroc ed seicépse sa sadot
, sertuba ed seicépse sa sadot e oãclaf o
, oãhliremse o , ognarfox o , aiugá a : setniuges sa remoc meved oãn saM
. sarup oãs euq sa remoc medop seva saD
. sorupmi oãS . mamoc oãn samacse uo sanatabrab merevit oãn euq soD
. samacse e sanatabrab mêt euq so sodot ed remoc medop , augá an meviv euq siamina soD
. sotrom ed sioped , siamina sessen meuqot men , enrac aus ad mamoc oãN . orupmi mébmat on-meredisnoc , animur oãn sam , adidnef ahnu a met euq , ocrop O
. sorupmi son-meredisnoC . adidnef ahnu a mêt oãn sam , manimur euqrop , ohleoc o e erbel a , olemac o : setnanimur majes uo adidivid ahnu mahnet euq adnia , setniuges sod remoc meved oãn , ossi roP
. etnanimur ajes e setnerefid socsac siod me adidivid ép od ahnu a ahnet euq lamina reuqlauq ed remoc otnatrop medoP
. olafúb o e epolítna o , omag o , megavles arbac a , açroc a , alezag a , odaev o
, otirbac o , oriedroc o , iob o : setse oãs remoc medop euq siamina sO
. sorupmi sodaredisnoc siamina remoc meved oãN «
» . ralucitrap ovop ues o meres arap , arret an metsixe euq sovop so sodot ertned sov-uehlocse elE . ROHNES oa odargasnoc ovop mu oãs siop
, rerrom méugla odnauq , açebac ad etnerf ad etrap a mepar men oproc on setroc maçaf oãN . sueD ossov , ROHNES od sohlif oãs sêcoV «
» . otsuj aredisnoc , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq oliuqa odnezaf , otimsnart et ejoh ue euq sotnemadnam sues so sodot odnirpmuc , sueD uet , ROHNES od arvalap à serecedebo es árecetnoca otsI
. sodassapetna suet soa uetemorp omoc lat , osoremun siam zev adac ovop mu senrot et euq moc rezaf e edadnob moc et-ratart ed-áh e odari ratse ed áraxied ROHNES o missA . oãçiurtsed à odanednoc iof euq oliuqad adan ravresnoc seved oãN
. racifide a áratlov a siam méugniN . erpmes arap saníur ed oãtnom mu áracif edadic asse E . sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me adamieuq etnemarietni atrefo amu áreS . revuoh ál euq o odut moc edadic à ogof o atied e açarp ad oiem on serartnocne ál euq sojopsed so aotnomA
. siamina so éta , artnocne es alen euq o odut omoc saossep sa otnat , oãçiurtsed à so-anednoc e adapse ed oif a edadic assed setnatibah so assap
, sóv ertne odacitarp iof rorroh etnahlemes mu euq e uotnavel es euq romur o edadrev etnemlaer é euq seriv eS . otnussa o meb ragitsevni arucorp
, setna saicehnocer oãn ut euq , sesued sortuo a otluc meratserp arap sa-odnatsarra , saossep sa ratneirosed a madna euq , ovop oirpórp uet oa setnecnetrep , sosrevrep snemoh marecerapa
, sereviv ál arap ued et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , sedadic sad amun euq rezid serivuo eS «
» . sassed asioc amu rezaf a áratlov siam méugnin e odem ed oiehc áracif e osac od otnemicehnoc áramot learsI ed ovop o odoT
. oãdivarcse ad arret ad , otpigE od rias zef et euq , sueD uet , ROHNES od et-ratsafa uedneterp euqrop , rerrom éta odajerdepa áreS
. sioped áraunitnoc ovop o e ardep ariemirp a rarita ehl ed snet oirpórp uT . rerrom ed áret elE
. es-rednocse a seduja o men eled oãxiapmoc men ód sahnet oãN . sodivuo sêd ehl men , setieca oãn
, odnum od etrap reuqlauq ed , setnatsid siam sovop sortuod reuq , sóv ed otrep siam oãtse euq sovop sod sesued ed etart es reuQ
. sodassapetna suet so men ut men , setna saicehnocer oãn euq sesued sortuo a , oderges me , otluc seratserp arap edivnoc et e ratsarra arieuq et omitní otium ogima mu uo asopse aut a uo , ahlif uo ohlif uet o uo , oãmri oirpórp uet o , zev amugla , euq recetnoca edoP «
» . oiem ossov od ogirep esse recerapased rezaf seved , ossi roP . riuges uodnam et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ohnimac od et-raivsed are aidneterp ele euq O . oãdivarcse ad arret ad uocnarra sov euq , otpigE od uorit sov euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES o artnoc atlover amu é ahnuporp ele euq oliuqa euqrop , etrom à odanednoc ajes euq , oiránoisiv uo ateforp esse a otnauQ
. ele a siéif maçenamrep e on-mavris , snedro saus sà maçedebo e sotnemadnam sues so marpmuc , otiepser ehl-mahnet e , sueD ossov , ROHNES o etnemos magiS
. amla a adot moc e oãçaroc o odot moc mama o etnemlaer es rebas arap , avorp à rôp a átse sov euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES o É . oiránoisiv uo ateforp esse zid euq od osac maçaf oãn
, razilaer a mahnev es soigídorp e sergalim sesse euq adnia , setna maicehnocer oãn euq , sesued sortuo raroda e riuges a recnevnoc sov arap
, soigídorp e sergalim sov-raicnuna a seõsiv ahnet euq méugla uo ateforp mu oiem ossov on recerapa aid mu eS «
» . adan rariter men ratnecserca mes , acitárp me ol-ôp meved , ienedro sov ue euq oliuqa oduT

! sesued sues sod arnoh me sahlif e sohlif sues so oicífircas me ramieuq a maragehc éta selE . sacitárp sasse a rorroh met ROHNES o e sievánimoba sasioc oãs sesued sues soa mezaf sele euq o sioP . sueD uet , ROHNES o moc arap missa sadecorp oãN
. asioc amsem a serezaf arap otluc mavatserp sehl sovop seleuqa euq é omoc rebas serucorp men sesued sues so setlusnoc oãN . etnerf aut ad sodanimile odis meret sele ed sioped omsem , semutsoc sues solep ratsarra sexied et oãn e odadiuc met
, seratibah ál e oirótirret ues od essop odamot serevit odnauq , sarret sa ratsiuqnoc siav meuq a sovop so etnerf aut ad odanimile revit , sueD uet , ROHNES o odnauQ «
» . sueD uet , ROHNES oa levádarga e mob é euq oliuqa rezaf a sátse , arienam atsed , sioP . setnednecsed suet soa e it a , erpmes arap meb árerroc et odut missa e acitárp me san-eõp e uod et ue euq snedro sa atucsE
. oicífircas essed enrac ad remoc seredop arap , sueD uet , ROHNES od ratla o erbos eugnas o ramarred ed snet , oicífircas mu serezif odnauq saM . ROHNES od ratla od amic me eugnas o moc enrac a acoloc otsuacoloh me siamina serecerefo odnauQ
. rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on sal-êcerefo ri seved , sassemorp saut sa e , ROHNES oa etsargasnoc euq sasioc sa saM
. edrat siam , sohlif suet soa e it a , meb árerroc et odut , reuq ROHNES o omoc etnematcerroc seredecorp missa eS
. augá omoc oãhc on ol-ámarred seveD . ossi rezaf seved acnuN
. enrac a moc etnematnuj adiv a remoc sedop oãn e adiv ád euq é eugnas o , otiefe moC . eugnas o remoc seved muhnen odom ed saM
. átse oãn euq o omoc orup etnemlautir átse euq o otnat , sotnuj sodot remoc medoP . alezag uo odaev remoc a ratse omoc É
. seresiuq missa es , arret aut an omsem enrac assed remoc sedop , osac esseN . essid et áj omoc lat , odad ahnet et ROHNES o euq , ahlevo amu uo iob mu ratam sedop , asac aut ad egnol otium rof oiráutnas ues o eled rezaf arap uehlocse , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ragul o eS
. edatnov à remoc sedop , al-êmoc ecetepa et euqrop , enrac remoc seresiuq euq erpmes , uetemorp et ele omoc lat , síap uet od sarietnorf sa odagrala revit , sueD uet , ROHNES o odnauQ
. síap uet on sereviv otnauqne sativel so senodnaba oãN ! odadiuc meT
. sohlabart suet sod odatluser o é euq atrefo aut a airgela moc sárajetsef , ROHNES od etnaid , missA . it ed otnuj maviv euq sativel so e savarcse e sovarcse suet so , sahlif e sohlif suet so moc etnematnuj , rehlocse ele euq ragul on , ROHNES od etnaid remoc sedop sa ós sasioc sassE
. ROHNES oa savidád e satrefo saut sa , oditemorp serevit euq o , sohnaber suet sod sairc sariemirp sa , etieza e ohniv , ogirt uet od amicéd a arret aut an remoc oditimrep é et oãN
. augá essof es omoc , oãhc on ol-ámarred meved ; lamina od eugnas o remoc meved oãn saM
. alezag uo odaev remoc a messevitse es omoc é euqrop , merevitse oãn euq so omoc sorup etnemlautir merevitse arutla an euq so otnat , aled remoc medop sodoT . enrac assed remoc medop e red sov , edadnob aus alep , ROHNES o euq lamina reuqlauq ratam medop , meresiuq o euq erpmes e mereviv edno sedadic san , euq oralc É
. iednam ue omoc odut rirpmuc meved euq mébmat ál É . sobirt sad amun , rehlocse ROHNES o euq ragul on etnemos son-maçerefO
. merartnocne euq otluc ed ragul reuqlauq me otsuacoloh me siamina maçerefo oãN ! odadiuc mahneT
. arret ad oãçiubirtsid an etrap ocsovnoc mêt oãn setse euqrop , merevitse ila euq sativel so e savarcse e sovarcse sossov so , sahlif e sohlif sossov so moc , atsef assov a airgela moc merbelec , sueD ossov , ROHNES od etnaid , ila E
. ROHNES oa marezif euq sassemorp ed eicépse a adot e seõçiubirtnoc , samicéd , soicífircas e siamina ed sotsuacoloh : recerefo iednam sov euq sasioc saleuqa sadot , oiráutnas ues arap rehlocse , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq , ragul esse a ravel oãtne meveD
. sogimini sossov so sodot ed servil sov-odnaxied , edadiliuqnart e osnacsed áredecnoc sov ele , açnareh me ád sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq , arret an meralatsni es e oãdroJ o merassevarta odnauQ
. árad sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq açnareh à e osnacsed ed ragul oa maragehc oãn adnia , etnemlaeR
. ecerap ehl rohlem omoc zaf mu adac siop , etnemlautca són omoc maçaf oãN
. uooçneba sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq moc , sohlabart sossov sod odatluser mob olep es-odnargela , sueD ossov , ROHNES od etnaid , ailímaf assov a moc oãremoc ilA
. sohnaber sossov sod sairc sariemirp sa e satrefo sa , sassemorp sa , seõçiubirtnoc sa , samicéd sa ravel meved euq ila é ; soicífircas sossov so e otsuacoloh me siamina sossov so recerefo meved euq ila É
. ratibah ál e oiráutnas ues o rezaf ía arap sobirt sa sadot ertne uehlocse ele euq ragul on ol-ároda e ROHNES o rarucorp ri meved óS
. sueD ossov , ROHNES o arap sassed sasioc maçaf oãn , sóv a otnauQ
. sesued sesse edrocer euq o odut arret aleuqad recerapased maçaF . sesued sues sod snegami sa raçadepsed e ariedam ed so ramieuq e ardep ed sodargas sotnemunom sues so rarbeuq , seratla sues so rilomed meveD
. asodnorf erovrá reuqlauq ed oxiabed uo saniloc e sahnatnom sa erbos , sesued sues so maroda rajolased oãv euq sovop so edno otluc ed seragul so sodot riurtsed meveD
. edadeirporp me ued sov sodassapetna sossov sod sueD , ROHNES o euq arret an , adiv assov a adot etnarud , acitárp me rôp ed mêt euq sotiecerp so e siel sa oãs satsE «
» . ieuqinumoc sov ejoh euq sotiecerp e siel sa sadot rirpmuc ed es-merbmel
, mereviv alen e aled essop meramot odnauQ . árad sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq arret ad essop ramot ri arap oãdroJ o sierassevartA
. éroM ed sohlavrac sod otnuj éta e , lagliuG ed etnerf me , ábarA ed oãiger an mébmat matibah euq , suenanac sod arret an , etneop oa oãçcerid me iav euq ohnimac od sioped , oãdroJ od latnedico odal od es-martnocne setnom setsE
. labE etnom o erbos , seõçidlam sa e miziraG etnom o erbos , soãçnêb sa : seõçidlam sa e soãçnêb sa etnerf a etnerf sáracoloc , segirid et edno arap arret an rartne rezif et , sueD uet , ROHNES o odnauq E
. maicehnocsed setna euq sesued sortuo ed sárta mererroc e oçart sov ejoh ue euq ohnimac od meraivsed es es e , sueD ossov , ROHNES od sotnemadnam soa merecedebo oãn es , seõçidlam oãrerfoS
. uod sov ejoh ue euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES od sotnemadnam soa merecedebo es , soãçnêb oãrebeceR
. seõçidlam sa e soãçnêb sa sóv ed etnaid ocoloc ejoH ! meb merapeR
. essid sov ele omoc lat , sóv ed etnaid rorret ed e odem ed saiehc meuqif saossep sa , meragehc ednoa seragul so sodot me , euq moc áraf , sueD ossov , ROHNES O . sov-ritsiser áriugesnoc méugniN
. oenârretideM ram oa éta setarfuE oir o edsed , onabíL oa éta otresed o edsed oãri sarietnorf sassov sA . sossov oãres sép sossov so meresup edno seragul so sodoT
. sêcov euq od setrof siam e sosoremun siam sovop ed are euq , arret ad essop oãramot e etnerf assov ad sovop seleuqa sodot raslupxe ed-áh ROHNES o
, siéif merecenamrep ehl e sohnimac sues so erpmes meriuges e , sueD ossov , ROHNES o merama es , uod sov ejoh ue euq sotnemadnam so sodot acitárp me meresup eS
. erpmes o odot rop meríussop a ed mif a , sodassapetna sossov soa rad uoruj ROHNES o euq arret an , sohlif suet so e ut , adiv agnol amu reviv sáredop missA
. seõtrop suet so sodot me e asac aut ad satrop sad sarierbmo san sa-evercsE
. megaiv ed sáv reuq asac me sajetse reuq , ratnavel oa omoc ratied oa otnat sa-odnaticer , sohlif suet soa sal-ánisne seveD
. atset assov an amelbme mu omoc , oçarb ossov on ovitnitsid mu omoc san-magart e amla assov an e oãçaroc ossov on sarvalap sahnim satse mahnoP
. rad iav sov ROHNES o euq asohlivaram arret ad asserped meb mairecerapased e oturf ues o rad ed airaxied arret A . riac ed essaxied avuhc a uéc od euq moc airaf e ocsovnoc odari otium airacif ROHNES o euqrop
, ROHNES o odnanodnaba , sesued sortuo raroda e otluc ratserp odni , ranagne mexied es oãn ; odadiuc mahnet saM
. sotiefsitas meracif éta remoc oãredop missa E . siamina so arap avre recserc ieraf sopmac sossov soN
. etieza e ohniv , ogirt ed setnadnuba satiehloc sáret e , arevamirP ad a e onotuO od avuhc a , opmet odived ues on avuhc a arret assov à ierad
, amla a adot moc e oãçaroc o odot moc o-odnivres e , sueD ossov , ROHNES o odnama , uod sov ejoh euq sotnemadnam so merirpmuc es E
. ona od mif oa éta oipícnirp o edsed , alen sotsop erpmes oãtse ROHNES od sohlo sO . odadiuc laicepse moc atart , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq arret amu É
. uéc od iac euq avuhc a moc adager , seicínalp e setnom ed arret amu é , aled essop ramot ed mif a , oãv aroga edno arap arret a saM
. atroh amu moc zaf es omoc , ép a rager a ed mahnit sioped e arietnemes a maizaf áL . marías ednod , otpigE o omoc é oãn essop ramot oãv euq ed arret a , etnemlaeR
. lem o e etiel o erroc edno arret amu É . setnednecsed sues soa e sodassapetna sossov soa rad uetemorp ROHNES o euq arret assen sona sognol reviv oãredop missa E
. megirid es lauq a arap arret ad essop ramot a meragehc e setrof meres arap , uod sov ejoh euq sotnemadnam so sodot marpmuc , ossi roP
. uozilaer ROHNES o euq sahlivaram sa sadot mariV
. aicnetrep sehl euq o odut a e sadnet saus sà , sailímaf saus sà , sele a uilogne so , ovop o odot ed atsiv à , euq ahcerb amu uirba arret A . nebúR ed etnednecsed , bailE ed sohlif , maribA e nataD a zef euq o e
, oãtse edno iuqa meragehc éta , otresed on sóv rop zef ele euq o odut mariV
. ejoh ed said soa éta recerapased sol-êf ROHNES O . oãçiugesrep assov me mairroc odnauq , sele erbos ohlemreV raM od sadno sa ratipicerp oa , solavac e sorrac sues so moc , otpigE od oticréxe oa zef ele euq o mariV
. ovop ues o odot artnoc e , otpigE od ier , óaraf o artnoc otpigE on zef ele euq sahlivaram e soigídorp so mariV
. sasioc sa etnematcerid marecehnoc oãn euq , sohlif sossov so oãn e aicnêirepxe asse mareviv euq sêcov maroF . sueD ossov , ROHNES od azednarg a merev oa , marednerpa euq oliuqa ejoh maçehnoceR
. adiv assov a adot etnarud , sotnemadnam sues so , sotiecerp sues so , siel saus sa , snedro saus sa marpmuc e , sueD ossov , ROHNES o memA «
» . uéc od salertse sa omoc sosoremun oãt sov-uonrot , sueD ossov , ROHNES o aroga e otpigE o arap marof odnauq , sodassapetna sossov so saossep atnetes ós marE

. eled méla sued ortuod emon o odnasu , sotnemaruj maçaf oãn e eled metsafa es oãn , on-meroda , sueD ossov , ROHNES o metiepseR
. otpigE on soriegnartse marof áj mébmat sêcov euqrop , soriegnartse sod sogima majes , ossi roP
. ritsev arap apuor e otnemila ehl-odnad , oriegnartse od ogima é e avúiv à e oãfró oa açitsuj zaf elE

. sedleber res ed mexied e oãçaroc ossov on odavarg ajetse açnaila ad lanis o euQ

. etsixe alen euq o odut e arret a omoc meb , sueD uet , ROHNES oa ecnetrep marrecne sele euq o odut e suéc sO

» ” . sodassapetna sues soa otief otnemaruj rop , sehl-rad itemorp ue euq , arret ad essop ramot a ragehc massop sele euq arap , ovop uet od etnerf à megaiv a aunitnoc e iaV “ : essid ROHNES O
. riurtsed sov ed uitsised e odidep uem o zev amu siam rivuo a uotlov ROHNES O . seroiretna sezev sad omoc , setion atnerauq e said atnerauq ahnatnom an ieuqiF
. uetemorp ehl , sueD uet , ele omoc lat , ROHNES o é açnareh aus A . sobirt sartuo sa ertne sarret ed oãçiubirtsid an etrap met oãn iveL ed obirt a , ossi roP
. seõçnuf saus sa ejoh adnia sasse oãS . emon ues me ovop o raoçneba e rivres o arap , ROHNES od açneserp an ratse ed mif a , ROHNES od açnaila ad acra a ratropsnart arap iveL ed obirt a uehlocse ROHNES o euq oãisaco assen ioF
. setnerrot satium ed arret , átabtoJ arap dagdiuG ed e dagdiuG arap maritrap ilaD

. uonedro om ROHNES o missa euqrop , racif meved sale euq ál É . otief ahnit euq , acra an sa-ieuqoloc e ahnatnom ad recsed a ietlov ue e

” . acra ad ortned sacalp sasse sáracoloc e , etsarbeuq ut euq , sacalp sariemirp san mavatse euq sotnemadnam so revercse a ieratlov uE

» ” . redop osnemi uet o e açrof ednarg aut a moc etsatrebil ut euq seleuqa oãS . ralucitrap edadeirporp aut e ovop uet od atart es euq arapeR
’ . otresed on mererrom arap , iuqad rias zef so euq aireuq sehl euq lam olep iof ‘ : oãtne uo ; ’ oditemorp ahnit sehl euq arret à éta rizudnoc so ed zapac iof oãn ROHNES O ‘ : etsarit son ednod , otpigE on rezid áv es euq açetnoca oãN

. sov-riurtsed a odidiced avatse ROHNES o euqrop , sóv rop ridep a evitse setion atnerauq e said atnerauq seleuqa etnaruD

. marecedebo ehl men elen maratiderca oãn e , sueD ossov , ROHNES od medro a artnoc es-maratlover , odad ahnit sov euq arret ad essop ramot ri uodnam sov ROHNES o , aienraB sédaC me , odnauq E

. ahnatnom ad aicsed euq etnerrot à saznic saleuqa moc ierita e aznic me odot uocif euq éta odíom meb o-íom e o-ieletram , ogof oa o-iessemerra e , odacep ossov od oturf are euq e odacirbaf mahnit euq orrezeb on ierraga siopeD

. odidep uem o uedneta ROHNES o zev amu siam saM . essíurtsed sov e sóv artnoc messatlov es ROHNES od roruf o e ari a euq odem ahniT

. ” odidnuf latem ed olodí mu marezif e iecart sehl ue euq , ohnimac od maraivsed es asserped ; odipmorroc átse , otpigE od etsarit ut euq eleuqa , ovop uet o euqrop , asserped ecsed , adnA “ : arutla assen em-essid e
açnaila ad sacalp sa , ardep ed sacalp saud sa em-ued ROHNES o , setion atnerauq e said atnerauq sod mif on , sioP

. rebeb men remoc mes , setion atnerauq e said atnerauq ahnatnom an ieuqif , ocsovnoc zef ROHNES o euq açnaila a atircse avatse edno , ardep ed sacalp sa racsub ri arap , ahnatnom à ibus ue odnauQ
. sov-riurtsed a otsopsid evetse e ocsovnoc uotirri es ROHNES o euq , etsacovorp o odom lat ed , beroH etnom oN
. ROHNES o artnoc edleber erpmes odis snet , aroga éta otpigE od etsías euq edseD . sueD uet , ROHNES o etsatsogsed , otresed on , euq ed saçeuqse et oãN «
» . edleber ovop mu sé ut siop , aled essop seramot arap , asohlivaram arret asse rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq otirém uet rop é oãn euq rebas a otnatrop aciF
. bocaJ e caasI , oãarbA , sodassapetna suet soa arezif euq assemorp a rirpmuc arap mébmat e uodresed so , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq sovop sessed edadlam ad asuac rop mis ioF . seled oirótirret od essop ramot a etsagehc euq oãditcer aut alep men , sotirém suet solep iof oãN
. uojolased so ROHNES o euq sovop setsed edadlam ad asuac rop iof euqrop , arret atsed essop seramot arap exuort et ROHNES o euq sotirém suet solep iof euq rasnep a sahnop et oãn , it ed etnaid odaslupxe revit so , sueD uet , ROHNES o odnauQ
. essid et ROHNES o omoc , recerapased sáraf so asserped e oirótirret ues od essop ramot sárI . it ed etnaid arret rop atied so e iórtsed so euq rodaroved ogof mu omoc , etnerf aut à iav euq ROHNES o é euq ed azetrec a snet aroga saM
” ? canA etnagig od setnednecsed soa ritsiser edop meuQ “ : etsivuo áj , otrec ed , euq otid eleuqa rop éta sol-ecehnoc uT . arutatse adavele ed etneg mare canA etnagig od setnednecsed so mébmaT
. uéc oa éta sahlarum moc sedadic sednarg ed e ut euq od setrof siam e seroiam sovop ed oirótirret od essop ramot seri arap , oãdroJ o rassevarta aroga siaV ! learsI , atucsE «

, odíurtsed azetrec ed sáres euq et-otnarag , seraroda so e otluc seratserp sehl e sesued sortuo ed sárta ri arap , sueD uet , ROHNES od sereceuqse et aid mugla es saM
. sodassapetna sossov so moc zef euq açnaila a ép ed retnam a ejoh adnia aunitnoc ele euq missa É . azeuqir odnairc seri arap , açrof a ád et euq é ele euqrop , sueD uet , ROHNES od et-arbmeL
” . soãm sairpórp sahnim sa moc , açrof ahnim a moc , azeuqir emrone atse rezaf iugesnoc euq é uE “ : sagid oãn E
. orutuf on edadirepsorp rad sov arap ós are lanifa otsi odut sam , avorp à sov-sôp e seõçavirp rassap sov-zeF . maicehnoc oãn sodassapetna sossov so euq , ánam o moc uotnemila sov e
arud ardep amu ed augá ratorb zef euq ía ioF . augá mes e odirá otresed , seõiprocse e sasonenev setnepres ed oiehc , levírret e osnemi , otresed od sévarta uizudnoc et euq e
, oãdivarcse ad arret ad , otpigE od rias zef et euq , ROHNES od saçeuqse et euq açetnoca oãN . sueD uet , ROHNES od saçeuqse et e açediavne es oãçaroc uet o , ossi odut ed sioped , euq açetnoca oãn
, ecnetrep et euq o e oruo o e atarp aut a , sohnaber e sodag suet so sodatnemua serev ed
, odatibah seret sa e sasac odíurtsnoc seret ed , otiefsitas seracif éta odimoc seret ed sioped , euq açetnoca oãN
. uod et ejoh ue euq , siel e soterced , sotnemadnam sues so rirpmuc ed sexied oãn e , sueD uet , ROHNES od saçeuqse et oãN ! odadiuc meT «
» . ued et euq asohlivaram arret alep , sueD uet , ROHNES oa sárecedarga e otiefsitas seracif éta sáremoc ilA
. sahnatnom saus sad erboc e sahcor saus sad orref racnarra sedop edno arret amu É . adimoc ed atlaf árevah oãn ál siop , edatnov à remoc sedop edno arret amu É
. lem ed e etieza otium ed arret , sariezãmor ed e sarieugif ed , ahniv ed , adavec e ogirt ed arret É
. sahnatnom san e seicínalp san matorb euq setnecsan e setnof , soir áh edno , asohlivaram arret amu arap rizudnoc et-iav , sueD uet , ROHNES O
. ele rop otiepser o odot moc sohnimac sues so euges e , sueD uet , ROHNES od sotnemadnam so erpmuc , ossi roP
. ohlif ues od adiuc iap mu omoc it ed adiuc , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq ed etneicsnoc meb seuqif euq arap É
. sodahcni maracif sép suet so men marecehlevne oãn adnia sapuor saut sa , sona atnerauq setseN
. aus arvalap amu moc ranoicroporp ehl sueD euq o odut ed reviv edop euq sam , eviv memoh o euq oãp ed ós é oãn euq rartsom et arap ioF . maicehnoc sodassapetna suet so men ut men euq , ánam o moc et-uotnemila , emof e seõçavirp rassap rezaf et ed siopeD
. oãn uo sotnemadnam sues so rirpmuc sai es rebas e roiretni uet o meb recehnoc arap , avorp à rôp et e seõçavirp rassap rezaf et arap ioF . otresed olep rezaf a uogirbo et ROHNES o euq sona atnerauq ed adahnimac agnol ad et-arbmeL
. sodassapetna sossov soa uetemorp ROHNES o euq , arret ad essop ramot a ragehc oãredop e recserc e reviv oãredop missA . uod sov ejoh euq sotnemadnam so acitárp me mahnoP «


» . oãçiurtsed à sadanednoc sasioc oãs euqrop , ossi odut rop rorroh e ozerpsed ret seveD . sasioc siat sadanednoc oãtse euq a oãçiurtsed amsem à odanednoc sairacif siop , asac arap sievánimoba snegami sasse sevel oãN
. sasioc sasse a rorroh met , sueD uet , ROHNES o euqrop it arap ahlidamra amu áres , ossid serairporpa et eS . etsever so euq oruo o e atarp a seciboc oãn sam , sesued sues sod snegami sa amieuQ
. sodot a sol-íurtsed siav e aicnêtsiser recerefo áriugesnoc et méugniN . odnum etsen sodadrocer majes siam acnun sele euq moc sáraf ut e soãm saut san sier sues so áracoloc elE
. etnematelpmoc merecerapased éta rorret ed so-odnehcne , oãçisopsid aut à áracoloc so , sueD uet , ROHNES oirpórp O
. omsem it arap ogirep moc , sezoref siamina so riarta oãn arap asserped otium sele moc rabaca sedop oãN . etnerf aut ad sovop sesse áraslupxe , sueD uet , ROHNES o ocuop a ocuoP
. remet zaf es euq e osoredop sueD mu é ele e ogitnoc átse , sueD uet , ROHNES o euqrop , seled odem sahnet oãN
. odapacse ahnet euq mugla omsem éta recerapased áraf euq ednarg oãt rorret mu sele ertne áracovorP
. odem snet aroga ut meuq ed , sovop so sodot moc arap omsem o rezaf a áratlov , sueD uet , ROHNES O . ál ed rias zef et euq moc açrof a e osnemi redop o , soigídorp e sianis so , etsaicneserp oirpórp ut euq seõçavorp sednarg sa
: otpigE o odot a e óaraf oa zef , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq od et-arbmeL . seled odem sahnet oãN
. rajolased so arap açrof snet oãn euq e ut euq od setrof siam otium oãs sele euq omsem ogitnoc rasnep a ratse sedoP
. it arap ahlidamra amu é ossi euqrop , sesued sues soa otluc setserp men , seled anep sahnet oãN . ragertne iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq , sovop so sodot riurtsed euq snet saM
. sogimini sossov so erbos mis sam , sóv erbos riac áraf sa oãn elE . marecehnoc meb euq , otpigE od sagarp sievírret saleuqa , saçneod sa sadot sóv ed áratsafa ROHNES O
. siamina men , rehlum men , memoh men , lirétse méugnin sáret oãn : sovop sortuo so sodot euq od odaoçneba siam sáreS
. sodassapetna suet soa otief otnemaruj rop , rad ed airevah et euq uetemorp ele euq arret an , sahlevo saut sad e sacav saut sad sairc sa , etieza uet o , ohniv uet o , ogirt uet o : arret aut ad sotudorp so e sohlif suet sod oremún o ratnemua odnezaf e et-odnaoçneba , roma ues o et-rartsom ed-áH
. sodassapetna suet soa uetemorp omoc , edadnob moc et-ratart a áraunitnoc e açnaila aus a áretnam , sueD uet , ROHNES o , acitárp me seresup so e soterced setse seratucse eS «
» . uod et ejoh ue euq sotiecerp e siel , sotnemadnam so acitárp me rôp seved , ossi roP
. seleuqad mu adac a ogitsac o rad me aromed oãn e , recerep so-odnezaf , mama o oãn euq so etnemlaudividni agitsac saM
. sotnemadnam sues so madraug e mama o euq seleuqa , seõçareg lim etnarud , edadnob moc atart e açnaila aus à leif é elE . sueD etnemariedadrev é , sueD uet , ROHNES o ós euq odnebas aciF
. otpigE od ier , óaraf od soãm sad , oãdivarcse ad arret ad uocnarra sov e , redop emrone moc uotrebil sov ROHNES o euq sodassapetna sossov soa zef euq otnemaruj oa leif res arap e , roma rop iof saM
. siamed sod oiem on oneuqep meb ovop mu oãs , otcaf ed , siop , sortuo so euq od roiam ovop mu meres rop oãn , sov-uehlocse e sóv rop es-uosseretni ROHNES O «
» . odnum on metsixe euq sovop so sodot ertned , ralucitrap ovop ues o seres arap et-uehlocse , sueD uet , ROHNES O . sueD uet , ROHNES oa odargasnoc ovop mu sé uT
. sesued soslaf sod snegami sa ramieuq e sodargas setsop sues so racnarra , sosoigiler sotnemunom sues so rarbeuq , seratla sues so riurtsed é rezaf meved euq O
. recerapased airaf sov asserped e sóv artnoc odangidni airacif ROHNES O . sesued sortuo a otluc mairatserp e riuges em ed mairaxied sohlif suet so , amrof assed , sioP
. sahlif saut sa men sohlif suet so men , ut men , sele moc sotnemasac saçaf oãN
. seled anep sahnet men sele moc açnaila saçaf oãN . etnematelpmoc sol-íurtsed e sol-átorred siaV . soãm saut san sol-ácoloc iav , sueD uet , ROHNES O
. ut euq od setrof siam e seroiam sovop etes oãS . suesubej so e sueveh so , suezirep so , suenanac so , suerroma so , suesagriug so , satitih so : sovop sotium raslupxe iav elE . aled essop seramot ed mif a , segirid et edno arap arret à rizudnoc et-iav , sueD uet , ROHNES O «
» ” . ued son ROHNES o euq sotnemadnam setse etnemleif somrirpmuc es , sueD osson , ROHNES od etnaid sodacifitsuj someraciF
. somet aroga euq adiv a ravresnoc somredop e etnemlautca ecetnoca omoc , edadirepsorp somret arap , sueD osson , ROHNES o somratiepser arap siel satse sadot acitárp me rôp son-uodnaM
. sodassapetna sosson soa oditemorp ahnit euq arret a rad son e rizudnoc son arap , ál ed oãtne son-uorit elE
. sahnumetset somof sóN . asac aus a adot e óaraf od sotidbús so artnoc sievírret e semrone soigídorp e sianis uozilaeR
. ál ed son-uorit , redop ednarg ues o moc , ROHNES o e , otpigE on óaraf od sovarcse somof sóN “ : missa rednopser meved
, uoxied son , sueD osson , ROHNES o euq setse oãs sotiecerp e siel , seõçurtsni euq meratnugrep sov , aid mu , sohlif sossov so odnauQ
. uetemorp sov ROHNES o omoc lat , etnerf assov ad sogimini sossov so odnaslupxe
, sodassapetna sossov soa uetemorp ROHNES o euq asohlivaram arret ad essop ramot a ragehc meredop e sezilef meres arap , ROHNES od etnaid mob e otsuj é euq o meuqitarP
. ued sov ele euq , siel sa e seõçurtsni saus sa , sueD ossov , ROHNES od sotnemadnam so rirpmuc rop es-mecrofsE
. ássaM me marezif áj omoc , sueD ossov , ROHNES o meuqovorp oãN
. arret ad recerapased açaf sov e sóv artnoc etirri es , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq moc maçaf oãN . sesued sortuo mahnet euq arelot oãn euq sueD mu é , ocsovnoc átse euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES o sioP
. atlov assov à sovop so maroda euq sesued so , sohnartse sesued meroda oãN
. emon ues olep oãnes , sotnemaruj saçaf oãn e otluc ehl-atserp e , sueD uet , ROHNES o atiepseR
. oãdivarcse ed arret amu it arap are euq , otpigE od uorit et euq , ROHNES o arutla assen receuqse oãn me , odadiuc met saM
. otiefsitas sáracif e edatnov à sáremoC . etsatnalp oãn ut euq siavilo e sahniv , sol-êzaf a ut odis seret mes , sotief meb soçop , sal-êhcne a ut odis seret mes , mob é euq o odut ed saiehc sasac
, etsíurtsnoc oãn ut euq sedadic saleb e sednarg oãS . bocaJ e caasI , oãarbA , sodassapetna suet soa otief otnemaruj rop , et-rad uetemorp euq arret a arap rizudnoc et-iav , sueD uet , ROHNES O «
» . seõtrop suet so sodot me e asac aut ad satrop sad sarierbmo san so-evercsE
. amelbme omoc atset aut an , ovitnitsid mu omoc oçarb uet on sol-êzart seveD
. megaiv ed sáv reuq , asac me sajetse reuq , ratnavel oa omoc ratied oa otnat , so-eteper e sohlif suet soa etnemaunitnoc so-anisnE
. airómem aut an erpmes majetse uod et ejoh euq sotnemadnam so euQ
. saçrof saut sa sadot moc e amla aut a adot moc , oãçaroc o odot moc , sueD uet , ROHNES o amA
. sueD osson o é ele ós e ROHNES o , learsI , atucsE
. sodassapetna suet sod sueD , ROHNES o uetemorp omoc , lem e etiel erroc edno arret aleuqan osoremun otium ovop mu et-ranrot ed-sáh e zilef sáres missA . acitárp me san-eõp e sasioc satse atucse , learsI ed ovoP
. sona sognol reviv meredop arap , soten e sohlif sossov soa e sóv a , ritimsnart a uotse ue euq , sotnemadnam e siel saus sa , adiv a adot etnarud , odnirpmuc , sueD ossov , ROHNES o moc arap otiepser oãrartsom missA
. essop ramot oãv euq ed e megirid es edno arap arret an merirpmuc so ed mif a , racinumoc sov ue arap ued em , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq sotiecerp e siel , sotnemadnam so oãs setsE «
» . essop ramot oãv euq ed arret an sona sognol oãreviv e edadirepsorp e adiv oãret missA . uoçart sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq ohnimac o erpmes magiS
. ortuo arap men odal mu arap men , seled metsafa es oãN . uonedro sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o omoc , acitárp me , otnatrop , son-mahnoP
” . aus res a racif arap rad uov sehl ue euq arret an merirpmuc so ed mif a , ranisne sehl ed snet euq sotiecerp e siel , snedro sa sadot et-ritimsnart uov ue euq ogimoc iuqa acif , mérop , uT
. sadnet saus sa arap ratlov medop euq sehl-rezid iaV
. erpmes arap , setnednecsed sues so e sele , sezilef maires missA ! snedro sahnim sa rirpmuc ed e ratiepser em ed edatnov aob atse erpmes messevit sele euq ared meuQ
. otrec etnemarietni átse maressid sele euq O . rezid iof et ovop etse euq o odut ietucsE “ : em-essid e , ogimoc mavalaf odnauq , rivuo a avatse ROHNES O
” . acitárp me odut rôp e rivuo sometemorp són euq , ressid et ele euq o odut son-acinumoc e rezid arap met , sueD osson , ROHNES o euq oliuqa evuo e , sésioM , ut iaV
? somivuo són omoc , ogof od oiem od ralaf a aossep me sueD rivuo ed sioped , oviv raunitnoc edop euq memoh o é meuq , sioP
. rerrom omsem someri oãn es ebas meuq , ralaf a , sueD osson , ROHNES o rivuo a somaunitnoc eS ? emrone ogof etse rop sodaroved rerrom ed ocsir o rerroc ed somevah euq é euq rop , ossid rasepA
. ele moc odalaf ret sueD ed rasepa , reviv a raunitnoc memoh o levíssop é , lanifa , euq somácifirev ejoH . ogof od oiem od ralaf a zov aus a somivuo e azednarg aus a e redop ues o son-uortsom , sueD osson , ROHNES O “ : merezid em arap
, soãicna sossov so e sobirt sassov sad sefehc so ogimoc ret mareiv , samahc me redra a avatse ahnatnom a otnauqne , oãdirucse ad oiem od ahniv euq zov a marivuo odnauQ
. sam-ued e ardep ed sacalp saud me sarvalap satse uevercsE . adan siam uotnecserca oãn e oãdirucse ad e mevun ad , ogof od oiem od etrof zov moc uolaF . beroH etnom od otnuj sodinuer sodot mavatse odnauq , uigirid sov ROHNES o euq sarvalap sa marof satsE «
» ” . asioc artuo reuqlauq uo orrub uo iob o , avarcse a uo ovarcse o , opmac o , asac a ajes , sortuo soa ecnetrep euq od adan seciboc men , ortuo ed rehlum a seciboc oãN
. méugnin artnoc ohnumetset oslaf setnavel oãN
. sebuor oãN
. oirétluda satemoc oãN
. méugnin setam oãN
. rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret an zilef sáres e sona sotium sáreviv missA . uonedro et , sueD uet , ROHNES o omoc , eãm aut a e iap uet o atiepseR
. odabás ed aid o sessadraug euq uonedro et ele , ossi roP . ál ed rias zef et , redop e açrof ednarg moc , ROHNES o euq e , otpigE on savatse odnauq , ovarcse etsof ut mébmat euq et-arbmeL
. ut omoc lat rasnacsed ed mêt , sovarcse suet majes euq omsem , sodoT . it arap ahlabart euq oriegnartse o reuqes men , lamina ortuo reuqlauq uo orrub uo iob uet o men , savarcse e sovarcse suet so men , sahlif e sohlif suet so men ut men , muhnen ohlabart rezaf sedop oãn , aid esseN . sueD uet , ROHNES od arnoh me osnacsed ed é aid omités o saM
. rezaf a snet euq o odut rezaf e rahlabart sedop said sies etnaruD
. uodnam et ele omoc , sueD uet , ROHNES oa o-odnargasnoc , odabás ed aid o adrauG
. emon ues o missa asu meuq a aodrep oãn ROHNES o euqrop , oslaf raruj arap , sueD uet , ROHNES od emon o sesu oãN
. snedro sahnim sa merpmuc e mama em euq seleuqà seõçareg lim etnarud roma moc ogap mébmat saM
. sotensib e soten so éta e sohlif so ragitsac ed zapac uos , mim artnoc metemoc siap so euq sapluc sad asuac roP . sesued sortuo ahnet meuq arelot oãn euq sueD mu uos , ROHNES o , ue euqrop , otluc setserp sehl men seroda so oãN
. arret ad oxiabed augá an uo arret an uo uéc on etsixe euq oliuqad rof euq o ajes odnatneserper , sesued soslaf ed snegami saçaf oãN
. mim ed méla , sesued sortuo raroda seved oãN
. ovarcse sare ut edno , otpigE od ierit et euq , sueD uet , ROHNES o uos uE “
: essid ROHNES O . ahnatnom à ribus maireuq oãn e ogof od odem otium mahnit siop , aizid ROHNES o euq oliuqa racilpxe sov arap , sóv e ROHNES o ertne avatse uE
. ogof od oiem od etnerf a etnerf ocsovnoc uolaf ROHNES o , etnom eleuqaN
. soviv adnia ejoh iuqa somatse euq so , ocsonnoc sam , açnaila asse zef ele euq sodassapetna sosson so moc iof oãN
. beroH etnom on , ocsonnoc açnaila amu zef , sueD osson , ROHNES O
. ” acitárp me son-mahnop e meb son-madnerpA . ejoh recehnoc a uod sov ue euq sotiecerp e siel sa metucse , satilearsi Ó “ : essid e learsI ed ovop o odot uinuer sésioM «

» . agsiP etnom od satsocne sad otnuj , otroM ram oa éta oãdroJ oir od etneiro a oãiger a adot maíulcni e
, nomreH o é euq , noiríS etnom oa éta , nonrA oir od megram an , reorA edsed mai soirótirret sessE
. oãdroJ od etneiro a setnetsixe suerroma sier siod so mare euq , ãsaB ed ier , gO ed oirótirret od e oirótirret ues od essop oãtne maramoT
. otpigE od merías ed sioped , maratorred satilearsi so e sésioM euq e , nobseH me aiviv euq , suerroma sod ier , noeS ed oirótirret on , roeP-teB ed etnerf me acif euq elav on , oãdroJ od etneiro a ioF
. otpigE od odías meret ed sioped , uitimsnart sehl sésioM euq sotiecerp e siel , seõçurtsni oãS
. satilearsi soa uogertne sésioM euq iel a é atsE «
» . séssanaM ed so arap , ãsaB me , ãloG e ; daG ed setnednecsed so arap , daeliuG me , tomaR ; nebúR ed setnednecsed so arap , otlanalp od anoz an , otresed on , receB : sale marE
. adiv a avavlas e sedadic sassed amu arap aiguf , ossid setna lam rereuq ehl mes , rereuq mes méugla essatam euq eleuqa odoT
. oãdroJ oir od etneiro a odautis oirótirret on , oigúfer ed sedadic sêrt oãtne uongised sésioM «
» . erpmes arap sov-rad iav , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq arret an sona sognol oãreviv e , edrat siam , sohlif sossov so oãres sezilef e sezilef sieres missA . otneserpa sov ejoh ue euq sotnemadnam e siel saus sa marpmuc , ossi roP
. ortuo áh oãn e arret an omoc uéc on otnat , etsixe euq sueD ocinú o é ROHNES o euq airómem an meb mexif e rebas a siop meuqiF
. ejoh adnia res a aunitnoc omoc , açnareh rop ragertne al-ov e seled are euq arret à rizudnoc sov arap , setrof siam e sosoremun siam sovop otievorp ossov me uojolaseD
. redop osnemi ues o moc otpigE od sov-odnarvil , setnednecsed sues so etnemlaicepse uehlocse e sodassapetna suet solep roma evet ele euqrop otsi odut E
. ogof od oiem on sarvalap saus sa rivuo maredup e osoidnarg ogof ues o arret an rev sov-zef ; riurtsni sov arap , zov aus a uéc od rivuo sov-zeF
. eled arof muhnen siam áh oãn e sueD ocinú o é ROHNES o euq mabias euq arap , ossi rev odad sov-ioF
. sohlo soirpórp sossov so moc mariv omoc , otpigE on sóv rop ossi odut zef , sueD ossov , ROHNES o , arO ? sogimini so rorret ed aihcne euq redop e açrof ahnamat moc e , satul e soigídorp , sergalim sotnat moc , ortuo ed oiem on odidrep , ovop mu ratrebil arienam atsed uotnet sued mugla áJ
? reviv a raunitnoc sioped odnedop , marivuo sêcov omoc , ogof od oiem od ehl-ralaf sueD ed zov a uivuo ovop mugla áJ
. etnahlemes asioc ed ralaf uivuo es áj es uo atse a laugi asioc amugla áh es rev arap , artuo à éta uéc od atnop amu edsed rarucorp sedop e edadinamuH a uoirc sueD euq me aid o edsed , it ed setna marassap áj euq sopmet sod sévarta raugireva sedoP
. rirpmuc uoruj euq e sodassapetna sossov so moc zef euq açnaila ad eceuqse es oãn ele euqrop , sodíurtsed majes euq áritnesnoc men áranodnaba sov oãn e edadnob ed oiehc é , sueD ossov , ROHNES o sioP
. merecedebo ehl ovon ed arap , sueD ossov , ROHNES o arap ratlov ed-oãh , merecetnoca saçargsed satse sadot etnemlanif odnauQ
. oãrartnocne o euq otrec ed , amla a adot moc e oãçaroc o odot moc , sueD ossov , ROHNES o merarucorp , ila omsem , es saM
. maripser men , memoc men , mevuo men , meêv men euq , ardep e ariedam ed sesued , snemoh solep sotief sesued raroda oãri ál roP
. opurg oneuqep mu sanepa res a oãracif , árarita sov ele edno arap , sovop sod oiem on , e ; sovop so ertne rop sov-rahlapse ed-áh ROHNES O
. sodíurtsed , azetrec ed , oãres e opmet otium alen oãreviv oãn , amrof asseD . oãdroJ o merassevarta oa , essop ramot oãv aroga euq ed arret assed oãrecerapased asserped , recetnoca lat eS . sóv artnoc sahnumetset omoc arret a e uéc o ohnop omsem ejoh , ossi roP
. ol-êdnefo a e ROHNES od etnaid lam o racitarp a oãtse , rof euq od ajes sesued soslaf ed snegami merezaf ed otnop oa meraxiaber es es , arret assov an opmet otium áh merevitse áj e soten e sohlif merevit odnauQ
. sesued sortuo mahnet euq arelot oãn e rodaroved ogof mu omoc é , sueD ossov , ROHNES o sioP
. uibiorp sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq oliuqad adan ed sesued soslaf ed snegami maçaf oãN . ocsovnoc zef ROHNES o euq açnaila ad maçeuqse es oãn e odadiuc mahneT
. asohlivaram arret aleuqad essop ramot ed-oãh e ol-ássevarta ed-oãh sêcov sam , oãdroJ o ossevarta oãn áJ . iuqa rerrom uov uE
. açnareh omoc rad iav sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq asohlivaram arret an airartne men oãdroJ o airassevarta oãn ue euq uoruj e , asuac assov rop , mim artnoc es-uotirri ROHNES o saM
. laicepse arienam ed ROHNES oa ecnetrep euq ovop mu : ejoh adnia sios euq oliuqan uomrofsnart sov e , orierref ed ahlanrof amu omoc sóv arap are euq , otpigE od rias sov-zef e etnemlaicepse sov-uehlocse ROHNES o , sóv a otnauQ
. arret an metsixe euq sovop so sodot a sietú meres arap so-ued sueD ossov , ROHNES o , otcaf eD . oãçaroda me seled etnaid menilcni es oãn , sortsa sod otnujnoc o odot e salertse sa , auL a , loS o merev oa e uéc o arap merahlo oA
. ram od sexiep uo arret ad sietpér ed men
, uéc olep maov euq seva sad reuqlauq ed uo , metsixe euq siamina sod reuqlauq ed men
, rehlum ed uo memoh ed , eicépse reuqlauq ed seõçatneserper uo snegami merezaf ed otnop oa éta repmorroc , otnatrop , mexied es oãN
. beroH etnom on , uolaf sov ROHNES o , ogof od oiem od , odnauq , sueD ed oãçatneserper amuhnen mariv oãn euq meb es-merbmeL «
» . essop ramot mai euq ed , arret an rirpmuc maived euq sotiecerp e siel essanisne sov euq , arutla assen , em-uodnam ROHNES o , mim A
. ardep ed sacalp saud me otircse ahnit ele euq , sotnemadnam zed so rirpmuc sov-uodnam , açnaila aus a recehnoc a sov-ueD
. méugnin maiv oãn sam , zov aus a marivuo e ogof od oiem od sov-uolaf ROHNES o oãtnE
. oãdirucse e snevun , savert me otlovne uéc o arap maibus euq , samahc me aidra ahnatnom A . ahnatnom ad odnuf oa maracif e es-maramixorpa sêcoV
” . omsem o rezaf a sohlif so menisne euq arap e , arret an mereviv euq me opmet o odot etnarud , em-ratiepser a merednerpa arap , arvalap a sehl-rigirid oreuq ue euqrop , mim ed etnaid ovop o enúeR “ : otid em-ahnit ROHNES o , beroH etnom on , sueD ossov , ROHNES od etnaid marevitse euq me aid oN «
» . soten e sohlif sossov soa recehnoc a san-meêd e setneserp erpmes san-mahneT . sohlo soirpórp sossov so moc mariv euq sasioc sa mereceuqse oãn arap oãçneta atium metserp e odadiuc mahnet saM
? otneserpa sov ejoh ue euq , iel atse omoc sotsuj oãt sotiecerp e siel met , sednarg sad omsem , oãçan euq E
. ele rop mamahc euq sod omixórp erpmes átse ele , otcaf eD ? sueD osson , ROHNES o somet són omoc somixórp oãt sesued met , sednarg sad omsem , oãçan euQ
” ! aicnêgiletni e airodebas lat amu iussop ovop ednarg etse óS “ : rezid oãredop siel satsed ralaf merivuo sele odnauQ . aicnêgiletni ed e airodebas ed lanis mu ossin rev ed-oãh sovop sortuo so e acitárp me son-mahnop e son-metiecA
. essop ramot oãv euq ed , arret an merevitse odnauq , rirpmuc es arap oãs , rezaf uodnam em , sueD uem , ROHNES o omoc lat , onisne sov euq sotiecerp so e siel sa euq maçeuqse es oãN
. ejoh soviv sodot siaunitnoc , ROHNES oa siéif setsecenamrep euq , sóv euq ossap oa
, roeP-laaB ed sued o mariuges euq satilearsi so sodot recerapased zef , sueD ossov , ROHNES O . roeP-laaB me zef ROHNES o euq oliuqa mariv sohlo soirpórp sossov so moC
. etnemlargetni san-mevresbO . sonem arap men siam arap men , uod sov ue euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES od siel sa meuqifidom oãN
. ád sov , sodassapetna sossov sod sueD , ROHNES o euq arret ad essop ramot ri oãredop e adiv oãret , merirpmuc so eS . onisne et ue euq sotiecerp e siel sà oãçneta atserp , learsI ed ovop Ó «
» . roeP-teB ed etnerf me , elav on sodapmaca somáunitnoc E
” . rev siav ut euq arret a riubirtsid ed-áh sehl ele e ovop etsed etnerf à ári ele euqrop , o-amina e o-ajarocne , éusoJ a seõçurtsni áD
. sárassap oãn ut oãdroJ od odal ortuo o arap siop , odut meb avresbO . etneiro arap e lus arap , etron arap , etnedico arap ahlo e agsiP etnom od omic oa eboS
. otnussa essen ralaf a setlov em euq oreuq oãN ! atsaB “ : uednopser e odidep uem o uotucse oãn , asuac assov rop , mim artnoc odangidni es-ahnit ROHNES o saM
” . onabíL o e sahnatnom saleb saleuqa , asohlivaram arret aleuqa rev redop arap , oãdroJ od odal ortuo o arap rassap em-axieD
. sezaf ut euq sahlivaram e soigídorp so ezilaer euq , arret an uo uéc on , sueD ortuo etsixe oãN . redop uet o e azednarg aut a ovres uet oa rartsom a etsaçemoc , sueD uem , ROHNES “
: ROHNES oa missa iero , oãisaco aleuqaN «
» ” . sóv rop áretabmoc , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euqrop , seled odem sahnet oãN
. rassap sári edno rop sonier so sodot a omsem o áraf ROHNES o sioP . sier siod seleuqà zef , sueD ossov , ROHNES o euq o odut ed ahnumetset etsof uT “ : éusoJ a seõçadnemocer setniuges sa zif , arutla asseN
. ” ied sov euq edadeirporp a arap ratlov áredop sóv ed mu adac oãtne , oãdroJ od odal ortuo od uetemorp sehl euq arret ad essop a sehl-odnad , sobirt sartuo sad soãmri sossov soa mébmat osnacsed redecnoc ROHNES o odnauQ
. siamina sotium mêt euq ies ue E . odag ossov o omoc meb , ied sov euq sedadic san oãracif euq é saçnairc sa e serehlum sa óS
. satoirtapmoc sossov , satilearsi sortuo sod etnerf à ri meved arreug a arap sotpa snemoh sossov so sodot sam , edadeirporp omoc oirótirret etse sov-ued , sueD ossov , ROHNES O “ : ienedro ue , arutla asseN
. otroM ram o é otsi , laS od raM oa éta éraseneG ed ogal o edsed , oãdroJ oir on etimil moc , agsiP etnom od satsocne sad etneiro arap , oãdroJ od elav o e ábarA ad oãiger a adnia sehl-ieD
. nomA ed setnednecsed so moc arietnorf zaf euq , cobaJ oir oa éta e , etimil omoc oir od ortnec o odnet , nonrA oir od elav oa éta daeliuG ed etrap adnia ied daG ed e nebúR ed setnednecsed soA
. daeliuG ed oãiger a ied riuqaM ailímaf À
. avresnoc ejoh adnia euq emon , riaJ ed saiedlA uo riaJ-tovaH ehl-odnamahc , ãsaB a e seõiger saleuqà emon ues o ued e ácaM ed e ruhceuG ed arietnorf à éta bogrA ed oãiger asse adot moc uocif , séssanaM ed etnednecsed , riaJ
. séssanaM ed obirt aiem à sa-ied , satíafer sod arret omoc adicehnoc , bogrA ed oãiger a adot e , gO ed onier ogitna oa odicnetrep ahnit euq , ãsaB ed oãiger a adot , daeliuG ed etnatser etrap A
. daG ed e nebúR ed setnednecsed soa o-ied , sedadic saus sa moc , daeliuG ed sahnatnom sad edatem e nonrA oir od elav oa éta reorA edsed , arutla aleuqan odatsiuqnoc oirótirret O «
» . nomA ed setnednecsed sod latipac , ábaR me rev edop es adnia euq , arugral ed siod e otnemirpmoc ed sortem ortauq ed acrec moc orref ed amac amu ahnit euq menigamI . satíafer setnagig sod avatser euq etnednecsed ocinú o are , ãsaB ed ier , gO
. gO ed onier od sedadic mare ierdE e aclaS éta ãsaB ed e daeliuG ed oãiger a adot e otlanalp od sedadic sa sadoT
. rineS ehl-mavamahc suerroma so e noiríS o nomreH oa mavamahc nodíS ed soicínef sO
. nomreH etnom oa éta nonrA oir od elav o edsed iav euq oirótirret o , oãdroJ od odal ortuo od aivah euq , suerroma sier siod soa somátsiuqnoc euq arutla assen ioF
. són arap sol-omehlocer sedadic sad sojopsed so e siamina so saM
. saçnairc e serehlum , snemoh , sedadic somíurtsed : nobseH ed ier , noeS moc somezif omoc lat , oãçiurtsed à odut sománednoC
. siam satium mare euq , sadacifitrof oãn seõçaovop sa ratnoc mes , sohlorref e satrop , sahlarum satla moc , sadacifitrof sedadic mare satse sadoT
. ãsaB me , gO ed soinímod soa aicnetrep euq , bogrA ed oãiger a adot me , sedadic atnesses maroF . somessámot oãn sehl són euq oãçaovop evuoh oãn e sedadic saus sa sadot somátsiuqnoc , arutla amsem aN
. méugnin uocif oãn euq atorred ahnamat ehl-somigilfnI . oticréxe ues o odot moc , soãm sasson san , ãsaB ed ier , gO mébmat uogertne , sueD osson , ROHNES o E
” . nobseH me aiviv euq , suerroma sod ier , noeS moc etsezif euq o ele moc zaF . oirótirret e ovop ues o odot a e ele a , soãm saut san o-ohnop uE . eled odem mahnet oãN “ : em-essid ROHNES o saM
. ierdE me arreug rezaf son arap , oticréxe ues o odot e ele , ortnocne osson oa uias , ãsaB ed ier , gO . ãsaB a oãçcerid me somibus e omur ed oãtne somáduM «

» . racata ed odibiorp ahnit son , sueD osson , ROHNES o euq seragul sortuo son men , ahnatnom ad sedadic san e cobaJ oir od oãiger an somártne oãn omoc lat , somártne oãn euq é nomA ed setnednecsed sod oirótirret on óS
. soãm sasson san odut uogertne ROHNES O . essitsiser son euq oãçaovop evuoh oãn , daeliuG éta elav on omsem átse euq edadic ad e , nonrA ed elav od atsocne an átse euq , reorA edseD
. sadatsiuqnoc sedadic sad sojopsed so moc e siamina so moc somácif óS
. méugnin rapacse somáxied oãN . oãçiurtsed latot à sománednoc sa e sedadic sa sadot arutla amsem aleuqan somátsiuqnoC
. oticréxe ues oa e sohlif sues soa , ele a ol-omátorred són e soãm sasson san o-uocoloc , sueD osson , ROHNES o saM
. sáaJ me ahlatab rad son arap , oticréxe ues o odot moc ortnocne osson oa uias noeS
” . eled essop amot e oirótirret ues on artnE . síap ues o e noeS et-ragertne uov , aroga ed ritrap A “ : em-essid ROHNES O
. ejoh adnia aunitnoc missa e , soãm sassov san ragertne o missa arap , oãçaroc ues o e etnem aus a uecerudne euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES o ioF . somessássap euq uitnesnoc oãn , nobseH ed ier , noeS saM
” . soirótirret sues so rassevarta maraxied son mébmat rA ed oãiger an meviv euq satibaom so e rieS me meviv euq , úasE ed setnednecsed sO . rad iav son , sueD osson , ROHNES o euq arret a arap somri ed mif a , oãdroJ oir o somrassevarta éta
, rassap sexied son euq somereuq óS . rebeb arap augá e remoc arap somrasicerp euq ed oliuqa rarpmoc em-axieD
. ortuo o arap men odal mu arap men , lapicnirp ohnimac od ierias oãn sam , oirótirret uet o rassevarta ed ret uoV “
: zap ed atsoporp etniuges a moc , nobseH ed ier , noeS a soriegasnem ieivne , tomedeuQ ed otresed o edseD «
» ” . aitsúgna ed soiehc oãracif e remert ed-oãh , amaf assov ad otnemicehnoc merevit odnauQ . metiepser sov e mamet sov arret ad sovop so sodot euq moc rezaf uov , etnaid me ejoh eD
. oirótirret ues od essop amot e ele artnoc arreug aralceD . oirótirret ues o e , nobseH ed ier , noeS uerroma o ogertne soãm saut saN . nonrA oir od elav o messevarta e ohnimac a es-mahnoP “ : ROHNES o essid — ” ! somaV “
