. serargasnoc o arap , ratla o erbos oeló amarred e odacep od oãdrep arap oicífircas mu ele erbos odnecerefo , ratla o acifiruP . sodacep sod oãdrep o retbo arap , oicífircas me ohlivon mu etnemairaid ecerefo e
oãçargasnoc ed ainómirec à said etes acideD . ienedro et omoc redecorp seved , sohlif sues soa e oãraA a etnemavitaleR
. odacifitnas átse euqrop , áremoc o méugnin ; rajebos euq o odut ramieuq seved , oãçargasnoc ad oãp e enrac etniuges aid o arap racif es E
. sadargas oãs euqrop , sasioc satsed remoc eved ohnartse muhnen saM . setodrecas omoc edadirotua anelp marebecer e sodargasnoc marof odnauq , sodacep sues sod oãdrep o retbo arap odicerefo iof euq , ossi oãremoC
. ortnocne od adnet ad adartne à , otsec on átse euq oãp o e orienrac od enrac a oãremoc setnednecsed sues so e oãraA
. otnas ragul mun oãçargasnoc ed oriedroc od enrac a rezoc seveD
. said etes etnarud setsev sasse satsop ravel áreved , oiráutnas on seõçnuf saus sa recrexe arap ortnocne od adnet an rartne euq e ragul ues o rapuco euq , oãraA ed etnednecsed etodrecas O
. setodrecas omoc edadirotua anelp merebecer e sodargasnoc merof odnauq , setnednecsed sues sod açnareh oãres oãraA ed sadargas setsev sA
. rohneS od arnoh me oãçailicnocer ed oicífircas omoc , learsI ed sohlif solep odicerefo otubirt mu áres atrefo atsE . satilearsi so ertne outéprep otierid omoc , sohlif sues soa e oãraA a , otnatrop , ecnetrep etrap assE
. sohlif sues e oãraA arap adavreser oãçargasnoc ed orienrac od oãçrop a asse é siop , otubirt omoc etsecerefo euq axoc a e , ROHNES oa otir essen laicepse atrefo omoc etsatneserpa euq , otiep o missa sárargasnoC
. it a et-ecnetrep oãçrop atse E . orienrac od otiep o moc ROHNES oa oãçatneserpa ed lautir o rarbelec seved , oãraA ed oãçargasnoc a araP
. odarga ues od áres euq , ROHNES od arnoh me oicífircas mu é etsE . otsuacoloh oa riuges a , ratla on sa-amieuq e sasioc sa sadot soãm saus sad ariter siopeD
. ROHNES oa oãçatneserpa ed lautir o marpmuc euq arap , sohlif sues sod e oãraA ed soãm san sasioc sasse sadot acoloC
. óhlif amu e atrot amu , seãp sod mu arit otnemref mes seãp so métnoc euq otsec oD
. oãçargasnoc ed ainómirec amu arap é euqrop , atierid axoc a e evlovne so euq arudrog a e snir so , odagíf od anarbmem a , sonitsetni so evlovne euq arudrog a , aduac a , orienrac od arudrog a arit siopeD
. setsev savitcepser sa e sohlif sues so e oãraA sodargasnoc oãracif missA . sele sodot ed setsev sa erbos e sohlif sues so erbos e oãraA erbos ocuop mu sárahlapse oãçargasnoc ed oeló od e ratla on racif euq eugnas oD
. ratla od atlov à eugnas od otser o amarred , adiuges mE . sohlif sues sod e oãraA ed otierid ép od ragelop on e atierid oãm ad ragelop on , atierid ahlero ad oluból on eugnas ues od ocuop mu eõp e orienrac esse ataM
. açebac aus a erbos soãm sa mahnopmi euq arap , sohlif sues soa e oãraA a orienrac ortuo o sioped aveL
. odarga ues od é euq e arnoh aus me odimusnoc oicífircas mu , ROHNES oa otsuacoloh mu missa odnezaf , ratla o erbos orienrac o odot amieuq e
, açebac ad e soçadep sod otnuj odut odnop , sanrep saus sa e sonitsetni sues so aval , orienrac o ajetrauqse , adiuges mE
. ratla od atlov à eugnas ues o ahlapse e orienrac o atam siopeD
. açebac a erbos soãm sa ehl-ropmi sohlif sues so e oãraA adnam e sorienrac sod mu aveL
. odacep od oãdrep arap oicífircas mu É . otnemapmaca od arof sol-ámieuq sáreved ohlivon od otnemercxe o e elep a , enrac a saM
. ratla o erbos odut sáramieuq e evlovne so euq arudrog a moc snir so e odagíf od anarbmem a e sonitsetni so erboc euq arudrog a sárariT
. ratla od esab an eugnas o odot sáramarred e ratla od setneilas sotnac so sárignu , ohlivon od eugnas on oded o odnahloM
. ohlivon o sáratam , ortnocne od adnet ad adartne à , ROHNES od açneserp an , ila e
ohlivon od açebac a erbos soãm sa oãropmi sohlif sues so e oãraA . ortnocne od adnet ad etnaid arap ohlivon o sioped aveL
. outéprep otierid rop árecnetrep sehl oicódrecas o e edadirotua anelp sárad sehl odom etseD . setnabrut so sehl-acoloc e sohlif sues soa e oãraA a sotnic so eõP
. sacinút sa moc seritsever so arap , sohlif sues so ramixorpa adnaM
. etodrecas omoc o-odnignu , oãraA ed açebac a erbos o-amarred e oãçargasnoc ed oeló on sioped ageP
. etodrecas omoc árargasnoc o euq oruo ed acalp a acoloc etnabrut o erbos e açebac an etnabrut o ehl-eõP
. aingísni amsem ad otnic o moc larotiep o aruges e olucáro ed aingísni a e otnam o , acinút a moc oãraA etsever e siatodrecas setsev san agep sioped e
meval es euq sehl-ziD . ortnocne ed adnet ad adartne à éta sohlif so e oãraA raçnava adnaM
. sorienrac siod so e ohlivon o euq opmet omsem oa , oiráutnas oa sodavel meres arap , otsec mun so-acoloc
; etieza ed sadatnu , otnemref mes sóhlif e , etieza moc sodassama , otnemref mes satrot e seãp zaf , ogirt ed ahniraf rohlem a moc
; otiefed mes sorienrac siod e ohlivon mu sárarapes : arienam etniuges ad redecorp seved , oçivres uem oa setodrecas so serargasnoc araP «
» . setnednecsed sues solep e ele rop adavresbo res arap , autéprep iel amu é atsE . rerrom ed ocsir o oãrerroc oãn e atlaf amuhnen oãretemoc oãn missa ; oiráutnas on setodrecas omoc meraicifo arap , ratla od meramixorpa es odnauq uo ortnocne od adnet an merartne odnauq , sol-ásu meved sohlif so e oãraA
. saxoc sà éta arutnic a edsed , oproc o rirboc sehl arap , ragluv ohnil ed seõçlac mébmat sáraF
. oçivres uem oa setodrecas omoc so-odnargasnoc e so-odnitsevni , açebac aus a oeló moc rignu sáreved siopeD . sohlif sues so e oãraA oãmri uet o ritsev seved missA
. azeleb e edadingid meêd sehl euq , setnabrut e sotnic , sacinút etnemlaugi sáraf oãraA ed sohlif so araP
. etnemacitsitra odadrob áres otnic O . onif ohnil ed mébmat etnabrut o e ohnil ed acinút a zaF
. satrefo sa odarga moc etieca ROHNES o euq moc áraf oãraA ed atset an acalp a ; sasoigiler satrefo saus sa merargasnoc oa , soditemoc sodacep sod satilearsi so árarvil odom etsed euq , oãraA ed atset a erbos erpmes áratse missA
. aecáloiv aruprúp ed odicet ed atif amu moc adagil , etnerf ad etrap an , etnabrut on acalp a eõP
. ” ROHNES oa odargasnoC “ sarvalap sa , etenis mu essof es omoc , alen avarg e orup oruo ed acalp amu zaF
. rerrom ed ocsir o arroc oãn ele missa e sahniapmac sa maçio es , rias odnauq uo , ROHNES od etnaid , oiráutnas on rartne odnauq , euq arap , etodrecas omoc raicifo odnauq apac a atsop ravel áreved oãraA
. otnam od alro a adot me , ãmor artuo e oruo ed ahniapmac artuo , ãmor amu e oruo ed ahniapmac amu , é otsi
, atlov a adot a oruo ed sahniapmac ed sadaemertne , misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sodicet ed sãmor sáracoloc , roirefni alro ad atlov mE
. seõgsar rative arap , adaurbed adot áres , ahlam ed atoc amu ed arutreba a omoc , arutreba A . açebac a arap , ortnec oa arutreba amu moc
, aecáloiv aruprúp ed odicet ed etnemarietni olucáro ed aingísni ad otnam o sáraF
. learsI ed sohlif sod otnemagluj o , ROHNES od açneserp an , otiep o erbos erpmes áravel oãraA missA . ROHNES od etnaid ratneserpa es ele odnauq , oãraA ed otiep o erbos majetse euq arap , mimut e miru , olucáro ed sotnemurtsni so sáracoloc otnemagluj od larotiep oN
. ROHNES od etnaid oãçadrocer autéprep me , otnemagluj od larotiep on sodavarg , learsI ed sohlif sod semon so oãçaroc ues o erbos áravel , oiráutnas on rartne oãraA odnauQ
. elicso oãn larotiep o euq arap , aingísni ad otnic o erbos ol-áxif a amrof ed , aecáloiv aruprúp ed oãdroc mu ed oiem rop , olucáro ed aingísni ad sà salogra saus sa odnagil , larotiep o á-es-rednerP
. aruges a euq otnic od amica ocuop mu , oxiabed rop , menu es sale edno , etnerf ad odal od aingísni ad saxiaf saud sad oxiabed sa-axif e oruo ed salogra saud mébmat zaF
. olucáro ed aingísni an acot euq roiretni alro an , larotiep od oxiabed satnop san sáraxif euq , oruo ed salogra saud sartuo zaF
. olucáro ed aingísni ad sorbmo solep massap euq sarit sà , etnerf alep , sa-odnaruges , setsagne siod son sadaxif oãres etnerroc adac ed satnop sa e
larotiep od sotnac sod salogra saud salep rassap ed oãret oruo ed setnerroc saud sA
. larotiep od sotnac siod son sáracoloc euq , oruo ed salogra saud etnemlaugi sáraF
. oãdroc ed amrof me sadaçalertne , orup oruo ed setnerroc saneuqep larotiep o arap mébmat sáraF
. sobirt ezod sad amu ed emon o , etenis ed amrof me , odavarg áres sardep sad amu adac mE . bocaJ ed sohlif sod semon so ezod oãs siop , ezod res ed oãret e
oruo me sadatsagne oãres sardep satse sadoT . epsaj mu e xinó mu , otilósirc mu , atrauq an
; atsitema amu e atagá amu , alapo amu , ariecret an
; etnamaid mu e arifas amu , epsaj mu , adnuges an
; adlaremse amu e oizápot mu , ibur mu sáracoloc adaif ariemirp aN . sasoicerp sardep ed sadaif ortauq ed ol-êcenraug sáreveD
. odal ed omlap mu moc , siod me odarbod , odardauq áreS
. odicroter ohnil ed e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sodicet ed , oruo ed sá-ol-áF . olucáro ed aingísni a omoc , odahlabart etnemacitsitra áres , otnemagluj ed sotnemurtsni so moc , larotiep O
. setsagne son sárednerp euq , seõdroc ed amrof me sadaçnartne , orup oruo ed setnerroc saneuqep saud e
, sardep saud sa arap , oruo ed setsagne zaF
. seled edrocer es etse euq arap ROHNES od etnaid , learsI ed sohlif sod semon so sorbmo so erbos áravel oãraA missA . learsI ed sohlif so radrocer arap , etodrecas od sorbmo solep massap euq , olucáro ed aingísni ad sarit san sadacoloc oãres sioped e
oruo me sadatnom e sadatsagne oãres sardep sA . setenis messavarg es omoc , soirádipal rop otief áres sardep saud san bocaJ ed sohlif sod semon sod oãçavarg A
. otnemicsan ed medro rop , artuo an sies sortuo so e ardep amun semon sieS
. bocaJ ed sohlif ezod sod semon so salen avarg e xinó ed sardep saud me sioped ageP
. odicroter ohnil ed e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sodicet , oruo ed mébmat áres e açep ós amu ale moc áramrof oproc oa adatrepa áres ale euq moc otnic O
. artuo à amu meugil es e sorbmo solep messap euq sarit saud moc
, odahlabart etnemacitsitra , odicroter ohnil e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sodicet , oruo moc atief áres olucáro ed aingísni A
. onif ohnil e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sodicet , oruo oãrazilitu setsev sa merezif euq sO
. oçivres uem oa oicódrecas o merecrexe ed mif a , sohlif sues so arap e oãraA oãmri uet o arap sadargas setsev sa satse oãS . otnic o e ohnil ed etnabrut o , adadrob acinút a , apac a , olucáro ed aingísni a , larotiep o : oãs rezaf ed oãret euq setsev sA
. etodrecas omoc rivres em ele ed mif a , oãraA ed setsev sa meranoiccefnoc arap edadilibah ied siauq soa , sezapac secifítra so sodot agerracnE
. azeleb e edadingid meêd ehl euq , sadargas setsev oãraA oãmri uet o arap rezaf adnaM
. setodrecas suem majes euq arap , ramatI e razaelE , úibA , badaN sohlif sues e oãraA oãmri uet o it ed otnuj arap amahc , satilearsi so sodot ertne eD «
» . setnednecsed sues solep e satilearsi solep adavresbo res arap , autéprep iel amu é atsE . açnaila ad acra à otnuj átse euq anitroc ad arof , ortnocne od adnet an , etion a adot ROHNES o etnarep madra euq arap , sadapmâl sad radiuc ed sodagerracne oãracif sohlif sues so e oãraA
. saseca erpmes sadapmâl sa retnam arap , arievilo ed etieza rohlem od magart et euq arap , satilearsi soa snedro áD «
» . erboc ed oãres oirtá od sacatse sa sadot e sacatse saus sa sadot , oiráutnas od soçivres soa sodanitsed soilísnetu so sodoT
. erboc ed , sesab sa e odicroter ohnil ed oãres sanitroc sA . oiem e sortem siod ed , arutla a e , sortem ocnic e etniv ed , arugral a , sortem atneuqnic ed áres oirtá od otnemirpmoc O
. erboc ed sesab sa e atarp ed mébmat oãres sohcnag so ; atarp ed seõrav rop sadagil oãres oirtá od otnicer o matimiled euq sanuloc sa sadoT
. sesab ortauq e sanuloc ortauq áret e , odadrob etnemacitsitra , odicroter ohnil e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed salet ed sortem zed moc anitroc amu áres oiráutnas od adartne A
. ala adnuges a oãramrof , sesab sêrt e sanuloc sêrt rop sodatropus , oiem e sortem etes e
; ala amu oãramrof , sesab sêrt e sanuloc sêrt rop sodatropus , sodanitroc ed oiem e sortem etes
: sodanitroc ed sortem ocnic e etniv árevah , oirtá od arugral a adot a , latneiro odal oN
. sesab zed me setnessa , sanuloc zed rop sodatropus , sodanitroc ed sortem ocnic e etniv árevah , oirtá od arugral a adot a , latnedico odal oN
. atarp ed oãres sarudlom saus sa e sanuloc sad sohcnag sO . erboc ed sesab etniv me setnessa , sanuloc etniv rop sadatropus , sortem atneuqnic ed otnemirpmoc mun sanitroc mébmat árevah , etron odal oN
. atarp ed oãres sarudlom saus sa e sanuloc sad sohcnag sO . erboc ed sesab etniv me setnessa , sanuloc etniv rop odatropus áres mu adaC
. odal mu a ednopserroc euq sortem atneuqnic ed otnemirpmoc mun , odicroter ohnil ed sodanitroc áret oirtá o , lus odal oN . oiráutnas od oirtá o , riuges a riurtsnoc seveD «
» . etnom on iertsom et emrofnoc odatucexe res odneved , oco áracif e ariedam ed áres ratla O
. odatropsnart rof odnauq , ratla od sodal siod son , salogra me soditem oãres siarav sO
. erboc ed soditsever aicáca ed siarav ratla o arap sáraF
. sotnac sod arutla aiem a racif a odom ed , ratla od roirefni etrap an edarg a sioped sáracoloC
. erboc ed salogra ortauq sáraxif edarg ad sotnac ortauq son e eder ed amrof me erboc ed edarg amu mébmat sáraF
. sariesarb e sezanet , saicab , sáp , aznic a rehlocer arap sorieznic : ratla od soilísnetu so sodot erboc ed sáraF
. erboc ed oditsever áres mébmat lauq o , ratla o moc açep acinú amu oãramrof euq , setneilas sotnac ortauq zaf solugnâ ortauq soN
. arutla ed oiem e ortem mu e odal adac ed oiem e sortem siod moc , ralugnardauq amrof ed , aicáca ed ariedam ed ratla o rezaf seveD «
» . erboc ed sesab ocnic sanuloc sa arap ridnuf sáradnam e oruo ed oãres sohcnag sues so ; oruo ed saditsever , aicáca ed sanuloc ocnic ale arap zaF
. odadrob etnemacitsitra , odicroter ohnil ed e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed alet ed anitroc artuo sáraf , adnet ad adartne a araP
. etron odal od asem a odnacif , oiráutnas od lus odal od , asem ad etnerf me áracif orbalednac o e anitroc ad arof ed odal od áracif asem A
. omissítnas ragul on , açnaila ad acra ad amic me arutreboc a sáracoloC
. omissítnas ragul o e oiráutnas o ertne oãçarapes a sodot arap áracram anitroc A . açnaila ad otnemucod o moc acra a acoloc ale rop odigetorp otnicer on e sohcnag son a-ednerP
. atarp ed siatsedep ortauq erbos sadatnom , oruo ed sohcnag moc , oruo ed saditsever , aicáca ed sanuloc ortauq me anitroc asse ednepsuS
. snibureuq sodadrob oãres lauq on , odahlabart etnemacitsitra , odicroter ohnil ed e misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed salet ed anitroc amu rezaf seved , riuges A
. etnom on iertsom et euq oledom o odnuges , oiráutnas o sáriurtsnoc missA
. oruo ed saditsever res oãreved mébmat euq , sassevart sa rassap oãri edno rop , salogra sa oruo ed sáraf e saubát sa oruo ed sáritseveR
. saubát sad artuo à edadimertxe amu ed ári oiem od assevart A
. latnedico odal od , oiráutnas od odnuf od saubát sa arap ocnic e odal ortuo od saubát sa arap ocnic
, oiráutnas od odal mu ed saubát sa arap aicáca ed sassevart ocnic mébmat zaF
. aubát adac ed oxiabed siod , atarp ed setropus siessazed setnednopserroc sues so moc , saubát otio , otnatrop , árevaH
. saniuqse saud san sadacoloc saubát saud sa moc es-rezaf áreved omsem O . salogra ed oiem rop , amic me e oxiab me sadinu oãracif saubát satsE
. oiráutnas od odnuf od saniuqse sa arap saud siam e
, saubát sies zaf , etseo odal od , é otsi , oiráutnas od sárt ed etrap a araP
. aubát adac ed oxiabed arap siod , atarp ed setropus atnerauq sues so e
, oiráutnas od etron odal on sadacoloc meres arap , saubát etniv mébmat zaF
. sexiacne siod son , aubát adac ed oxiabed siod , atarp ed setropus atnerauq , saubát etniv sad oxiabed e
, oiráutnas od lus odal on sa-acoloc e saubát etniv zaF
. saubát sa sadot rinu seved euq missa É . artuo à rinu redop es arap , sexiacne siod áret saubát sad amu adaC
. sortemítnec ocnic e atnetes ed áres arugral a e otnemirpmoc ed sortem ocnic áret saubát sad amu adaC
. otla oa sadacoloc , aicáca ed ariedam ed saubát oiráutnas o arap rezaf adnaM
. roirepus etrap a arap , sanif selep ed arutreboc amu e , ohlemrev ed sadignit , orienrac ed selep ed arutreboc amu adnet a arap adnia zaF
. odal adac ed sortemítnec atneuqnic , oiráutnas od sodal sod mu adac árirboc adnet ad salet sad otnemirpmoc on arbos euq o E
. oiráutnas od roiretsop etrap a arap áriac adnet ad ajebos euq salet sad edatem A
. odot mu ramrof a odom ed , adnet a serinu missa arap soçal son so-ednerp e erboc ed sohcnag atneuqnic mébmat zaF
. otnujnoc adac ed edadimertxe an macif euq salet sad sahniab san soçal atneuqnic sáracoloC
. adnet ad etnerf ad etrap a arap alet atxes a odnarbod , ortuo od sies e odal mu ed salet ocnic sáresoC
. sortem siod ed arugral aus a e sortem ezniuq ed áres salet ezno sassed amu adac ed otnemirpmoc O
. oiráutnas od amic rop adnet amu ramrof arap arbac ed olêp ed salet ezno mébmat zaF
. odot mu emrof oiráutnas o euq ed mif a , sartuo sà samu salet sa serinu arap oruo ed sohcnag atneuqnic mébmat sáraF
. salet ocnic ed sotnujnoc siod son sortuo soa snu madnopserroc soçal so euq odom ed , salet sad amu adac me soçal atneuqnic sáraF
. aecáloiv aruprúp ed soçal sáracoloc ocnic ed otnujnoc adac ed edadimertxe an acif euq alet ad ahniab aN
. mébmat ocnic setnatser sa e sartuo sà samu sadisoc oãres salet sassed ocniC
. seõsnemid samsem sa sadot oãret salet sartuo sA . arugral ed sortem siod e otnemirpmoc ed oiem e sortem ezrotac áret salet sad amu adaC
. snibureuq siod salen radrob adnam e , misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp me , odicroter ohnil ed salet zed moc oiráutnas o zaF «
» . etnom on iertsom et euq oledom o odnuges odatucexe ajes ohlabart o euq arap , oãçneta meb amoT
. soirósseca setse sodot e orbalednac o rezaf arap , orup oruo ed soliuq atnirt snu sodazilitu oãreS
. orup oruo ed oãres serodagapa so e serodativepse sO
. etnerf ad etrap a meranimuli a odom ed sáracoloc euq sadapmâl etes sáraf siopeD
. oletram a odahlabart , orup oruo ed adot , orbalednac o moc açep ós amu ramrof oãreved soçarb so e secilác sO
. roirefni etrap aus an ecilác mu áret orbalednac od meas euq soçarb ed serap sêrt sod mu adac
; serolf e seõtob sues so moc , arieodnema ed rolf ed amrof me secilác ortauq árevah orbalednac od lapicnirp etsah aN
. rolf e oãtob moc , arieodnema ed rolf ed amrof me secilác sêrt árevah soçarb sies sod mu adac mE
. odal adac ed sêrt , soçarb sies oãriac sodal soD
. açep acinú amu oãramrof orbalednac od serolf sa e seõtob so , secilác so , etsah a , esab A . oletram a odahlabart , orup oruo ed orbalednac mu mébmat zaF «
» . mim ed etnaid etnemetnenamrep ratse eved euq , odargasnoc rof em euq oãp o acoloc asem ad amic me E
. ohniv ed satrefo sa arap , orup oruo ed saçat e sarraj , serehloc , sotarp sovitcepser so mébmat zaF
. oruo ed soditsever e aicáca ed res meved siarav sO
. asem a ratropsnart es arap siarav siod sale rop messap es euq matimrep e ohlixiac oa otnuj meuqif euq odom ed
, sotnac ortauq sues son sa-ednerp e oruo ed salogra ortauq asem a arap zaF
. oruo ed arudacrec amu acoloc ohlixiac od atlov me e arugral ed sortemítnec etes snu moc ohlixiac mu eõp asem ad atlov mE
. oruo ed arudacrec amu ed al-áedor e orup oruo ed al-itsever seveD
. arutla ed sortemítnec ocnic e atnetes e arugral ed sortemítnec atneuqnic , otnemirpmoc ed ortem mu moc aicáca ed ariedam ed asem amu mébmat iórtsnoC «
» . satilearsi soa ritimsnart seved euq snedro sa ieracinumoc et , açnaila ad acra a erbos oãtse euq snibureuq so ertne , acra ad amic ed e ogitnoc ierartnocne em ilA
. rad uov et euq açnaila ad otnemucod o acra ad ortned eõp e acra a erbos apmat a acoloC
. apmat a arap odanilcni otsor ed e ortuo o arap mu sodatlov , apmat a adot odnirboc , etnaid arap sadidnetse sasa sa moc racif meved snibureuq sO
. ortuo o arap mu etnerf ed , edadimertxe adac me mu
, açep ós amu ed , oletram a odahlabart , oruo ed snibureuq siod moc
, arugral ed sortemítnec ocnic e atnetes e otnemirpmoc ed oiem e ortem mu moc , orup oruo ed arutreboc amu mébmat zaF
. rad uov et euq açnaila ad otnemucod o racoloc seved acra ad ortneD
. sodariter meres acnun mes , ragul ues on erpmes racif meved siarav sO
. ratropsnart a arap mavris euq arap , acra ad sodal son , salogra san so-aifne e
, oruo ed soditsever aicáca ed siarav rezaf adnaM
. odal adac ed salogra saud , sotnac ortauq sues son sáraxif euq , oruo ed salogra ortauq mébmat zaF
. oruo ed arudacrec amu sárop atlov me e , arof rop e ortned rop , orup oruo ed al-itsever seveD
. arutla ed e arugral ed sortemítnec ocnic e atnetes e otnemirpmoc ed oiem e ortem mu moc , aicáca ed ariedam ed acra amu maçaF «
» . soilísnetu sues so sodot e arbo ad otnujnoc o etnemasorogir missa merazilaer arap , rartsom uov et euq oledom o moc odroca ed ol-êzaf oãreved saM
. seled oiem on etibah ue euq arap , oiráutnas mu em-meuqifidE
. etodrecas omus od larotiep o e olucáro ed aingísni a recenraug arap sardep sartuo e xinó ed sardep
, osnecni o arap e oãçargasnoc ed oeló o arap semufrep , oirádapmal o arap etieza
, aicáca ed ariedam , onif oruoc , ohlemrev ed sadignit orienrac ed selep
, arbac ed olêp , onif ohnil , misemrac e etalracse , aecáloiv aruprúp ed sonap
, eznorb , atarp , oruo : ratieca meved euq satrefo sa oãs satsE
. edatnov aob ed asioc amugla rad meresiuq euq so sodot atrefo asse arap riubirtnoc oãreveD . atrefo amu maçaf em euq learsI ed sohlif soa ziD «
: ehl-essid e sésioM a es-uigirid ROHNES O
. setion atnerauq e said atnerauq uocif ila e etnom oa uibus , mevun an uortne sésioM
. etnom od atla siam etrap an , rodaroved ogof mu omoc , airólg aus a adot me learsI ed sohlif soa es-uotneserpa ROHNES O
. mevun ad roiretni od , sésioM rop uomahc ROHNES o aid omités oN . mevun alep otrebocne uocif said sies etnarud euq , ianiS etnom o erbos uecenamrep ROHNES od airólg a E
. mevun amu rop otreboc avatse euq , etnom oa uibus sésioM
» . sele a es-ajirid rôp a oãtseuq amugla revit meuQ . ruH e oãraA ocsovnoc mébmat maciF . somesserger euq éta iuqa son-merepsE « : essid soãicna soA
. etnaduja ues , éusoJ ogisnoc odnavel , sueD ed etnom oa uibus e uitrap sésioM
» . satilearsi sod oãçurtsni arap sotnemadnam so e iel a ivercse siauq san , ardep ed sacalp samu et-rad uov euqrop , ál arepse e , etnom on , mim ed otnuj éta eboS « : sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. rebeb a e remoc a raunitnoc maredup e sueD a rev maredup sele ; learsI ed setnatropmi snemoh setse a lam zef oãn sueD
. uéc od o omoc orup oãt luza mud , sarifas ed etepat mu euq omoc aivah sép sues sod oxiabed : learsI ed sueD o mariv ilA
. learsI ed soãicna atnetes so e , úibA e badaN , oãraA moc etnom oa uibus sésioM
» . sotnemadnam setsen esab moc , ocsovnoc zef ROHNES o euq açnaila ad eugnas o é etsE « : odnezid , ovop o uigrepsa sésioM , eugnas od otser o moC
» . setneidebo someres e uonedro ROHNES o euq o odut someraF « : marednopser sodot e ; ovop oa o-uel e açnaila ad orvil on uogep siopeD
. ratla o erbos edatem artuo a uomarred e sahlisav me eugnas od edatem uodraug sésioM
. oãçailicnocer ed soicífircas me siamina meratam e sotsuacoloh ROHNES oa recerefo satilearsi snevoj snugla sioped uodnaM
. learsI ed sobirt ezod sad oãçatneserper me sardep ezod ueugre e , etnom od ép oa ratla mu uocifide e es-uotnavel , ahnizãhnam ed , etniuges aid on e otid ahnit ehl ROHNES o euq o odut oãtne uevercse sésioM
» . uonedro ROHNES o euq o odut someraF « : zov ós amun , uednopser ovop o odot e odanedro e otid ahnit ehl ROHNES o euq o odut ovop oa uitimsnart sésioM
» . ogitnoc áribus oãn ovop o e es-ramixorpa oãreved oãn sortuo so ; ROHNES o , mim ed áramixorpa es sésioM sanepA
. oãçaroda me egnol ed es-menilcni sam ; learsI ed soãicna atnetes e , úibA e badaN , oãraA ogitnoc zart e mim ed otnuj éta eboS « : sésioM a sioped essid sueD
» . aníur aut a aires ossi e sesued sues so raroda sairi : mim artnoc racep a mairavel et euqrop , arret aut an racif sexied so men
; sesued sues so moc men sele moc sodroca saçaf oãN
. açneserp aut ad seraslupxe so ut arap arret assed setnatibah so soãm saut san ieragertnE . oir ednarg oa éta otresed o edsed e suetsilif sod ram oa éta ohlemreV raM o edsed setimil suet so ieraxiF
. arret ad essop ramot sassop e etnemua ovop uet o euq éta , açneserp aut ad ocuop a ocuop sol-áslupxe uoV
. it artnoc meuqilpitlum es saref sa e otresed me emrofsnart es oãn arret a euq arap , ona mun açneserp aut ad sodot ieraslupxe so oãN
. satitih so e suenanac so , sueveh so it ed egnol arap áratsafa euq , etnerf aut à ocinâp o ieraivne mébmaT
. it ed etnaid meriguf a sogimini suet so ieragirbo e etnerf aut an serartnocne euq sovop so sodot me rorret o e ocinâp o ierahlapsE
. adiv ed said sognol ie-et-rad e , lirétse rehlum men etroba euq rehlum amu arret aut an árevah oãN
. edadimrefne a it ed áratsafa e augá aut a e oãp uet o áraoçneba ele e sueD uet rohneS o arodA
. solodí sues so riurtsed e raburred seved , oirártnoc olep ; mezaf sovop sesse euq o odnatimi , sárivres so oãn ; sesued sues so raroda seved oãn
, odanimretxe revit so e suesubej sod e sueveh sod , suenanac sod , suezirep sod , satitih sod , suerroma sod arret an rizudortni et , etnerf aut à odnahnimac , ojna uem o odnauQ
. meugesrep et euq so ieriugesrep e sogimini suet sod ogimini ieres , ressid et ue euq o odut serezif e zov aus a seratucse es saM
. sodacep sossov so áraodrep oãn e emon uem me autca ele euqrop , aicnêtsiser saçaf ehl oãn e ehl-ecedebo ; eled etnaid otiepser moc et-atroP
. it arap ieraperp euq ragul oa rizudnoc et arap e ohnimac on regetorp et arap etnerf aut à ojna mu raivne uoV «
» . eãm aus ad etiel on otirbac mu rahnizoc seved oãN . arret aut ad soturf sod saicímirp sa , sueD uet , ROHNES od olpmet oa ravel seveD
. ãhnam ed etniuges aid oa éta recerefo rop racif eved oãn samitív sad arudrog a e odatnemref oãp ed otnuj arnoh ahnim me odicerefo oicífircas od eugnas o semarred oãN
. ona rop sezev sêrt , sueD uet , ROHNES od etnaid oãratneserpa es snemoh so sodoT
. soturf sues so sodot opmac od serehlocer odnauq , ona od mif on , satiehloc sad atsef a e , opmac on etsaemes euq o odut ed saraes sariemirp sad afiec ad atsef a , riuges A
. ienedro sov omoc lat , otnemref mes seãp remoc meved said etes etnaruD . saizav soãm ed mim ed etnaid áratneserpa es méugnin e ; sêm essen otpigE od odías seret otsiv , bibA ed sêm on , otnemref mes seãp sod atsef a , oriemirP
. ona rop sezev sêrt arnoh ahnim me satsef rarbelec seveD «
» . seled emon o meicnunorp men , sesued sortuo meuqovni oãn e ienedro sov euq o odut marpmuC
. saçrof sa merepucer oriegnartse o e ovarcse uet o euq arap e otnemuj uet o e iob uet o mébmat rasnacsed meredop arap , rasnacsed seved aid omités on sam , anames ad said sies so etnarud ol-êzaf sedop rezaf arap serevit euq o oduT
. lavilo uet o moc e ahniv aut a moc rezaf seved omsem O . rarbos euq od mamoc snegavles siamina so euq arap e aled mamoc síap uet od serbop so euq arap rasnacsed a-axied : ravitluc seved a oãn omités oa sam
, sona sies etnarud soturf sues so rehloc e arret aut a ravitluc sedoP «
» . oriegnartse ed oãçidnoc a redneerpmoc sedop missa e otpigE on oriegnartse etsof mébmat euqrop , oriegnartse o samirpo oãN
. asuac a macrep setneconi so euq moc odnezaf , sotrepse siam so omsem agec e epmorroc onrobus o euqrop , ranrobus sexied et oãN
. açitsujni asse ieranednoc ue euqrop , otsuj o e etneconi o etrom à senednoc oãn e seõçaralced saslaf sa ativE
. erbop mud adnamed a rednefed euq serevit odnauq , açitsuj à setlaf oãN
. amic ed agrac a rarit a o-aduja , agrac aus ad osep od oxiabed uiac otnemuj ues o euq seriv es ; aiedo et euq eleuqa raduja ed sexied oãN
. etnemataidemi ohl-evloved , uedrep ogimini uet o euq otnemuj o uo iob o serartnocne eS
. erbop res ele rop ós adnamed amun méugla a oãzar sêd oãn sam
, oãzar met oãn euq etrap a seraiopa arap , laiciduj osac mun , airoiam alep rizudnoc sexied et oãN . lam o racitarp arap airoiam ad oãinipo a sagis oãN
. açitsujni amud rovaf a ohnumetset odnad , odapluc mud ecilpmúc sajes oãn e seõçaralced saslaf saçaf oãN «

» . seãc soa an-merita ; saref salep sotrom sopmac son merecerapa euq siamina ed enrac mamoc oãN . mim a sodargasnoc snemoh sieres missA
. sodicerefo em-res oãreved sodicsan ed aid ovatio oa sam , eãm a moc racif oãredop said etes etnaruD . ahlevo aut ad e acav aut ad airc ariemirp a e
ohlif oriemirp uet o em-argasnoC . ahniv aut ad e satiehloc saut sad soturf soriemirp so em-recerefo me sesarta et oãN
. ovop uet od efehc o men sueD a sadnefo oãN
. osoidrociresim uos euqrop , ol-áduja ed-ieh , ROHNES o , ue , oilíxua ridep em ele es E ? airimrod ele euq é omoc oãn eS . oirf od rednefed es arap met ele euq acinú a é apuor asse euqrop
, los-od-rôp od setna ahl-revloved sáreved , omitsérpme olep rohnep omoc , apuor aus a red et ohniziv uet o eS
. soruj serboc ehl men , oirárusu mu omoc ele moc setrop et oãn , it ed otrep aviv euq ovop uem od erbop mugla a oriehnid seratserpme eS
. soãfró , sohlif sossov so e savúiv oãracif serehlum sassov sa ; adapse à ie-sov-ratam e odatirri otium ieraciF
. otirg ues o rivuo ed-ieh , ROHNES o , ue e oilíxua oã-em-ridep sele seratartlam so es euqrop
, soãfró so e savúiv sa ratartlam sáreved oãN
. otpigE on soriegnartse marof sêcov mébmat euqrop , oriegnartse mu rimirpo men ratartlam sáreved oãN
. etrom à odanednoc áres , ROHNES oa sanepa recerefo so ed zev me , sesued sortuo a soicífircas recerefo euq eleuqA
. etrom à odanednoc áres lamina mu moc siauxes sotca racitarp euq eleuqA
. ariecitief à adiv a sepuop oãN
. megriv amu rop es-rad emutsoc é euq etod o áragap uizudes a euq eleuqa , otnemasac me ahl-rad resiuq oãn mevoj ad iap o eS
. ale moc árasac e lautibah etod o áragap , rarnosed a e , aditemorpmoc ajetse oãn euq , megriv amu rizudes memoh mu eS «
» . oirálas ues on á-es-ratnocsed , odairalassa rof rodeved o eS . ragap o ed áret oãn etneserp revitse onod o es saM
. ragap o ed áret odatserpme uidep euq o , onod od aicnêsua an , odajiela racif uo rerrom lamina o e odatserpme lamina mu ortuo a ridep méugla eS
. onod oa adan ragap ed áret oãn , otrom lamina od sotser so sodatneserpa merof e aref amu rop odaçadepsed iof lamina o eS
. onod o razinmedni ed áret , odabuor iof lamina o es saM
. adan áragap oãn ortuo o e otnemaruj o áratieca lamina od onod O . uoifnoc ehl ortuo o euq on oãm a uetem oãn euq sueD ed etnaid áraruj lamina o uodraug euq o
, osac od sahnumetset revah mes , odabuor rof uo odajiela racif uo rerrom lamina o e , reuqlauq lamina ortuo uo ahlevo amu , iob mu , otnemuj mu radraug a ortuo a red méugla eS
. orbod o ortuo oa áragap odapluc odagluj rof euq o e sueD ed etnaid adatneserpa áres siod so ertne adnamed a , ecnetrep ehl euq ressid aossep artuo e , odidrep ahnet es euq asioc artuo reuqlauq uo oiráutsev uo , ahlevo amu uo otnemuj mu , iob mu ed rairporpa es méugla eS
. omixórp ues oa aicnetrep euq oa oãm a uotied oãn euq , sueD ed etnaid , raruj eved asac ad onod o oãtne , oãrdal o rirbocsed es oãn eS
. orbod o áragap , otrebocsed rof es , oãrdal o , omitlú etsed asac ad sodabuor merof sele e , radraug a rolav ed sotcejbo uo oriehnid ortuo a ragertne méugla eS
. ozíujerp o odot áragap oidnêcni od rodasuac o , aossep artuo ed opmac o uo araes a , ogirt ed sadem sa ramieuq rof e ohlotser oa ragep es ogof o e opmac ues on arieugof amu rezif méugla eS
. ahniv aus a uo opmac ues o rizudorp rohlem ed euq o oãçaraper omoc árad , açnetrep ehl oãn euq ahniv amun uo opmac mun lamina ues o ratsap a resup méugla eS
. orbod o áragap , redop ues me oviv revitse adnia uobuor euq lamina o e ahlevo amu uo otnemuj mu , iob mu uobuor eS
. obuor od rolav olep odidnev áres , ragap euq moc revit oãn es ; uobuor euq o odut riutitser a odagirbo áres oãrdal O . oidícimoh ed odapluc áres uotam o meuq , aid rof áj es saM
. oidícimoh ed emirc árevah oãn , rerrom e odiref rof e rabuor a odidneerprus rof oãrdal mu eS «
» . ahlevo alep sahlevo ortauq e iob olep siob ocnic áragap , lamina o rednev uo ratam e ahlevo amu uo iob mu rabuor méugla eS «
» . otrom iob o moc áracif oriemirp o e , oviv iob o ehl-odnad , onod ortuo o es-rasnepmoc áreved , aidnerp o oãn onod o euq e rarram ed emutsoc o setna áj ahnit iob o euq es-odnebas saM
. otrom iob od enrac a omoc meb , siaugi setrap me , siod solep oditraper áres adnev ad oriehnid o e oviv iob o á-es-rednev , aossep artuo ed iob o etrom ed riref méugla ed iob o eS
. á-ehl-recnetrep otrom lamina o sam , oriehnid me lamina od rolav o onod oa áragap oçop od oiráteirporp o
, otnemuj mu uo iob mu riac oçop on e , rirboc o oãn e oçop mu rirba uo odapatsed oçop mu raxied méugla eS
. atarp ed sadeom atnirt iob od onod od árebecer , avarcse ad uo ovarcse od rohnes o e , rerrom éta odajerdepa áres iob o , avarcse amu uo ovarcse mu ratam iob o es saM
. agirapar amu reuq , zapar mu etam iob o reuq es-acilpa iel atsE
. otsopmi rof ehl euq o áragap ele , adiv aus alep etagser merigixe ehl es
; etrom à odanednoc áres mébmat onod o e rerrom éta odajerdepa áres iob esse , méugla ratam iob o ed osac on , aidnerp o oãn e ossid aibas onod o e saossep san rarram avamutsoc setna áj iob o es méroP
. odagitsac áres oãn iob od onod o sam ; adimoc áres oãn enrac aus a e rerrom éta odajerdepa áres iob esse , ratam o e méugla me rarram iob mu eS «
» . odidrep etned od rasnepmoc o arap , edadrebil a á-ehl-rad , avarcse à uo ovarcse oa etned mu rarbeuq es E
. odidrep ohlo od rasnepmoc o arap edadrebil a á-ehl-rad , ol-ágec a odom ed avarcse amud uo ovarcse mud ohlo o riref méugla eS
. adacnap rop adacnap , adiref rop adiref , arudamieuq rop arudamieuq
, ép rop ép , oãm rop oãm , etned rop etned , ohlo rop ohlo
, adiv rop adiv áres ogitsac o , ogirep me atsop rof rehlum ad adiv a es saM
. sezíuj sod oãsiced a odnuges , odiram olep adigixe áres ehl euq oãçazinmedni amu ragap áreved odapluc o , rehlum ad adiv a ogirep me rôp mes , ratroba a-odnezaf adivárg rehlum amu a ortnocne ed rof seled mu e ratul a merevitse snemoh siod eS
. aus edadeirporp é ovarcse o euqrop , odanednoc áres oãn rohnes ues o , siod uo aid mu adnia reviv ovarcse o es saM
. odanednoc áres , ogol rerrom ovarcse o e avarcse aus an uo ovarcse ues on uap mu moc retab méugla eS
. otnematart o moc sasepsed sad e odidrep opmet od ol-ázinmedni áreved , odutnoC . alagneb amun odaiopa , rias redup e recelebatser es ortuo o es , odanednoc áres oãn uiref o euq o
, amac ed racif a o-odnagirbo sam , etrom a odnasuac ehl oãn , sohnup so moc uo ardep amu moc ortuo riref mu e meratul snemoh siod odnauQ
. etrom à odanednoc áres eãm aus a uo iap ues o ratlusni euq O
. redop ues me adnia ahneter o reuq , ovarcse omoc odidnev ahnet o reuq , etrom à odanednoc áres méugla ratpar euq O
. etrom à odanednoc áres eãm aus an uo iap ues on retab euq O
. etrom à seranednoc o arap , racsub sári o ratla uem od otnuj éta , méugla ratam arap oãçiart ed rasu , edadlam rop , memoh mu es saM
. racidni et ue euq ragul on es-raigufer edop , ratam o ed oãçnetni ahnit oãn e , etnedica rop iof es saM
. etrom à odanednoc áres ratam o e méugla riref euq O «
» . etagser ragap ed ret mes , arobme es-ri áredop ale , sasioc sêrt sassed amugla rasucer ehl eS
. siagujnoc sotierid sues sod men , oiráutsev ed men , adimoc ed men ariemirp a ravirp áredop oãn , rehlum adnuges amu moc rasac memoh mu eS
. ahlif omoc al-átart áreved , ues ohlif mu a rehlum rop red a eS
. uoiduper a euq zev amu , oriegnartse mu a al-êdnev áredop oãn saM . etagser ues o eugap méugla euq ritimrep áreved , rehlum arap resiuq a oãn e aled ratsog oãn rohnes ues o eS
. sovarcse sod seõçidnoc samsem san edadrebil me árias oãn ale , avarcse omoc ahlif aus a rednev memoh mu eS
. erpmes arap ovarcse ues áracif missa E . alevos amu moc ahlero a ehl-aruf e atrop ad arierbmo à uo atrop à o-atsocne , sueD a aroda edno ragul oa o-avel rohnes ues o oãtne
, sohlif sues so e rehlum aus a , rohnes ues o ama euq raralced e edadrebil a resiuq oãn ovarcse o eS
. sele mes ri ed áret ovarcse o e rohnes ues od edadeirporp oãs sohlif so e rehlum a , eled sahlif uo sohlif revit ale es e , rehlum a ued ehl meuq rohnes ues o iof es saM
. ele moc ári rehlum a , rehlum ahnit es ; rias odnauq ele moc rehlum ravel áredop oãn , etsarpmoc o odnauq , orietlos are eS
. adan ragap mes , ervil áracif omités on e sona sies etnarud it arap árahlabart ele , uerbeh ovarcse mu serarpmoc eS «
: sáratneserpa sehl euq samron sa oãs satsE
» . oproc uet od etrap amuhnen ajev es oãn meribus oa euq arap , suarged ret eved oãn ratla uem O
. mim ed ongidni ratla o manrot satnemarref moc sardep sa merahlabart oa euqrop , sadahlabart sardep moc maçaf o oãn , ardep ed ratla mu merezif em eS
. raoçneba sov arap , ocsovnoc ret ieri , odarbmel emon uem o ranrot ue euq me ragul o odot mE . oãçailicnocer ed soicífircas e sotsuacoloh omoc , sadanam e sohnaber sossov sod siamina ele erbos em-maçerefo e arret ed ratla mu em-maçaF
. mim a omoc meraroda so arap atarp ed uo oruo ed solodí maçaf oãN
. ielaf sov , uéc od , ue omoc mariV « : satilearsi soa essessid euq sésioM a uonedro ROHNES O
. avartnocne es sueD edno arucse mevun ad es-uorieba sésioM e odatsafa avaunitnoc ovop O
» . odacep od metsafa es , sueD ed romet erpmes odnitnes , euq arap e avorp à rôp sov arap oiev sueD . odem mahnet oãN « : ovop oa uednopser sésioM
» . sodot somerrom oãn es , ocsonnoc etnematcerid elaf oãn sueD euq sam ; et-somecedebo són e ocsonnoc ut alaF « : sésioM a oãtne maressiD
. aicnâtsid à es-evetnam e odem ed aimert , ossi roP . omuf me otlovne etnom o aiv e atebmort ad mos o e seõvort so aivuo , sogapmâler so aiv ovop O
» . ecnetrep ehl euq od amuhnen asioc men , sotnemuj sues so men odag ues o men , savres e sovres sues so men rehlum aus a seciboc oãn : etnahlemes uet od asac a seciboc oãN
. méugnin artnoc aslaf oãçasuca amu saçaf oãN
. sebuor oãN
. oirétluda satemoc oãN
. setam oãN
. rad iav et , sueD uet , ROHNES o euq arret an sona sotium saviv euq arap , eãm aut a e iap uet o atiepseR
. odargas uoralced o e odabás ed aid o uooçneba ROHNES o , ossi roP . aid omités on uosnacsed sam , selen áh euq o odut e ram o , arret a , uéc o zef ROHNES o said sies so etnarud euqroP
. arret aut an reviv euq oriegnartse o men siamina suet so men , savres e sovres suet so men , sahlif e sohlif suet so men ut men , muhnen ohlabart saçaf oãn , aid esseN . sueD uet , ROHNES oa odargasnoc , osnacsed ed aid é aid omités o saM
. serasicerp euq ed oliuqa odut serezaf arap , said sies etnarud rahlabart sedoP
. ROHNES oa serargasnoc o arap odabás ed aid od et-adroceR
. emon ues od osu uam merezif euq so ogitsac mes áraxied oãn ele euqrop , sueD uet , ROHNES od emon od osu uam saçaf oãN
. sotnemadnam suem so merpmuc e mama em euq seleuqa , oãçareg amisélim à éta , roma moc otart saM
. oãçareg atrauq à e ariecret à éta mednefo em euq seleuqad edadlam a ogitsac e sesued sortuo mahnet euq orelot oãn , sueD uet , ROHNES o , ue euqrop , otluc setserp sehl men , megami amuhnen ed etnaid senilcni et oãN
. arret ad oxiabed saugá san e arret an , uéc on áh euq o odnatneserper sadiplucse snegami it arap saçaf oãN
. mim ed méla sesued sortuo sahnet oãN
. oãdivarcse ad arret ad , otpigE od rias zef et euq , sueD uet , ROHNES o uos uE «
: sarvalap setniuges sa sioped uoicnunorp sueD
. satilearsi soa otsi uocinumoc e uecsed sésioM
» . sele artnoc etlov oãn es euq arap , ROHNES od otnuj arap ribus men setimil so rassap oãreved oãn ovop o e setodrecas so saM . oãraA ed odahnapmoca ribus a atlov sioped e , ecsed , adnA « : oãtne ehl-essid ROHNES O
» . ahnatnom ad odargas oçapse o arap setimil somessácram euq , setimil somessesup euq etsanedro son ut euqrop , ianiS etnom oa ribus a áreverta es oãn ovop O « : ROHNES oa uednopser sésioM
» . sele artnoc etlov es oãn , ROHNES o euq arap , meuqifirup es , ROHNES od es-ramixorpa medop euq , setodrecas so mébmat euQ
. sotrom mairiac seled sotium euqrop , ROHNES o etnet men , sodaxif setimil so essapartlu oãn euq arap , ovop o asiva e oxiab ál iaV « : ehl-essid ROHNES o e
uibus sésioM . ál éta essibus euq sésioM a uidep e ianiS etnom od omic o erbos uecsed ROHNES O
. oãvort od zov a moc ehl-aidnopser sueD e avalaf sésioM . etrof siam zev adac odnanrot es-ai atebmort ad mos O
. aicnêloiv moc aicemertse etnom o odot e onrof mud essías es omoc aibus omuf O . samahc ed oiem on ele erbos odicsed ahnit ROHNES o euqrop , avagemuf ianiS etnom o odoT
. etnom od odnuf oa mararap sodot e sueD ed ortnocne oa ri arap otnemapmaca od rias ovop o uodnam sésioM
. odem ed messemert otnemapmaca on sodot euq moc zef atebmort ed mos etrof mU . o-uirboc assepse mevun amu e etnom o erbos sogapmâler e seõvort evuoh aid oriecret od ãhnam aN
» . siauxes seõçaler mahnet oãn , ál étA . ãhnama ed sioped arap sodaraperp majetsE « : essid sésioM e
setsev saus sa maraval sodoT . essacifirup es ele euq moc zef e ovop od otnuj arap etnom od uecsed sésioM
» . atebmort a raos ed sioped etnom oa ribus oãredop óS . rerrom ed áret aossep uo lamina ajeS . sahcelf moc uo otnemajerdepa rop otrom res ed áret , rezif o eS . oãm a moc ehl-racot áredop mérop méugniN
. etrom a moc odagitsac áres elen racot méugla eS . esab aus an meuqot men , etnom oa mabus oãn e messapartlu so muhnen odom ed euq sodot a zid e , etnom od atlov me ovop o arap setimil so acraM
. ovop o odot ed atsiv à , ianiS etnom o erbos árecsed ROHNES o , aid oriecret essen , euqrop , ãhnama ed sioped arap sodaraperp majetse e
sapuor saus sa meval euQ . songidni anrot so euq o odut ed meracifirup es arap ãhnama ed o e ejoh ed aid o metievorpa euq sehl-zid e ovop o moc ret iaV « : ehl-essid ROHNES o e
ovop od atsopser a ROHNES oa uiteper sésioM » . it me açnaifnoc erpmes ahnet missa e ogitnoc ralaf açio em ovop o euq arap , assepse mevun amun it ed em-ramixorpa uoV « : essid ROHNES o e
ovop od atsopser a ROHNES oa uovel sésioM » . uonedro ROHNES o euq o odut someraF « : uednopser oãtne ovop o odoT
. odanedro ahnit ehl ROHNES o euq o odut sehl-sôpxe e ovop od soãicna so uocovnoc sésioM
» . satilearsi soa ritimsnart seved euq otsi É ” . odargasnoc ovop mu e setodrecas ed onier mu mim arap oãreS
. ecnetrep em arret a adot siop , sovop so sodot ertne odireferp ovop uem o oãres , açnaila ahnim à siéif merof e odut me merecedebo em es , otnatroP
. aiugá amu ed sasa sa erbos omoc , mim ed otnuj éta exuort sov omoc e soicpíge soa zif ue euq oliuqa meb mariV “
: satilearsi soa , bocaJ ed setnednecsed soa sarvalap satse aicnunA « : essid e etnom od omic od o-uomahc ROHNES O . sueD moc rartnocne es arap etnom oa uibus sésioM
. etnom od etnerf me ila marapmaca e ianiS od otresed oa maragehc , midifeR ed odnitraP
. ianiS od otresed oa maragehc satilearsi so , otpigE od adías ad sioped sesem sêrT
. arret aus à uosserger orteJ e orgos od es-uidepsed sésioM
. aicnâtropmi ronem ed so sele odnidiced , sevarg siam sosac so sésioM a mavatneserpa e otnemom reuqlauq me ovop od seõtseuq sa maivloser selE
. snemoh zed ed e atneuqnic ed , mec ed , lim ed sefehc omoc ovop od etnerf à so-uocoloc e learsI o odot me sezapac snemoh uehlocsE
. essid ele omoc odut zef e orgos ues od ohlesnoc o uivuo sésioM
» . sasac saus arap zap me ári ovop etse odot e oãssim aut a moc raunitnoc sáredop , snedro saus sa ritimsnart et sueD es e , ossi serezif eS
. al-irpmuc a oãraduja et e edadilibasnopser atsed oãraivila et missA . seronem sasuac sad sele es-odnagerracne , aicnâtropmi roiam ed seõtseuq sa ós metneserpa et e , otnemom reuqlauq me , ovop o arap sezíuj majes sele euQ
. snemoh zed ed e atneuqnic ed , mec ed , lim ed sopurg ed sefehc omoc snemoh sesse aiemoN . soriesseretni oãn e sotsenoh majes euq , sueD a metiepser euq , sezapac snemoh , ovop o ertned , mérop ehlocsE
. rezaf meved euq o e riuges meved euq ohnimac o sehl-acidni , sueD ed siel sa e sotiecerp so sehl-anisnE
. samelborp sues so ehl-ratneserpa e , ovop od etnatneserper omoc , ROHNES od etnaid et-retnam seveD . eduja et sueD euq e rad uov et euq ohlesnoc o atucsE
. ohnizos al-átropus sedop oãn e it arap adasep etnemadaisamed é aferat A . ogitnoc átse euq ovop etse odot a e it a rasnac et rop sabacA
. meb redecorp a sátse oãN « : ehl-essid orteJ saM
» . sueD ed siel sa e sotnemadnam so recehnoc a missa sehl-uod uE . oigítil me setrap saud sa ertne eugluj ue euq arap ogimoc ret mêv , oãtseuq amugla mêt odnauQ
. atsopser amu sueD ed retbo arap em-rarucorp mev ovop o euq É « : uednopser sésioM
» ? aid o odot etnarud , it ed etnaid , ép ed oãditlum atse saxied e ragluj arap ohnizos satnes et euq roP ? etneg atse a rezaf a ut sátse euQ « : ehl-essid orgos o , ovop o avatiejus sésioM euq oa rev oA
. eled etnaid ép ed aid o odot marevitse sele E . satilearsi solep sodatneserpa sosac so ragluj a es-sôp sésioM , etniuges aid oN
. sueD ed açneserp an , sésioM ed orgos o moc adargas oãçiefer an etrap maramot learsI ed soãicna so sodot e oãraA . satrefo sartuo adnia zef e , sueD ed arnoh me , oicífircas me lamina mu sioped uecerefo orteJ
» . aicnêlosni atnat moc satilearsi so mavatart soicpíge so odnauq , ossi zef ele euqrop , sesued so sodot ed amica átse ROHNES o euq aroga oçehnoceR
. otpigE od rosserpo redop od ovop etse uorvil euq ; soicpíge sod e óaraf od redop od uorvil sov euq ROHNES o ajes otidneB « : oãtne uomalcxe orteJ
. soicpíge sod redop od odatrebil ret so rop e learsI ed sohlif so moc arap odartsom ahnit ROHNES o euq edadnob ednarg a moc etnetnoc uocif orteJ
. odatrebil ahnit so ROHNES o omoc amrof a e ohnimac o etnarud marassap euq rop sedadlucifid sa sadot , learsI ed roma rop soicpíge soa e óaraf oa otief ahnit ROHNES o euq o odut orgos oa uotnoc sésioM
. sésioM ed adnet a arap marartne , ortuo od mu edúas ad odamrofni meret es ed siopeD . o-uojieb e eled etnaid es-uonilcni , orgos od ortnocne oa iof sésioM
» . sohlif siod suet sod e rehlum aut ad odahnapmoca et-ratisiv ohnev , orteJ orgos uet , uE « : sésioM a rezid uodnam elE
. sueD ed etnom od otnuj , odapmaca avatse edno otresed oa ele moc ret iof , sésioM ed sohlif siod so e , sésioM ed rehlum , ahlif aus a ogisnoc odnavel , orteJ
» . óaraf olep otrom res ed em-uorvil e em-raduja oiev iap uem od sueD O « : otid ahnit sésioM euqrop , rezéilE es-avamahc ohlif ortuo O
» . ahnartse arret me oriegnartse mu odis ohneT « : otid ahnit sésioM euqrop , nosreG es-avamahc sohlif sod mU . sohlif siod sues so moc etnematnuj
, asac aus arap odaivne ahnit ele euq , sésioM ed rehlum , aroféS ogisnoc uovel , sésioM ed orgos , orteJ oãtnE
. otpigE od learsI odatrebil ahnit ROHNES o euq mébmat ebuos e , ovop ues , learsI rop e sésioM rop otief ahnit sueD otnauq odut ed ebuos , sésioM ed orgos , ãidaM ed etodrecas , orteJ
» . oãçareg me oãçareg ed celamA ed ovop o moc arreug me átse ROHNES O ! ROHNES od onort olep meruJ « : essid e
, » ariednab ahnim a é ROHNES O « ed emon o ehl-sôp , ratla mu zef sésioM
» . saticelama so etnematelpmoc recerapased ieraf e ieriurtsed euq éusoJ a zid e , odadrocer ajes euq arap , orvil mun otsi evercsE « : sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. adapse aus a moc saticelama sod ovop o e oticréxe o uotorred éusoJ e
, sôp es loS o euq éta semrif es-marevitnam sésioM ed soçarb so , odom etseD . odal adac ed mu , soçarb so mavaruges ehl ruH e oãraA otnauqne , essatnes es euq arap , eled oxiabed an-maracoloc e ardep amun maragep , sodasnac mavatse áj sésioM ed soçarb so omoC
. mavanimod euq saticelama so mare , avaxiab o odnauq sam ; ahlatab a mavanimod satilearsi so , oçarb o avatnavel sésioM odnauQ
. etnom od omic oa maribus ruH e oãraA , sésioM otnatertnE . saticelama so artnoc arreug rezaf iof e uonedro ehl sésioM omoc zef éusoJ
» . oãm an sueD ed arav a moc etnom od otla on ãhnama ieratse uE . saticelama so són rop retabmoc iav e snemoh snugla ehlocsE « : éusoJ a essid sésioM oãtnE
. satilearsi so racata arap midifeR a es-marigirid saticelama sO
» ? oãn uo ocsonnoc átse ROHNES o euq áreS « : merezid oa ROHNES o avorp à maresup e maracovorp satilearsi so euqrop , abireM e ássaM ed emon o ragul esse a ued E
. learsI ed soãicna sod açneserp an , zef missa sésioM » . rebeb ovop o arap augá árias eled e odehcor on arav a moc etaB . odehcor od amic me , beroH etnom od otnuj arepse aut à ieratse uE
. etnerf me euges e oir on etsetab euq moc arav a mébmat aveL . learsI ed soãicna snugla ed rahnapmoca et-zaf e ovop od etnerf à et-acoloC « : ehl-uednopser ROHNES O
» ! em-rajerdepa oãv ocuop a iuqaD ? ovop etse a rezaf ed-ieh euQ « : essid e ROHNES o oãtne uocovni sésioM
» ? odag osson oa e sohlif sosson soa , són a , edes à seratam son arap ioF ? otpigE od rias etsezif son euq roP « : sésioM artnoc aizid e edes ahnit ovop o saM
» ? ROHNES o macovorp euq roP ? mim artnoc mamalcer euq roP « : sehl-uednopser sésioM » ! rebeb arap augá son-meêD « : aizid e sésioM artnoc avamalcer ovop o oãtnE
. rebeb ovop o arap augá ila aivah oãn sam , midifeR me marapmacA . ROHNES od snedro sa emrofnoc , ragul arap ragul ed es-avacolsed e niS ed otresed od uitrap atilearsi edadinumoc a adoT
. áfe od etrap amicéd a are maihlocer euq edaditnauq A
. ãanaC ed arret ad sarietnorf sà meragehc éta on-maremoc , é otsi ; adatibah arret amu a meragehc éta , sona atnerauq etnarud ánam maremoc satilearsi sO
. odadraug essof euq arap açnaila ad acra ad etnaid osav o uocoloc oãraA , sésioM a odad ahnit ROHNES o euq medro a odnirpmuC
» . setnednecsed so sodot arap açnarbmel omoc ravresnoc es ed mif a , ROHNES od etnaid o-acoloc e ánam ed sortil siod elen etem , etneipicer mun ageP « : oãraA a sioped essid sésioM
» ” . otpigE od ierit sov odnauq , otresed on ietnemila sov ue euq moc adimoc a majev setnednecsed sossov so euq arap , an-medraug e sortil siod ed adidem amu ánam ed mahcnE “ : etniuges o anedro ROHNES O « : essid sésioM
. lem ed olob ed robas o ahnit e ocnarb are , ortneoc ed etnemes a moc es-aiceraP . mavahnapa euq otnemila eleuqà ánam maramahc satilearsi sO
. aid omités on uosnacsed ovop o oãtnE
» . aled aias oãn e adnet aus an lauq adac euqif aid omités oN . said siod arap otnemila adnam sov , aid otxes on , ossi rop ; osnacsed ed aid mu ued sov ROHNES o euq meb majeV
? siel sahnim sà e sotnemadnam suem soa recedebo me asucer assov a áretnam es odnauq étA « : sésioM a essid ROHNES o oãtnE
. adan marartnocne oãn sam , asioc amugla merahnapa arap aid omités on marías seled snuglA
» . árevah oãn , osnacsed ed aid o é euq , aid omités on sam , ol-áhnapa oãredop said sies etnaruD
. opmac on adan oãrartnocne oãn ejoh siop , ROHNES oa odargasnoc odabás o , osnacsed ed aid o é euq , ejoh on-mamoC « : oãtne essid sésioM
. emrev ocinú mu ahnit men , lam rariehc a uocif oãn e odarbos ahnit euq o etniuges aid o arap maradraug sele , sésioM ed snedro sa odniugeS
» . rarbos euq o odut ãhnama arap medraug e meresiuq euq o augá me mazoc , meresiuq euq o onrof on meraperp , ossi roP . ROHNES oa odargasnoc , odabás o , osnacsed ed aid o é ãhnamA . uonedro ROHNES o euq ossi ioF « : sehl-uednopser ele e
sésioM a ossi racinumoc marof edadinumoc ad sefehc so oãtnE . aossep rop sortil ortauq ed acrec , é otsi , adimoc ad orbod o marahnapa , anames ad aid otxes oa saM
. es-aiterred receuqa a avaçemoc loS o euq ogol siop , remoc arap avatissecen euq ed oliuqa avahnapa mu adac sãhnam sa sadoT
. sele moc es-uotirri sésioM oãtnE . lam avariehc e semrev ed es-uehcne maradraug euq adimoc a saM . aid ortuo o arap oãçrop amu maraxied e odadnemocer ahnit sésioM euq od osac marezif oãn euq snugla evuoh , otnatne oN
» . etniuges aid o arap adan exied méugnin euQ « : oãtne sehl-essid sésioM
. remoc arap avatissecen euq ed oliuqa sanepa uohnapa mu adaC . uotlaf ocuop uohnapa euq oa men , uorbos otium uohnapa euq oa meN . sadaxif sedaditnauq sa odnuges
, sonem sortuo e siam mavahnapa snU . marezif missa satilearsi sO
» . aossep rop sortil siod ed acrec ed oãzar à , adnet amsem an meviv euq saossep ed oremún o moc odroca ed , remoc arap asicerp euq o ehnapa mu adac euq uonedro ROHNES O
. meremoc arap ád sov ROHNES o euq oãp o é otsI « : sehl-uednopser sésioM E » ? otsi é euQ « : sortuo soa snu mavatnugrep , oliuqa merev oa , e are euq o maibas oãn satilearsi sO
. ozinarg iac odnauq omoc , sodúim sohnizoãrg snu otresed od eicífrepus à marecerapa , ohlavro o odaropave ret es ed siopeD
. otnemapmaca od atlov me ohlavro ed adamac amu aivah ãhnam ed e ; otnemapmaca o marirboc euq sezinrodoc satnat marecerapa edrat amsem aleuqaN
» . sueD ossov , ROHNES o uos ue euq rebas a oãracif missA . sotiefsitas meracif éta oãp oãremoc ãhnam ed e enrac oãremoc edrat à euq sehl-zid e sele moc alaF . satilearsi sod seõçarumrum sa ivuo uE «
: sésioM a essid ROHNES o E
. mevun amun uecerapa euq , ROHNES od redop o mariv e otresed o arap marariv es sele sodot , satilearsi sod edadinumoc a adot a avalaf oãraA euq me otnemom oN
» . seõçarumrum saus sa uivuo ele siop , ROHNES od etnaid etneserpa es euq learsI ed edadinumoc a adot a ziD « : oãraA a sioped essid sésioM
» . ROHNES o artnoc mis sam , mavarumrum euq són artnoc iof oãN ? són somos meuq sioP . ele artnoc mavarumrum euq uivuo ROHNES o siop , aicnâdnuba moc oãp ãhnam ed e remoc arap enrac sov-rad iav ROHNES o edrat À « : uotnecserca sésioM
» ? són artnoc merarumrum arap són somos meuq sioP . sueD artnoc oãçarumrum assov a uivuo ele siop , ROHNES od redop o oãrev ãhnam ed ãhnama e
otpigE od uorit sov euq ROHNES o iof euq redneerpmoc oãri edrat atsE « : learsI ed ovop oa maressid oãraA e sésioM
» . said sortuo son mahnapa euq od orbod o rahnapa oãreved anames ad aid otxes oN
. oãn uo snedro sahnim sà mecedebo sodot es rev oreuQ . aid adac arap airássecen edaditnauq a rahnapa said so sodot ri eved ovop O . sodot arap adimoc uéc od revohc rezaf uoV « : sésioM a essid ROHNES o oãtnE
» . otresed o arap marexuort son euq ovop etse odot emof à meratam arap ioF ! somratraf son éta oãp somaímoc e enrac ed salenap sad otnuj sodatnes somavátse odnauq , otpigE on odatam essevit son ROHNES o euq ared son meuQ « : sehl-maizid e
oãraA e sésioM artnoc rarumrum a sodot maraçemoc otresed on ilA
. otpigE od adías ad sioped , sêm odnuges od ezniuq aid on , ianiS o e milE ertne , niS ed otresed oa uogehc e milE ed uitrap learsI ed ovop od edadinumoc a adoT
. augá ad otnuj marapmaca ilA . sariemlap atnetes e augá ed setnecsan ezod aivah edno , milE a sioped maragehC
» . selam sossov so aruc euq eleuqa , ROHNES o uos ue euqrop , soicpíge so ieugitsac euq moc sagarp sad amuhnen ieraivne sov oãn , siel sahnim sa odnirpmuc e sotnemadnam suem soa odnecedebo , adarga em euq o merezif es ; onedro sov , sueD ossov , ROHNES o , ue euq oliuqa oãçneta moc meratucse eS « : essid sehl e
, avorp à sôp o omsem ila e sotiecerp e siel ovop oa ued ROHNES o omsem ilA . rebeb arap aob uocif augá a e augá a arap o-uorita elE . ariedam ed oçadep mu ehl-uocidni ROHNES o e ROHNES o oãtne uocovni sésioM
» ? rebeb ed somevah euQ « : ratnugrep a e sésioM artnoc rarumrum a oãtne uoçemoc ovop O
. araM avamahc es ragul eleuqa , ossi roP . agrama are euqrop , aivah ál euq augá ad rebeb maredup oãn araM a maragehc odnauQ
. augá rartnocne mes said sêrt etnarud marahnimac e ruhC ed otresed on marartnE . ohlemreV raM od satilearsi so rias zef sésioM oãtnE
» . orielavac o e olavac o ram on uoçnal , osohlivaram ofnuirt mu evetbo euq ROHNES oa metnaC « : seled ocitnâc o avamoter mairíM otnauqne
, sateriednap odnacot e odnaçnad , aled sárta marías serehlum sa sadot e ateriednap amun uogep , asiteforp are euq oãraA ed ãmri , mairíM oãtnE
. ram od oiem olep otuxne ép a mavassap learsI ed sohlif so otnauqne , seled amic rop essíac ram od augá a euq moc zef ROHNES o , ram on marartne sorielavac e sorrac sues so , óaraf od solavac so odnauQ
» ! edadinrete a adot arap ier é ROHNES O
. etsíurtsnoc oirpórp ut euq sueD ed olpmet o , onort uet o etsecelebatse , ROHNES , ut edno , ahnatnom aut an etsacoloc o e etsizudnoc o uT
. etsatagser omsem ut euq ovop o , ROHNES ó , ovop uet o odassap ahnet euq éta , redop uet od etnaid sodacifirtep , merovapa es e metsussa es euQ
. megaroc mes átse uenanac ovop o e ; baoM ed sióreh so odem ed memert ; sodarreta oãtse modE ed sefehc sO
. odem ed soiehc maracif suetsilif so , otsid merebas oa maremert seõçan sA
. arret atnas aut à etsizudnoc o , açrof aut alep ; ovop uet o etsaiug e etsatrebil , edadnob aut aleP
. sogimini so uilogne arret a e atierid oãm aut a etsednetsE
! sievírret e sasohlivaram sasioc sezaF ? ut omoc otnas e ednarg é meuQ ? ut omoc é sesued sod lauq , ROHNES Ó
. ram od sazednuforp san obmuhc omoc es-maradnufa ; so-uilogne ram o e ram o erbos etsarpoS
” ! ranimretxe so arap adapse a ierahniabmeseD . sojesed suem so rezafsitas uov sele moc e sojopsed sues so ridivid uoV ! sol-áhnapa e sol-iugesrep uoV “ : aizid ogimini O
. sadilós es-maranrot sazednuforp sa ; sahlarum omoc es-mareugre sadno sa ; ram od saugá sa es-maraotnoma ari aut ad orpos oA
. so-uimusnoc ele e roruf uet o etsatloS . soirásrevda suet so etsaburred edatsejam e azednarg aut a moC
. soçadep me ogimini o zaf atierid aut a , asoredop e etrof é , ROHNES , atierid oãm aut A
. ram od odnuf oa sardep omoc marecsed , so-uilogne omsiba O
. ohlemreV raM on es-maragofa siaicifo serohlem sues so ; óaraf od oticréxe o e sorrac so ram on uotipicerP
. ROHNES é emon ues o , orierreug etnelav mu é ROHNES O
. sairólg saus sa ieratnac , iap uem ed sueD o é ; ieravuol o ossi rop , sueD uem o é elE . uovlas em meuq ele iof , rosnefed e açrof ahnim a é ROHNES O
. orielavac o e olavac o ram on uoçnal : osohlivaram ofnuirt mu evetbo euq , ROHNES od arnoh me ieratnaC « : mavamalcorp e ROHNES od arnoh me ocitnâc etse maraotne satilearsi so e sésioM , arutla aleuqaN
. sésioM ovres ues on e ROHNES on açnaifnoc marahnag e romet ed es-marehcne , soicpíge soa odigilfni ahnit ROHNES o euq ogitsac ednarg o mariv learsI ed sohlif so odnauQ
. aiarp an sotrom soicpíge so mariv satilearsi so E . soicpíge sod redop od learsI uorvil ROHNES o , aid essen , euq missa ioF
. adreuqse aus à e atierid aus à augá ed ahlarum amu moc otuxne ép a ram o marassevarta satilearsi so méroP
. oviv uocif oicpíge odadlos ós mu meN . learsI ed ovop od oãçiugesrep me ram on odartne ahnit euq óaraf od oticréxe o odot e sorielavac so e sorrac so uirboc lamron levín ues o uomoter augá a odnauQ
. saugá sad oiem on uogofa so ROHNES o missa e ; ram o etnerf alep mavartnocne ós aguf me soicpíge so ; lautibah levín ues o maramoter saugá sa , aid od repmor od setna , e zef missa sésioM
» . sorielavac e sorrac sues so , soicpíge so odnirboc , es-rinu a oãratlov saugá sa e ram o erbos oçarb uet o ednetsE « : sésioM a essid ROHNES O
» . són artnoc seled rovaf a etabmoc ROHNES o euqrop , satilearsi sod somajuF « : oãtne maressid soicpíge sO . raçnava maiugesnoc etnemlicifid euq odom ed , sorrac sod sador sa sehl-uovarT
. ocinâp o sele erbos uoçnal e soicpíge sod odal o arap mevun ad e ogof ed anuloc ad uohlo ROHNES o , adagurdam ed , mérop
; ortned ram olep seled sárta marartne , sorielavac sues so moc , óaraf od solavac e sorrac so sodot e son-mariugesrep soicpíge sO
. adreuqse à artuo e atierid à amu , augá ed sahlarum saud ertne , satilearsi so marassevarta ila roP
. aces arret me ram o uomrofsnart ROHNES o missA . siod me ram o odnidivid , etion a adot etnarud uorpos euq , etsel ed otnev etrof mu uoivne ROHNES o e ram o erbos oçarb ues o uednetse sésioM
. etion a adot etnarud satilearsi so raçnacla mariugesnoc oãn soicpíge so , ossi roP . so-avaimula satilearsi soa sam , oãdirucse ed mevun amu are , soicpíge so arap ; satilearsi so e oicpíge oticréxe o ertne uocif snevun ed anuloc a missA
. seled sárta es-maresup e ragul ed maradum , satilearsi sod etnerf à aiuges euq , snevun ed anuloc a e sueD ed ojna o , otnemom esseN
» . sorielavac e sorrac sues so artnoc e ele artnoc redop uem o riv óaraf o odnauq , ROHNES o uos ue euq rebas a oãracif soicpíge sO
. solavac sues so e sorrac sues so , oticréxe ues o odot artnoc e óaraf o artnoc redop uem o ierartsom , satilearsi so meriugesrep oA . riugesrep sov me memiet soicpíge so euq moc ieraf uE
. otuxne ép a rassevarta massop o learsI ed sohlif so euq arap , arba es ele euq moc zaf e ram o erbos a-ednetse , arav aut a atnavel , uT
. etnaid arap magis euq satilearsi soa anedrO ? aduja sedep em euq roP « : sésioM a essid ROHNES o oãtnE
» ! mepucoerp es oãN . rovaf ossov a áretabmoc ROHNES O
. sol-êv a oãratlov siam acnun rev a oãtse aroga euq soicpíge sO . ravlas sov arap ejoh rezaf iav ROHNES o euq o oãrev e somlac majetsE ! odem mahnet oãN « : ovop oa uednopser sésioM
» . otresed on somrerrom euq od seled sovarcse somres rohlem arE ? soicpíge sod sovarcse res a somraunitnoc arap sessaxied son euq otpigE on són somaízid et oãN
? otpigE od etsarit son euq roP ? otsi etsezif son euq roP ? otresed etsen rerrom somriv arap , ál ed etsarit son euq otpigE on sorclupes revah oãn rop ioF « : sésioM a maizid E
. ROHNES oa oilíxua maridep e odem ed soiehc maracif , maiugesrep so e mavamixorpa es soicpíge so e óaraf o euq ed marebecrepa es satilearsi so odnauQ
. nofaS-laaB ed etnaid , toriaH-iP ed etnerf me , ram od otnuj sodapmaca mavatse sele odnauq son-maraçnacla e , sorrac e solavac sues so sodot moc , son-maiugesrep soicpíge sO
. etnemlafnuirt rahcram a messaunitnoc setse arobme , satilearsi so riugesrep me essamiet , otpigE od ier , óaraf o euq moc zef ROHNES O
. laicifo mu moc mu adac , siaicepse sorrac sotnecsies so odniulcni , otpigE od sorrac so sodot uoveL
. oticréxe ues o moc ahcram me es-sôp e etabmoc ed orrac ues o ralerta uodnam óaraf O
» ? sovarcse sosson res ed messaxied e arobme messof es satilearsi so euq ritimrep somedup omoc saM « : maressid e seled otiepser a saiedi ed maradum serodivres sues so e ier o oãtnE . riguf ai learsI ed ovop o euq ed odasiva iof otpigE od ier o otnatertnE
. marezif missa satilearsi so E » . ROHNES o uos ue euq rebas a oãracif soicpíge so : oticréxe ues o odot artnoc e ele artnoc redop uem o ierartsom ue sam , sol-iugesrep ári ele e osomiet ajes óaraf o euq moc ieraf uE
. sohnimac so sodot uohcef sehl otresed o euq e arret alep sodidrep madna learsI ed sohlif so euq rezid iav óaraf O
. ram oa otnuj , nofaS-laaB ed etnaid rapmaca meved ila ; ram o e lodgiM ertne , toriaH-iP ed etnerf me mepmaca e oãçcerid ed medum euq learsI ed sohlif soa ziD «
: sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. etion a etnarud , ogof ed anuloc a men , aid o etnarud , ovop od etnerf ad uias acnun snevun ed anuloc A
. etion ed e aid ed rahnimac meredop a odom ed , ogof ed anuloc amu omoc , etion ed e ; ohnimac o rartsom sehl arap , snevun ed adamrof anuloc amu omoc seled etnerf à ai ROHNES o , aid eD
. otresed o açemoc edno , matE me marapmaca e tocuS ed marías satilearsi sO
» . sosso suem so ocsovnoc mevel , iuqad rarit reiv sov sueD odnauQ « : otid ahnit ésoJ . messezif missa euq satilearsi soa odidep ahnit ésoJ euqrop , ésoJ ed siatrom sotser so ogisnoc uovel sésioM
. oticréxe mu omoc sodazinagro otpigE od marías satilearsi sO . ohlemreV raM oa oãçcerid me , otresed o arap messigirid es sele euq moc zef , ossi roP
. otpigE o arap ratlov mairireferp euq e , rezaf o ed messevit odnauq , ratul mairi oãn satilearsi so euq uosnep sueD euqrop , otruc siam o res ed rasepa , suetsilif sod arret a assevarta euq ohnimac olep uovel so oãn sueD , atilearsi ovop o rias uoxied óaraf o odnauQ
» ” . etrof oãm moc otpigE od uorit son ROHNES o euq ed sohlo suet so ertne uo oãm aut an odacram lanis mu omoc áres otsI
. ohlif oriemirp osson olep etagser omoc atrefo amu somatneserpa e onilucsam oxes od sohlif soriemirp so sodot ROHNES oa somecerefo , ossi roP . siamina sues sod sairc sariemirp sa sadot e saicpíge sailímaf sa sadot ed ohlif oriemirp o etrom ed uiref ROHNES o , rias raxied son oãn me avamiet óaraf o odnauq , euq É
. oãdivarcse ad arret , otpigE od rias son-zef , etrof oãm moc , ROHNES O “ : madnopser , ossi odut acifingis euq o , aid mu , meratnugrep sov sohlif sossov so odnauq E
. atrefo amud oiem rop sodatagser oãres , aicnêdnecsed assov ad rehlum amud , sohlif soriemirp so sodoT . oçocsep o ritrap ehl ed oãret , otnemuj olep etagser me otirbac mu uo oriedroc mu mered oãn eS . otnemuj olep etagser omoc otirbac mu uo oriedroc mu rad oãreved , otnemuj mud airc ariemirp ad osac oN
. ROHNES oa mecnetrep sohlif soriemirp so euqrop , siamina sossov sod merecsan euq sohcam soriemirp so sodot e onilucsam oxes od ohlif oriemirp o ehl-rargasnoc meved sodot
, sodassapetna sossov soa e zef sov euq assemorp a odnuges arret a ragertne sov odnauq , é otsi , suenanac sod arret an rartne otief revit sov ROHNES o odnauQ
. adaxif atad an , sona so sodot atsef atse rarbelec meved , ossi roP
. etrof oãm moc otpigE od uorit sov ele euqrop , ROHNES od iel ad ralaf erpmes meved euq ed merarbmel es arap , atset an uo oçarb on odacram lanis mu omoc sóv arap áres otsI
. otpigE o maraxied odnauq , zef sov ROHNES o euq od asuac rop otsi odut zaf euq sohlif sues soa árid mu adac , aid esseN
. odatnemref oãp uo otnemref revah áreved oirótirret od amuhnen etrap me e otnemref mes oãp oãremoc said etes so etnaruD
. ROHNES od arnoh me atsef oãraf aid omités on e otnemref mes oãp oãremoc said etes etnaruD
. sêm omsem etsen , atsef atse rarbelec meved ía , augá omoc merroc lem o e etiel o edno arret , airad sov euq sodassapetna sossov soa uetemorp ele euq arret , suesubej sod e sueveh sod , suerroma sod , satitih sod , suenanac sod arret an rartne rezif sov ROHNES o odnauq , otnatroP
. bibA ed sêm etsen , otpigE od ejoh meaS
. odatnemref oãp remoc meved oãn aid etsen , ossi roP . redop ednarg ues olep rias zef sov ROHNES o euq me aid o é etsE . oãdivarcse ad arret , otpigE od marías euq me aid etsed erpmes es-merbmeL « : ovop oa essid sésioM oãtnE
» . siamina sod ajes sonamuh sod ajes , erpmes em-ecnetrep ohlif oriemirp o euqrop , learsI ed ovop od sailímaf sa sadot ed ohlif oriemirp o em-rargasnoc seveD «
: sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. oticréxe mu essof es omoc satilearsi so otpigE od rias zef ROHNES o , aid omsem eleuqan , E
. oãraA a e sésioM a odanedro ahnit ROHNES o omoc odut marirpmuc satilearsi sO
» . ocsovnoc maviv euq soriegnartse so arap reuq satilearsi so arap reuq adacilpa áres iel amsem A
. aocsáP ad oãçiefer ad remoc áredop , odadicnucric ajetse oãn euq , méugnin saM . atilearsi oãdadic mu omoc odaredisnoc áres , osac essen , euqrop , aocsáP a rarbelec áredop sioped ós e ailímaf aus ad onilucsam oxes od soudívidni so sodot radicnucric rezaf áreved oriemirp , ROHNES od arnoh me , aocsáP a rarbelec resiuq ocsovnoc reviv euq oriegnartse mu eS
. aocsáP a árarbelec learsI ed edadinumoc a adoT
. sosso so oãrarbeuq ehl men , odacifircas lamina od enrac ed oçadep ós mu men asac ed arof arap oãravel oãN . asac ed ortned odimoc res áreved aocsáP ad otirbac uo oriedroc O
. aled remoc áredop , odairalassa uo etnediser ajes , oriegnartse muhneN
. oãsicnucric a atief res ehl ed sioped , aled remoc áredop odarpmoc ovarcse o sam
, aocsáP ad oãçiefer ad áremoc oriegnartse muhneN : aocsáP a erbos iel a é atsE « : oãraA a e sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. ROHNES od arnoh me , oãçareg me oãçareg ed , ailígiv oãraf satilearsi so euq me etion a áres , otpigE od adías aus a uoigiv ROHNES o euq me , etion assE
. otpigE od marías ROHNES od ovop od sobirt sa sadot , sona atnirt e sotnecortauq so maratelpmoc euq me aid omsem on e
; sona atnirt e sotnecortauq otpigE on marevitse learsI ed sohlif sO
. seãp marezif e , otpigE od odavel mahnit euq , otnemref mes assam a marezoc , síap od rias a mavagirbo so soicpíge so euqrop , megaiv a arap adimoc raraperp ed opmet marevit oãn omoC
. odag ed sadanam e sohnaber sednarg maravel e etneg artuo atium ai sele moc , ossid mélA
. saçnairc sa ratnoc mes , snemoh lim sotnecsies ed acrec marE . tocuS éta ép a marof e séssemaR ed edadic ad marías satilearsi sO
. soicpíge so marajopsed satilearsi so missa e , maidep sehl satilearsi so euq o odut edatnov-aob ed messed soicpíge so euq moc zef ROHNES O
. oiráutsev e atarp ed e oruo ed sotcejbo soicpíge soa maridep , sésioM ed snedro sa odniuges , ossid mélA
. sorbmo soa san-maravel e apuor moc sariessam sa marevlovne , essatnemref euq setna , oãp ed assam an maragep satilearsi sO
. sodot rerrom mai euq odnezid , síap o etnemadipar messaxied euq arap satilearsi so moc maitsisni soicpíge sO
» . mim rop mébmat meugoR . matrap e , maridep omoc , sacav e sahlevo sassov sa mébmat ravel medoP
. maressid omoc , ROHNES o raroda oãV . learsI ed sohlif so e sêcov , ovop uem od oiem od maiaS ! arobme es-oãV « : sehl-essid e oãraA e sésioM ramahc uodnam óaraf o , etion amsem asseN
. otrom mu essevuoh oãn euq me asac acinú amu aivah oãN . otpigE o odot me rod ed sotirg sednarg evuoh e etion a etnarud es-maratnavel soicpíge so sodot e serodivres sues so e óaraf O
. siamina sod airc ariemirp a adnia e , oãsirp an avatse euq od ohlif oa éta , onort od oriedreh o , óaraf od ohlif o edsed , saicpíge sailímaf sa sadot ed ohlif oriemirp o etrom ed uiref ROHNES o , etion ad oiem A
. oãraA a e sésioM a odanedro ahnit ROHNES o euq o rirpmuc marof e
oãçaroda me es-maranilcni satilearsi so oãtnE » ” . sailímaf sasson sa uopuop e otpigE on learsI ed sohlif sod sasac sa uorvil , soicpíge so etrom ed uiref ele odnauq euqrop , ROHNES od arnoh me , aocsáP ad oicífircas o é otsI “ : sehl-rednopser meved
, acifingis ale euq é euq o meratnugrep setnednecsed sossov so odnauq E
. atsef atse rarbelec a raunitnoc oãreved , uetemorp omoc , árad sov ROHNES o euq arret an merartne odnauq E
. setnednecsed sossov so arap e sóv arap anrete iel omoc , iel atse , otnatrop , metiepseR
. sasac sassov san ertne oãçiurtsed a euq áraxied oãn e etnaida árassap , atrop ad sarierbmo saud san e agrev an eugnas o rev oa , soicpíge so etrom ed riref arap rassap ROHNES o odnauQ
. ãhnam ed éta atrop ad raimil o ropsnart áreved sóv ed muhneN . atrop ad sarierbmo saud sa e agrev a eugnas esse moc meuqram sioped ; aicab amun áratse euq , eugnas on on-mabebme e opossih ed omar mun meugep , adiuges mE
. aocsáP a rarbelec arap on-metam e , sailímaf sassov sad amu adac rop , otirbac mu uo oriedroc mu rehlocse oãV « : sehl-essid e learsI ed soãicna so sodot ramahc uodnam sésioM
» . otnemref mes oãp remoc oãreved , maviv euq reuq edno ; otnemref ahnet euq adan mamoc oãn , otnatroP
. atilearsi ajes reuq , oriegnartse ajes reuq , learsI ed edadinumoc ad odíulcxe áres otnemref moc oãp remoc euq eleuqa odot e , sasac sassov san otnemref revah áreved oãn said etes etnaruD
. sêm oriemirp od mu e etniv aid od edrat à éta , ezrotac aid od edrat a edsed , otnemref mes oãp oãremoC
. erpmes arap rarbelec ed mêt setnednecsed sossov so mébmat euq oãçagirbo amu É . oticréxe mu omoc otpigE od learsI ed ovop o rias zif aid eleuqan euqrop , rarbelec oãreved euq atsef amu é otnemref mes seãp sod atsef A
. adimoc aus a raraperp mu adac arap rezaf osicerp é euq o res oãn a , árahlabart es oãn said sesseN . oãçaro ed enelos aielbmessa amu arap es-rinuer oãreved , omités on omoc aid oriemirp on otnaT
. learsI ed ovop od odíulcxe áres , said etes sesse etnarud , otnemref moc oãp remoc euq eleuqa odoT . aid oriemirp o edsed , sasac sassov san otnemref revah áreved oãn , otnatrop ; otnemref mes oãp oãremoc , said etes etnaruD
. setnednecsed sossov so omoc meb , erpmes arap ol-árbelec a sodagirbo maciF . ROHNES od arnoh me atsef ednarg moc odarbelec e odadrocer sóv ertne res áreved aid essE
. soicpíge so etrom ed riref ue odnauq , árerrom sóv ed muhnen e etnaida ierassap , eugnas o riv ue odnauq , missA . martnocne es edno sasac sa ralanissa arap sov-rivres ed-áh eugnas O
. ROHNES o uos ue euqrop , otpigE od sesued so sodot artnoc açitsuj ahnim a ierecrexe e siamina sues so sodot ed airc ariemirp a e saicpíge sailímaf sa sadot ed ohlif oriemirp o rerrom ieraf e otpigE o odot rop ierassap , etion asseN
. ROHNES od aocsáP a é siop , asserped remoc e oãm an odajac o e sodaçlac sép so ret , rajaiv messof es omoc soditsev ratse oãreved , otirbac uo oriedroc o meremoc odnauQ
. odamieuq res eved etniuges aid o arap rarbos eled euq o ; etniuges aid o arap adan racif raxied meved oãN
. sazeduim sa e satap sa , açebac a omsem , emul oa adassa sanepa ; augá me adizoc uo aurc enrac aus ad oçadep ós mu men mamoc oãN
. sagrama satnalp moc e otnemref mes oãp moc , emul oa adassa enrac a oãremoc etion asseN
. remoc a merevitse o edno asac ad atrop ad agrev a e sarierbmo saud sa meuqram lamina od eugnas o moC
. recedratne oa , oãratam o satilearsi so sodot , aid essen , e sêm etsed ezrotac aid oa éta ol-ádraug oãreveD
. otirbac mu res edop , oriedroc ed zev me ; ona mu ed ohcam mu res eved , sotiefed ret áreved oãn oriedroc O
. remoc edop mu adac euq edaditnauq a e saossep ed oremún o emrofnoc oriedroc o odnitraper , sotnuj oãremoc omixórp siam ohniziv ues o e ailímaf ad efehc o oãtne , oriedroc o odot remoc arap aneuqep rof ailímaf a eS
. asac adac rop mu , ailímaf rop oriedroc mu ahlocse sóv ed mu adac sêm etsed zed aid oN : etniuges o learsI ed ovop o odot a magiD
. ona od sesem sod oriemirp o e etnatropmi siam sêm ossov o áres sêm etsE «
: sehl-essid e oãraA e sésioM moc uolaf ROHNES o , otpigE oN
. otpigE od satilearsi so rias uoxied oãn ele euq odom ed , óaraf od oãçaroc o uecerudne ROHNES o sam , óaraf od etnaid sahlivaram sasse sadot marazilaer oãraA e sésioM
» . otpigE on es-racilpitlum ed-oãh sahlivaram sahnim sa missa e , sodivuo rad iav sov oãn óaraf O « : sésioM a essid ROHNES O
. óaraf od oicálap od odatirri otium uias sésioM E » ” . ieritrap ue euq é ossid sioped óS . ogitnoc átse euq ovop o odot e ut , iuqad iaS : sohleoj ed oãridep em e ogimoc ret oãriv setneserp iuqa serodivres suet so sodot E
. odag ues o artnoc uo satilearsi so artnoc árardal oãc mu men , satilearsi e soicpíge ertne oãçnitsid zaf ROHNES o euq mabias euq arap , E
. árevah men evuoh acnun omoc romalc ednarg mu árevah otpigE o odot mE
. siamina so sodot ed airc ariemirp a mébmat árerroM . ahniraf a ióm euq avarcse ad ohlif oa éta , onort od oriedreh , óaraf od ohlif o edsed , árerrom saicpíge sailímaf sa sadot ed ohlif oriemirp o e
otpigE o odot rop ierassap , etion ad oiem A “ : ROHNES o zid missA « : essid sésioM
. lareg me ovop olep omoc óaraf od serodivres solep otnat , otpigE on adatiepser otium aossep amu are sésioM oirpórp O . satilearsi so moc arap edatnov aob messartsom soicpíge so euq moc zef ROHNES O
» . atarp ed e oruo ed sotcejbo sohniziv sues soa mu adac ridep oãreved , serehlum sa omoc snemoh so otnat , euq satilearsi soa sáriD
. arobme áradnam sov éta sam , iuqad rias áraxied sov ós oãn ele , ossid siopeD . otpigE o artnoc e óaraf o artnoc agarp artuo adnia ieraivnE « : sésioM a essid ROHNES o oãtnE
» . it ed etnaid ieratneserpa em siam acnuN . meb etsessiD « : uednopser sésioM
» . sárerrom serecerapa em euq me aid on euqrop , mim ed etnaid recerapa a setlov oãn e iuqad et-iaV « : sésioM a adnia essid óaraf O
. ritrap raxied siuq so oãn ele e óaraf od oãçaroc o ovon ed uecerudne , mérop , ROHNES O
» . ROHNES oa somraroda arap ratissecen someri euq od somebas oãn , somragehc ál étA . ROHNES oa oicífircas me somrecerefo so arap seled snugla rehlocse ed somet euqrop , racif áreved osson lamina ós mu men ; árahnapmoca son odag osson o odot , ossid mélA
. sueD osson , ROHNES od arnoh me somramieuq e somracifircas arap soirássecen siamina so son-ragertne seved euq é uT « : uednopser sésioM saM
» . sacav sa e sahlevo sa sanepa racif mexied ; saçnairc sa mébmat mevel e ROHNES o raroda oãV « : ehl-essid e sésioM ramahc uodnam óaraf o oãtnE
. sasac saus san zul mahnit learsI ed sohlif so saM . avatse edno ragul od uias méugnin , said sêrt so etnarud , e oãdirucse an sortuo soa snu maiv es oãN
. said sêrt etnarud , otpigE o odot uirboc asned otium oãdirucse amu e uéc o arap oãm a uotnavel sésioM
» . racot assop es euq assepse oãt oãdirucse amu ajah otpigE o odot me euq arap oãm aut a atnaveL « : sésioM a oãtne essid ROHNES O
. satilearsi so rias essaxied oãn e zev artuo essecerudne es óaraf o euq moc zef ROHNES o saM
. otpigE od oirótirret o odot me otohnafag ocinú mu uocif oãN . ohlemreV raM on so-uoçnal e sotohnafag so uovel omissítrof etseo otnev mu e otnev od omur o uodum ROHNES o oãtnE
. ROHNES oa uoro óaraf od oicálap od uias sésioM odnauQ
» . latrom olegalf etse mim ed etsafa euq , sueD ossov , ROHNES oa meugor e , zev atse adnia , atlaf ahnim a meodrep euq sov-oçep sam
, sóv artnoc e , sueD ossov , ROHNES o artnoc lam idecorP « : sehl-essid e oãraA e sésioM ramahc etnemataidemi uodnam óaraf O
. serovrá san men , opmac on men : otpigE o odot me arudrev reuqlauq uocif oãN . ozinarg od sioped , serovrá san odacif ahnit euq aturf a adot e satnalp sa sadot mararoved e ; oãhc o rev aiugesnoc es oãn euq edaditnauq lat me arret a marirboc siop
, aid eleuqan omoc sotohnafag sotnat sioped árevah men setna evuoh acnuN . odal o odot rop mavasiop e síap o odot maridavni euq
, sotohnafag so odizart ahnit etsel otnev o , uecehnama odnauQ . etion a adot e aid o odot evetnam es euq etsel otnev mu síap o erbos rarpos zef ROHNES o e otpigE o erbos arav aus a uednetse sésioM
» . ozinarg oa uopacse euq o odut moc , síap od satnalp sa sadot moc mebaca e sotohnafag so sele artnoc mahnev euq arap otpigE o erbos oãm aut a ednetsE « : sésioM a oãtne essid ROHNES O
. oicálap od arof rôp so-uodnam E » ! odidep mêt omoc , ROHNES o raroda arap snemoh so sanepa oãV ! oãN
. sodanoicnetni-lam oãtse euq meb es-êV . saçnairc sassov sa moc ri sov-raxied uov oãn euq é ue saM ! ehnapmoca sov ROHNES o euq oãtnE « : essid óaraf O
» . ROHNES od arnoh me atsef ednarg amu é són arap siop ; siob sosson so e sahlevo sasson sa someravel e ; sahlif sasson sa e sohlif sosson so , sohlev sosson so e saçnairc sasson sa moc ri euq someT « : uednopser sésioM
» . ritrap ed mêt euq so oãs siauq em-ziD . sueD ossov , ROHNES o raroda ri medoP « : sehl-essid e oãraA e sésioM ramahc zev artuo uodnam óaraf O
» ? es-raniurra a átse otpigE o euq etsiv oãn adniA . sueD ues , ROHNES oa soicífircas recerefo arap etneg atse ri ál axieD ? samelborp rasuac iav son memoh etse euq é odnauq étA « : ehl-maressid óaraf od serodivres so oãtnE
. óaraf od açneserp ad es-uoriter sésioM siopeD » ” . said sosson soa éta arret atse a maragehc euq edsed , laugi mariv acnun sóva suet so e siap suet so euq ednarg oãt edadimalac amu áreS . soicpíge so sodot ed sasac sa e serodivres suet sod sasac sa e soicálap suet so oãridavnI
. sopmac sossov son mecserc euq serovrá sa sadot adnia e ozinarg od uopacse euq o oãraroveD . oãhc o rev áriugesnoc es oãn euq edaditnauq lat me arret atsed eicífrepus a oãrirboc selE
. síap uet o odot erbos sotohnafag ieradnam ãhnama , ovop uem o rias raxied oãn a seraunitnoc es euqrop
; em-raroda áv euq arap ovop uem o rias axieD ? mim ed etnaid et-rahlimuh a sárasucer et odnauq étA “ : suerbeh sod sueD o , ROHNES o zid missA « : ehl-maressid e óaraf o moc ret marof oãraA e sésioM
» . ROHNES o uos ue euq oãrecehnocer sêcov missA . sele ertne iezilaer euq soigídorp so e otpigE on iezilaer euq sahlivaram sa soten suet soa e sohlif suet soa ratnoc sassop euq arap e
, sahlivaram satse seled oiem on razilaer redop arap , serodivres sues sod o e oãçaroc ues o icerudne ue euqrop , óaraf o moc ret iaV « : sésioM a oãtne essid ROHNES O
. sésioM a otid ahnit ROHNES o omoc satilearsi so rias raxied a es-uosucer e
oãçaroc o uecerudne , serodivres sues so omoc lat , E . etnetiner ovon ed es-uonrot , seõvort men , ozinarg men , avuhc aivah oãn áj euq uiv óaraf o odnauQ
. riac ed maraxied avuhc a e ozinarg o e seõvort so marassec ogol e oãçaro me ROHNES oa soãm sa uovele , óaraf od açneserp ad e edadic ad uias sésioM odnauQ
. edrat siam matorb ós euqrop , adan marerfos oãn oietnec o e ogirt o saM
. rolf me avatse ohnil o e agipse me áj avatse adavec a euqrop , sodíurtsed maracif adavec a e ohnil O
» . ROHNES o , sueD memet serodivres suet so men ut men euq ies ue , otnatne oN
. ROHNES oa ecnetrep arret a euq sabias euq arap , ozinarg siam árevah oãn e oãrassec seõvort sO . ROHNES oa oãçaro me soãm sa ieratnavel , edadic ad rias euq ogoL « : uednopser sésioM
» . iuqa racif a siam ieragirbo sov oãn e otpigE od rias ieraxied sov ue e , siamed somevit áj euqrop , ozinarg e seõvort siam ajah oãn euq arap ROHNES oa merO
. sodapluc somos euq é ovop uem o e ue : otsuj é ROHNES O . ieuqep euq oçehnoceR « : sehl-essid e oãraA e sésioM ramahc uodnam óaraf o oãtnE
. ozinarg uiac oãn , satilearsi so maiviv edno , nehcóG ed arret an sanepA
