. sotrom sues so ratlupes redop ía arap , oãarbA ed essop a arap satitih sod essop ad marassap aivah elen euq aturg a e opmac o , arienam atseD
. ãanaC ed arret an , norbeH é euq , érbmaM ed etnerf me , alepcaM ed edadeirporp ad aturg an , araS , rehlum aus a ratlupes edôp oãarbA , otsid siopeD
. aielbmessa aleuqan etrap odamot mahnit euq , satitih so sodot ed açneserp an , oãarbA ed essop a arap
marassap , onerret od ortned aivah euq serovrá sa sadot e aturg a , opmac oirpórp o odniulcni , érbmaM ed etnerf me , alepcaM me , norfE ed opmac o missa E
. etnerroc osep o moc , atarp ed saçep satnecortauq : ovop o odot ed açneserp an , otid ahnit ele euq etnatnom o ehl-uogertne e oçerp o moc uodrocnoc oãarbA
» . rehlum aus a ratlupes ál edop euq odom eD ? is arap uo mim arap ossi é euQ . atarp ed sadeom satnecortauq elav arret aleuqa , ogima uem , ehlO «
: oãtne uednopser norfE
» . rehlum ahnim a ratlupes oreuq ue euq missa É . aturg ad oçerp omoc uod ehl euq oriehnid o etieca euq , rovaf rop , ehl-oçeP « : rivuo etnemlaugi messedup sodot euq a odom ed , norfE a uednopser e
arret aleuqad ovop od etnaid es-uonilcni oãarbA
» . rehlum aus a ratlupes edop áJ . ovop uem od etnaid , ossi odut ehl-uoD . etsixe elen euq aturg a moc e opmac esse moc euqif euq ehl-oçep , rohnes orac ueM «
: edadic ad atrop à avassap meuq rop e sodot rop odivuo res a arienam ed , oãarbA a uednopser e satitih so ertne ila es-avartnocne norfE , arO
» . arret assov an iuqa orclupes mu ed onod res a ieracif e odived oçerp olep eugertne am ele euQ . ecnetrep ehl euq onerret od amertxe an átse euq e eled é euq , alepcaM ed aturg a redec em arap
, raoS ed ohlif , norfE a maçep , rehlum ahnim a etlupes ue euq edatnov assov ad etnemlaer é eS « : sehl-essid e
, arret ad sonod mare euq , satitih soa otiepser ed oãçanilcni amu zef e es-uotnavel oãarbA
» . orclupes mu árasucer ehl són ed muhneN . sorclupes sosson sod rohlem on rehlum aus a ratlupes edoP . sueD ed odihlocse mu omoc són ed oiem on ol-omaredisnoc sóN ! rohnes , ehl-rezid a somet euq o etucsE «
: oãarbA a marednopser satitih sO
» . rehlum ahnim a ratlupes redop elen arap , arret assov an , ahnim edadeirporp omoc , orclupes mu ririuqda em-mexied saM . oriegnartse mu omoc oiem ossov on odiviv ohnet uE «
: satitih soa rezid iof e revádac od otnuj ed uias sioped saM
. ale rop otul ed lanis me e araS ed etrom a rarohc arap asac me uocif oãarbA . ãanaC ed arret an acif euq , norbeH , é otsi , ábrA-tairiuQ me uerrom e
sona etes e etniv e otnec ueviv araS
. ácaM e sáaT , maaG , abeT zul à ued atse e amúeR adamahc anibucnoc amu mébmat ahnit roaN
. oãarbA ed oãmri , roaN a ued acliM euq sohlif otio so oãs setsE . acebeR ed iap iof leuteB , odal ues roP
. leuteB e faldiJ , sádliP , ôzaH , desséuQ
, marA ed iap , leumeuQ adnia sioped e zuB , odnuges o , ecU iof oriemirp O
. oãarbA ed oãmri , roaN a sohlif odad ahnit acliM euq oãarbA a raicnuna marof , sioped opmet muglA
. reviv a uocif edno , abehcreB arap sele moc uitrap ilad E . sodairc sues sod otnuj arap uotlov oãarbA
» ” . medro ahnim à etsecedebo ut euqrop , odnum od sovop so sodot sodaoçneba ritnes ed-oãh es setnednecsed suet sod sévartA
. sogimini sues sod sedadic sad essop ramot ed-oãh sele e , aiarp ad saiera sa omoc uo uéc od salertse sa omoc asoremun oãt aicnêdnecsed amu et-rad ed-ieh e raoçneba ed-ieh et euq
emon mob uem olep oruj , ohlif ocinú uet o etsapuop oãn e otsi rezaf ed zapac etsof euq áJ “ : ROHNES o zid euq o siE « : ehl-essid e
uéc od zev amu siam oãarbA uomahc ROHNES od oriegasnem O
» . áraicnedivorp es ROHNES od ahnatnom an « zid es ejoh adnia e » aicnedivorp ROHNES O « ed emon o ragul eleuqà ued oãarbA
. ohlif ues od ragul me oicífircas me o-uecerefo e ol-ácsub ál ioF . otsubra mun serfihc solep oserp avatse euq , orienrac mu is ed sárta uiv e es-uotlov oãarbA
» . mim ed roma rop ocinú ohlif uet o reuqes men rapuop oãn a otsopsid savatse siop , sueD a etneidebo sé euq ojev áj arogA . lam muhnen saçaf ehl oãn ; oninem o artnoc oãm a setnavel oãN « : ehl-essid sueD E
» ! uotse iuqA « : uednopser etsE » ! oãarbA ! oãarbA « : ele rop uomahc ROHNES od oriegasnem o , uéc od saM
. ohlif ues o racifircas arap acaf a uorraga e oãm a uednetse oãarbA
. ahnel ad amic rop , ratla od amic me o-uocoloc e , caasI , ohlif ues o uota siopeD . eled amic rop ahnel a uodomoca e ratla mu ila uiurtsnoc oãarbA . odalaf ahnit ehl sueD euq ed ragul oa maragehC
. sotnuj rahnimac a odnaunitnoc marof E » . ohlif uem , oicífircas o arap amitív a rartnocne ed-áh sueD « : ehl-uednopser oãarbA
» ? oicífircas o arap amitív a átse euq é edno sam , ahnel a e ogof o iuqa somaveL « : uotnugrep caasI » . ohlif uem , ziD « : uednopser ele E » ! iap Ó « : oãarbA uomahc caasI
. sotnuj odnahnimac marof sobmA . acaf a e ogof o avavel oirpórp ele e oicífircas od arieugof a arap ahnel a caasI ed sorbmo soa uocoloc oãarbA
» . sóv ed otnuj arap somatlov sioped e , ROHNES o somraroda arap , oninem o moc etnaida ál éta uov ue euq orrub o moc iuqa meuqiF « : sodairc sues soa oãtne essiD
. odirefer ragul o egnol ed uiv oãarbA , megaiv ad aid oriecret oN
. caasI ohlif ues o e sodairc siod ogisnoc odnavel , aracidni ehl ROHNES o euq ragul o arap ohnimac a es-sôp e oicífircas od ogof o arap ahnel uoraperp , orrub ues on soierra so rôp arap odec es-uotnavel oãarbA , etniuges ãhnam aN
» . racidni et ue euq setnom sod mu erbos , oicífircas me ál o-ecerefo e áiroM etnom od oãiger à iav , sereuq otnat meuq a , caasI , ohlif ocinú uet o ogitnoc aveL « : uounitnoc sueD
» ! uotse iuqA « : uednopser etsE » ! oãarbA « : ele rop uomahc e oãarbA avorp à rôp siuq sueD , edrat siam sona snuglA
. opmet otium etnarud , suetsilif sod arret an adnia ueviv oãarbA
. onrete sueD o , ROHNES od emon o uocovni e , arieugramat amu , erovrá amu abehcreB me ila uotnalp oãarbA
. suetsilif sod arret a arap ovon ed marof , oticréxe ues od efehc , lociP e celemibA , abehcreB me açnaila atse odíulcnoc meret ed siopeD
. otnemaruj o marezif sobma euq ál iof euqrop , abehcreB es-ramahc a uocif ragul eleuqa , ossi roP
» . oçop etse zif euq ue iuf euq ed lanis omoc , rad sat arap ioF « : uednopser oãarbA
» ? sahlevo etes satse etrap ed etsesup euq é euq roP « : ehl-uotnugrep celemibA
. ohnaber od sahlevo etes etrap ed sôp oãarbA saM
. açnaila amu marezif missa e celemibA a siob e sahlevo uecerefo oãarbA
» . aroga res oãn a , rezid odivuo ahnit o ue men etsacinumoc om ut meN . ossi otief essevit méugla euq aibas oãn uE « : uednopser celemibA
. odarit mahnit ehl celemibA ed sovres so euq oçop mu ed celemibA a uolaf E
» . oruJ « : uednopser oãarbA
» . it a ietart et euq moc edadnob amsem a moc , sarom edno , arret atse a e mim a sáratart em euq e , setnednecsed e sohlif suem soa men mim a men , em-ranagne sáredneterp oãn euq sueD rop aroga seruj euq et-oçeP
. sezaf euq oliuqa odut me odal uet od átse sueD « : oãarbA a essid , oticréxe ues od efehc , lociP ed odahnapmoca celemibA , arutla aleuqa roP
. aicpíge rehlum amu moc o-uosac eãm A
. ocra ed rodarita res a oiev e naraP ed otresed on aiviV . odnecserc iof ele e oninem o aigetorp sueD
. oninem oa rebeb ed ued e augá ed erdo o rehcne ál ioF . oçop mu essiv ragA euq moc zef sueD
» . ovop ednarg mu a megiro êd ele euq moc rezaf ed-ieh ue siop , oãm alep meb o-aruges e oninem o avel , et-atnaveL
. átse ele edno ía , oninem od zov a uivuo sueD euqrop , odem sahnet oãN ? ragA , snet euQ « : ehl-essid e ragA rop uéc od uomahc ROHNES od ojna o e rarohc a oninem o uivuo sueD
. sotirg sotla me avarohc ale , oãhc on adatneS . ohlif o rerrom rev aireuq oãn euqrop , aicnâtsid atrec amu a es-ratnes iof e
otsubra mud oxiabed oninem o uoxied ragA . ehl-es-uobaca erdo on aizart euq augá A
. abehcreB ed otresed on es-uedrep sam , ohnimac a es-sôp alE . arobme a-uodnam e oloc oa oninem o e orbmo oa sasioc sa ehl-uocoloC . ragA a rad so arap augá ed erdo mu e adimoc racsub iof oãarbA , ãhnam alep etniuges aid oN
» . mébmat ohlif uet é lanifa euqrop , ovop ednarg mu a megiro mébmat árad avarcse ad ohlif o saM
. caasI ed áriv aicnêdnecsed aut a siop , araS ed atsoporp a ratieca sedoP . avarcse aut ad e oninem od asuac rop osotsogsed oãt seuqif oãN « : oãarbA a essid sueD saM
. ues ohlif mu ed avatart es euqrop , atsoporp a moc osotsogsed otium uocif oãarbA
» . caasI ohlif uem o moc etnematnuj oriedreh ajes aled ohlif o euq oreuq oãN . ohlif ues o e avarcse asse arobme radnam ed sneT « : oãarbA a rezid iof e
caasI moc racnirb a , ragA , aicpíge avarcse aus ad e oãarbA ed ohlif o uortnocne araS aid mU
. eteuqnab ednarg mu uecerefo oãarbA , arutla assen , e ramam ed raxied ed edadi a uogehc euq éta odnecserc iof oninem O
» . ohlif mu ied ehl adnia , adaçnava edadi ed áj ele odnes , E . sohlif ratnemama airi adnia araS euq oãarbA a airid meuQ
. mim ed asuac rop rirros ed-oãh aicíton atse merivuo euq so sodot e osirros mu mim arap uodraug sueD « : aressid araS , otiefe moC
. caasI ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona mec ahnit oãarbA
. ROHNES od adibecer medro a emrofnoc oãsicnucric a ehl-zef oãarbA , adiv ed said otio soA
. caasI ed emon o , zul à odad ahnit araS euq , ohlif ues eleuqà ued oãarbA E
. odaicnuna ahnit ehl sueD euq ona od arutla an etnematcaxe , ohlif mu zul à ued e eled adivárg uocif araS , adaçnava edadi ed áj oãarbA odneS
. oditemorp ahnit ehl euq o uirpmuc e araS a odaicnuna ahnit euq od es-uorbmel ROHNES O
. araS a odidecus ahnit euq oliuqad asuac rop , celemibA ed asac ad serehlum sa sadot sierétse odanrot ahnit ROHNES o siop
, sohlif zul à rad ovon ed maredup salE . savarcse saus sà e rehlum aus à e celemibA a edúas a uevloved sueD e , sueD ed otnuj , celemibA ed rovaf a uedecretni oãarbA
» . adan ed rasuca edop et méugnin e etneconi sátse euq suet so sodot a rartsom arap , atarp ed sadeom lim oãmri uet oa ieD « : araS a essid siopeD
» . rohlem recerap et edno ratibah sedoP . oãçisopsid aut à átse arret ahnim A « : oãarbA a adnia essid e
rehlum aus , araS ehl-uogertne e savarcse e sovarcse , siob , sahlevo oãarbA a ued celemibA
» ” . oãmri uet uos ue euq erpmes sagid , somrof edno arap seragul so sodot me , euq rovaf rop et-oçeP “ : rehlum ahnim à essid ue , airtáp ahnim ad rias zef em sueD odnauq E
. ogimoc rasac edôp ossi rop , eãm ahnim ad ahlif é oãn sam ; iap uem od ahlif é euqrop , ãmri ahnim é mébmat ale , otcaf eD
. rehlum ahnim ad asuac rop ratam em ed sezapac mare , essof missa es , E . sueD a otiepser messevit oãn arret atsen zevlat euq iesnep ue euq É « : uednopser oãarbA
» ? satsed asioc amu serezaf a uovel et euq ovitom o iof lauQ « : adnia uotnugrep celemibA
» . méugnin a zaf es oãn etsezif em ut euq oliuqA ? emirc ednarg oãt mu rop , ovop uem oa e mim a , levásnopser missa seranrot em arap it artnoc itemoc emirc euQ ! etsezif son euq o meb êV « : ehl-essid e oãarbA ramahc uodnam celemibA
. odem ed soiehc maracif sodot E . odidecus o sehl-uotnoc e etroc aus a adot uocovnoc celemibA , ãhnam alep es-ratnavel oA
» . suet so sodot e ut , azetrec a adot moc sárerrom euq rebas a acif , seragertne oãn ahl es saM . adiv aut a ravlas sassop ut euq arap , mim ed etnaid , it rop áredecretni : ateforp mu é elE . odiram ues oa rehlum asse , otnatrop , agertnE
. mim artnoc asnefo amu seretemoc oãn arap , sessacot ehl euq itimrep oãn mébmat ossi rop e edadirecnis a adot moc etsezif o euq ies meb uE « : ohnos o etnarud , adnia ehl-uednopser sueD
» . otsi zif euq oãçnetni atcer e edadirecnis a adot moc ioF . oãmri ues are ele euq essid em mébmat ale e ãmri aus are araS euq em-essid oãarbA edadrev aN
? etneconi átse euq méugla etrom à ranednoc siav euq áres , ROHNES Ó « : uednopser e ale moc seõçaler odit ahnit oãn celemibA saM
» . adasac é áj euq rehlum amu moc etsasac euqrop , etrom a moc odagitsac res siav uT « : ehl-essid e , sohnos me , celemibA a es-uotneserpa sueD , etion a etnarud saM
. araS messavel ehl euq uodnam , rareuG ed ier , celemibA E . ãmri aus odnes omoc , rehlum aus , araS uotneserpa oãarbA
, rareuG me aidatse amu etnaruD . ruhC e sédaC ertne aiviv e eveugeN od oãiger a arap ilad es-uocolsed oãarbA
. metsixe ejoh adnia mébmat euq satinoma sod odassapetna o é euq , imA-neB ed emon o ehl-ued e ohlif mu zul à ued mébmat avon siam A
. metsixe ejoh adnia euq satibaom sod odassapetna o é euq , baoM ed emon o sôp meuq a ohlif mu zul à ued ahlev siam A
. iap od sadivárg saud sa maracif missa E
. uotnavel es odnauq men uotied es ale odnauq men ossi rop essed euq mes iap o moc es-ratied iof avon siam a e ol-ádebebme a maratlov etion aleuqaN
» . setnednecsed êd son euq arap , ele moc ut semrod e etion atse mébmat ol-ádebebme somaV . iap o moc imrod euq ue iuf etion à metnO « : avon siam à essid ahlev siam a etniuges aid oN
. uotnavel es odnauq men uotied es ale odnauq men , atnoc essed es ele euq mes , ele moc uimrod ahlev siam a sioped e iap o maradebebme etion aleuqaN
» . setnednecsed êd son ele euq arap , ele moc somimrod sioped e iap osson o radebebme somaV
. etrap a adot rop ecetnoca omoc , ocsonnoc rasac arap muhnen memoh áh oãn oãiger atse adot me e ohlev átse iap osson O « : avon siam a arap ahlev siam a essid aid mU
. sahlif saud saus sa moc aturg amun reviv a uocif E . raoS me recenamrep ed odem moc avatse siop , sahlif saud saus sa ogisnoc odnavel , sahnatnom sa arap reviv iof e raoS ed uias toL
. avatibah ele edno aerá ad sedadic sa uignita euq oãçiurtsed ad toL uovlas e oãarbA ed es-uorbmel sam , oãiger aleuqad sedadic sa uiurtsed sueD
. ahlanrof amu ed ias euq omuf oa etnahlemes , arret ad ribus a omuf ed snevun ós mare euq uiv , oãiger a adot arap e arromoG e amodoS ed odal o arap uohlo odnauQ
. ROHNES o moc ralaf a odatse ahnit edno ragul oa iof e odec ãhnam ed es-uotnavel oãarbA
. las ed autátse me adamrofsnart uocif e sárt arap uohlo toL ed rehlum A
. oãçategev a adot e setnatibah sues so sodot moc oãiger a adot e sedadic saleuqa uiurtseD
. arromoG erbos e amodoS erbos ogof e erfoxne uéc od riac oãtne zef ROHNES O
. recsan a avatse loS o odnauq raoS me uortne toL
. raoS es-ramahc a uocif edadic a , ovitom etse roP » . seratse ál ut ed setna adan rezaf ossop oãn ue siop , etnemadipar alen et-aigufer oãtnE
. etsalaf euq ed edadic asse riurtsed uov oãn e odidep esse siam et-redecnoc uoV « : uednopser ele E
» ! anineuqep oãt edadic amu É . adiv a ravlas assop ue euq arap , saurtsed a oãn e ál arap ri em-axieD . raigufer ossop em edno , aneuqep etnemavitaler edadic amu omixórp iuqa áH
. rerrom e açargsed alep odahnapa res ieredop euqrop , sahnatnom san em-raigufer ossop oãn ue saM . adiv a etsavlas em amic rop adnia e ovres uet etse edadnob moc etsatart uT
! rovaf etse adnia em-zaF « : uocilper toL saM
» . odahnapa mébmat seres oãn arap sahnatnom san et-aigufeR . sazednoder salep iuqa seuqif men , sárt arap sehlo oãN ! ovlas a et-eõP « : ehl-essid soriegasnem sod mu , edadic ad rias otief meret so ed siopeD
. sol-ávlas aireuq ROHNES o siop , edadic ad arof arap son-maravel e sahlif saud sà e rehlum à , ele a , oãm alep on-mararraga setnatisiv siod so , ratiseh aicerap toL omoC
» . edadic ad ogitsac olep mébmat odahnapa res sereuq oãn es , ogitnoc adnia oãtse euq sahlif saud saut sa e rehlum aut a arof arap iuqad avel e asserped et-atnaveL « : ehl-maizid e toL moc maitsisni sueD ed soriegasnem so adagurdam eD
. racnirb a avatse toL euq marasnep sele saM » . al-íurtsed iav ROHNES o euqrop , edadic atsed maiaS « : sehl-essid e sahlif saus sa moc rasac arap mavatse euq , sorneg sorutuf sues so rasiva iof e asac ed uias toL
» . riurtsed a arap sodaivne somof són e seroiam zev adac oãs ale artnoc ROHNES oa sadigirid saxieuq sa euqrop , al-íurtsed somav , otiefe moC
. edadic atsen serevit euq o odut e sahlif e sohlif , sorneg : merecnetrep et euq seleuqa sodot moc ragul etsed iaS « : toL a maressid setnatisiv sO
. atrop a rartnocne mariugesnoc oãn e , ohlev siam oa ovon siam o edsed , toL ed asac ad atrop à mavatse euq amodoS ed snemoh so arieugec ed mariref E
. atrop a marahcef e asac ed ortned arap toL maravel setnatisiv siod so otsiN
. merabmorra a arap atrop ad es-maramixorpa , toL odnarrupme E » . sele a euq od roip et-ratart somaV . ziuj osson me et-ramra sereuq aroga e oriegnartse omoc reviv iuqa arap etseiV ! arobme et-iaV « : maracilper selE
» . asac ahnim me ogirba mararucorp sele euqrop , muhnen lam maçaf oãn snemoh seleuqà saM . meresiuq euq o odut sale moc rezaf medop e iuqa arap sa-ogart meresiuq eS . sarietlos adnia oãs euq , sahlif saud ohnet euq mebaS
! sessed emirc mu matemoc oãn , sogima suem , rovaf roP « : essid e
is ed sárta atrop a uohcef , asac aus ad adartne à uogehc toL
» . sele moc rimrod somereuq euq , arof arap ác so-adnaM ? asac aut me marartne etion atse euq snemoh so oãtse ednO « : ehl-mavatnugrep e ele rop odnatirg
, toL ed asac a maraedor , muhnen ratlaf mes , sohlev e sovon , amodoS ed edadic ad snemoh so sodot , ratied odi meret es ed setna saM
. maremoc setnatisiv so e otnemref mes seãp uezoc , seled arnoh me eteuqnab mu zef toL . ál arap es-marigirid e asac aus arap ri maratieca sele euq otnat uitsisni toL saM
» . aur an omsem somimrod són , osicerp é oãN « : marednoper sele saM » . ohnimac o raunitnoc medop ãhnam ed ãhnamA . etion a merassap e sép so meraval arap ovres ossov etsed asac me rartne marieuq , serohnes suem , rovaf roP « : sehl-essid
, oãhc oa éta etnemadnuforp es-odnanilcni , e ortnocne ues oa iof , es-uotnavel toL , ragehc sol-êv oA . edadic ad atrop à odatnes avatse toL e recedratne oa amodoS a maragehc sueD ed soriegasnem siod sO
. setna avatse edno arap uotlov oãarbA e arobme es-iof ROHNES o , oãarbA moc odalaf ret missa ed siopeD
» . zed sesse a oãçneta me , ieriurtsed a oãn mébmaT « : uednopser ROHNES O » . setneconi oãtse euq saossep zed ós metsixe ál euq somahnopuS . siam zev amu olaf ue es , eugnaz es oãn ROHNES uem o euQ « : adnia essid oãarbA
» . etniv sesse a oãçneta me , ieriurtsed a oãN « : uednopser ROHNES O » . etniv snu sanepa metsixe ál euq somahnopuS : ós asioc amu siam ierid , ROHNES uem o moc ralaf ed aidasuo a evit euq áJ « : uounitnoc oãarbA
» . atnirt sesse rartnocne ál otcaf ed es , edadic à lam oçaf oãn mébmaT « : uednopser ROHNES o E » . atnirt martnocne es ál euq somahnopus saM . ralaf a raunitnoc ue es , ragnaz áv es oãn ROHNES uem o euQ « : uitsisni oãarbA
» . atnerauq sesse a oãçneta me , edadic à lam oçaf oãn mébmaT « : uednopser ROHNES O » . setneconi oãtse euq atnerauq matsixe ál euq somahnopuS « : ehl-essid e ROHNES o moc ralaf a adnia uounitnoc oãarbA
» . edadic a ourtsed oãn mébmat , setneconi majetse euq ocnic e atnerauq rartnocne ál eS « : uednopser ROHNES O » ? ocnic ed asuac rop ós , edadic a adot riurtsed siav euq áreS . ocnic snu matlaf euq sam , atneuqnic a meb magehc oãn euq somahnopuS
. arvalap amu siam em-atimrep , arret ad óp euq od siam ajes oãn ue euq omsem , rohneS uem oa ralaf ed edadrebil a iemot euq áJ « : uounitnoc oãarbA
» . sele a oãçneta me edadic a adot a oodrep , setneconi majetse euq saossep atneuqnic amodoS ed edadic an rartnocne ue eS « : uednopser ROHNES O
» . saçnetnes saut san , otsuj res euq snet orietni odnum od ziuj o sé euq uT . asioc amsem a aires , odapluc uo etneconi res , odom esseD . odapluc o moc etnematnuj etneconi o etrom à ranednoc : sassed asioc amu rezaf sáv ut euq levíssop é oãN
? setneconi oãtse euq atneuqnic soa oãçneta me edadic a adot a raodrep ed zapac sé oãN ? amsem an al-íurtsed siav , edadic aleuqan setneconi atneuqnic snu metsixe euq somahnopuS
? sodapluc so moc etnematnuj setneconi so riurtsed siav euq áreS « : ehl-uotnugrep e ROHNES od siam es-uomixorpa oãarbA
. ROHNES od otnuj avaunitnoc oãarbA otnauqne , amodoS ed oãçcerid an es-maratsafa setnatisiv sod sioD
» . otrec oa rebas oreuQ . oãn uo edadlam aus à mednopserroc sedadic sasse artnoc marezif em euq saxieuq sa es rev arap , ál éta uoV
. sevarg otium oãs semirc sues so e sasoremun oãs arromoG e amodoS artnoc saxieuq sA « : ehl-essid ROHNES o oãtnE
» . sadirpmuc e saditnam majes zif ehl euq sassemorp sa euq arap , otsenoh e otsuj é euq o odnacitarp , ROHNES ues od edatnov a meriuges a setnednecsed e sohlif sues soa ranisne arap o-ihlocse uE
. odnum od sovop so sodot sodaoçneba oãres ele rop e osoredop e ednarg otium ovop mu ed iap o res iav oãarbA , otcaf eD
? rezaf odneterp euq oliuqa oãarbA a rednocse uov ue euq áreS « : ogisnoc arap essid ROHNES o oãtnE
. ridepsed es arap sele moc odnahnimac iof oãarbA ; amodoS a merigirid es arap es-mavaraperp e es-maratnavel setnatisiv sO
» . mis , etsirroS « : uednopser ele saM . odirros essevit euq uogen e odem moc uocif araS
» . ohlif mu zul à odad áret rehlum aut a , odived opmet od mif on , e asac aut rop rassap a ieratlov ona mu a iuqaD ? licífid oãt asioc amu é ossi , ROHNES o arap , euq áreS
? edadi atsen ohlif mu ret edop oãn áj euq odnasnep , uirros araS euq é euq roP « : oãarbA a essid ROHNES O
» ? sodasnac e sohlev somatse odiram uem o e ue es , airgela asse ritnes adnia uov ue euq é omoC « : amsem ogisnoc arap rasnep oa uirros araS oãtnE
. sohlif ret ed edadi me avatse oãn áj araS e sosodi etnatsab mare araS e oãarbA
. oãarbA ed sárt rop omsem , adnet ad adartne à asrevnoc a rivuo a avatse araS arO » . ohlif mu áret araS rehlum aut a , arutla adived an , e asac aut a ieratlov mev euq ona o araP « : essid seled mu oãtnE
» . adnet an ila átsE « : uednopser ele E » ? araS , rehlum aut a átse ednO « : ehl-maratnugrep selE
. maimoc sele otnauqne , serovrá sad oxiabed , seled otnuj oãçisopsid à uocif oirpórp ele E . etiel e agietnam adnia sehl-uecerefo , odaraperp ahnit euq oletiv o sedepsóh soa uivres siopeD
. etnemadipar uohnizoc o euq odairc mu a o-uogertne e odrog e ovon oletiv mu exuort e odag ues o arap uerroc ele E
» ! seãp snugla zaf e ahniraf rohlem ad sadidem sêrt assamA ! asserpeD « : araS a essid e adnet ad ortned arap uerroc oãarbA oãtnE
» . etsessid omoc res edoP . meb átsE « : marednopser sele E » . megaiv a meraunitnoc ed setna , saçrof sa merarepucer arap oãp racsub uov , ovres ossov etsed asac rop marassap euq áJ
. serovrá sad arbmos à sotnemom snu rasnacsed massop euq arap , sép so meraval arap augá rezart ieradnaM
. asac ahnim me ocuop mu euqif , rovaf mu rezaf reuq em rohnes uem o eS « : uomalcxe e
etnemadnuforp es-uonilcni , seled ortnocne oa uerroc , avatse edno , adnet aus ad atrop aD . eled etnaid mavatse euq sneganosrep sêrt uiv e sohlo so uotnavel oãarbA
. érbmaM ed sohlavrac sod otnuj , rolac od aroh à , adnet aus ad atrop à odatnes avatse ele odnauq , oãarbA a uecerapa ROHNES o aid mU
. oãsicnucric a ele omoc marebecer sodoT . oriehnid rop sodiriuqda odis mahnit euq soriegnartse sovarcse so omoc asac aus me sodicsan so otnat , oãarbA ed asac ad snemoh setnatser so adnia e
leamsI ohlif ues o e oãarbA oãsicnucric a marebecer , aid omsem eleuqaN
. sodadicnucric marof odnauq sona ezert ahnit leamsI e
edadi ed sona evon e atnevon ahnit oãarbA
. oriehnid rop odiriuqda ahnit euq sovarcse so sodot a omoc meb , asac aus me sodicsan so sodot a e leamsI ohlif ues oa , asac aus me mavartnocne es euq snemoh so sodot a oãsicnucric a zef oãarbA , ROHNES od arebecer euq snedro sa odnirpmuc , aid omsem eleuqaN
. eled otnuj ed es-uotsafa sueD , oãarbA moc odalaf ret ed siopeD
» . arutla atse rop , ona omixórp on , rad iav et araS euq ohlif o , caasI ed rovaf a atief áres açnaila ahnim a saM
. ovop ednarg mu oãramrof setnednecsed sues so e sefehc ezod ed iap áreS . asoremun otium aicnêdnecsed amu ehl-rad e ol-áoçneba ed-ieH . leamsI ed rovaf a odidep uet oa rednopser oreuq mébmaT
. erpmes arap setnednecsed sues so moc e ele moc açnaila rezaf ed-ieh uE . caasI ed emon o ehl-rad ed-sáh ut e uet ohlif mu ret iav araS rehlum aut a mébmat sam , miS « : essid sueD saM
» ! leamsI a adiv a sevresnoc ut álaxO « : uomalcxe oãarbA oãtnE
» ? sona atnevon soa ohlif mu ret omsem iav araS euq áreS ? sona mec ed iap mu ed ohlif mu recsan edop euq áreS « : omitní ues on odnasnep , uirros e es-uonilcni oãarbA
» . setnednecsed sues so ertne sier revah ed-áh e sovop sotium ed eãm res ed-áh adniA . uet ohlif mu ahnet ale euq moc ieraf e al-áoçneba ed-ieH
. araS sam , iaraS es-ramahc a áraunitnoc oãn áj rehlum aut A « : oãarbA a essid sueD
» . açnaila ahnim a odatiepser ret oãn rop , ovop ossov od odanimile res eved odadicnucric odis revit oãn euq eleuqa E
. oproc ossov on açnaila ahnim ad lanis o erpmes arap áres etsE . sodadicnucric res ed mêt oriehnid rop sodiriuqda marof euq so omoc , asac aut me sodicsan so otnaT
. assov ad setnerefid saçar sartuod madnecsed e oriehnid rop sodiriuqda sovarcse majes reuq , ailímaf ad sohlif majes reuq , onilucsam oxes od setnednecsed so sodot a oãsicnucric a maçaf , edadi ed said otio soA
. sóv e mim ertne açnaila ad lanis o áres oãsicnucric a e adadicnucric áres oicúperp od enrac A
. snemoh sossov so sodot a oãsicnucric a rezaf meved : atse é setnednecsed suet so sodot e it e mim ertne açnaila ad oãçagirbo a E
. erpmes arap , setnednecsed suet so e ut , açnaila ahnim à leif res mébmat seved , oãarbA , ut saM « : adnia uotnecserca sueD
» . sele arap sueD etnemlaer ieres E . ãanaC ed arret a adot , oriegnartse omoc seviv aroga edno arret a , erpmes arap , edadeirporp me sele a e it a et-rad uoV
. setnednecsed suet sod sueD o e sueD uet o iereS . anrete açnaila amu omoc , setnednecsed sorutuf suet so moc e ogitnoc açnaila ahnim a emrif retnam ed-ieH
. setnednecsed suet so ertne sier árevah e sovop soiráv rigrus ed-oãh it ed ; aicnêdnecsed emrone amu et-rad uoV
. sovop ed oãdisnemi amu ed iap sajes euq moc rezaf uov euqrop , oãarbA mis sam , oãrbA áres oãn emon uet O
. sovop ed oãdisnemi amu ed iap et-ranrot siav , ogitnoc oçaf euq açnaila ad edutriv mE «
: ele moc ralaf a uounitnoc ROHNES o e etnemadnuforp es-uonilcni oãrbA
» . asoremun otium aicnêdnecsed amu et-rad uov , ogitnoc açnaila amu recelebatse uov uE
. oãditcer moc edatnov ahnim a erpmuc ; omerpus sueD o uos uE « : ehl-essid e ehl-uecerapa ROHNES o , edadi ed sona evon e atnevon ahnit oãrbA odnauQ
. leamsI ohlif ues o zul à ued ragA odnauq , edadi ed sona sies e atnetio ahnit oãrbA
. leamsI ed emon o ehl-sôp , iap ues , oãrbA e ohlif mu zul à ued ragA
. deréB e sédaC ertne es-artnocne e » ioR-iahaL ed etnecsaN « ramahc a uocif es etnecsan aleuqa , ossi roP
» ! êv em euq sueD o sé uT « : ale moc odalaf ahnit euq , ROHNES oa essid E » ? mim a êv em euq eleuqa otsiv ue iereT « : uomalcxe ragA
» . sohniziv e soãmri sues so sodot ed açneserp an reviv áriugesnoc saM . ele moc atul me sortuo so e sortuo so moc atul me erpmes , megavles lamina mu omoc áreS
. otnemirfos uet oa oãçneta uotserp ROHNES o euqrop , leamsI ehl-ramahc ed-sáh ; ohlif mu zul à rad siav e adivárg sátse uT « : adnia ehl-uoralced ROHNES od ojna O
» . ratnoc áredop so méugnin euq sosoremun oãt setnednecsed suet so ranrot ed-ieH « : adnia uotnecserca E
» . ehl-ecedebo e arohnes aut a arap atloV « : uiuqroter ROHNES od ojna o saM
» . arohnes ahnim a , iaraS ed asac ed iguF « : uednopser alE » ? siav edno arap e snev edno ed , iaraS ed avarcse , ragA « : ehl-uotnugrep e
, ruhC arap ohnimac on átse euq etnof a etnemasicerp , otresed on , etnof amu ed otnuj a-uortnocne ROHNES od ojna O
. riguf ed evet ale euq arienam lat ed al-áhlimuh a uoçemoc iaraS E » . recerap et rohlem euq oliuqa aled zaF . avarcse aut a res a adnia aunitnoc alE « : iaraS a uednopser oãrbA
» ! it e mim ertne oãtseuq atsen ziuj o ajes ROHNES o euQ . levásnopser sé mébmat ut e ogimoc arap açitsujni amu é otsI . ozerpsed moc ahlo em áj adivárg átse euq uiv euq aroga e soçarb suet son avarcse ahnim a sup uE « : oãrbA a oãtne essid iaraS
. arohnes aus a ozerpsed moc rahlo a uoçemoc , adivárg avatse euq rebas oa , arO . adivárg uocif ale e ragA moc seõçaler evet oãrbA
. rehlum adnuges omoc oãrbA a ragA avarcse aus a ued oãrbA ed rehlum iaraS , ãanaC me reviv a áj meratse ed sioped sona zed , missa E
. iaraS ed atsoporp a moc uodrocnoc oãrbA » . mim rop ohlif mugla rad assop et avarcse ahnim a zevlat saM . sohlif ret ed edadilibissop a ued em oãn ROHNES O « : oãrbA a essid iaraS oãtnE
. ragA adamahc , aicpíge avarcse amu ahnit ale arO . ohlif muhnen odad ahnit ehl oãn , oãrbA ed rehlum , iaraS
» . suesubej sod e suesagriug sod ; suenanac sod , suerroma sod
, satíafer sod , suezirep sod , satitih sod
, suenomdac sod , suezineuq sod , satineuq sod oirótirret o sehl-rad uov , é otsI
. setarfuE oir ednarg oa éta otpigE od ariebir a edsed , setnednecsed suet soa arret atse rad uoV « : essid e oãrbA moc açnaila amu uecelebatse ROHNES o aid omsem eleuqaN
. sodidivid siamina so ertne rassap a aseca ahcot amu e etnagemuf orieragof mu oãtne es-uiV . oãdirucse a oiev e loS o es-sôp otsiN
» . odicerem ogitsac o merebecer arap etimil oa éta maragehc oãn adnia suerroma sod sapluc sa aroga siop , iuqa arap ratlov ed-oãh setnednecsed suet so , oãçareg atrauq aN
. sodassapetna suet sod otnuj zap me rasnacsed sári e adaçnava edadi me zilef sárerrom , it a otnauQ
. sazeuqir satium moc rias oãredop , mif on , e razivarcse iav so euq ovop o ragitsac ed-ieh omsem ue saM
. sona sotnecortauq etnarud sol-áhlimuh e sol-ázivarcse ed-oãh e aus a é oãn euq arret amun soriegnartse omoc reviv ed-oãh setnednecsed suet so euq rebas a aciF « : ehl-essid sueD oãtnE
. levírret e emrone odem mu uitnes e oãrbA erbos uiac aicnêlonos emrone amu , recedratne oA
. so-avatsafa oãrbA sam , sotrom siamina sod soproc so erbos es-mavaçnal sertuba sO
. seva sa uidivid oãn óS . etnerf a etnerf saled amu adac odnacoloc , sedatem saud me so-uotroc e siamina seleuqa exuort oãrbA
» . obmop mu e alor amu adnia e , sona sêrt moc sodot , orienrac mu e otirbac mu , aletiv amu em-zarT « : uednopser ROHNES O
» ? edadeirporp ahnim áres ale euq oruges ratse ossop ue euq é omoc , sueD uem , ROHNES Ó « : uotnugrep oãrbA
» . aut edadeirporp omoc arret atse rad et arap , suedlac sod arret an , rU ed rias zif et euq , ROHNES o uos uE « : siam ehl-essid sueD
. otsuj omoc uotieca o ROHNES o ossi rop e ROHNES on uoifnoc oãrbA
» . setnednecsed suet sod oremún o áres missa sioP . salertse sa ratnoc sedop es êv e uéc o arap ahlO « : ehl-essid e asac ed arof arap oãrbA rias uodnam sueD
» . oriedreh uet o áres euq é sahnartne saut sad rias euq eleuqa ; oriedreh uet o esse áres oãN « : ehl-uednopser ROHNES o saM
» . oriedreh uem o res iav euq é uem odairc mu euq e sohlif etsed em oãn euq meb sebaS « : uitsisni oãrbA
» ? asac ahnim ad onod res iav euq é , ocsamaD ed , rezéilE e sohlif mes odnum etsed ritrap uov ue es , em-rad ut sedop euq , sueD uem , ROHNES Ó « : uednopser oãrbA
» . asnepmocer ednarg amu ret siav e ; rotcetorp uet o uos ue ; oãrbA samet oãN « : ehl-essid e oãsiv amun oãrbA a uecerapa ROHNES o , otsid siopeD
» . etrap aus a rariter a otierid mêt , otcaf ed , selE . érbmaM e locsE , renA , mim a maratnuj es euq seleuqa otierid mêt euq a etrap a e maremoc áj sovres suem so euq oliuqa oreuq ós , mim araP
. oãrbA a etseceuqirne euq ut etsof euq sagid euq oreuq oãN . sotapas so ratrepa arap oãdroc mu men , oif mu men , mim arap adan oreuq oãn uet é euq oliuqad euq
, arret ad e uéc od rodairc , omissítla sueD , ROHNES o arap adiugre oãm a moc , oruJ « : amodoS ed ier oa uednopser oãrbA
» . sele moc acif , sneb soa otnauq ; saossep sa ós em-áD « : uocilper amodoS ed ier o saM
. odarepucer odis ahnit euq o odut ed etrap amicéd a ehl-ued oãrbA » ! sogimini suet so erbos airótiv a ued et euq , omissítla sueD o ajes odavuoL
! oãrbA eoçneba , arret ad e uéc od rodairc , omissítla sueD o euQ « : sarvalap satse moc o-uooçneba e
ohniv e oãp ogisnoc odnavel uotneserpa es , omissítla sueD od etodrecas are euq , mélaS ed ier , cedesiuqleM mébmaT
. ieR od elav o é euq , évahC ed elav on rebecer o arap uias amodoS ed ier o , sodaila sues sier so e remoalrodaC odacata ret ed sioped , avasserger oãrbA odnauQ
. sorienoisirp setnatser e serehlum sa moc etnematnuj , sneb sues so moc , ohnirbos ues , toL uotrebil e sneb so sodot uorepuceR
. ocsamaD ed etron o arap acif euq , aboH éta seled oãçiugesrep me odnaunitnoc , etion a etnarud so-uecnev e sopurg me snemoh sues so uidivid , racata so araP
. naD éta sogimini sod oãçiugesrep me iof e , otiozed e sotnezert ed oremún me , asac aus me sodicsan , sodatnemirepxe siam sovres sues so uomra oãrbA , orienoisirp otief odis ahnit ohnirbos ues o euq rivuo oA
. açnaila otief ahnit oãrbA siauq so moc , renA ed e locsE ed etnerap are etsE . érbmaM uerroma od sohlavrac son reviv a avatse euq , uerbeh o , oãrbA a otcaf o raicnuna iof ovitiguf mu otnatertnE
. amodoS me aiviv toL siop , sneb sues so sodot moc , toL , oãrbA ed ohnirbos o mébmat maraveL
. arobme es-marof e sotnemila sues so sodot moc arromoG ed e amodoS ed sazeuqir sa maraeuqas setnacata sO
. sahnatnom sa arap mariguf setnatser sO . seled ortned maríac arromoG ed e amodoS ed sier so , meriguf oa , e emuteb ed soçop ed oiehc avatse midiS ed elav O
. ocnic artnoc sier ortauq mare latot muN . rasalE ed ier , coirA e raniS ed ier , lefaremA , mioG ed ier , ladiT , malE ed ier , remoalrodaC
, midiS ed elav on retabmoc maroF . arreug a arap marías , raoS ejoh é euq , aleB e miobeS , ámdA , arromoG , amodoS ed sier so saM
. ramaT-noçaH me matibah euq suerroma sod a e saticelama sod oãiger a adot maretembus e , sédaC , é otsi , tapsiM-nE arap maratlov siopeD
. otresed od adartne à átse euq , naraP-lE éta so-odniugesrep , rieS ed sahnatnom san satirroh so e
miatairiuQ-évahC me satime so , maH me satizuz so e mianraC-toratsA me satíafer so maratorred e sodaila sier so moc etnematnuj remoalrodaC uogehc , ona otrauq omicéd oN
. es-maratlover ona oriecret omicéd on sam , remoalrodaC a sotiejus ratse maratieca , sona ezod etnaruD
. laS ed raM o acif edno , midiS ed elav on soticréxe sues so maratnuj somitlú setsE
. raoS mébmat amahc es lauq a , aleB ed edadic ad ier oa e , miobeS ed ier , rebémehC a e , ámdA ed ier , baniS a , arromoG ed ier , áhcriB a , amodoS ed ier , areB a arreug marezif
, mioG ed ier , ladiT e , malE ed ier , remoalrodaC , rasalE ed ier , coirA , raniS ed ier , lefaremA
. ROHNES od arnoh me ratla mu ál uiurtsnoc e , norbeH me , érbmaM ed sohlavrac so arap reviv iof e otnemapmaca o uotnavel oãrbA
» . uod a ue euq it a é siop , seõçcerid sa sadot me arret atse rerrocrep sedop arogA
. setnednecsed suet so ratnoc áriugesnoc méugnin , odom omsem oD . arret ad óp ed soãrg so ratnoc eugesnoc méugniN . arret ad óp o omoc sosoremun oãt majes setnednecsed suet so euq moc ieraF
. erpmes arap , setnednecsed suet soa e it a uod ot ue rev a sátse euq síap etse odoT
! etnedico arap e etneiro arap , lus arap e etron arap ahlo sartnocne et euq me ragul etseD « : oãrbA a essid ROHNES o , odarapes ret es toL ed siopeD
. ROHNES od edatnov à sairártnoc seõçca maitemoc e suam mare amodoS ed setnatibah so saM
. amodoS ed otnuj adnet aus a ratnom iof e oãdroJ od elav od sedadic san aiviv toL e ãanaC ed arret an aiviv oãrbA
. ortuo od mu mararapes es missa E . etneiro arap es-uohnimacne e oãdroJ od elav o , ossi rop , uehlocse toL
. arromoG e amodoS odíurtsed ret sueD ed setna iof otsI . raoS ed oãiger à éta es-odnednetse , otpigE oa etnahlemes , osohlivaram midraj mu omoc are e augá etnatsab ahnit : oãdroJ od elav o arap uohlo toL
» . adreuqse a arap uov ue , atierid a arap serof es e atierid a arap uov ue , adreuqse a arap serof eS . mim ed serapes et euq et-oçeP . rehlocse seredop arap oãçisopsid aut à orietni síap o sneT
. ailímaf amsem ad somos euqrop , serotsap sosson so ertne men són ertne sotnemidnetnesed ritsixe meved oãN « : toL a essid oãrbA oãtnE
. síap on mébmat mavatibah suezirep so e suenanac so arutla aleuqan , ossid mélA . toL ed so e oãrbA ed serotsap so ertne sotilfnoc siop marigruS
. ahnit áj seled mu adac euq azeuqir a arap etneicifus oçapse aivah oãn euqrop , sotnuj ratibah maidop oãn , ossi roP
. sadnet satium e sacav ed e sahlevo ed sohnaber aíussop , oãrbA avahnapmoca euq , toL mébmaT
. ROHNES oa otluc uotserp ila e ratla mu odíurtsnoc ál ahniT
. iA e leteB ertne , adnet aus a etnemroiretna odacoloc ahnit edno ragul o arap , leteB arap eveugeN od odnajaiv iof siopeD
. oruo e atarp , sohnaber sednarg aíussop oãrbA
. eveugeN o arap es-marahnimacne e , toL rop adnia odahnapmoca , aicnetrep ehl euq o odut moc e rehlum aus a moc otpigE od uias oãrbA
. aicnetrep ehl euq o odut moc e rehlum aus a moc oãrbA otpigE od rias merezaf arap snemoh snugla uodnam óaraf O
» . al-ável sedop , snet a iuqa , rehlum aut é euq zev amu saM . ale moc iesac ue e ãmri aut are euq etsessiD
? rehlum aut are ale euq etsessid em oãn euq roP ? satsed asioc amu etsezif euq é euq roP « : ehl-uotnugrep e oãrbA ramahc uodnam óaraf o oãtnE
. oãrbA ed rehlum , iaraS ed asuac rop , ailímaf aus à e óaraf oa sogitsac sednarg uigilfni ROHNES O
. oçivres ues oa sadairc e sodairc ahnit e solemac e satnemuj , sorrub , sacav e sahlevo ed sohnaber uojnarrA . aled asuac rop odatart meb iof , odal ues rop , oãrbA
. óaraf od oicálap o arap adavel iof oãrbA ed rehlum a missa E . óaraf od otnuj al-áigole marof e óaraf od siaicifo so mébmat an-mariV
. atinob otium are ale euq mararaper , otcaf ed , soicpíge so , otpigE oa meragehc oA
» . it a saçarg , oviv raunitnoc assop e , asuac aut rop , odatart meb ajes ue euq arap , ãmri ahnim sé euq otnatrop ziD
. ogitnoc meracif arap ratam em ed sezapac oãs e rehlum ahnim sé euq ogol mezid , meriv et soicpíge so odnauQ
. atinob otium rehlum amu sé ut euq ies uE « : rehlum aus , iaraS a essid , otpigE oa ragehc a esauq áj avatse odnauQ
. opmet mugla ál rop racif arap , otpigE o arap es-uohnimacne oãrbA e ãanaC me emof levírret amu oãtne evuoH
. eveugeN oa oãçcerid me odnaçnava iof siopeD
. otluc ehl-uotserp e ROHNES od arnoh me ratla mu ál uiurtsnoC . etneiro a iA e etnedico a leteB odnaxied , adnet aus a uotnom e etneiro a átse euq ahnatnom à oãçcerid me uitrap ilaD
. odicerapa ahnit ele edno ragul on , ROHNES od arnoh me ratla mu uiurtsnoc oãrbA E » . setnednecsed suet soa arret atse rad uoV « : ehl-essid e oãrbA a uecerapa sueD ilA
. suenanac so mare síap o avatibah meuq , opmet eleuqaN . éroM ed adargas erovrá ad otnuj , méuqiS éta síap o odnassevarta iof oãrbA
, ãanaC ed arret à maragehc odnauQ . ãanaC ed arret ad ohnimac a marof e naraH me ele arap avahlabart euq etneg a e maíussop euq sneb so sodot siam , ohnirbos ues , toL e iaraS rehlum aus a ogisnoc uoveL
. naraH ed uias odnauq edadi ed sona ocnic e atnetes ahnit oãrbA . ele moc iof toL e , odanedro ahnit ehl ROHNES o omoc lat , ohnimac a es-sôp oãrbA
» . odnum od sovop so sodot sodaoçneba oãres it ed sévarta E . meraoçidlama et euq so raoçidlama e meraoçneba et euq so raoçneba ed-ieH
. ovop ednarg mu it ed ieraF
. rartsom uov et ue euq arret a arap iav e iap uet od asac a e setnerap suet so , arret aut a axieD « : oãrbA a essid ROHNES O
. naraH me uerrom e edadi ed sona ocnic e sotnezud soa éta ueviv areT
. rarom a ál maracif e naraH a maragehc saM . ãanaC ed arret a arap meri ed otiutni o moc , oãrbA ed rehlum e aron aus , iaraS e , oten ues , naraH ed ohlif , toL e , ohlif ues , oãrbA ogisnoc odnavel , aiedlaC an , rU ed uias areT oãtnE
. sohlif ret aiugesnoc oãn e lirétse are iaraS saM
. acsiJ ed ãmri e naraH ed ahlif , acliM are roaN ed rehlum a e iaraS es-avamahc oãrbA ed rehlum A . es-marasac roaN e oãrbA
. aiedlaC ad edadic , rU me , latan arret aus an , iap ues , areT ed setna uerrom naraH
. toL ed iap iof naraH E . naraH e roaN , oãrbA ed iap iof areT . areT ed setnednecsed sod atsil a é atsE
. naraH e roaN , oãrbA : sohlif sêrt evet areT , edadi ed sona atnetes sod siopeD
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona evonazed e otnec adnia ueviv roaN , areT ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. areT ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq sona evon e etniv ahnit roaN
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona sotnezud adnia ueviv gureS , roaN ed otnemicsan od sioped , E
. roaN ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona atnirt ahnit gureS
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona etes e sotnezud adnia ueviv úeR , gureS ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. gureS ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona siod e atnirt ahnit úeR
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona evon e sotnezud adnia ueviv geleP , úeR ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. úeR ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona atnirt ahnit geleP
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona atnirt e sotnecortauq adnia ueviv rebéH , geleP ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. geleP ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona ortauq e atnirt ahnit rebéH
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e rebéH ed otnemicsan od sioped , sona sêrt e sotnecortauq adnia ueviv alehC
. rebéH ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq edadi ed sona atnirt ahnit alehC
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona sêrt e sotnecortauq adnia ueviv , alehC ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. alehC ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq sona ocnic e atnirt ahnit daxafrA
. sahlif e sohlif ed iap iof e sona sotnehniuq adnia ueviv meS , daxafrA ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. oivúlid od sioped sona siod , daxafrA ohlif ues o uecsan odnauq , sona mec ahnit meS . meS ed setnednecsed sod atsil a é atsE
. odnum o odot rop uosrepsid so euq ál ed iof e edadinamuH ad saugníl sa uidnufnoc sueD euq ál iof euqrop , lebaB es-ramahc a uocif edadic aleuqa , ossi roP
. edadic a riurtsnoc ed maritsised sele e odnum o odot rop uosrepsid so , ROHNES o , amrof atsed E
» . sortuo soa snu madnetne oãn es sele euq odom ed , saugníl saus sa ridnufnoc oxiab ál uoV
. rezaf meratcejorp euq oliuqa merezaf ed ridepmi áredop so siam méugnin sioped e otsi rezaf a es-maresup arogA . augníl amsem a sodot malaf e ovop ós mu oãs selE « : ogisnoc arap oãtne essid e
riurtsnoc a mavatse snemoh so euq errot a e edadic a rev arap , uecsed ROHNES O
» . odnum olep rasrepsid son ed somahnet euq setna sosomaf racif ed somet siop , uéc oa éta eugehc euq errot ednarg amu moc edadic amu riurtsnoc somav , arogA « : maressid siopeD
. assamagra ad sezev sa aizaf emuteb o e ardep ed sehl-maivres solojit sO » ! onrof on sol-êzoc e solojit rezaf somaV « : sortuo so arap snu oãtne maressiD
. maraxif es edno aimâtoposeM an eicínalp amu a maragehc e , etneiro od odnias , ohnimac a es-maresup , arutla atrec a saM
. sarvalap samsem sa mavasu sodot e augníl acinú amu avalaf edadinamuH a opmet eleuqaN
. oivúlid od sioped , odnum od sovop so sodot mavired euq sailímaf satsed É . sovop sod mu adac ed aicnêdnecsed ed ahnil a emrofnoc , éoN ed setnednecsed sod sailímaf sa oãs satsE
. sovop e seõçan , sailímaf rop sodidivid , meS ed setnednecsed so oãs setsE
. etneiro a , asohnatnom oãiger an , rafeS éta asseM edsed maidnetse es euq soirótirret son mavatibaH
. natcoJ ed sohlif mare setse sodoT . baboJ , álivaH , rifO
, ábaS , leamibA , labO
, alciD , lazU , marodaH
, araJ , tevamraçaH , feléhC , dadomlA ed iap iof natcoJ
. natcoJ es-avamahc ortuo o e , arret alep uosrepsid es edadinamuH a opmet ues on euqrop , geleP es-avamahc mu : sohlif siod ed iap iof rebéH
. rebéH ed iap iof alehC e alehC ed iap iof daxafrA
. sáM e retéuG , luH , ecU oãs marA ed sohliF
. marA e duL , daxafrA , russA , malE oãs meS ed sohliF
. meS ed setnednecsed oãs rebéH ed sohlif so sodoT . sohlif mébmat evet , tefaJ ed ohlev siam oãmri o , meS
. sovop e seõçan , saugníl , sailímaf rop sodidivid , maC ed setnednecsed so setse oãS
. ahceL e miobeS , ámdA , arromoG , amodoS éta , azaG ed omixórp , rareuG a oãçcerid me nodíS edsed es-aidnetse oirótirret ues O
. ãanaC ed setnednecsed ed sopurg so es-marasrepsid , ossid sioped E . suetamah e suerames , suedavra sod
, suenis e sueuqara , sueveh
, suesagriug , suerroma , suesubej sod adnia e
, teH ed e , ohlif oriemirp ues , nodíS ed iap o iof ãanaC
. aterC ed setnatibah sod e , suetsilif so mêvorp ednod , ulsaC ed , sortaP ed setnatibah sod adnia e
utfaN ed e baeL ed , ménA ed , duL ed setnatibah sod odassapetna o iof miarsiM
. edadic ednarg a are euq , álaC e eviníN ertne , nesséR e
álaC , rI-toboeR e eviníN ed edadic a uiurtsnoc e airíssA a erbos oinímod ues o uednetse ilaD
. aimâtoposeM an odlaC e curU , ainólibaB ed sedadic sa erbos etnemariemirp ranier a uoçemoC
» . doremiN omoc rodaçac etnelav mu açaf o ROHNES o euQ « : ejoh adnia zid es , ossi roP . ROHNES od aduja a moc , rodaçac etnelav mu mébmat ioF
. uitsixe euq efehc ednarg oriemirp o iof euq , doremiN ed iap adnia iof ehcuC
. nadeD e ábaS marof amaR ed sohliF . acetbaS e amaR , atbaS , álivaH , abeS marof ehcuC ed sohliF
. ãanaC e tuP , miarsiM , ehcuC marof maC ed sohlif sO
. augníl aus a e oirótirret ues o mu adac meussop e megiro aus a emrofnoc sodapurga oãtse sovop setsE . sahli sad setnatibah so sodot mavired seleD
. minadoR e mitiuQ , sisráT , áhcilE marof navaJ ed sohliF
. amragoT e tafiR , zaneuqsA marof remoG ed sohliF
. sáriT e cehceM , labuT , navaJ , iadaM , gogaM , remoG marof tefaJ ed sohlif sO
. oivúlid od sioped áj marecsan sehl euq sohlif sod e tefaJ e maC , meS , éoN ed sohlif sod setnednecsed so oãs setsE
. edadi ed sona atneuqnic e sotnecevon moc uerroM
. sona atneuqnic e sotnezert adnia ueviv éoN , oivúlid od siopeD
» ! ovarcse ed avris sehl ãanaC euq e meS ed setnednecsed sod otnuj etibah ele euQ . tefaJ recserc açaf sueD euQ
. meS ed ovarcse ajes ãanaC euq e ; meS ed sueD , ROHNES o ajes otidneB « : uounitnoc E
» ! soãmri sues sod sovarcse sod omitlú o áres elE . ãanaC ajes otidlaM « : essid
, ovon siam ohlif o otief ahnit ehl euq o ebuos e ohniv olep odacovorp onos od uodroca éoN odnauQ
. un merev oãn o arap , ele arap satsoc ed erpmes odnatse , iap o marirboc missA . ele arap sadariv satsoc ed odnahnimac , iap od es-maramixorpa , sorbmo so erbos rop a-odnatnavel , e apuor ed açep amun maragep tefaJ e meS saM
. adnet ad arof mavatse euq soãmri siod sues soa osac o ratnoc iof e un iap o uiv , ãanaC ed iap , maC
. adnet aus ad ortned etnematelpmoc es-uipsed e odebêb uocif , ohniv uebeb oãisaco atreC
. ahniv a ravitluc a oriemirp o e rotlucirga iof éoN
. seled setnednecsed oãs arret ad setnatibah so sodot e sêrt setse ós oãs éoN ed sohliF
. ãanaC ed iap o iof maC . tefaJ e maC , meS mare acra ad marías euq éoN ed sohlif sO
» . arret an metsixe euq soviv seres so sodot moc oçelebatse ue euq açnaila ad lanis o é etsE « : éoN a odnezid uiulcnoc sueD E
» . arret an eviv euq o odut moc , soviv seres so sodot e mim ertne etsixe euq , anrete açnaila atsed em-radrocer ed-ieh e ele arap rahlo ed-ieh ue , snevun san recerapa lanis o odnauQ
. soviv seres so riurtsed a oivúlid muhnen siam árevah oãn missa E . metsixe euq soviv seres so sodot moc e ocsovnoc zif euq açnaila ad rarbmel em arap áres
, snevun san sirí-ocra o recerapa e arret a erbos snevun recerapa rezif ue odnauQ
. arret a e mim ertne açnaila ed lanis o áres esse e snevun san sirí-ocra uem o racoloc ed-ieH
. erpmes o odot arap , ocsovnoc oãtse euq soviv seres so sodot e sóv e mim ertne recelebatse uov ue euq açnaila ad lanis o áres etsE « : uounitnoc sueD E
» . arret a riurtsed a oivúlid muhnen siam árevah oãn sioP . oivúlid od saugá salep rerrom a áratlov oviv res muhnen siam e ocsovnoc açnaila asse erpmes retnam ed-ieH
. arret an meritsixe euq so sodot e acra ad marías aroga euq so , snegavles e socitsémod siamina , seva , ocsovnoc oãtse euq soviv seres so sodot a árednetse es euq
, setnednecsed sossov so moc e ocsovnoc açnaila ed otcap mu rezaf uoV «
: sohlif sues soa e éoN a essid sueD
» . an-menimod e arret alep es-meugaporp , maçserc e sietréf majes sêcov a otnauQ
. sueD ed megami omoc odairc iof onamuh res o siop , adiv a árarit ehl memoh ortuo , memoh mu a adiv a arit euq eleuqÀ
. etnahlemes ues mu a adiv a odarit ahnet euq mu reuqlauq a satnoc ierideP . eugnas ossov od satnoc ieridep ue , memoh ajes , lamina ajes , adiv a odarit revit sov euq eleuqa odot a sioP
. adiv ad esab a é euq , eugnas o oriemirp rarit ehl mes enrac a remoc meved oãn saM
. oãçisopsid assov à acif ossi oduT . ied sov euq satnalp e sarudrev sad omoc missa soviv siamina so sodot ed remoc medoP
. redop ossov oa sotiejus macif sele sodoT . sóv ed etnaid odem ed remert ed-oãh ram od sexiep so e arret an evom es euq o odut , seva sa e snegavles siamina so sodoT
. arret a mahcne e maçserc , sietréf majeS « : sehl-essid e sohlif sues so e éoN uooçneba sueD
» . etion e aid , onrevnI e oãreV , rolac e oirf , atiehloc e arietnemes ratlaf ed-áh siam acnun , ritsixe odnum o otnauqnE
. zev atsed zif omoc soviv seres so sodot ragitsac a siam ieratlov oãn saM . aicnâfni a edsed seõçanilcni sám mêt sele euq otrec É . sonamuh seres sod asuac rop , arret a raoçidlama a siam ieratlov oãN « : ogisnoc arap uosnep ROHNES o , oicífircas eleuqad levádarga emufrep o ritnes oA
. sarup seva samugla e sorup siamina snugla ratla esse erbos oicífircas me uecerefo e ROHNES od arnoh me ratla mu zef éoN
. sailímaf setnerefid saus sa emrofnoc , arret an evom es euq o odut , seva , sohcib , siamina so sodot acra ad mébmat maríaS
. saron sa e rehlum a , sohlif sues so moc uias éoN
» . maçserc e sietréf majes euq , arret alep meugaporp es sele euQ . arret ad sohcib ed eicépse a adot e siamina , seva , ogitnoc oãtse euq soviv seres ed seicépse sa sadot ogitnoc rias mébmat zaF
. saron saut sa e sohlif suet so , rehlum aut a e ut , acra ad rias sedoP «
: éoN a oãtne essid sueD
. aces avatse áj arret a sêm odnuges od etes e etniv aid oN
. races a avatse arret a euq uoraper e acrab ad arutreboc a uoriter éoN . arret a erbos odicerapased mahnit áj saugá sa , edadi ed sona mu e sotnecsies ahnit éoN odnauq , ona od sêm oriemirp od aid oriemirp oN
. acra a arap siam uotlov oãn áj ale zev atsed sam , abmop a ovon ed uotlos e said etes sortuo uorepsE
. etnatsab odaxiab mahnit áj saugá sa euq rebas a , ossi rop , uocif éoN . ocib on arievilo ed omar mu moc éoN ed otnuj arap uosserger abmop a , ahnidrat aleP
. abmop a radnam a uotlov e said etes adnia uorepsE
. acra ad ortned arap ovon ed a-uovel e alen uogep , oãm a uednetse éoN . arret a mairboc adnia saugá sa euqrop , acra an , éoN ed otnuj arap ovon ed uotlov e rasiop edno ragul adnia uortnocne oãn mébmat abmop a saM
. saxiab etnemetneicifus mavatse áj saugá sa es rev arap , abmop amu sioped uodnam éoN
. arret a erbos aivah euq saugá sa meraces éta , ortuo o arap odal mud raov a uodna ele e ovroc mu arof arap uodnam
, acra an otief ahnit euq alenaj a uirba éoN , sioped said atnerauQ
. setnom sod somic so maiv es áj sêm omicéd od aid oriemirp on e raxiab a maraunitnoc saugá sa , sêm omicéd oa étA
. ona od sêm omités od etessazed aid o arE . tararA ed sahnatnom san oãtne uosiop acra A
. odíunimid mahnit áj said atneuqnic e otnec ed mif oa e ocuop e ocuop a odnaucer marof arret a erbos mavatse euq saugá sA
. riac ed uoxied avuhc a e es-marahcef uéc od satropmoc sa e odnuforp ram od setnof sA
. raxiab a uoçemoc augá a oãtne e arret a erbos essarpos otnev o euq moc zef e , acra an ele moc mavartnocne es euq , socitsémod e snegavles siamina sod men éoN ed ueceuqse es oãn sueD
. said atneuqnic e otnec etnarud , arret a marirboc saugá sA
. acra an ele moc mavatse euq seres so e éoN uocif óS . sodíurtsed marof sodoT . seva e sohcib , siamina , snemoh , arret a erbos maitsixe euq seres so sodot uiurtsed oivúlid o missa E
. uerrom emrif arret me aiviv e oãçaripser e adiv ahnit euq o oduT
. sonamuh seres so sodot e sohcib so sodot , snegavles e socitsémod siamina , seva , odnum on maitsixe euq , soviv seres so sodot marerroM
. satreboc sadot maracif sahnatnom sa e saled amic arap sortem etes ed siam mavassaP
. metsixe euq satla siam sahnatnom sa éta marirboc euq , otnat maribus saugá sA
. saugá sad amic rop avautulf acra a , arret ad amica otium uibus saugá sad levín o odnauQ
. olos od egnol etnatsab uocif euq , acra a maratnavel e odnibus maroF . arret a erbos maríac oivúlid od saugá sa , said atnerauq etnaruD
. atrop a uohcef ROHNES o , mif oN . odadnam ahnit sueD omoc lat , eicépse adac ed aemêf amu e ohcam mu arE
. éoN ed otnuj arap , acra an serap soa marartne soviv seres so sodot eD
. seva ed seicépse sadairav siam sad e sohcib so sodot ed , snegavles e socitsémod siamina , soviv seres ed seicépse sa sadot ed seralpmexe adnia e
, saron sêrt sa e rehlum aus a moc e , sohlif sues , tefaJ e maC , meS moc acra an uortne éoN , aid omsem eleuqaN
. setion atnerauq e said atnerauq etnarud , arret a erbos uiac avuhc A
. uéc od satropmoc sa marirba es e odnuforp ram ednarg od setnecsan sa maratneber euq oãtne ioF . edadi ed sona sotnecsies moc avatse éoN e ona od sêm odnuges od etessazed aid o arE
. arret a erbos riac a maraçemoc oivúlid od saugá sa , said etes sod mif oN
. odadnam ahnit ehl sueD omoc lat , acra an , éoN ed otnuj arap , aemêf e ohcam , serap soa marartne
, sohcib so sodot ed e seva sad , sorup oãn e sorup siamina soD
. oivúlid oa meriguf arap , saron saus sa e rehlum aus a moc e sohlif sues so moc acra an uortnE
. arret a uodnuni oivúlid o odnauq , sona sotnecsies ahnit éoN
. odadnam ahnit ehl ROHNES o euq o odut zef éoN
» . odnum etsen ieirc euq seres so sodot ieriurtsed e setion atnerauq e said atnerauq etnarud arret a erbos aiac avuhc a euq moc rezaf uov , said etes a iuqaD
. raunitnoc assop arret a erbos adiv a euq arap , aemêf e ohcam , serap etes etnemlaugi sáravel seva saD
. sorup oãn siamina sod , aemêf e ohcam , rap ós mu e sorup siamina so sodot ed , aemêf e ohcam , serap etes ogitnoc aveL
. soenâropmetnoc suet so sodot ertne iertnocne euq atsenoh aossep acinú a etsof ut siop , ailímaf aut a adot moc acra an artnE « : éoN a essid ROHNES O
. rezaf odadnam ahnit ehl sueD omoc etnematcaxe odut zef éoN E
» . siamina so sodot arap e it arap seõsivorp omoc , remoc amutsoc eicépse adac euq adimoc ed sopit setnerefid so ranezamra e rahnapa seveD
. reviverbos meredop arap ogitnoc seralpmexe siod oãri , siamina sortuo uo sedepúrdauq , seva majes soviv seres ed etnerefid eicépse adac ed , otnatroP
. ogitnoc etnematnuj reviverbos meredop arap , aemêf e ohcam , seralpmexe siod acra a arap ravel seved soviv seres ed seicépse sa sadot ed E
. sohlif suet sod sa e rehlum aut a , sohlif suet so e ut , acra an rartne seveD . açnaila ed otcap mu ieraf ogitnoc saM
. rerrom iav arret an áh euq o odut ; odnum on metsixe euq soviv seres so sodot riurtsed arap , augá ed oivúlid mu arret a erbos riac rezaf uov ue , otiefe moC
. sotsoperbos seradna sêrt moc al-êzaf seveD . odal ed atrop amu e omic od ortem oiem a aióbaralc amu ehl-zaF
. arutla ed sortem ezniuq e arugral ed sortem ocnic e etniv , otnemirpmoc ed sortem atneuqnic e otnec : sadidem satse moc al-êzaf seveD
. arof rop e ortned rop emuteb ehl-eõp e , sotnemitrapmoc soiráv moc , asoniser ariedam aob ed acrab ednarg amu ; acra amu zaF
. arret a moc etnematnuj sol-íurtsed uoV . seled asuac rop , aicnêloiv ed aiehc átse arret a siop , sonamuh seres so sodot a mif rôp idiceD « : éoN a essid sueD , ossi roP
. sodarre sohnimac maiuges setnatibah sues so sodot siop , oãçpurroc avartnocne ós sueD , arret a arap rahlo oA
. saicnêloiv ed aiehc e adipmorroc etnematelpmoc avatse arret a , sueD araP
. tefaJ e maC , meS : sohlif sêrt eveT
. sueD ed edatnov a erpmes airpmuc e opmet ues on aivah euq atsenoh e atsuj aossep acinú a are éoN . éoN ed airótsih a é atsE
. éoN arap odarga moc uohlo ROHNES o , odutnoC
» . odairc sol-êt otnemaL . sohcib so sodot e suéc sod seva sa , siamina so , sonamuh seres so , arret ad recerapased sol-êzaf uov ; ieirc ue euq , sonamuh seres so riurtsed uoV « : oãtne uidiced ROHNES O
. etsirt otium uocif e edadinamuH a odairc ret ed anep uitnes sueD
. suam erpmes mare sonalp e seõçnetni saus sa euq e odnum on siam zev adac aicserc snemoh sod edadlam a euq uiv ROHNES O
. sogitna sopmet sod sióreh sosomaf so sesse maroF . sohlif odareg mahnit e snemoh sod sahlif sa moc odasac mahnit setselec seres so euq É . ritsixe a sioped maraunitnoc e setnagig so arret an oãtne aivaH
» . sona etniv e otnec ed méla ári oãn aicnêviverbos aus a , latrom é elE . opmet otium rop memoh o regetorp uov oãN « : oãtne essid ROHNES O
. uodarga ehl siam euq aleuqa rehlum aus arap uehlocse seled mu adac e saleb mare satse euq mariv sueD ed sohlif so
, sagirapar siam odnecsan marof e arret an asoremun siam res a uoçemoc edadinamuH a odnauQ
. tefaJ e maC , meS sohlif so marecsan ehl odnauq , edadi ed sona sotnehniuq áj ahnit éoN
. sona etes e atnetes e sotnecetes odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom cemaL
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona ocnic e atnevon e sotnehniuq adnia ueviv cemaL , éoN ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. éoN uomahc ehl ossi rop E » . acovorp son , ROHNES olep adaoçidlama , arret a euq sagidaf e sohlabart sod raivila ed-áh son euq é etsE « : uomalcxe e
ohlif mu uoreg cemaL , edadi ed sona siod e atnetio e otnec soA
. sona evon e atnesses e sotnecevon odiviv ret ed sioped uerrom mélasutaM
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona siod e atnetio e sotnecetes adnia ueviv mélasutaM , cemaL ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. cemaL uoreg mélasutaM , edadi ed sona etes e atnetio e otnec soA
. ogisnoc uovel o euq sueD ioF . otsiv res ed uoxied , sueD ed edatnov a moc odroca ed areviv erpmes euq , coneH
, sona ocnic e atnesses e sotnezert odiviv ret ed siopeD
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona sotnezert adnia ueviv ele , mélasutaM ed otnemicsan od siopeD . sueD ed edatnov a moc odroca ed erpmes ueviv coneH
. mélasutaM uoreg coneH , edadi ed sona ocnic e atnesses soA
. sona siod e atnesses e sotnecevon odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom deraJ
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona sotnecotio adnia ueviv deraJ , coneH ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. coneH uoreg deraJ , edadi ed sona siod e atnesses e otnec soA
. sona ocnic e atnevon e sotnecotio odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom leilalaM
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona atnirt e sotnecotio adnia ueviv leilalaM , deraJ ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. deraJ uoreg leilalaM , sona ocnic e atnesses soA
. sona zed e sotnecevon odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom naneuQ
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona atnerauq e sotnecotio adnia ueviv naneuQ , leilalaM ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. leilalaM uoreg naneuQ , edadi ed sona atnetes soA
. sona ocnic e sotnecevon odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom sónE
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona ezniuq e sotnecotio adnia ueviv sónE , naneuQ ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. naneuQ uoreg sónE , edadi ed sona atnevon soA
. sona ezod e sotnecevon etnarud odiviv ret ed sioped , uerrom teS
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona etes e sotnecotio adnia ueviv teS , sónE ed otnemicsan od siopeD
. sónE uoreg teS , edadi ed sona ocnic e otnec soA
. edadi ed sona atnirt e sotnecevon ahnit odnauq uerrom oãdA
. sahlif e sohlif soiráv ed iap iof e sona sotnecotio ueviv oãdA , otsid siopeD
. teS ed emon o ehl-ued e açnahlemes e megami aus à ohlif mu uoreg , sona atnirt e otnec ahnit oãdA odnauQ
. sonamuh seres sehl-uomahc e so-uooçneba sueD , sol-áirc oA . rehlum a e memoh o é odairc missa onamuh res O
. sueD oirpórp oa etnahlemes ol-êf , onamuh res o uoirc sueD odnauQ . oãdA ed setnednecsed sod atsil a é atsE
. ROHNES od emon o racovni a uoçemoc es euq oãtne edsed ioF . sónE uomahc es euq ohlif mu evet teS mébmaT
. odanissassa ahnit miaC euq , lebA riutitsbus arap , ohlif ortuo odidecnoc ahnit ehl sueD euqrop , teS ehl-uomahc e ohlif ortuo zul à ued atse e rehlum aus a moc seõçaler ovon ed evet oãdA
» . siam sezev etes e atnetes odagniv áres cemaL , sezev etes odagniv res ed ahnit miaC es , sioP
. arudacsileb selpmis amu rop , mevoj mu uo açaf em euq adiref amu rop , memoh mu ratam a otnorp uotsE . rezid uov euq oa oãçneta metserp , cemaL ed serehlum ó ; meb em-maçuo , aliS e adA « : serehlum saus sà aid mu essid cemaL
. ámaaN adamahc , ãmri amu evet miaC-labuT . orref ed e erboc ed sotnemurtsni ed eicépse a adot avajrof euq , miaC-labuT zul à ued , odal ues rop , aliS
. atualf e aprah macot euq so sodot ed odassapetna o iof etse e labuJ es-avamahc oãmri ues O
. odag mêt e sadnet me meviv euq sod odassapetna o iof euq , labaJ zul à ued adA
. aliS , artuo e adA es-avamahc amu , serehlum saud moc uosac cemaL
. cemaL ed iap iof leasuteM e leasuteM ed iap , leajueM ; leajueM ed iap iof darI ; darI ed iap iof coneH
. coneH ohlif ues od emon o ehl-ued e edadic amu uodnuf miaC otnatertnE . coneH zul à ued sioped e adivárg uocif ale e rehlum aus a moc seõçaler evet miaC
. nedÉ ed etneiro a , doN ed arret a arap reviv iof e sueD ed açneserp ad es-uotsafa miaC oãtnE
. essartnocne o meuq rop otrom res essedup oãn euq arap , miaC a lanis mu sôp ROHNES o E » . sues so ertne setrom etes açnagniv omoc árerfos miaC ratam meuQ ! muhnen odom eD « : uocilper sueD saM
» . ratam edop em rartnocne em euq aossep reuqlauq , etnarre e odidrep radna arap , it ed riguf euq revit ue e arret atsed saslupxe em ut eS
. ratropus redop o ue arap ednarg odaisamed é emirc uem O « : uednopser miaC
» . odnum olep etnarre e odidrep radna ed sáret E . azeuqir aus a et-rad a áratlov oãn ale , arret a sevitluc euq otium roP
. etsatam ut euq , oãmri uet od eugnas o uebeb euq arret alep ut sajes odaoçidlama , ossi roP
. açnagniv em-ridep a , arret ad es-atnavel , etsamarred ut euq , oãmri uet od eugnas O
? etsezif euq é euQ « : uitsisni sueD . ele uednopser , » ? oãmri uem od adraug o uos ue euq áreS . ies oãN « » ? oãmri uet o átse ednO « : miaC a uotnugrep ROHNES O
. uotam o e oãmri o uocata miaC odnauq , ál es-mavartnocnE . opmac o arap marías , oãmri ues , lebA moc odalaf ret miaC ed sioped , aid otreC
» . ol-ánimod sedop ut odutnoc E . et-recnev odnarucorp , atrop à ratierpse a odacep o snet , lam seratropmoc et es sam , adiugre açebac ed radna sedop , meb seratropmoc et eS
? arac ám oãt moc etsacif e missa etsatirri et euq é euq roP « : oãtne ehl-essid sueD
. arac ám ed e odatirri otium uocif miaC , ossi roP . atrefo aus a moc men miaC moc otiefsitas uocif oãn sam
; atrefo aus a moc e lebA moc etnetnoc uocif sueD , arO . odag ues od sairc serohlem e sariemirp sa uecerefo lebA e
arret ad sotudorp ed atrefo amu ROHNES oa uotneserpa miaC , opmet otrec mu ed mif oA
. rotlucirga iof miaC e rotsap iof lebA . miaC ed oãmri , lebA ioF . ohlif ortuo zul à ued , edrat siaM
» ! memoh ohlif mu sueD ed raçnacla iugesnoc áJ « : uomalcxe ale , miaC zul à ued odnauQ . adivárg uocif atse e , rehlum aus , avE moc seõçaler evet oãdA
. adiv ad erovrá a arap ohnimac o ridepmi a odom ed , ortuo arap odal mud aivom es euq , ogof ed adapse amu e snibureuq so nedÉ od midraj od etnaid uocoloc sueD , memoh o odaslupxe ret ed siopeD
. odamrof odis ahnit lauq ad , arret a ravitluc ri euq evet memoh o e nedÉ od midraj od o-uoslupxe , ROHNES o , sueD , ossi roP
» ! erpmes arap adiv ret e remoc eled arap , adiv ad erovrá ad oturf od rehloc mébmat áv euq atlaf ós arogA . lam o e meb o odnecehnoc , són ed mu a etnahlemes es-uonrot memoh O « : oãtne essid sueD ROHNES O
. sale moc messitsev es euq arap lamina ed elep ed sapuor rehlum aus a arap e memoh o arap uojnarra sueD ROHNES O
. sonamuh seres so sodot ed eãm a are ale euqrop , avE ed emon o rehlum aus à ued , oãdA , memoh O
» . ovon ed ramrofsnart ed-sáh et óp me e óp sé ut , edadrev aN . odamrof etsof aled siop , arret me ovon ed ramrofsnart a sahnev et aid mu euq éta , remoc arap oirássecen o rajnarra sáriugesnoc rous otium ed atsuc à óS
. opmac on ecserc euq avre a remoc ed sáret ut e sodrac e sohnipse árizudorp óS
. adiv aut a adot etnarud , otnemila rarit ed-sáh aled euq otnemirfos ednarg moc áres e , asuac aut rop adaoçidlama acif arret a , remoc ed odibiorp ahnit et ue lauq od , erovrá ad oturf od etsemoc e rehlum aut à sodivuo etsed euq áJ « : essid memoh oa E
» . it me radnam ed-áh ele sam , odiram uet olep oãçcarta etrof sáritnes , ossid rasepA . serod satium moc zul à rad euq sáret e zedivarg ad sodomócni so sarfos euq moc rezaf uoV « : essid rehlum à E
» . rahnaclac o ehl-ragamse sárarucorp ut e açebac a et-ragamse ed-áh rehlum ad aicnêdnecsed A . aled aicnêdnecsed a e aicnêdnecsed aut a omoc meb , sagimini majes rehlum a e ut euq moc ieraF
. adiv aut a adot etnarud , arret remoc e oãhc olep et-ratsarra euq sáreT . snegavles uo socitsémod , siamina so sodot ertne ut sajes atidlam , otsi etsezif euq áJ « : etnepres à oãtne essid sueD ROHNES O
» . imoc ue e em-uonagne etnepres A « : uednopser rehlum A » ? etsezif euq é euQ « : rehlum à oãtne essid sueD ROHNES O
» . imoc ue e erovrá assed oturf od ued em euq é ogimoc reviv arap etsed em euq rehlum A « : uocilper memoh O
» ? odibiorp ahnit ue euq erovrá aleuqad oturf od remoc etsof euq áreS ? un savatse euq essid et euq é meuQ « : ehl-uotnugrep sueD
» . em-idnocse e , un ratse rop , odem evit ; midraj on savadna euq ed em-ibecrepA « : uednopser memoh O
» ? sátse ednO « : uotnugrep e memoh olep uomahc sueD ROHNES O
. midraj od serovrá sad oiem on rehlum aus a moc rednocse es-iof memoh o e , edrat ad asirb alep , midraj on raessap a avadna sueD ROHNES o euq marivuo otsiN
. arutnic a rirboc meredop sale moc arap , arieugif ed sahlof oãtne maresoC . sun mavadna euq ed atnoc es-mared e sobma ed sohlo so es-marirba , otnemom esseN
. mébmat uemoc euq odiram ues oa ued e uemoc , o-uohnapA . airodebas raçnacla arap litú e atsiv à levádarga e osotitepa are euq , erovrá aleuqad oturf od remoc mob res aived euq oãtne uosnep rehlum A
» . sueD omoc lat , meb o e lam o recehnoc a oãracif e sohlo sossov so oã-es-rirba , oturf essed meremoc euq me aid on euq ebas sueD euq é ecetnoca euq O
! amuhnen arienam eD . rerrom euq mêt oãN « : ehl-uocilper etnepres A
» . somaírerrom , oturf ues on somessácot eS . midraj od oiem on átse euq erovrá ad oturf od remoc ed uibiorp son óS
. midraj od serovrá sad oturf o remoc somedop sóN « : ehl-uednopser rehlum a saM » ! midraj od serovrá sa sadot ed oturf od meremoc ed sov-uibiorp sueD oãtne euq moC « : rehlum à essid
, sueD ROHNES olep sodairc snegavles siamina so sodot ed otutsa siam o are euq , etnepres A
. ossi rop ahnogrev amuhnen meritnes mes , sun mavadna rehlum a omoc memoh o otnaT
. oproc ós mu res a macif e rehlum aus a moc rinu es arap eãm ad e iap od asac a axied memoh o , ossi roP
» . memoh od adamrof iof euqrop ; rehlum es-ramahc iaV . enrac airpórp ahnim ad e sosso soirpórp suem sod otief méugla átse iuqa , zev atseD « : uoralced etsE
. memoh oa a-uotneserpa e rehlum a zef sueD ROHNES o , memoh od odarit ahnit euq aletsoc aD
. ragul eleuqan enrac a ovon ed recserc zef e saletsoc sad amu ehl-uorit , onos o etnaruD . odnuforp otium onos mu essimrod e essecemroda memoh o euq moc zef sueD ROHNES O
. ele arap adairporpa aihnapmoc a are muhnen sam , snegavles siamina soa e seva sà , socitsémod siamina so sodot a emon ued memoh O
. maracif euq moc emon o é soviv seres sessed mu adac a avad ele euq emon O . avad sehl ele emon euq rev arap , memoh oa so-uotneserpa e seva ed e snegavles siamina ed seicépse satium arret ed mébmat uoledom sueD ROHNES o E
» . adairporpa aihnapmoc amu rajnarra ehl-uoV . ohnizos euqif memoh o euq mob é oãN « : adnia essid sueD ROHNES O
» . rerrom a odanednoc sacif , seremoc eled euq me aid oN . amuhnen arienam ed remoc sedop oãn etseD
. lam od e meb od otnemicehnoc od erovrá ad oturf od sonem , erovrá reuqlauq ed oturf od remoc sedoP « : snedro satse ehl-ued E
. radraug o arap e rahlabart elen arap , nedÉ od midraj on memoh o uocoloc sueD ROHNES O
. setarfuE o é oir otrauq o E . airíssA ad latneiro anoz an assap euq , leuqédiH es-amahc oir oriecret O
. ehcuC ed arret a adot aiedor euq , noiuG es-amahc oir odnuges O
. ilúzal-sipál e rabmâ mébmat ál áh e mob otium é arret aleuqad oruo O
. oruo otium áh edno , álivaH ed arret a aiedor euq , nohciP o é oriemirp od emon O
. setnerefid soir ortauq me edivid es sioped e midraj o ager euq oir mu ecsan nedÉ mE
. lam od e meb od otnemicehnoc od erovrá a e adiv ad erovrá a avatse midraj od oiem oN . remoc arap soturf snob mavad e atsiv à sievádarga mare euq serovrá ed eicépse a adot recsan zef , arret aD
. odaledom ahnit euq memoh o elen uocoloc e , etneiro o arap ál , nedÉ me midraj mu uoraperp sueD ROHNES O
. oviv res mu es-uonrot memoh o E . adiv e oãçaripser ehl-ued e saniran san ehl-uorpoS . arret ad orrab moc memoh o uoledom sueD ROHNES O
. sopmac so avager e arret ad ratorb a avaçemoc augá ed etnerroc amu sam
, alen rahlabart arap onamuh res muhnen aitsixe men arret a erbos avuhc a riac otief ahnit oãn sueD ROHNES o euq É . avre a odatorb ahnit men arret an satnalp aivah oãn adnia
, uéc o e arret a zef sueD ROHNES o odnauQ . arret ad e uéc od oãçairc ad airótsih a atse É
. otief ahnit euq oãçairc ed ohlabart o odot ed uosnacsed ele euq me aid o iof siop , odargas aid mu eled zef e aid omités o uooçneba sueD
. rezaf a odniv ahnit euq sohlabart sod uosnacsed sueD aid omités essen e arbo aus a odatelpmoc ahnit sueD , aid omités oN
. mêtnoc euq oliuqa odut moc , arret a e uéc o sotelpmoc maracif missA
. aid otxes o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP . mob otium are otief ahnit euq oliuqa odut euq uohca sueD E
. uecetnoca missa E » . arret a erbos madna euq soviv seres so sodot a , seva e siamina soa otnemila omoc sarudrev sa sadot uoD
. remoc meved euq ossi É . airpórp etnemes aus a moc , oturf ed serovrá sa sadot e arret ad etrap reuqlauq me metsixe euq e etnemes mezudorp euq satnalp sa sadot sov-uoD « : uounitnoc sueD
» . arret a erbos madna euq siamina so sodot erbos e uéc od seva sa e ram od sexiep so erbos menimod ; an-menimod e arret a mahcne ; maçserc e sietréf majeS « : arienam atsed so-uooçneba sueD
. rehlum a e memoh o é sueD rop odairc onamuh res etse E . sueD ed megami ariedadrev omoc o-uoirc ; megami aus à onamuh res o oãtne uoirc sueD
» . arret a erbos madna euq sohcib so sodot erbos e snegavles e socitsémod siamina so erbos ; uéc od seva sa e ram od sexiep so erbos redop ahnet ele euQ . açnahlemes e megami asson à onamuh res o somaçaF « : adnia essid sueD
. saob sasioc mare sodot euq uohca E . sohcib so sodot e socitsémod siamina ed , snegavles siamina ed seicépse sa sadot uoirc sueD
. uecetnoca missa E » . seicépse setnerefid saus sa emrofnoc , sohcib so sodot e snegavles siamina , socitsémod siamina : soviv seres ed eicépse a adot azudorp arret a euQ « : essid sueD siopeD
. aid otniuq o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP
» . mébmat meuqilpitlum es seva sa , arret me , euq e ram od saugá sa mahcne ; maçserc e sietréf majeS « : arienam atsed so-uooçneba e
saob sasioc mare euq uohca sueD E . seva ed seicépse sa sadot adnia e saugá sa maovop e mevom es euq soviv seres ed eicépse a adot e soecátec sednarg so uoirc sueD E
» . raov a seva ajah otnemamrif o e arret a ertne euq e soviv seres ed sadaovop majes saugá sa euQ « : sioped essid sueD
. aid otrauq o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP
. saob sasioc mare oliuqa euq uohca sueD E . oãdirucse a e zul a ertne oãçarapes a missa odnezaf , etion à e aid oa meridiserp e
arret a meranimuli arap , otnemamrif on so-uocoloC
. salertse sa adnia e , etion à ridiserp arap , auL a , oneuqep siam o e , aid oa ridiserp arap , loS o , seled roiam o : soriezul sednarg siod so zef sueD
. uecetnoca missa E » . arret a ranimuli arap mébmat mavris , uéc on sodacoloc , soriezul sesse euq E
. sona so e said so , opmet od seõsivid sa racram arap lanis ed mavris sele euq e ; etion ad aid o meriugnitsid arap , otnemamrif on soriezul matsixe euQ « : oãtne essid sueD
. aid oriecret o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP
. saob sasioc mare oliuqa euq uohca sueD E . amu adac ed airpórp etnemes a moc , oturf ed serovrá e , edadilauq aus a emrofnoc , etnemes oãd euq , savre ed eicépse a adot uizudorp arret A
. uecetnoca missa E » . airpórp etnemes a ahnetnoc oturf o euq e edadilauq aus a emrofnoc amu adac , oturf meêd euq serovrá e etnemes meêd euq satnalp e savre azudorp arret a euQ « : adnia essid sueD
. saob sasioc mare oliuqa odut euq uohca E . sadinuer missa saugá sà ram uomahc e emrif arret à arret uomahc sueD
. uecetnoca missa E » . emrif arret a atsiv à euqif euq e ragul ocinú mun metnuj es uéc od oxiabed oãtse euq saugá sa euQ « : oãtne essid sueD
. aid odnuges o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP . otnemamrif etse a uéc uomahc sueD
. uecetnoca missa E . amic ed odal od oãtse euq sad oxiab ed odal od oãtse euq saugá sa missa odnarapes , otnemamrif o oãtne zef sueD E
» . sartuo sad samu rarapes sa arap , saugá sa ertne otnemamrif mu atsixe euQ « : essid sueD siopeD
. mu aid o : ãhnam a oiev e edrat amu uossaP . etion , oãdirucse à e aid zul à uomahc sueD E
. oãdirucse ad a-uorapes e aob asioc amu are zul a euq uohca sueD
. ritsixe a uoçemoc zul a E » ! atsixe zul a euQ « : essid sueD oãtnE
. sueD ed otirípsE o avariap saugá sa erbos sam ; oãdirucse ed otreboc odnuforp ram mu arE . medro mes e amrof mes avatse arret a
, arret a e uéc o uoirc sueD odnauq , oipícnirp oN
